1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrIdz+nyA nA dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud): dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal kun tu bzang
1b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// ngo mtshar rmad du
2a1(rgyud): byung ba yi// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // ye shes gang lags
2a2(rgyud): 'bar ba gang // dpal ni gang legs bdag la gsungs// 'jigs byed chen pos bka'
2a3(rgyud): stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// gnyis med bde chen ro las byung // gzung
2a4(rgyud): 'dzin mtha' spangs rang rig go/ sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes re// rang byini brlabs pa
2b1(rgyud): lte bar te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsang bar ro// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod pu ltar// zung du gnas shing
2b2(rgyud): ring du 'gyur// de nyid drang dang kha dbye dang // rgyas par bya ba gsum yod do// dang por drang ba'i rnam pa yang //
2b3(rgyud): 'drongs pa'i tshad ni gsum yod do// sgo ga sum yon tan gsum ldan na// sor bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges/
2b4(rgyud): 'bring la sor gnyis tha ma la// sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung // sbom phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam// dang /
2b5(rgyud): po bya gdong nyid na gnas// rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bzhi// stong pa bcu drug khams bco brgyad//
3a1(rgyud): #nyi shu lte bar nyi shu la// snying ka ru ni gnas pa'o// sman la sogs pa kun ldan pas// drang ba'i sbyor
3a2(rgyud): ba brtsam par bya// rnam snang ska rags bcing ba dang // rgyab yol dbul dang mchod pa dbul// gdan khri dbul dang sku
3a3(rgyud): khrus dbul// sman mchod dbul dang ma mchod dbul// de nas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// kun rdzob lce yi rtse mo'am//
3a4(rgyud): khro mo mdzub mo'i rtse mo yi// bdud rtsi ril bu legs byas te// mkhas pas rigs bya'i mchod pa 'bul// mngon du shes
3a5(rgyud): pa gdon mi za// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// khams gsum mchod par gdon mi za// dar ram med tri sor bzhi'i
3a6(rgyud): tshad// rked par ska rags dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// ras bal la sogs rgyab yol dbul//
3b1(rgyud): shing bu rigs dang mthun pa yi/ sgom phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam/ dri med thun dang sum ldan pa'i// khrag rdzim paskyed mchod rdzas kyis/ khye ro na na'i lam du mchod/
3b2(rgyud): dri ma chu yi khrus byas te// khrus kyis lus la mchod pa dbul/ sman dang snum gyi phye ma yis// sgo gnyis dag tu mchod pa dbul// shin tu dro ba'i me dag gis/ gdum
3b3(rgyud): mo'i me la mchod pa dbul/ rked pa'i tshad mnyam karti ka/ gdan khri bsgrub pa'i mchod pa dbul// de yis 'drongs par gdon mi za// de nas rgyas par bya ba yang // gzhan
3b4(rgyud): ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma kun// rgyas par byed pa'i lam yin te/ brgyad pa'i sbyor ba gsum byas na// dper na me tog pad+ma bzhin// de nas dbye ba'i rim
3b5(rgyud): pa yang / gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste// dus gsum lce yi rtse mos kyang // bskyod na nges par kha 'byed de// de nyid gsum ni me rang bzhin// me 'bar ba yi rkyen gyur pa/
3b6(rgyud): rlung nyid yin par gsungs pa ste// rkyen des me nyid 'bar ba bshad// gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye brag dang // srog rtsol rlung ni dbu mar dgag/ bum pa zhabs med rlung phul nas// sgo dgu phyi
3b7(rgyud): rol drag tu bud// lus kyi ngal dub cha bsnyam ste// sbyong ba rdzogs na bde ba'i rkyen// bde ba las ni rdo rje 'chang / bde ba yis ni bde ba 'grub// rgyu bde ba las 'bras bu bde// rgyu yi nang
4a1(rgyud): na 'di mchog la// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog go// de nas bde ba'i rkyen gyur pa// srid pa dag ga dang rlung dgag pa// gnas nas gnas su rten bzung ste/
4a2(rgyud): g.yas brkyang bas ni rom dgag/ dpa' bo g.yas nas mkha' 'gro g.yon// g.yon brkyang bas ni brkyang ma ste// sa gas kun dang ma ru gzung // de bzhin thub pos dbu mar gzung // de dag kun gyi/
4a3(rgyud): bye brag kyang // dpa' bos g.yas dang gzhan gyis g.yon// de bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye brag kyang // dril can bu gu dgu lam gyi// rlung rgyu phyi ru bus byas te// rkang lag
4a4(rgyud): drug tu bsgrims byas na// zin par 'di la the tsom med// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis// thun mong du ni bya bar gsungs// bai ro tsa na las kyi rlung // gzhan yang lam brgyad rlung rnams dag
4a5(rgyud): dang po nyid du bsdams byas na// zin par 'di la the tsom med// dbye ba bsdams pa'i man ngag go// byed pa spel mar sos gyur na// mi zin pa la the tsom med// gnas gsum dag tu k+Sha bsams te/
4a6(rgyud): dbugs gsum pa yis yar drangs te// lte ba'i rkyen la drangs kyang zin// 'di ni gang zag mchog gis yin// mdzes pa'i spyi bo de nyid la// chen du bkan dang thur du bkan// drang por g.yas
4a7(rgyud): g.yon ba tsan thabs la// ka ti'i gzer ni bcan thabs gcig/ sbom po khra mos mnan pa ste// bla ma'i zhal nas ma grangs na// lus kyi nad gzhi kun nas rtse// chu skyes chu so spangs la sogs/
4b1(rgyud): lus smad nad sna nyi shu 'byung // gzhan yang btsan thabs bcu gnyis ni// tha ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tha ma mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// lus srog longs spyod thams cad kyis/
4b2(rgyud): dus gsum maN+Dal dang bcas mchod// lus srog gtang bar 'phangs pa bas// man ngag dam pa de bas 'phangs// de bas btsan thabs legs par sra// man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'drubs/
4b3(rgyud): de nyid rgyud du shes par bya// zab mo'i don ston rgyal por gsungs// rdo rje phag mo la sogs rnams// gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad byung 'di// khyod la gtad do dam du spos// kun la spel na dam
4b4(rgyud): tshig nyams// kye ma rgyud 'di'i don 'di la// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// thams cad ngo mtshar cher skyes te// dga' zhing mgu nas yi rang ngo //
4b5(rgyud): dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang cher gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// sing ga gling gi rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / dge
4b6(rgyud): slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+d+ra ma le n+d+han dza/ bod sad du/ dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyirgyal
4b7(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mgon po rdo cha can// grol ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// nges pa gang lags chad gang lags// rang bzhin grub pa'i slar lags ki mnan sa/
5a1(rgyud): bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin thub pa sgrub 'dod pas// bla ma'i bka' drin legs mnos te// du khrod la sogs/
5a2(rgyud): sa phyogs su// bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan// brtags pa las dang po yi gnas// gang zag mchog la brtag tu med// yon tan ldan pa'i sar 'jug ste// bla med sems gzung /
5a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// sgo gsum ngal ba'i tshad brtag ste// bcing ba gsum ni nges bsgoms pas// skye ba gcig gis 'grub par nges// dbugs bcing kun rdzob sna n+der yid// yid bcing sor bzhi'i/
5a4(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams// sems bcing rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu rkyen las ni sna tshogs las// sems can mos pa sna tshogs 'byung // de dag bcing gsum dag pa yis// sems can bcings
5a5(rgyud): las nges par grol// bla ma'i nal nas shes par bya// 'du shes gsum gyi cha las grol// thig le cha gsum phra mo no// yan lag lnga ldan 'byung ba'i rim// sgra dang rang rig re rer snang // stong nyid
5a6(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab tshul// sa dang lam sogs rim pa kun// rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar// de nas sgrol ma'i tshad bstan te// tshad ni spyi dang bye brag ste// brgya phrag gnyis
5a7(rgyud): dang bcu gnyis dang // yi ge gsum las nges 'byung ba// gsang ba gcod pa'i drud kyi tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu la// yi ge bcu dgu las 'byung po// rin chen 'phreng ba'i nges
5b1(rgyud): / cu gas zhu / thugs / sa
5b2(rgyud): gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// brgya sun gnyis yi ge gcig/ rin chen 'bang ba'i ldang chad do// sum can gcig yi ga no// nyi shurtsa gnyis las rlung ba// rnamamakha' mnyam pa'i rgya
5b3(rgyud): yin no// drug curtsa drug yi ge drug/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi tshad// drug cu yi ge nyi shu gcig/ gsang ba rdo rjer rab tu grags// drug cu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba// bcu drug stobs po
5b4(rgyud): tsheche yi tshad// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yi ge lnga// nam mkha' chen po'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ ye shes par ri'i ljang tshad do/ kum cu drug 'i ge dgu/ shes 'phreng ba'i tsha yin/ u chun bshizhinyi shu bzhi// mkha' 'gro gsang
5b5(rgyud): ba'i tshad yin no// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag/ me yi 'phreng ba'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis bco brgyad dag/ ye shes rgyal po'i ldang tshad do// bdun
5b6(rgyud): cu rtsa brgyad rkang pa phyed// chags pa'i rgyal po'i tshad yin no// tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu lnga// ye shes bsam pa'i ldang tshad do// dgu bcu go brgyad las byung ba// ye shes gsang ba'i tshad
5b7(rgyud): yin no// nyi shu thams pa gang yin pa// gsang ba rjorje rgyal po'i tshad// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis ni// rdo rje rgyal po'i re la'i tshad// lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi ge bcu// dur khrod rgyan gyi ldang
6a1(rgyud): tshad do// sam ts+tsha na gsum mi gni bcu drug pa 'a 'grom sdom dzad/ rdza bsu yi ge bcwo lnga las// thung bags ba bdudan ci'i rgyal/ ba bcul zung gi/
6a2(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i gzhung tshad do// sum cu yi ge bcu drug las// thung ba zla ba'i 'phreng tshad do// de nas nges par bshad bya ste// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gang ston pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dam tshig dag
6a3(rgyud): ston pa dam tshig chen por nges// dgra drug sten pa stobs po che// dbang bzhi dag sgrub gsang ba gcod// rang rig de ston bsam mi khyab// yi ge gsum ston rin chen 'bar// sgo gsum lam ston nam
6a4(rgyud): mkha' mnyam// bcom ldan la sogs the tsom med// ston pa nam mkha'i chen po ste// dbang bzhi'i de nyid gang ston pa// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud du nges// lta spyod rmad du gang byung ba//
6a5(rgyud): ston pa ye shes 'phreng bar nges// gleng ba spang rnam pa lnga yi don// ston pa mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud// he ru ka dpal gang ston pa// me yi 'phreng ba'i rgyud du grags// dbang gsum don ni gang
6a6(rgyud): ston pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ra ling nges// snod bcud rin chen sngon byed pa// rin nen 'phreng ba'i ri ling nges// lhan cig skyes smon ye shes bsam// rdo rje rnyog pa med pa'o// b+ha li de nyid gang
6a7(rgyud): ston pa/ chags pa'i rgyal por lir nges// nges pa lnga sngon rdo rnga rgyal// rig a ra li zhes grags// drang khrod brgyad sngon dur khrod rgyan// dam tshig sdom pa mkha' 'gro gsum// smon pa mkha' 'gro
6b1(rgyud): rnam pa// kyim tsha la mongs gyu na pa/ / 'phrul pa 'phru gas / / na/
6b2(rgyud): nges sgrub gsum ston zla 'phreng // rgyud sogs lnga ston ye shes 'bar// de nas 'khor thams cad dga' nas rgyud thams cad kyi don la yi rang bar gyur to// dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
6b3(rgyud): rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya ng+ga ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @rgya gar skad du/
6b4(rgyud): shrI rat+na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// he he rdo rje snying po dang // mkha' spyod ma la sogs pa dag/ sgra
6b5(rgyud): gsum legs par bsdus nas ni// ral chen po'i dbye ba nyon// la las byung ba thabs kyi rgyud// ra las byung ba shes rab rgyud// i phyis a las gnyis med rgyud// thabs ni sku ste shes rab gsung /
6b6(rgyud): gnyis med thugs su shes par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// nyi shu rtsa ba'i byung ba'o// a la la ho e ma'o// thabs ni la las ji ltar byung // mas shes rangs grug sa 'ams ye cir byung /
6b7(rgyud): gsung thugs su ji ltar 'gyur// nyi shu ma bzhir ji ltar dbye// e ma go mgon pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// a las a ba d+hU tI ste// 'di nyid las ni gnyis med chung //
7a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas dang myu brtag/ lulas la lan yin// de las thabs kyi rgyud byung ba'aM// rgyu gnas dang bor brtag/ dmas ras ma sa// 'di nyi las ni shes/
7a2(rgyud): rab kyi// ra li 'byung ba'i rgyud dang gnas// rin chags phyir shes rab ste// shes rab yi ge bcudrug pang // la ni nu pa byid thabs yin te/ thabs kyi yi ge bcu bzhi'i 'ang // thog ma med nas pa
7a3(rgyud): skyes pa// e ni gnyis med rang bzhin te// gnyis med blo yi spyod yul min// blo dang sgrani kun rdzob phyir// g.yas ni thabs yin la la nA// g.yon pa shes rab sa na// a ba d+hU tI gnyis su med//
7a4(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyi// ra li'i ngo bo shes par bya// 'dod chags rdul la lus ni thabs// la la nA ni sku yin te// gti mug mun pa dag dang yang // shes rab ra sa nA ni gsung // zhe sdang snying
7a5(rgyud): stobs yid yin te// thugs te gsum gyis 'gyur ba'o// sku la brgyad de gsung la brgyad// thugs la brgyad de nyi shu bzhi// ra li nyi shu bzhi ru nges// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang // tsaN+Da li dang
7a6(rgyud): phyag dag dang // mkha' 'gro 'byung po nyi shu bzhi// de nyid brda ru nges pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas so// gnas dang mkha' 'gro ra'i dbye// sku gsum dun de nyid bsdu// dang por rgyud kyi
7a7(rgyud): nges pa dang // rgyu yi gnas dang gnas nges pa// gtangs nges dang go rims nges// grangs des rigs nges bco lngar nges/ mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa yi// dman pa'i rim pas dang por gsungs/
7b1(rgyud): dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rnas/ derjes rnal byung ba yin te// cesu pa phrul bye nal 'byor dru// phrinas rnal 'byor ba rgya // ngad mang yongs su bca gyi'o// d+ha so Sh+T+ri d+d+ha/
7b2(rgyud): gsungs te// de nas bshad pa'i rgyud nyid do// de nas rgyud ni phyi ma'o// de rjes phyi ma'i phyim ste// rim pa bcu ni bskor ba ste// snod ngan dman pa'i rim pas gsungs// me tog snying po'i bdun
7b3(rgyud): bzhin du// phyi yi phyi nas bdud rtsi'i ro// ra li'i snying po snying po'i rgyud// dang por la las su yi rgyud// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mas zhus nas// sku yi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// de rjes
7b4(rgyud): las gsung gyi rgyud// gsung gi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// phyi nas a las thugs kyi rgyud// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// gnyis med ye shes bdud rtsi'i ro// lus las lus
7b5(rgyud): gsal mig gis lus// gsal ba'i phyir ni sgron ma ste// seng ge'i gzugs 'dra bdud rtsi'i ro// nyi ma'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i zer// 'brug gi sgra 'dra rgya mtsho'i gting // chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ri rab lhun//
7b6(rgyud): u dum wAr 'dra'i zhing gi rdul// 'di la 'dod 'dod tshol ba dang // rtog ge pa yis dpyad du med// gal te rang 'dod dpyad gyur na// dpa' bo mkha' 'gre khros gyur te// mgo lus tshal pa brgya ru
7b7(rgyud): 'gas// de bas rang gi chung ma dang // bu dang yul 'khor lus ngag gis// bla ma dam pa mnyes bya ste// chu bo rgyun 'dra'i man ngag blang // kye ma'o mgon po snying rje can// ra li'i dbye ba de ltar na//
8a1(rgyud): #/ de'i chen po ji ltar lags// nang du nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// nges pa skur yang bdag la gsungs// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// ma spangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// ra li dzi/
8a2(rgyud): ni chen por nges// re re la yang chen po bdun// gang zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la// rgyu nyid gtso bor gyur pa ste// sa lu las ni myu gu bzhin// de phyir dang po rgyu mi spang // lhan cig skyes gnyis rgyu yin te//
8a3(rgyud): rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang // lhan cig lhan cig skyes pa'o// thun mong dang ni thun mong min// bla ma'i zhal nas shes byi'i phyir// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i zhal yin te// de nyid ston pa'i bka' las
8a4(rgyud): 'das// de las 'khrul pa zhing re rje// phung sogs rtsa dang shu la ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te// log rtog 'khrul pa rgyar 'dod dang // ngobo ma grub rgyur 'dod dang // kun rdzob byang sems
8a5(rgyud): d+hu dod pa// 'di ni rmongs pa mjungs pa// phung po 'byung ba dbang po dang / khri yi skye mtshod dman pa'i d+ha/ btags pa rjid 'dod meng rje/ namama'i'i ma rtog ga jigag/
8a6(rgyud): pa la na/ na nas pa lashes / ga gas sa// da byang chub rnams // na sa
8b1(rgyud): sa me/ zhan gyis panyis myed rkyen min ge/ nyid nga ba mi byazhing / las kyi rlung me dang / na na gyur byung nga/ seM pa led dang bde ba yin// masu mi
8b2(rgyud): ba yang / mi srung ba ni bzhi pa'o// lus dang lus kyi snying po \u0f7f// gnas dang gnas chen mi spang ba// lnga pa drug pa yin par 'dod// de nyid byi dang nang du shes/ phyi nang dbye ba ma mangs pas
8b3(rgyud): snang ba dang ni mun pa'i cha// gang ba dang ni stong pa'i char// 'pho ba ma sangs brgyad pa'o// nu mi gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas// de nyid kyi srang shes par bya// rin po che la po zang du// dz+nyAn nimi spang
8b4(rgyud): gzung // gal te de ru ma zin na// shor ba mi sdang ro mar bstim// gnyen po me spang gzugs sku gnyis// ma spangs pa ni bcu gnyis pa'o// nor bu'i rten las skyes pa yi// bde ba la brten dbang po yi/
8b5(rgyud): sgo bsdu ngo bo ma spangs pa'o// gong 'og khyad par shes byas nas// sgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// dga' ba mchog dga' shes byas te// sdod du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// 'khor ba lugs las bzlog bya
8b6(rgyud): ste/ gnas nas gnas su zlog byed pa// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid rim par 'pho byed pa// bla ma'i tha ma las brgyud shes// 'khor bar 'jug ldog bye brag ni// 'pho ba ma spangs rnam pa
8b7(rgyud): gnyis// ye shes me ni cher 'bar bas// phung po 'byung po dbang po sogs// thams cad bdud rtsir gyur pa ni// rkyen gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang // brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos
9a1(rgyud): po kun// bde ba'i dbor gang snang ba// ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// bzhin mdzes mig sangs phyug
9a2(rgyud): sbyid// ldan pa phyag rgya ma spangs pa'o// dam tshig chos kyi phyag rgya dang // de nas ye shes phyag rgya che// phyag rgya'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// chags pa'i phyag rgya las yin te// dam tshig chos ni ma ni
9a3(rgyud): gi/ phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes phyag rgya chen po gnyis// grol ba'i phyag rgya yin par 'dod// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por gsang ba'i 'khor lor te// phyi nas rang bzhin
9a4(rgyud): 'khor lor yin// 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang po gsang ba'i gtum mo ste// gnyis par rang bzhin gtum mo ni// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// las kyi rlung dang me gnyis ni// kun
9a5(rgyud): rdzob 'khor ba'i rkyen yin te// ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni// don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// srid pa bskyed cing 'dzag pa bde// kun rdzob shu kra'i las yin no//
9a6(rgyud): srid pa mi len rang rig skyes// don dam byang sems las yin no// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// sbyor thabs rtse ni rgyas pa dang // kha 'byed pa yi las yin te// sbyor thabs bzhi la ma rmongs pa//
9a7(rgyud): 'di ni ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// spyi mthun las la grub pa yi// mig drug la sogs grangs kyis bstan// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// bla ma'i dus thabs legs par bsten// mi spangs nges
9b1(rgyud): pa'i gdams gzung / 'di nyid do 'ang shi rtswa/ de las byung ba 'ad par 'bras/ dang por ma mkhrig pa dang / tshul dang tshul can mchog gan ma cho// 'dinyid deng dug sbyin te/ dang/
9b2(rgyud): drug ni tsaN+Dali// re re la yang zin pa'i rtse/ tsaN+Di mAn ni gu bzhi// de 'i nyi shurtsa bzhir nges// phyi ru gnas ni nyi shu bzhi// spyan dang phyag rgya'i bu bzhi// tsaN+Da lI dang ral yi// byi dang nang du blangs
9b3(rgyud): sru ngas// he he dpa' bo rdo rje 'chang // ra li 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags// ra lo'i ngo bo gang gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sku dang phyag mtshan rags pa kun// ra li'i
9b4(rgyud): ngo bo dman pa'i lam// mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// sgo gsum la gnas khyad par gyi// ra li'i ngo bor gsungs pa yin// dga' ba bcu drug rten dang bcas// zab pa'i ra li'i ngo bor brtag
9b5(rgyud): rang rig stong pa thabs dang bcas// mthar thug ra lir shes par bya// a ni thog mar ma skyes pa// la ni nub dang skyong ba ste// ra ni chags dang rin po che// ra las 'dod chags khrags yin te/
9b6(rgyud): la las zhe sdang khu ba'o// a las gti mug khu ba ste// sems can ra li'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga dang sa bcu sogs// kun la ldan pas ra lir gnas// sku yi ra li spyi bo yi/
9b7(rgyud): gtsug tor dag las byung ba'o// gsung ni ljags kyi dbang po las// thugs kyi ra li thugs ka nas// byung ba rnam par nges pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// spyan rnams la ni rang bzhin
10a1(rgyud): byung // su gsung thugs kyi gnas las te// spyi bo la sogs dag las byung // phyag gi mthil nas rim pas byung // tha ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya// bye brag 'byung ba'i
10a2(rgyud): sgo yin te// he he sems can sangs rgyas kyi// rang bzhin sa dang lam ldan te// zla ba bcu sogs sa sogs ni// rngus skyes la sogs ji ltar lags// 'on te sangs rgyas min nam ci/
10a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad gdod ma nas// sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste// rdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsher sogs// sems kyi gnas bcu sa bcu ste// rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub lnga//
10a4(rgyud): mkhan po sems kyi rgyal po ste// rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin// rang bzhin gnas pa kha spu bregs// a dang haM gnyis sngags kyi don// thams cad sems la gnas pa ste// sam
10a5(rgyud): med sangs rgyas ma yin te// ngam grog la sogs bems po'o// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul dang yang // bag la
10a6(rgyud): nyal dang kun tu rgyu// nus pa'i tshul dang mngon sum tshul// gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtag/ sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no// de ltar sems can sangs rgyas pas// nga 'i
10a7(rgyud): sems can rang bzhin phyir// lus la sku yi phyag rgyas gdab// ngag la gsung gi phyag rgyas gdab// sems la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du// dngos po
10b1(rgyud): ngomanyam thur pal// sangs rgyas sems can sa la yod/ dgran dang mnom ga la spyod/ 'khor ba mongs su shes pal// mdun 'das zhes de la brjod// gams cad 'a gas drun ngon/
10b2(rgyud): spong // 'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyis// legs par gtad kyis dam du so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur tem snang bar gyur to// dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i drud kyi
10b3(rgyud): rgyal po rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i 'phreng ba dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
10b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sUr+ya tsakra tan+ta rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la la tse
10b5(rgyud): dpal po kye// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// bskyed dang rdzogs pa chen po yi// ma spangs pa dang nges pa dge/ mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
10b6(rgyud): dang po ma spangs bshad bya ste// phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i zlum spangs// phyag mtshan nyi zla yig 'bru dang // bla ma'i man ngag rkyen ma spangs// lus dge sgo
10b7(rgyud): bsdams dam tshig las// sku gnyis 'byung ba 'bras ma spangs// zhe sdang ru trar skye bo'i las// zhe sdang rang rig bskyed pa dang // lus kyi dri ma 'khrud pa las// las kyi dbye ba ma
11a1(rgyud): / spangs pa'o// pu li ra dang dza lan sogs// nang du spyi bo spyi gtsug sogs// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// shar sogs bdud kyi snying ka ru/ zhabs gnas/
11a2(rgyud): gnas chen ma spangs pa// gnas de phyi dang nang du shes// gnas kyi dbye ba mi spangs pa'o// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhin// phung sogs lha ru 'pho byed na// 'di ni 'pho ba ma spangs
11a3(rgyud): pa'o// rgyu yi gnas ni snying ka ste// 'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sogs te// ma spangs pa ni gnyis su shes// phung sogs sgyu mar 'dzin byed pa// 'di ni rten pa ma spangs pa'o// gal
11a4(rgyud): te nang du ma zin na// phyi ru de nyid ngo bor bsgom// de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po ma spangs sgyu mar bsgom// phung sogs la rten lha rnams la// sgo gsum ngo bo ma spangs pa/
11a5(rgyud): tha mal pa dang bskyed rim gnyis// gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste// sgyu ma gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// bdun po rnam dag la sogs pa// sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs rtog
11a6(rgyud): pa las log nas// phra ba'i gnas su gnas pa byed// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lha yi rnam par 'jug pa dang // gang du sgyu mar bzlog pa gnyis// 'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs
11a7(rgyud): nyid// ye shes me ni cher 'bar te// phung sogs sgyu mar gang 'dzin pa// rten gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun 'gags te// thams cad rten dang brten par snang /
11b1(rgyud): jiba'i khyad par ma grangs pa// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i byung par ma spangs pa'o// shes rab pag mom sangs pa// phyag rnam sangs pa bu 'dod// ma grangs gcig ni gzhan da /
11b2(rgyud): gong 'og las kyi khyad par ro// zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags gsung // gti ga su yi phyag rgya sa// phyag d+ha'i dbye ba ma spangs pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor lo// bde ba chen po'i 'byo
11b3(rgyud): lo dag/ 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang po sgyu ma ye shes me// gnyis pa sgyum ltar snang ma// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs sgyu ma las g.yo zhing // phung sogs
11b4(rgyud): sgyu mas yang dag sreg/ kun rdzob rtogs pa'i rkyen yin te// sgyu ma ltar snang las g.yo zhing // sgyu ma de nyid ltar bsregs pa// don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o//
11b5(rgyud): 'khor ba spel zhing rnam rtog bskyed// kun rdzob bden pa sems kyi las// 'khor bar mi 'khor rang rig bskyed// don dam sems kyi las yin te// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa// 'di dag
11b6(rgyud): ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o// gsang dbang bla ma'i zhal nas blang // shes rab ye shes gzhan du'o// bzhi pa'i ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// rang rig lhan cig skyes pa yi//
11b7(rgyud): na #sa pa pam mams / sa
12a1(rgyud): 'og min gnas// gnas dang gnas chen ma spangs pa// de nyid phyi dang nang du nges// phyi nang dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// stong pa dang ni gzung 'dzin char// 'pho ba ma
12a2(rgyud): spangs a dang haM// rten ma spangs te rtog pa la// sems 'phros de nyid rang rig bsgom// shor ba ma spangs par rig pa// dbang po'i sgo bsdu ngo ma spangs// rtog bcom gnyen po ma
12a3(rgyud): spangs pa// rang rig spyi la sems pa las// sngon du ma spangs ma spangs brgyad// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// spyi dang rang rig mtshan nyid la// 'pho ba ma spangs rang rig bsgom//
12a4(rgyud): phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las// 'phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung // las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dad med bla ma ma bsten dang // bla ma dam
12a5(rgyud): pa ma rnyed dang // ma spangs ngo bor ma shes par// rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs// dper na sbrul gyi 'o ma bzhin// de nas nges pa bco lnga yang // rgyu
12a6(rgyud): dang rkyen dang gnas dang yang // gtad pa go rim grangs dang ril// nges pa bdun ni gzhan du gsungs// sngags ni spros bcas spros med des// rkyen ni ye shes me rlung nges// rgyu 'bras
12a7(rgyud): gnas ni a haM nges// dbang bzhi gong 'og khyad par nges// sun 'byin gnyen po nges pa dang // ngo bo nges dang dbye ba nges// las nges pa dang bco lnga ste// de las byung ba'i nges pa dag/ bcu
12b1(rgyud): bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes// ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongs su shes gyur na// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten
12b2(rgyud): 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // gong bu chu dang gzugs su gnas// de bzhin gzugs las 'das pa ste// gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang // rgyud ni nges pa kho na ste/
12b3(rgyud): rgyud ni dbang po'i ngo bor gnas// de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // 'bad pas bla ma mnyes bya ste// rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang // de yi man ngag shes par bya// bla ma mnyes par ma byas/
12b4(rgyud): shing // dbang rnams thob pa ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs byed pa ni// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// de bas 'bad de nan tan bya// dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
12b5(rgyud): rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
12b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas//
12b7(rgyud): kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs// gang phyir sems can thams cad kyis// mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir// dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te// bla ma'i rjes su 'jug par bya// rang rig
13a1(rgyud): gnyis su med pa la// gzhan rig gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gzod nas ma skyes ma grub la// skyes dang grub par 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la// dman
13a2(rgyud): dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrul// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par brjod pa la// sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas 'khrul// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la// rgyu dang rkyen gyis
13a3(rgyud): skye bas 'khrul// brda dang tha snyad bral ba la// blo yi spyod yul byed pas 'khrul// mtha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la// rtag dang chad par 'dzin pas 'khrul// shes brjod yul las 'das
13a4(rgyud): pa la// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// rnam rtog kun gyis stong pa la// dngos por rjes su 'dzin pas 'khrul// rang nyid gnyis su med
13a5(rgyud): pa la// bden pa gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul ba yi// theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la// sgro dang skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs
13a6(rgyud): kyis// las kyi rnam smin la sogs la// blta bas skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// rang rig gzod nas 'od gsal la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod pas
13a7(rgyud): 'khrul// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste// 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa las 'das na// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang zhe sdang
13b1(rgyud): chen po dang // de bzhin zhe sdang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// de bzhin gti mug bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis nges par grol 'gyur gyi// 'di spangs gzhan gyis grol/
13b2(rgyud): bamin// bdag po lha dang bla ma spun// bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam// theg pa spyi bsdus de las gzhan// skye bo'i bems po che dang brgyad// de dag rang rig thob pa'i rgyu// de phyir dam
13b3(rgyud): tshig gtso bor bsrungs// 'bras bu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung // kye ma mgon po kye sangs rgyas// 'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na// de yi ngo bo ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs de dang 'dra// rdo
13b4(rgyud): snying po snying rje che// legs par nyon la yid la zung // las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi// rgyu 'bras mi shes gti mug ste// lus sems kun nas 'khrugs pa dag/ zhe sdang yin te sgo gsum gyis//
13b5(rgyud): kun nas bslang ste nor bu'i mthar// sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chags so// dbang sogs ngo bo gang ma shes// 'dod chags la sogs chen por nges// rang rig ngo bo gang la gnas// 'og ma spongs pa'i
13b6(rgyud): gnyen po ste// ngo bo sgyu mar gang shes dang // dbang po'i sgo bsdus thabs yin te// gong ma skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i// phyir yang chen por gyur pa ste// gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang // de las
13b7(rgyud): gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang / mang po mi mos spong ba dang // nyon mongs spyi yis zil mnon// bye brag 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs// zil gyis mi non 'og ma yi// nam chog gang yang mi skye dang //
14a1(rgyud): nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag spong // gnyen po yin par nges pa dang // nyon mongs snga rtse tsam mi skye// gnyis ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// bcu gnyis 'dod chags chen po dag/ bcom ldan/
14a2(rgyud): 'das su gsungs pa ste// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no// zab mo'i lha spyod ma rtogs par// sngags spyod bzlas pa la sogs byed// de dag ngal ba don med yin// de dag bla ma dam pa lags//
14a3(rgyud): man ngag dam pa btsal bya ste// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi las// sad par byed pa'i cho ga zang // de'i tshe rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba'i/
14a4(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya ng+gir dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// /
14a5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ki nI gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon rdzogs mgon po kye/
14a6(rgyud): dbang rnams dam pa yod dam ci// gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung ji ltar mchis// de nyams bshags/
14a7(rgyud): thabs yod dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig ye shes thugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor
14b1(rgyud): sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges pa kho na ste// lus ngag kun nas bzang ba la// de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni// 'khrud dang gtor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas//
14b2(rgyud): sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' lta bu gsungs pa skye// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa/
14b3(rgyud): 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs/
14b4(rgyud): ba yan lag go/ 'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel bas so// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste/
14b5(rgyud): slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin// 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i//
14b6(rgyud): gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang // ras dang tshon pa la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin rlabs ye shes dbab byas nas// lha yin zer nas mchod
14b7(rgyud): sogs te// bcos ma la sogs de ltar na// phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi/
15a1(rgyud): bcos ma nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba yin pa lta bu yi// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te/ log pa'i sred pas sred par 'ching // 'khrul pa'i 'khor los
15a2(rgyud): 'khor bar 'khor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi bu yi bdud spangs te// tha ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// yid ches rig dang nges pa skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og
15a3(rgyud): ma spangs shing gong ma thob// man ngag tshad ma yin pa blang // mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing // che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten ltar spyod dang 'dres pa'i// snod bcud blang bar
15a4(rgyud): mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste// rgyan gyi khyad par thar pa'o// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang //
15a5(rgyud): phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis// gtso bo 'khor las khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa lnga dag gis// pha rol
15a6(rgyud): phyin pa'i ming mi thob// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur// dper na rgyal po
15a7(rgyud): med pa yi// grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku
15b1(rgyud): gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang /
15b2(rgyud): 'dra/ tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob
15b3(rgyud): bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag dang // rang sems las su
15b4(rgyud): rung ba dang // ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongs su rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su snang //
15b5(rgyud): tha dad par ni mi rtag ste// chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang rig rtogs pa na// sems can gdod nas sangs rgyas so//
15b6(rgyud): rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi/ dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang /
15b7(rgyud): gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na// srog gcod nyams pa chung ngur nges// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor ba dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de las bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig
16a1(rgyud): ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges// cher blangs nyon mongs chung ma 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs cher//
16a2(rgyud): de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos lhung ba chen po ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dag/ brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi// che 'bring chung ngu'i ldang
16a3(rgyud): tshad dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka yis// rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// ltung ba'i ngo bos zin pa dang // phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs// tshul dang
16a4(rgyud): mthun par bshad par bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gis// bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shes par bya// gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag la// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg phyir// nang gi sbyin sreg
16a5(rgyud): chen po tsam// zab pa'i me ni rgyun gzhag me// thab kyi rgyun gzhag me yin te// lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun gzhag chen po med// zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni// 'bring du gsungs/
16a6(rgyud): te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la seg de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyud bzhag chen po'i mi//
16a7(rgyud): thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi bud shing yin// man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges//
16b1(rgyud): dgang gapa la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rlung 'di gdang byikyis legs par drang // thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rlud kyi rgyal
16b2(rgyud): po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan pog ya d+hA rA dAng / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya ga gang/
16b3(rgyud): shrI dz+wa la am+be ga h+ya gan+da rAng / bod sad du/ dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal lo// bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcoMm/
16b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas rdo rje phag mos gsol pa/ rnal
16b5(rgyud): 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang // 'chi ba gang lags shi ba gang // re ni gang lags ro chen gang // de bzhin shi ba chen po gang // thal ba gang lags thal chen gang // tsha tsha gang lags tsha tsha yi//
16b6(rgyud): chen po gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs dang shes rab sems 'jug la// rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs
16b7(rgyud): pa yin// dus min lha la gsod pa ste// dang por 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang // dus chod nges par shes bya ste// bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par gyi/
17a1(rgyud): 'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar nges// khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim// srog kyang rtsol ba la thim ste// rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang po 'chi ba ste/ rdo rje/
17a2(rgyud): can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam snang tha dad bral ba yi// skad cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas zhag bdun bar du bzhag/ lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das// de ni shi ba chen por grags// lus
17a3(rgyud): ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra// 'di nyid ro zhes gsungs pa ste// ye shes dbab dang ye shes bstan// mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ka ru// dri yi thig le gsum byas te//
17a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// thog mar dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// khrus byas gnas ni bcu gnyis su// dri yi thig lo bcu gnyis bya// dpa' bo mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlabs/
17a5(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kun// dngos su gnas pas rab tu nges// ri mor bris pa 'bring po ste// dri yi thig le tha mar nges// g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis// he ru kar grags
17a6(rgyud): chen por bzhengs// rang rig bdag po gang yin pa'i// he ru ka ru nges pa dang // de la dus drug mchod pas mchod// 'di dag ro ni chen po ste// 'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod
17a7(rgyud): gnas su 'khrid par byed// rang bzhin bsregs pa thal bste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rim bzhin bcig/ yang na bum pa lta bu yi// gzhal yas 'ang /
17b1(rgyud): pa brtsegs mar bcig/ mi 'chi bcu phyed snying po dang // tsan dan gur kum la sogs pa'i// dri yis blugs shing bsgo bar bya// tsan dan dmar po la sogs pa'i// dri zhim ldan pa'i shing bu'am/
17b2(rgyud): yang na 'bras bu yod pa yi// bud shing tshad dang ldan pa yis// zab khung chen por rdzogs par brtsig/ tha ma dam pa mnyes byas la// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// zur bzhi rgyal po
17b3(rgyud): chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhi mi 'jigs seng ge brgyad// ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan// cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang // rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang // sngar gyi dbang tho
17b4(rgyud): rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun bzhag me sbar te// me lha la sogs gzhan dang 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid kyang // me yi khang pa mdzes pa ru// rang bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol/
17b5(rgyud): me mchod sdig pa sreg pa'o// sngags dang rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra// me dang du ba rlung sogs kyi// mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bya ste// bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs//
17b6(rgyud): med na sdig pa bsreg par bya// gdung la sogs pa byung na rab// ma byung na yang cho ga rnams// rdzogs pa las byung rus pa rnams// 'di ni thal ba chen po ste// de las gzhan pa thal
17b7(rgyud): bar gsungs// de nas rus pa zhag gsum ni// gur kum la sogs dris gtor te// rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bye ste// kha dog dbyibs dang dri dang ro// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/
18a1(rgyud): gdon bsal khrus bya rus pa brdung // ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// dri sogs bsgos pa'i nang du ste// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa yi// steng du seng
18a2(rgyud): ge'i khri dag la// seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi rgyan// steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te// gnas der rus pa bzhag byas la// me mchod byas nas zhag lnga ru// bsnyen pa byas te drug
18a3(rgyud): pa la/ gdung ni 'byung ste bdun pa la// tsha tsha rab tu gnas par bya// dang por ro sreg dus su yang // shi ba dang po nas bzung ste// zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste// drug pa ro yi sta
18a4(rgyud): gon no// bdun pa dur khrod rab tu gnas// dang por snang ba gnyis par ro// gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// gzhan la med cing rang la med//
18a5(rgyud): dman la med cing de rjes med// thabs su ma gsungs shes rab kyi// rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud rtsi
18a6(rgyud): sgron ma ra li yi// rgyud du khyod la nga yis bshad// de nas sa tsha'i rim pa yang // snang ba rgyal po la sogs la// mthun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs bslang // mi snangs bdag
18a7(rgyud): la sogs la// gtor ma mo yis sa sogs bslang // de nas srud pa rnam lnga yang // phan pa rdo rje can dang yang // gzi brjid gar dang rdo rje rgyal// srad bus sa gzungs sbyang so/
18b1(rgyud): cho ga gzhan dang mthun par bya// dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya// lha grangs du yod gtor mar gtang // sbyin sreg dag gis zhi byas te// gcig
18b2(rgyud): gam lnga 'am bdun nam ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad// ci nus par ni gdab par bya// dus ni mtshan mo zhes pa ste// dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste//
18b3(rgyud): gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag/ chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab// bum dbangs la gdab pa ste// gsang dbang sa dang tshul gdab// gsum pa me dang rlung la gdab// bzhi
18b4(rgyud): pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o// dang po 'pho bas ma lhung la// gnyis pa ro bsreg ma lhung ba'o// gsum pa tsha tshas ma lhung na// 'chi ba slu ba'i dam pa ste// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol
18b5(rgyud): nges// dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// ltung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges// de bas srid las grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam pa rab mnyes te// 'pho ba la sogs gdam ngag blang //
18b6(rgyud): rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par drang // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams kyis chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i char yang bab bo// dpa' bo dang / mkha'a'
18b7(rgyud): mi dang / dur khrod gnas pa'i ro langs chen po thams cad rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / daci tag
19a1(rgyud): la ng+gar dang / lo tsab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / N+ya gar skad du/ shrI a mri ta gu h+yAtan+tarAdza
19a2(rgyud): bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de
19a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la zhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// dkyil 'khor dbye ba ji
19a4(rgyud): lta bu/ sngags dang gtor ma ji lta bu// sbyin sreg mchod sogs ji lta bu// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po dkyil
19a5(rgyud): 'khor dbye ba yang // phyi la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor te// nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gsang bar b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te// bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems// de rnams lha yi
19a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang // sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs pa'i lam// khro tshul drug cu rtsa bzhi dang // 'bar ba'i gar dgu phyag rgya drug/ mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu la// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong //
19a7(rgyud): lus kyi dri 'khu zhe sdang dag/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o// 'di dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gyur pa// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje can
19b1(rgyud): dang ban pa dang // de bzhin rdo rjeg zi brjid dang // padz+ra gar gyi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin du bdun rdo rje sems// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor smin//
19b2(rgyud): de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang // rnam grol steng du gdan khri rlung // rang rig bdag po lnga yin no// dang por de nyid shes bya ste// rags pa dang ni phra ba dang // zung 'jug sgo gsum nyi khri dang /
19b3(rgyud): rig stong drug brgya rgyu ba tsam// las ni rags pa'i lam 'joms shing // ngag gi dri 'khru gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa// mkha' spyod rlung du shes par bya// gang zhig snang
19b4(rgyud): ba sgom pa dang // de bzhin mun pa sgom pa dag/ nyin dang mtshan mor rab tu grags// gnod mdzes lta stangs dman pa ste// tshul de de las bzlog pa'o// dang por yid bcing sna rtser bya//
19b5(rgyud): de bzhin sems bcing rlung bcing yang // nam mkha' sor bzhi de nas stong // de nas bar du thig le yang // yan lag dang bcas yan lag med// shin tu yan lag med pa ste// yan
19b6(rgyud): lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste// thabs la thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// ma ning 'dus pa'i sgo ru gsungs// de nas 'og sgor tsan+d+ra li// kha sbyor dang ni sdug/
19b7(rgyud): bo sogs// rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang // bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang dang // gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rkyen gyis slar/
20a1(rgyud): ba dang // gtum mo zhar la sbar ba dang // gtum mo bye brag sbar ba dang // spyi yi gtum mo sbar ba dang // grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang // chags pa'i rang
20a2(rgyud): bzhin gtum mo ste// nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste// gsang ba'i lha yi ring ba'i rgyu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// de yi phyir na b+ha ga yin// dga' ba
20a3(rgyud): la sogs sgyu ma yis// phra ba'i lam spong las yin te// sems kyi ji 'khrud 'dod chags dag/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i rgyu// de nas bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos sku skye med nam
20a4(rgyud): mkha' bzhin// rang rig stong par 'od gsal ba// bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te// ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa yin// sgom pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste// mi sgoms pa yang rtog pa nyid//
20a5(rgyud): sgom du rdul tsam med pa la// yongs su skad cig med pa 'di// lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// rang rig ye shes me bo che// thams cad 'di la gnas
20a6(rgyud): pa ste// dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang // yul na 'dod pa thams cad sdud pa ltar// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i// las dang bya ba sna
20a7(rgyud): tshogs kun// sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// thams cad 'di la sdud par nges// las ni zab pa'i las spong ste// sgo gsum rnam dag dug gsum 'joms// gzugs sku gnyis ni
20b1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rgyu// byin sreg rnam pa pazhi yin te// phyi yi thun mong yin par gsungs// de nas nang gi sbyin sreg kyang // lte bzhing ka spyi bo mazin// rigs ni nges pa'i thag zung ste// mun /
20b2(rgyud): bo gsung mgrin pa// snying kar thugs te yon tan dang // 'phrin las gtum mo gnyis su nges// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // rang bzhin gnas pa'i ye shes me/ me lnga dag pas bdag
20b3(rgyud): po'i lnga// sku mdog phyag mtshan rnam rtog dag/ bsreg rdzas bsregs te me mchod bya// nye bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang // rnam rtog bsreg phyir sbyin sreg ste// rang lus ye shes me yis ni/
20b4(rgyud): rtog pa'i bud shing bsreg bya ba// 'di ni sbyin sreg tshad ma ste// ti la sogs sdig par nges pa 'am// las kyi me nyid ye shes sam// bsregs pas nges par tshig gam ci//
20b5(rgyud): bsreg rdzas rtog pa sreg byed me// dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin te// de phyir las kyi me nyid la// ti la sogs bsregs pa'i las byas kyang // nges par sdig pa 'tshig mi 'gyur//
20b6(rgyud): mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no// bskrun pa tsam drangs pa ste// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam rtog pas bstan pa med// dgang gzar thugs gzar la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal
20b7(rgyud): nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang // thab khung lte ba 'am sna rtse ste// chags grol gnas ni nges pa dang // rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba yi// gtum mo ye shes me sbar te/
21a1(rgyud): g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis// shra ka rtsa dang rlung sogs kyi// phra mo'i rtog pa'i bsreg rdzas bsreg/ bde ba'i me lha mchod par bya// zhi rgyas las kyi rim
21a2(rgyud): pa dang // bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya// de nas sngags kyi dbye ba yang // phyi yi sngags ni oM AHhUM// nang du bdud rtsi mtshan nyid de// gsang bar mchog chad dbus na gnas/
21a3(rgyud): mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go// spos sogs phyi yi mchod pa ste// bdud rtsi la sogs nang du'o// gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod// mthar thug stong pa'i ro yis mchod// 'bras
21a4(rgyud): sogs phyi yi gtor ma ste// dman pa'i bgegs sogs zhi bar byed// a ba d+hU tI'i ka pA lar// sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas// rnam rtog bgegs chen zhi bar byed/
21a5(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros// phra ba'i gdon chen zhi byas pa// 'di ni gsang po'i gtor mar gsungs// rang rig stong pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros// bde chen don ni zhi byas pa// 'di ni
21a6(rgyud): bzhi pa'i gtor mar nges// phyag 'tshal skor ba la sogs pa// sbyang sogs bla ma'i zhal nas shes// gang gi phyir na sbyin sreg ni// dngos grub dam pa ster ba dang // rnam rtog sreg
21a7(rgyud): phyir sbyin sreg ste// shing sogs sreg pa sbyin sreg min// mnyes pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste// spos sogs phul bas mnyes pa med// rang sems las su rung ba dag mnyes/
21b1(rgyud): pas mchod pa chen pos// gdon dang gnod pazhi pa dang / bar chod ni dang dngos grub dag/ 'byung ba'i phyir na gtor ma ste// 'bras srogs kyi yi gtor ma yis// gdon sogs ni
21b2(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur te// rang gi sgo gsum rnam tog dag/ gdon la sogs par snang ba ste// 'khrul pa'i rnam tog ma spangs par// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir// sgo gsum rnam chog
21b3(rgyud): 'joms pa yis// sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog/ gdon dang gnod pazhi pa dang // dam tshig gso dang ldarnam 'gro// dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// phyi nang gtor
21b4(rgyud): ma'i nges pa'o// rgyud rnams nye bar zhi ba dang // lus las 'byung phyir lha yin te// byi yi dkyil 'khor lha ma yin// lus dang yan lag lha ma yin// kha mig la sogs lha ma yin/
21b5(rgyud): lus las ma byung g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang po sgo gsum g.yeng ba dag/ rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung // sgo gsum zhi phyir lha zhes brjod// yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te// rang sems
21b6(rgyud): las su rung ba dang // rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyong phyir// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs// gzhan yang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// thams cad tha ma'i zhal nas thang /
21b7(rgyud): rgyud 'di gtad kyis nan tan gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rgyud kyi don la yi rang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
22a1(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @rgya gar skad du/ sh+tsa
22a2(rgyud): na a laM kA ra tan+da ra dza/ bod skad du/ dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal te// zhabs la spyi bos legs
22a3(rgyud): btud nas// dur khrod gang lags rgyan gang lags// rgyud na gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so rdo rje snying po legs// legs
22a4(rgyud): par nyon la legs par zung // dang por dur khrod bshad bya ste// dur khrod spyi dang bye brag gnas// gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol te// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol du// 'jigs pa chen po
22a5(rgyud): spyi yi gnas// bye brag shar la sogs pa ste// snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang // lcags ri nag po tshun chad de// rdo rje rabs de nyid do// chen po khru ni nyi shu ste// chung ba khru gang
22a6(rgyud): tshun chad do// de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshad las nges par bzlas pa'o// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam rtog brgyad// mi mnga'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad// phyogs
22a7(rgyud): dang phyogs bral dag tu dgod// tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i// rtags su shing brgyad rim pas dgod// de bzhin gdug pa brgyad bcom pa'i// rtags su klu brgyad rim pas/
22b1(rgyud): dgod// tshogs brgyad mi dge bcu bcom pa'i// rtags su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod// lus ngag yid kyis sems can gyi// don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod// de nyid dur khrod
22b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa che// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyud// rnam rtog zil gnon brgyad por bshad// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan yin no// de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dang por dur rjod
22b3(rgyud): bshad par bya// shar du gtum drag nag po che// lho ru ha har dgod ser che// nub du mi bzad dmar po che// byang du tshang tshing ljang ku che// me ru g.yer ka can yin te// bden
22b4(rgyud): bral mtshams su 'bar ba 'dzin// rlung mtshams dmyal sogs gnas pa ste// dbang ldan du ni dbyib can no// b+ha tsa ri khi tsa sha ni// sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod// pa ta li dang thA
22b5(rgyud): sa ni/ sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod// dur khrod 'di rnams gzugs rnams kyang // 'bar ba tshig dang mchog sogs// keng rus thod pa la sogs dang // ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs dang
22b6(rgyud): bcas// ce spyang sgra yis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// shar du shi ri sha yi shing // lho ru a shwad tha yi shing // nub tu wang ge ling gi shing // byang du tsu ta'i shing du nges// gong dang mtshung
22b7(rgyud): ban+ya gro d+ha// parka ti lkug pA thA dag/ me nas dbang ldan mtshams su dgod// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su 'dod// shar du dbang po gnas pa ste// lho ru gshin rje gnas pa'o//
23a1(rgyud): rab tu klu dbang gnas pa ste// byang du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas// shar lhor me ni gnas pa'o// lho rub mtshams su srin po gnas// nub byang mtshams su
23a2(rgyud): rlung dgod do// byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan dgod// nyi zla shar la sa bdag rub// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su dgod// shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste// 'jog po lho ste stob
23a3(rgyud): rgyu rub// pad+ma byang la pad chen me// du lu hu lu srin por dgod// rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste// dung skyong dbang ldan mtshams su ni// gdug pa sbrul gyi gzugs su dgod//
23a4(rgyud): kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye// shar du char sbyin dkar por dgod// lho ru bu mi te dgod do// nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas// byang du a ba yang dag gnas// sngo nya mer ni yang
23a5(rgyud): dag gnas// wAn m+b+hi gyi'i mtshams sung med// rlung gi mtshams su par shAn// gabum pa 'di brgyad mar sbyin brgyad// gcod kyi mdog 'dra bur sum mdo/ rnam sa pa'i mngon
23a6(rgyud): 'dra ngu ba'i mdog/ sprin gyi mdog 'dra sprin gyi gzugs// shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste// 'di dag nang rtags phye ru 'byung // dang por spangs pa phun sum tshogs// de nas ye shes thun
23a7(rgyud): sum tshogs// rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs// gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yi// rtags su 'jigs pa 'di dag gnas// de nas nang gis dur khrod sogs// pags pa rdo rje
23b1(rgyud): rab ste// rus pa rdo rje gur du nges// dpung pa nye ba'i dpung pa ste/ badz+ra dang de bzhin le ba'i brda// brgyad ni dur khrod brgyad du nges// rjeng ranye ba'i rje ngar bzhi// la gang mge ba'i lag dang /
23b2(rgyud): bzhi brgyad ni nang gi shing brgyad do// tshigs dang de bzhin nye bar tshigs// steng dang 'og tu bzhi bzhi ste// nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod// mthil dang de bzhin nye ba'i mthil// steng
23b3(rgyud): 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do// rtse dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse// brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te// bskyed rim rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni nang na gnas// rtsa rlung ngo bo shes/
23b4(rgyud): brgyas// de phyir nang gi shing brgyad gnas// rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// nang na klu brgyad yang dag gnas// bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i phyir// char sprin brgyad
23b5(rgyud): ni nang du gnas// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod kyang // rtswa tse rtsa brgyad dur khrod brgyad// lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgyad do// snying kar rtsa brgyad phyogs myong brgyad// mgrin par rtsa brgyad
23b6(rgyud): klu brgyad de// spyi bor rtsa brgyad char sprin brgyad// gsang bar rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni gsang bar gnas// thams cad bde bar snang ba'i phyir// gsang bar shing /
23b7(rgyud): brgyad yang dag gnas// phra ba'i mtshan ma'i rnam rtog gi/ gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// bde bas bdag spyod gzhan sbyor bas// de yi phyir na char sprin dgod// de nas
24a1(rgyud): bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang // rnam shes brgyad ni de nyid brgyad// dur khrod brgyad du nges pa'o// dur khrod sogs brgyad de nyid shing // lhag ma gsum dang tshor sogs lnga/
24a2(rgyud): brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges// nyon mongs drug dang de yi gnyis// brgyad po dag ni klu brgyad do// lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag ni// de ni bzhi pa'i char sprin brgyad// gzung 'dzin rnam
24a3(rgyud): rtog mi mnga'i rtogs// bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad// stobs sogs mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgyas// rtags su shing brgyad nges pa'o// rnam rtog gdug pa 'dul ba yi// rtags su klu
24a4(rgyud): brgyad nges pa'o// gzugs sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi// don mdzad rtags su char sprin brgyad// phyogs skyong bla ma'i zhal nas shes// de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // bla ma'i
24a5(rgyud): zhal nas shes par bya// rgyun chags phyi nang rgyud ces bya// rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa'o// gzhan yang nga yis gsungs pa'i bka'// gsung gcig nyid du gsungs gyur kyang //
24a6(rgyud): du ma nyid du so sor snang // chos tshul du mi'i bye brag dang // mos pa du ma'i bye brag dang // 'du shes du ma'i bye brag gis// theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// sems gzung yan lag
24a7(rgyud): bsam mi khyab// nga yi rjes su 'brangs pa yi// thams rab non pa dang // de nyid bcu ldan mngon shes skyes// de gsung bcu drug mtha' yi bar// rig pa'i gnas lnga mkhas pas sbyang //
24b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan pas// brtsams bzhi yi mtha' yis des// de 'i man dag mthob par// sngags kyis snod gang stod pa// rang yang byung la gzhan yang thung // srog
24b2(rgyud): ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshed// de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bla ma dam pa mnyes byas te// man ngag dam pa zang bar bya// nges pa'i lha spyod ma rnyed par// gsang ba'i
24b3(rgyud): lha dang spyod pa dang // mos pa'i rjes su gang byed dang // nyon mongs zil non la sogs dag/ gsang sngags lta bur spyad pa spyod// 'di dag rkun po ma rungs pa// mthong ba'i chos
24b4(rgyud): la dmyal bar skyes// dang po srid pa skye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// si h+la'i dang po tha ma dang // 'bras bu srid pa skye ba yi// dus der kun tu ru byed na// 'byung
24b5(rgyud): ba'i rlung gi nang zhugs na// nad gzhi bsdus shing nad gzhi skyed// srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung // de la 'dod pa'i mtshon chas ni// g.yeng ba med par gtar ka bya// phyi nas
24b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bdag pos so// srid par skye ba'i dus chod kyang // rgyun chad zhag gsum zhag lnga dang // bdun dang dgu yi dus rnams spang // de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'i don// khyod la
24b7(rgyud): gtad kyis legs par zung // de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing mgu ste rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// paN+Di ta ga/
25a1(rgyud): ma d+hAr dang / lo tsa ba dge slong sa kya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ran dza ma hA n+tu/ da
25a2(rgyud): skad du/ dpal rdo rje rgyal po chen po'i rgyud/ dpal sdom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
25a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mkha' 'gro grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su phyi nang gsang
25a4(rgyud): ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pas gsol pa// rdo rje gang
25a5(rgyud): lags chen po gang // rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// don gyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs su shes par bya// rnam rtog
25a6(rgyud): 'joms phyir rdo rje ste// de la rnam par zhi yin te// phyi nang gsang ba rab gsang gnyis// rtse gsum rtse gcig rtse lnga pa// rtse dgu pa ni nyid yin no// bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje ste/
25a7(rgyud): rtags kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// gnyis su med pa rtse gcig pas// rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yin// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/
25b1(rgyud): 'joms pa'i phyir na bshad pa yin// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan chos dbyings shes// nyon mongs lnga ni spangs pa ste// zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod/
25b2(rgyud): chags dang // phrag dog gti mug 'joms par byed// rdo rje rtse dgu gang yin pa// ye shes rtse dgu bshad pa ste// khams gsums dgu 'joms par byed// 'dod khams gzugs khams
25b3(rgyud): gzugs med khams// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas ye shes che// sa dgu la ni gang sgrib pa'i// sgrib pa sbyong bar byed pa yi// rdo rje rtse dgur brtan pa
25b4(rgyud): yin/ rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// 'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// spong ba'i ye shes bcu gnyis yin// ma rig pa las 'du byed de// 'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes/
25b5(rgyud): ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg dang tshor dang sred dang len// srid pa skye dang na shis// de rnams spongs pa'i gnyen po ste// chos kyi ye shes mngon du byas// de las se
25b6(rgyud): sa rdza'ang bzhid// delas su gsung thugs cag/ delas sna mched drug sangs rgyas// de las gnyis med reg pa ni// delas rnams myong ba de chen po// 'a rig zhi med pa /
25b7(rgyud): chos sun rngon byed min pa 'o// srid pa langs spyod rdzogs su yin// bya ba sprul pa'i sla ru bags// ma gi tshun dang bya ngan 'das// 'od gas ma thong chen dang kyis// dbyer
26a1(rgyud): gnyis pa// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// 'bigs shing rno ba zur gsum ste// gru bzhis rdzas rnams brdar byas pas// 'jam zhing dngal 'joms par byed/
26a2(rgyud): pa lam zlum pos rtsub pa 'joms// thar lngas thams cad ci dgar byed// de nas chen po'i don bshad de// dmigs dang bsam pa spyod pa dang // brtul zhugs brtson 'grus smon lam dang //
26a3(rgyud): de bzhin ye shes chen po ste// re re la yang bdun bdun sbyar// de phyir chen po zhes ni bstan// rgyud ni rnam pa lnga yin te// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che//
26a4(rgyud): de rnams rgyun du gnas pa la// rgyu yi rgyud du bstan pa yin// de rnams don ni ji bzhin rtogs// 'bras bu'i rgyud du bstan pa yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa// rgyu ni
26a5(rgyud): gnyis su med pa yi// rang rig ye shes mthar thug pa// mthar thug bla na med pa'i rgyud// rgyal po la yang lnga yin te// phyi nang gsang dang rab tu gsang // shin tu gsang po chen
26a6(rgyud): po ste/ de rnams don la dbang bskur dang // de yi mi mthun phyogs 'joms phyir// de phyir rgyal po lnga ru bstan// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lag/
26a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji ltar lags// rdo rje gang lags snying po gang // dpa' bo gang lags mkha' 'gro gang /
26b1(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i sar lags// thabs gcig bzhugs pa'i thar lags// gyi nang gsang ba bya med pa'i// mchod nas zhes pa'i sngar lags// mngon phyogs 'khod pa snar
26b2(rgyud): lags// zhal 'dzum mdzad pa ji ltar lags// gzigs pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud// phung po'i
26b3(rgyud): bdud dang lha yi bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa'o// ldan pa yon drug drug ldan phyir// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang /
26b4(rgyud): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la// drug po de ldan zhes bya ba// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de ltar bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i
26b5(rgyud): don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// btsun mo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings// de las byung phyer b+ha ga ste/
26b6(rgyud): dbyer mi phyed pas bzhugs par bshad// rdo rje chos rnams 'jug pa che// snying po ye shes chen po ste// sogs pa mang po'i don yin te// dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga// phyi nang gas
26b7(rgyud): bal sogs kyi// rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyir yin// mkha' la 'gro bas mkha' 'gro ste// rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya// thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir// ma zhes payis
27a1(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// de yi don la mi dpogs pas// de yi phyir na dpag tu med// thabs gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di// de nyid don dang dbye med phyir// gcig
27a2(rgyud): gi don du bshad pa'o// gnyis pa ma yin de don du// phyi nang ma yin mchod pa ni// phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dang / dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang //
27a3(rgyud): rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // sgeg dang dgod dang gar nyid dang // rta dang glang po rin chen sogs// de nas nang gi mchod pa ni// b+ha ga btsums la ku tsa btsir// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung //
27a4(rgyud): ba lnga// byang chub sems dang ldan byas te// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// de la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le te// de nyid
27a5(rgyud): gnyis med bde ba yis// rtsa dang rlung sogs thig les mchod// de nas rab gsang mchod pa ni// dang po dga' dang mchog dga' dang // dga' bral de bzhin lhan skyes dga'// bde ba'i
27a6(rgyud): khyad par de nyid kyis// rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod// de nas bla med mchod pas ni// rang rig stong par rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos kyi sku// de nyid tha med mchod
27a7(rgyud): ba mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs par gyur te// g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba byas
27b1(rgyud): stsu grus kyi mi blang ba ma/ dpa tsha pa sa lam ng+gA gas so/ na byor smras kyu da
27b2(rgyud): ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI d+hAn tsan+na tan+t+ra r+yA / bod sadas/ dpal ye shes pasam pa'i rgyu kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rjes mas
27b3(rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro mo'i 'khor grangs med pa dang ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs
27b4(rgyud): gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shes mnga'
27b5(rgyud): bdag che// ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang // ye shes kyi gnas gang dang gang // rgyal po ji ltar lags pa dang // gang la dbang byed gang gis 'dul// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol//
27b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gro nyon// ye shes zhes bya rnam pa lnga// de nyid don la shes pa dang // log rtog shes pas mu bsgribs phyir//
27b7(rgyud): skye bo'i ye shes bshad pa'o// me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang // so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// chos dbyangs ye shes lnga pa'o// de la me long ye shes ni// dper ni gala' dag
28a1(rgyud): me long la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba bzhin// de bzhin sems kyi me long la// nyon mongs gala' ni dag byas na// chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar/
28a2(rgyud): mthong // sems kyi me long gang yin la// sgyu ma tsam du snang ba de// tha dad mi phyed mnyam ye shes// mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam de ni// las dang mtshan
28a3(rgyud): nyid ma 'dres pa// de nyid so sor rtog ye shes// de nyid nan tan sgrub byed de// de nyid don grub ye shes te// thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te// de phyir chos dbyings ye shes
28a4(rgyud): yin// ye shes skye gnas gang yin pa// kha sbyar dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med tshul// shar dang lho dang nub dang byang // ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas//
28a5(rgyud): de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni// chos dbyings ye shes skye ba'i gnas// me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang // so sor rtog dang bya ba grub// chos dbyings ye shes la sogs pa// bdag po
28a6(rgyud): byed pa'i phyir dang ni// zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags dang ni phrag dog dang // de bzhin gti mug la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir// rgyal po zhes
28a7(rgyud): ni bstan pa yin// ye shes mkha' 'gros yang gsol pa// byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags// de nyid dbye ba gang lags dang // de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas// nges par
28b1(rgyud): bzlog pa'i chul nyid dang / denyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang / rtags dang son tan gang lags pa/ denying bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das pas bka' phrul gA
28b2(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rang rig se// dbye ba'i don ni gnyis smra bstan// de yi gnas ni cha yin te// gzung ba rig pa'i 'khor lor te// nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dag ni/ go
28b3(rgyud): bzlog pa yi tshul yin no// de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs// rtags ni lus la khrag byung dang // ba spu langs dang 'dar ba dang // kha zas dang chung lus yang dang // sra dkar gnyer
28b4(rgyud): mdangs pa dang // le lo med dang brtson 'grus ldan// de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grub// de nas yon tan bshad pa ni// rkang mgyogs sa steng sa 'og go// 'jig rten dngos grub
28b5(rgyud): gang yin dang // 'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas// rang rig 'od gsal de nyid do// ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te// rtags
28b6(rgyud): ni 'od gsal de nyid do// 'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'o// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// rnal 'byor sems gzung sgom pa brtag/ lus sems tshags su bcug nas ni// rang rig
28b7(rgyud): sems kyi de nyid la// de nyid dbyer med bsgom par bya// de yis thob med 'bras bu thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i
29a1(rgyud): 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang nas// de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod de mi snang bar gyur to/ pa la yor ba rjom pa shes rnam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
29a2(rgyud): paN+Di ta ga ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shI rA ga rA dza tan+t+ra
29a3(rgyud): rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal chags pa'i rgyal po rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha'i 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
29a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog
29a5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ he he dpa' bo 'jigs pa che// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin na// mtshan dang dpe byad gang dang gang // stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang /
29a6(rgyud): rdzas skyes mngal skyes song skyes dang // drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi char ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// in dbu la gtsug tor te// A ni dbu skra g.yas su
29a7(rgyud): 'gyog// yon dpral ba'i gyis mnyam pa// go ni srin mtshams mdzod bu te// sngon kun migs thon mthong la// pa ma khrims du'o// chu tshims bzhi btsum ngar ba'o//
29b1(rgyud): mas mnyam tshams lags pag/ lal tshams da/ 'a thos to/ ni rnam pa sed skye hA// e sngags smras papas/ natshangs pa'i rgyangs du yang/
29b2(rgyud): mon dpung mgo shin tu rdzum// a ni bdun mtho ba du gsungs// ma ni thal gong rgyas pa ste// 'di dag bcu drug gams bsor ro// de nas g.yon paskyor mtshams nas kyang / ni
29b3(rgyud): pags skyab mdog giser 'dra// sA ni bzhengs bzhin ma gtud bar// phyag gnyis pus mar sleb pa'o// mi nir srod seng ge 'dra// zhi ni shing ca gro lnga bur// chung da shing ni ga
29b4(rgyud): su ni mdzod spu gams su 'khyil// spun snga rnams gyen du phyogs// ri mdoms sra ba sbubs su nub// rI bar+b+ba legs par zlum pa'o// la ni zhabs yod tshogs ma mngon// lA ni
29b5(rgyud): phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon// l-I ni phyag mthil zhabs kyi mthil// 'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o// e ni phyag zhabs dra bas 'bral// i ni sen mo ring ba ste// oM ni phyag dang
29b6(rgyud): zhabs mthil la// 'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin// oM ni zhabs ni shin tu gnas// maM zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste// a ni byin pa'i dgas ni// en+ta pa yi a bu ste// spyi bo
29b7(rgyud): mi shigs snying po na// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// ka ni sen mo 'angs mdog 'dra// kha ni sen mo mdog sdum pa// ga ni sen mo mtho ba sa// ma ni sor mo rnams zlum pa/
30a1(rgyud): nga ni sor so rnams rgyas pa// son sor rnams byin gyis pa/ tsan narnams mi 'angon pa// na tu mdud med pasbyin// tshun yong kyi 'i mngon pa//
30a2(rgyud): mi mnyam pa med// ni seng ge'i sngabs su gshegs// ba ni thang po'i sbubs su gshegs// ni ngang pa'i skabs sku gshegs// na ni g+hu rdzog skabs su gshegs// nagasas
30a3(rgyud): phyogs ldog cing gshegs// ta ni mdzes par gshegs pa ste// tha ni mi g.yo bar gshegs pa// da ni sku la 'khril bag chags// d+ha s+tha byi dor byas pa 'dra// na su rim par 'tshab
30a4(rgyud): pa'o// pa ni sku gtsang ba sku mchog/ ba sku rnam par dag pa'o// b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo nyid// ma sku kho lag yangs shing bzang // ya ni gom pa snyoms pa'o// ra skra shin tu gzhon/
30a5(rgyud): mdog can// la ni sru la 'khrul pa med// wa ni sku lus rgyas pa ste// sha ni shin tu grims pa'o// Sha ni yan lag thams cad mdzes// sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag
30a6(rgyud): ha dku zlum pa nyid yin te// k+Sha ni dku skabs phyed pa'o// ya dku ma rnyongs pa yin te// ra ni phyal phya ma med pa yin// la ni lte ba zab pa ste// wa ni lte ba g.yas su 'khyil/
30a7(rgyud): Da ni kun nas mdzes pa ste// D+ha ni kun spyod gtsang ma yin// 'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// g.yas nas bskor ba bzhi bcu yin// de nas g.yon gyi bzhi bcu ni// ka ni
30b1(rgyud): ga gad/ 'anag pa ma gyug/ gabyas ma mas sna pa// rtsu ma pa / / la / da
30b2(rgyud): gzugs kyi gzugs brnas byung // 'ad+ma sngags mnyen sngags pa// ni lcags dmar ngag ste/ gang ba'i rdzag sa/ bani gsang gan mnyen 'jam pa/
30b3(rgyud): mche ba zlum dang rno// Na ni mched kar ta tshems mnyam// tha ni mche ba byin gyis phra// dashangs shin tu mtho ba dang // d+hu shangs shin tu gtsang ba'o// na ni spyan 'od rnam
30b4(rgyud): par dag/ pa pha spyan bzang rdzi ma stug/ ba ni dkar nag phye pad+ma'i// 'dab ma'i mdangs 'dra pad+ma'i spyan// b+ha ni de bzhin smin mtshams ring // ma yi smin mtsham
30b5(rgyud): sprin spu mnyam// ra ni de bzhin smin ma snum// la ni snyan shal stug cing ring // de bzhin wa ni snyan shal mnyam// snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams sha// dpral ba leg
30b6(rgyud): par 'byes pa Sha// sa ni dpral ba'i dbyes che ba// ha na dbu dag shin tu rgyas// dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag k+Sha// dbu skra stug pa ya yin te// de bzhin dbu skra 'jam pa ra/
30b7(rgyud): dbu skra mi 'dzing ba ni la// dbu skra mi gshor ba ni wa// dbu spa dri zhim Na yin te// phyag la dpal gyi be'u dang ni// bkra shis g.yu drung 'khyil bas brgyan// sdong ris lha
31a1(rgyud): prad+d+ha yin te// lte ba sprul pa'i snying po sa// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid// sa ni stong pa nyid stong pa// si ni chen po stong /
31a2(rgyud): nyid// i ni don dam stong pa nyid// swa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid// spu ni 'dus ma byas stong ba// ri ni mtha' las 'das stong ba// ni ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// na/
31a3(rgyud): dor ba med pa stong // lI ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid// e ni chos rnams thams cad stong // i ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong // oM ni mi dmigs stong pa nyid// oM ni dngos po med
31a4(rgyud): stong nyid// a ni ngo bo stong pa nyid// dngos med ngo bo stong nyid aHmgrin pa longs spyod snying po yo// shes rab stong pa bcu drug rtsa// gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta
31a5(rgyud): ba/ rnam par thar pa dang po a// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas// phyi rol gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin no// sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus// /
31a6(rgyud): mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// de dag rnam thar gsum pa tsa// gzugs kyi 'du shes la 'das pa// sna tshogs 'du shes yid mi byed// nam mkha' mtha' yas la gnas rba/
31a7(rgyud): nam mkha' mtha' yas las 'das te// rnam shes mtha' yas la gnas shing // rnam shes mtha' las rdzogs pa ta// rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das na// ci yang med pa/
31b1(rgyud): la gnas te// de nyid rdzogs pa pa yin no// ci yang med pa las 'das te// 'du shes med min la gnas te// 'du shes med min rdzogs pa yang // 'du shes med min
31b2(rgyud): las 'das te// 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// rnam par thar pa brgyad pa shwa// snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo hUM// gtso bo rnam
31b3(rgyud): thar brgyad dang ldan// 'di dag rtsa yi rnam par gnas// 'khor lo'i rgyu ni sor gsum ste// sems can kun la rang bzhin gnas// de phyir sems can sangs rgyas yin/
31b4(rgyud): sna tshogs sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // ring du 'byung zhing thung ngu gnas// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu bzhin// chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba lnga// g.yas g.yon bu ga lnga lnga ste/
31b5(rgyud): steng 'og khaM ya bar nas 'byung // ro ma shar du mngon du phyogs// brkyang ma nub ste 'og gi char// roms brkyang ma la 'khyud cing // g.yas pa'i cha ru zung 'jug nyid// brkyang mas
31b6(rgyud): rom la 'khyud cing // g.yon gyi maru thang 'jug nyid// g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku gsung thugs// de sgra sngags su rab tu grags// sngags dang rgyud dang dngos grub sogs// de ci
31b7(rgyud): las ni blang bas na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// rtse ba bzhi yi rim pa yong // sdod bcud yab yum la thim ste/ yab su mi nyi ma bya bar 'gyur// snang ba'i
32a1(rgyud): thig le yang dag bcas// 'di dag nang gi mngal skyes tshul// A li kA li nyi zla ste// sems ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas// nang gi sgong skyes yin par 'dod/
32a2(rgyud): ka dang a las nyi zla ste// rang byung thig le drod gsher yin// de dag skad cig rkyen med las// rang bzhin 'byung ba rdzus skyes so// rkyen med sbyor ba sgong sogs las// bde ba skye
32a3(rgyud): dang bde ba'i rgyu// thams cad dran pa gsang ba yi// mngal na skyes pa'i tshul yin te// yar la bsreg dang mar la gso// gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin// phyi nang 'dod
32a4(rgyud): ba'i mtshan ma yis// rtsa rgyus bde ba ster ba dang // rin po chel po brang du// sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes yin// nang gi 'dod pa'i mtshon cha yis// bde ba skye ba drod
32a5(rgyud): gsher skyes// gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par// gdod nas bde ba'i rgyur skyes la// bde ba skyes pa rdzus skyes so// gtum mo go bzlog rkyen gyis sngar// gtum mo rkyen gyis
32a6(rgyud): spang ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbyar ba dang // gtum mo rang bzhin sbyar bo ni// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gshir skyes// rjes skyes rim par sbar bar bya// du ma'i gzhi bcas pan/
32a7(rgyud): bcas dang / gzhi med shin du gzhi med de// mngal skyes slong skyes drod gsher skyes// rdzus skyes bzhi char rim par sbyar// rgyu dang lam ste 'bras bu kun/ skye ba bzhi yi ngo bor
32b1(rgyud): TI sangs rgyas sems / rnam par mnyam sa pas/ 9b+hAm nyis su la/ byu dzin// dang gsang pa'i la 'an
32b2(rgyud): 'dis bshad kyis legs par nyon// u yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor sgom// gsung ni mgrin pa thugs ni ming // yon tan lta ba 'phrin las ni// sna rtse dag tu bsam par bya// 'bar ba/
32b3(rgyud): bzhi yi a la yang // rdo rje phag mo rab tu grags// nga ni bring mchog he ru ka/ dpa' bo gcig pa yin par 'dod// bdun pa dang ni dgu pa dag/ gsum pa dz+wa la sa rab tu grags// bcu
32b4(rgyud): gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// bcu dgu mo las rab tu grags// nyi shu rtsa lnga nyi shu dgu// traM gi ngo bor yang dag gnas// sum cu bdun dang drug cu bzhi// a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges// rmA nI
32b5(rgyud): rdo rje phag mo ste// g.yas g.yon phyag la dbu ma zhal// dpa' bo byang chub sems yin te// skye mched bcu gnyis dngas ma yang // bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags// 'byung bzhi'i
32b6(rgyud): dngas ma zhal bzhir nges// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan du bshad// gsung mchog bla ma'i zhal nas blong // g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste// 'dom gang mnyam pa gru bzhi yin// bdud
