32b7(rgyud): rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga// rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// so sen bsdu bar sogs// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// 'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te/
33a1(rgyud): dper na rang byung gser dang 'dra// 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te// rang rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// rdul tshon
33a2(rgyud): la sogs bri ba min// spos la sogs pas mchod pa min// rdo shing lha la phyag mi bya// rang bzhin gnas pa'i sangs rgyas la// rang bzhin mchod pas rtag tu mchod// sprin dgun dus rang
33a3(rgyud): bzhin te// 'byung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// gsung ni dpyid dus ngo bo ste// 'jug pa'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// thugs ni dbyar dus ngo bo ste// gnas pa sku gsum zla ba gsum// ye
33a4(rgyud): shes ston gyi dus yin te// sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum// dang po rgyu yi sa pa yin// 'khor lo chags pa dmar po la// yi ge rnams ni dkar pos gnas// lam gyi sa pa rnam pa gnyis// ring
33a5(rgyud): ba dang ni nye ba'o// de ni 'bras bu'i sa pa yin// 'khor lo yang dag gnas pa ste// 'khor lo de rnams lha rnams kyang // sku mdog phyag mtshan kun dang bral/ karang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med// shel
33a6(rgyud): lha rwa gsal ba dri ma med// mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can// zab cing bya ba'i rang bzhin can// phyi ru su mdog phyag mtshan gyi// nang gi shin tu phra ba'i gzugs// gsang ba'i bde ba lnga ru nges
33a7(rgyud): de las bzlog pa pani palas// chus las byung byir b+hazhelas// rlud rnams dag byed byer nas// chags pa'i phying na na yin te// rgyal po shes ra ra nga bzhin te// khabs dang shes rab nga bzhin gyi
33b1(rgyud): chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs so// de nas sa chen po'ang cher g.yos par gyur te// mchod pa'i spyan gyi char chen po babs par gyur to// de nas dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gros rnams cad d+hA /
33b2(rgyud): don la dga' zhing mgu sde rjes su yi rang nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rnal 'byor ma tsan+da ma le dang / lo tsa ba dge slong /
33b3(rgyud): shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skang du/ shI DA ki nI sa bar tan+d+ha rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa
33b4(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen po'i ros gang bas// thams cad stong par gyur nas kyang // he he mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' 'gro mun dzi
33b5(rgyud): ltar lags// de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig srung ba ji ltar lags// rdo rje phag mo bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyon// dang po dam tshig mtshan nyid kyang // rtsa ba dang ni yan
33b6(rgyud): lags bcas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dag/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang // sgo gsum kun 'khrug chen po ste// rang gzhan sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring // nyams pa 'bring du gsungs
33b7(rgyud): pa yin// rang bzhin 'khrugs pa tha ma yang // nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye// rang la mnar sems ma skyes kyang // gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa
34a1(rgyud): yi// bdag gis g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang // gzhan la nyes pa chung bas na// 'di lnga nyams pa/
34a2(rgyud): 'bring du bshad// g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang // 'di ni ltung ba yang bar gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// lha spyod gang la gzhan ma mos// zab mo'i don la skur 'des/
34a3(rgyud): pa// ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gis mnyes gzhan cher 'khrugs// 'di ni nyams pa chung ngur bshad// re re'i dbye ba gzhan nas shes// de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi yis rang
34a4(rgyud): gi sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye// rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol pa// bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur// g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring chung ngu// mdor na rang
34a5(rgyud): bzhin dam tshig dang // bcas te bye brag dam tshig las// gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // de nas mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid kyang // mkha' 'gro rtsa ru
34a6(rgyud): gnas pa ste// phag mo yungs kar tsam gyi tshad// gzhan ni lnga yi tshad tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o// ka nas g.yas bskor ka yi bar// mkha' 'gro drug cu bzhi ru nges//
34a7(rgyud): sogs zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ste// phyi nas rtsa re mkha' 'gro re// mkha' 'gro nas bskor mtshams kyi sar// sum cu rtsa bdun mkha' 'gro ma// lte ba sprul par yang dag gnas// a sogs brgyad ni mtha
34b1(rgyud): 'gro brgyad// de bzhin zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ba'i// snying ka ru ni yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' 'gro re// gzhan rnams zla re mkha' 'gro re// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin par gnas//
34b2(rgyud): rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas// gzhan ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// de nas sdom pa bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// bde de sdom pa yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can/
34b3(rgyud): nges par sdom pa yin par 'dod// rdo rje phag mo mi 'da' bas// sdom pa dam tshig tu ni bshad// mi byed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu ga
34b4(rgyud): lags// rkyen ni gang lags dus gang lags// tshad ni gang lags srung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // mi shes pa dang bag med dang // nyon
34b5(rgyud): mongs ldan dang ma gus dang // brjed nges dran pa mi gsal ba// 'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma bsten grog ngan 'grogs// mdor na sgo gsum yengs pa'i yul// de dag
34b6(rgyud): pa'i rkyen du gsungs// gdon gyis bar chod chang gis myos// log lta skyes dang khengs grags 'dod// nyon mongs zil non tha mas skyo// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus
34b7(rgyud): yin te// spyir ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// gdon sogs gzhan gyis byin brlabs tshe// bsrung ba'i 'du shes sngon song na// chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'du shes sngon dum song na// bag med/
35a1(rgyud): nyams pa son gnas// gdon sogs rang gis ma mthong na// de yang nyams pa chung ngur gsungs// 'khor bas sgo dang rnam srin dran// bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes// bar rjod/
35a2(rgyud): bral ba bshags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos gzhi mjug dang gsum// gang rdzogs tshad ni mthar phyin te// che 'bring dbye bas shes par bya// sbyor ba ltung ba chung ngu ste// dngos bzhi lhung ba 'bring du/
35a3(rgyud): 'byung // 'jug rdzogs ltung ba chen por nges// rgyan dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dag/ 'chang ba bsten pa'i dam tshig yin// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni// bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/
35a4(rgyud): sems can dpa' bo mkha' 'gro la// longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa// blta bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig go// sgo gsum
35a5(rgyud): su gsung thugs su bsam// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// nyon mongs drug drug gzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye ba med par bsgral// bskal ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig
35a6(rgyud): don du dam tshig dag/ dus drug dus gnyis lo bar du// brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig bsrung // dngos grub don du rtag tu bsrung // skad cig tsam yang gnang ba med// rang gi lus
35a7(rgyud): kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi lus kyi nyes 'byung ba// 'di ni sku yi nyes par bshad// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi ngag gi nyes 'byung ba// bdag gi sku yi nyams pa ste// gzhan
35b1(rgyud): la gsung gi nyams par 'gyur// gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// rang la rtsa ba'i nyes pa las// gzhan la yan lag nyes 'byung dang // legs pa las ni nyes 'byung sogs//
35b2(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya ste// 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de yi don rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig 'di yi/
35b3(rgyud): don rnams ni// zab cing rgya che rtogs par dka'// mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zos skur la dor ba med// ngan skyugs
35b4(rgyud): phyir don sngar la za ba med// rang rig byang chub bdud rtsi'i ro tsher na// log rtog 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol// de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad/
35b5(rgyud): kyang rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya
35b6(rgyud): ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ag+ne ma le tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal me'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal
35b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// ha ha hi hi he he kye// bdag ni khyod la zhu ba mchis// shI ni gang lags te gang lags// ru ni gang lags ka gang lags// dbang bzhi'i he ru ka gang lagra//
36a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs rnam par spangs// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du mi gnas/
36a2(rgyud): so// de lta'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ rtag tu lus dang sems la gnas// de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs kyi nges pa ste// dang po bum dbang he ru ka/ sku dang phyag mtshan snang
36a3(rgyud): ba'i tshe// rang sems las su rung ba ste// de tshe 'jig rten tha mal pa'i// rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi// spangs pa'i phyir na he zhes brjod// las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang bral// de yi/
36a4(rgyud): phyir na ru zhes brjod// 'jig rten tha mal rnam rtog gi/ gzung 'dzin gang yang mi gnas pa'i// phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis
36a5(rgyud): 'gags gnyis su med// de yi phyir na shI ru brjod// bskyed pa'i rim pa he ru ka/ phag mo la sogs tshogs dang ldan// zag med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul/
36a6(rgyud): de nas gsang dbang he ru ka/ nyi zla mtshan ma yig 'bru'i tshogs// bskyed rim rgyu rkyen kun spangs te// rlung sogs las su rung bas na// de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang //
36a7(rgyud): mchod pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i// tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir na ru// bskyed pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang // dmigs dang lha spyod gang la yang // mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin
36b1(rgyud): gnyis med ma'o// byir na shrI zhes gsungs pa ste// rgyu rnams lam la sogs dang ldan// rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul// rlung sogs sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas// rtsa rlung rang bzhin gnas/
36b2(rgyud): la sogs// nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs ldan// nang gi dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nas shes rab he ru ka/ rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa yi// rgyu spangs phyir na he zhes brjod// rlung sogs lam
36b3(rgyud): la brten pa yi// tshogs dang bral phyir ru zhes brjod// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // tsaN+Da li yi kha dog dang // dbyibs la mi gnas phyir na ka/ sems nyid bde bar gnas pa yis//
36b4(rgyud): nang gis thabs dang shes rab med// de yi phyir na shI ru gsungs// mig ser nad kyis btab pa ltar// rang sems bde bar gnas pas so// sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang // bde ba la
36b5(rgyud): brten tshogs dang ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan// sems dang bde ba tha dad med// sems dang bde bar gang gnas pa// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// gsang ba'i dpal ldan
36b6(rgyud): he ru ka/ de nas bzhi pa'i he ru ka/ rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral// de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// pha rol phyin drug bde ba'i lam// thams cad stong
36b7(rgyud): bar ro gcig pas// tshogs gnyis bral phyir ru zhes brjod// bde ba tsam la mi gnas phyir// ka zhes nges par brjod pa yin// sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas// stobs sogs phun sum tshogs
37a1(rgyud): pas nA// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang // gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan// shrI zhes bya bar mngon par brjod// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/
37a2(rgyud): dngos po ro mnyam mtha' yas pa'i// sems kyi de nyid la gnas pa'i// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ bdud rnams kun la mtho 'tsham zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod rol// mi
37a3(rgyud): gnas gsal ba'i rang bzhin med// me long bzhin 'dra chu zla bzhin// mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa spang // de ltar don ni ma rtogs par// kha cig sku mdog phyag mtshan la// he ru ka yi rnam/
37a4(rgyud): par rtog/ kha cig gzugs brnyan rnam par rtog/ kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod// de bzhin rtsa dang rlung 'dod sogs// de bzhin rang rig he ru ka/ bla ma ma bsten brtson 'grus med// rigs dang rigs
37a5(rgyud): pa'i nga rgyal can// khe dang grags pa rnyed la dga'// rgyu des log rtog sna tshogs bskyed// de bas he ru kar grags pa// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dad dang gus bcas pha rol phyin//
37a6(rgyud): rdzogs byas bla ma dam pa las// man ngag yang dag blang bar bya// ma mo'i tshogs kyis yang zhus pa// he ru ka dpal de ltar na// rdo rje phag mo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
37a7(rgyud): rdo rje gsum ste phag mo gnyis// don gyi rdo rje de nas brtags// tha mardzas kyi rdo rje ste// don gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// mi phyed phyir na rdo rjese// dbang bzhis rdo rje rira'o//
37b1(rgyud): nags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtse gsum rtse wa rtse dgu ste// rtse gsum su gsung thugs kyi chags// rje lnga ye shes lnga yin te// khams gsums dgu 'joms pa 'i// dgas su rdo rje rtse dgu'o//
37b2(rgyud): rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// mi shes dri ma ches gos pa'i// dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang // shes rab char phyung phag mo ste// de nyid rnam pa bzhi ru nges// bum dbang zhe sdang gti mug phag
37b3(rgyud): gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug phag/ gsum pa chags dga' gti mug phag/ bzhi pa chos dbyings gti mug phag/ 'di nyid khyod la legs par gtad// thams cad rjes su yi rang ngo // dpal/
37b4(rgyud): me'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal he ru ka'i nges pa 'byung ba rdzogs so// bla ma g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
37b5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ki gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka li phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon rdzogs rgyal/
37b6(rgyud): bo rtse dbang rnams dam par yod dam ci// gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam chog che chung med dam ci// de nyams bshags thabs
37b7(rgyud): yod dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang / rang rig yo shes thugs pa'i byed/ dbang rnams sgyum tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bos
38a1(rgyud): dbang ni nges pa kho na te// lus ngag kun nas bslangs pas so// de phyir sems kyi rim ni// 'khrud dang 'thor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sa ra /
38a2(rgyud): chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnam la//
38a3(rgyud): thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag go// 'di//
38a4(rgyud): yis ngan 'gro'i srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel bas so// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po ste//
38a5(rgyud): 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'gram 'bag la sogs la// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa yi// ras dang //
38a6(rgyud): tshen la sogs pa yi// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin brlab ye shes byas nas ni// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te// bcos ma'i lha sogs de ltar na// phung sogs ye nas/
38a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa yi ni 'khrul gzhi dag/ bcos pa nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba dang ni lta bu'o// dbang bzhis grol bar mi
38b1(rgyud): 'gyur te// log pa'i srid pas srid par 'ching // 'brul pas 'tshar mos 'khor bar bdang // de bas dngos thab 'dod pas nga // was bu yi bdu sangs te// tha ma dpa parag tu bamed/ /
38b2(rgyud): ches rig dang nges shes ste// lung gi tshang ma yin pa dang / 'og ma spong zhing gong mthob// man ngag tshad ma yin par thang // mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing // che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'a
38b3(rgyud): rten lha spyod 'dren pa yi// snod bzung blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste// rgyan gyi khyad par thal ba ste// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs/
38b4(rgyud): phyag dang zhal sogs khyad par gyis// gtso 'khor la sogs khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob// dkyil 'khor/
38b5(rgyud): dbus su gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyis ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil du mi 'gyur te// dper na rgyal po med pa'i grong // grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin
38b6(rgyud): no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam
38b7(rgyud): tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi shes song ba tsam//
39a1(rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin// tha ma'i zhal/
39a2(rgyud): nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag kyang // rang sems las su rung ba dang // ma rung ba dang
39a3(rgyud): las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongs su rdzogs dang ma rdzogs dang // sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su snang // tha dad par ni mi brtag ste// chu
39a4(rgyud): khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pas na// sems can gdod nas sangs rgyas so// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog
39a5(rgyud): gcod la sogs dam tshig la// dbye ba khyod kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang // gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na// srog
39a6(rgyud): gcod nyams pa chung bar nges// gzhan gyis gnon par tshor ba dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de las bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la
39a7(rgyud): nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges// tsher thangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs cher// de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste// mi
39b1(rgyud): shes pa dang bag med dang // brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs// gzhan yang dam tshig rnams pa yin// che 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshad dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka li// rmA d+hen dag las
39b2(rgyud): shes bya ste// ltung ba jo yis zin pa dang // byi nang rdo rje sdeb dpon gyi// stan sA dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs// rdul dang mthun byar bshags nga bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gi// tha ra'i
39b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor shes par bya// gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag las// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg phyir// nang gi sbyin sreg chen po bsam// zab pa'i me ni rgun bzhag me// thabs kyi rgyun
39b4(rgyud): bzhag ma yin te// lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun bzhag chen po'i ma// zla ba gsum dang bdun dang ni// 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs/
39b5(rgyud): rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams/
39b6(rgyud): nga'i bung shing sogs// ye shes me yi bud shing yin// man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang /
39b7(rgyud): 'bra ba rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad dag 'a zhing mgu bar gyur// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gas
40a1(rgyud): dang / yos pa ngashes rjes / klung dadu/ na
40a2(rgyud): dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'ad
40a3(rgyud): 'khor dpag tu med pa dang ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskod pa byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di
40a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gang lakra 'jigs byed gang // 'joms pa gang lags rgyud gang lags// rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol/
40a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// nyon mongs bdud sogs 'joms par byed// nyon mongs dgra sogs rnam par 'joms// rgyu yi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i
40a6(rgyud): rgyud// mthar thug rgyud ni gang yin la// rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// re re'i bye brag ma mtshal bas// de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
40a7(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal ba// rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje dang ni gsum// de nas don gyi rdo rje bshad// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi byed phyir// don gyi rdo rjer
40b1(rgyud): bshang pa'o// dbang bar rje rim// rdu rje ba'i ru bshad pa yin// rtags kyi ngo rjegasum yin te// ce gsum che la ze ba pa// ce gsum sru gsung thugs kyi nags// sa byes snga ma//
40b2(rgyud): grus/ de gra khams pa sums dpa gas// ram kyir rtem yin no// rnam pa'i dbang da la ba ste// sku mdag drug satshan las shesaH// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i da 'og ni
40b3(rgyud): 'jig snang 'joms pa'i rdo rje'o// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// n+ya dang rlung dang thig le la// gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtogs pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// shes rab ye shes
40b4(rgyud): dang 'brel ba'i// lhan cig skyes dga' la sogs pa'i// gzung dang 'dzin pa gang rtogs pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rang rig sems nyid stong nyid
40b5(rgyud): la// gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtog pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rtags kyi rdo rje ni// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs su bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// 'jig
40b6(rgyud): cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// nga rgyal la sogs rnam pa lnga// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni// rnam pa bzhi ru bsten pa ni// zur
40b7(rgyud): gsum rno la 'bigs pa dang // gru bzhi dag cing gsal bar byed// zlum pos rdzas rnams 'joms par byed// zur lngas 'dod sgrub sras rdo rje// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa bzhi// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis
41a1(rgyud): ka'i rgyud// mthar thug rgyud kyi rgyal po ste// de rnams kun la dbang byed pa// log lnga'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
41a2(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs te// g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang
41a3(rgyud): bar gyur to// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / bla ma ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
41a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems
41a5(rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la 'khor dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs
41a6(rgyud): kyis bskor te bzhugs pa'i dus su/ dpa' bo rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pas g.yon phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
41a7(rgyud): la spyi bos gtugs te ha ha zhes pa gsum brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rtsa ni gang lags rlung gang lags// thig le gang lags grangs ni du// de la sems gzung ji ltar lags//
41b1(rgyud): 'khor lo ji mar lags pa dang // de yi grangs ni du zhig mchi// rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar lags// yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags// de rnams dbus kyi sde bar ni// yi ge dgod pa gang dang /
41b2(rgyud): gang // gtum mo sbar ba ji ltar lags// zla ba nyi ma ji ltar lags// gnas ni gang du gzung bar bgyi// rkyen gnyis 'khor lo ji ltar lags// go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i
41b3(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi gang lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // de la dga' sogs ji ltar 'byung // stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags// sa yi rim pa ji ltar lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang //
41b4(rgyud): dgos pa'i dgongs pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod// khyod la bshad kyis legs par zung // rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni// nam mkha'
41b5(rgyud): gnyis med thams cad skyed// der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin ni// g.yo ba rnam shes g.yo ba yin// thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste// stong nyid bsam du med pa'o// thig le grangs na bcu drug ste/
41b6(rgyud): rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin no// de nas sems gzung bstan pa ni// rtsa dang rlung ni thig le la// gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po// 'khor lo'i grangs ni bzhi yin te// bde chen 'khor lo longs spyod/
41b7(rgyud): chos/ de 'og sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// de re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangs su shes par bya// me rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te// ro ma'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni// spyi gtsug 'khor lo dbang srur gnaso//
42a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin te// bde skyong 'khor lo drang po ste// rta mgrin longs spyod 'khor lo yon// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum du'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin no//
42a2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi grangs su bstan// rtsa rnams rang bzhin nga yis bshad// rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te// rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no// de nas yi ge dgod pa ni// bde chen 'khor lo sum cu gnyis// gsal/
42a3(rgyud): byed sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas nas bskor te dgod par bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ dbyangs yig bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// yum bzhi'i
42a4(rgyud): sa bon g.yon nas bskor// thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas bskor// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi gang yin la// gsal byed g.yas skor dgod par bya// dbyangs yig
42a5(rgyud): gnyis ldan g.yon nas bskor// bde chen 'khor lolo lte dbus su// haM ni dkar po 'brur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lde dbus su// oM ni dkar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi
42a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'o lte dbus su// nA ni sngon po 'brur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// AHni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// rkyen ni 'khor lo gnyis yin te// dang po'i gnas sa
42a7(rgyud): yi ge yaM// gtum mo 'bar po'i ya yin te// nag po yongs su gyur pa las// rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs// dbus su d+ha l+la dgod byas nas// ba dan lnga ni mdzes pa'o//
42b1(rgyud): ma gnas sum ra/ 'ang sa thugs sa dpa / rnams/ rdzu da// za rdza gas byas smra y-i// drug da
42b2(rgyud): sa man phrul bas ng+yas// 'tshams pa'i 'ayang rgyang gnyis bgad// ma gang+gAg su gnyis na bsgrags/ ba na can pa sros byas nas// bu nA nga tsam/ d+hAd+hAn+d+ha
42b3(rgyud): ba'i bdud rtsi yis// srog gi rtsa yi nang nas 'bab// rgyun du 'bab par gyur pa yis// 'chi med thigs pa gnyis yin te// gzung ba mdud pa'i nang du gzung // go bzlog lugs su bzlog pa ste//
42b4(rgyud): mthar thugs gnas su gzung ba'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa ni// gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo ste// hUM ni lte bar dgod byas nas// 'dab ma lnga bcu brgyad kyi grangs// gsal byed lugs/
42b5(rgyud): bzhin dgod par bya// dbyangs yig rim gnyis dag bkod nas// tha ma bzung ste spangs pa'o// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong ste// de phyir bde skyong zhes ni bshad// rta mgrin 'khor le'i 'dab
42b6(rgyud): bzung la// dbyangs yig lugs dang lugs min dgod// lte bar u ni dgod par bya// bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba'i phyir// rta mgrin 'khor lo ru ni bshad// rig pa'i 'khor lo 'dabam lda/
42b7(rgyud): lte bar gi ni dgod byas nas// 'dab ma lnga la o hU tra~M a// g.yas nas rim gyis dgod par bya// bzhi pa'i don ni reg pa'i phyir// rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rim
43a1(rgyud): pa drug/ lte ba 'dab bzhi 'dab ma brgyad// bcu drug sum cu rtsa gnyis te// drug cu rtsa bzhi bshad pa yin// lte bar a ni dgod pa ste// e bai ma ya de rnams ni// 'dab ma/
43a2(rgyud): bzhi la g.yon nas dgod// 'dab ma brgyad la dgod bya ba// sde brgyad kyi ni dang po brgyad// g.yon gyi rim pas dgod par bya// 'dab ma bcu drug gang yin la// ma mo bcu drug g.yon nas dgod//
43a3(rgyud): 'dab ma sum cu gnyis sogs la// dbyangs yig yi ge bcu drug ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pas dgod// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la// g.yas nas kA li lugs bzhin dgod// A li
43a4(rgyud): rim gnyis g.yon nas dgod// gsang ba'i dbang sgyur ba yi phyir// gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// de nas ro ma'i 'khor lo ni// 'dab ma gnyis la lte bar bcas// ma ning bzhi yi
43a5(rgyud): 'dab gnyis la// lte bar de nyid 'thung la dgod// rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba// b+hU ni gyen la dgod par bya// yi ge gnyis kyi dbus su ni// byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i ro// nyams su myong bar/
43a6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir// nyams myong ra ba'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas dbang bskur 'khor la ni// steng gi tshangs sgo'i 'dab ma brgyad// lte bar oM ni dgod pa sa// dam la tshwa// g.yon nas brtsams te phyogs
43a7(rgyud): bzhir dgod// hrutra bris/ g.yas nas mtshams su rim par dgod// byang chub sems kyi chu rkun gyis// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag/ 'khrud pa'i phyir na dbang bskur te// de byer dbang /
43b1(rgyud): mas bshad// de rnam pa ni ba da byag// bdo brdzus sa ga par bya/ nga ldan pa pa// rnam shes par \u0f7f/ gsangs
43b2(rgyud): rang gi sems kyi stong pa nyid// 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin du// tsaM yang mi rtog shes gyur na// ma bsgoms na yang sprom pa nyid// de ltar sems la legs par zung // bcom ldan 'a
43b3(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ byi dang
43b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha
43b5(rgyud): ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra sid+d+hi dz+wa la saM ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/
43b6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje grub pa'i dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na/
43b7(rgyud): rin po che khang bzang gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnam 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
44a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ rigs sgyur ma'i dbang du mdzad de/ thams cad kyis lha'i phyi nang gi gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas/
44a2(rgyud): mchod pa'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/ mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid don dam gang yin/
44a3(rgyud): pa// dpal dang rdo rje'i don dang ni// dra ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don nges bstan sdom pa gang yin pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa la sogs
44a4(rgyud): 'khor rnams kun// phyi rol don la yengs pa'i sems// nang du bsdus la rtse gcig nyon// dpal ldan ye shes gnyis med do// de nyid mchod pa'i 'os yin la// gnyis med bde bas
44a5(rgyud): mchod par bya// rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga// gzung 'dzin rtogs pas mi phyed phyir// rdo rje zhes ni bstan pa yin// de nyid don la rtse gcig pas// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges
44a6(rgyud): par thob pa'o// dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don// kun rdzob gzhan rig tu bstan pas// grangs mang rgya cher bstan pa ni// nam mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i don// nam mkha' dang mtshungs
44a7(rgyud): rang rig ni// sems kyi de nyid stong pa'o// skad cig de nyid rgyud nyid la// rgyud ces bya bar bstan pa yin// dpal rdo rje ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las// mtshan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste dang ba'o//
44b1(rgyud): sems ga ni ma skyes ste da'i rgyu banas/ dang ba migs pa / / ngas da/ m+b+ha
44b2(rgyud): dang / phan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang // don dam do cing chos kyi dbyings// de nyid 'di ni bshad par bya// tshun rang dag lenas te// rgya med bus rang bzhin can// dang gi spum byung ba'i/
44b3(rgyud): pade cher 'khor lo nas parnams te// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// ye shes skye ba'i rten yin la// gnas ni de dang rnanyam pa'i rtsa// thogs rnam
44b4(rgyud): shes rlung yin te// ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la// zhon nas de nyid 'byung ba yin// grangs ni snga ma ltar du shes// ngo bo thog le nyid yin te// thig le mdud pa'i grangs su shes// de yi phan
44b5(rgyud): yon gang yin pa// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// phyin ci log tu brtags pa yis// rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin// 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o//
44b6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes kyi rgyu dang gnas la sogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'khor lo rnams kyi
44b7(rgyud): dbye ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs yin no// de nas longs spyod 'khor lo ni// 'dab ma bcu drug dag tu bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// sprul pa'i 'khor
45a1(rgyud): mo 'du ma na// dug rtsun bzhi dag yin no// bde chen 'ayornam sar pa'i // 'ongs spyod 'tsha la sang drug/ chos kyi 'tsha sa song bcu gnyis sbrul d+ma'i 'tsha /
45a2(rgyud): sor bcu drug/ bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba ru// ni dkar po 'brur bltas pasam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i ste dbus su// yon dmar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khor li ro lte dbus su//
45a3(rgyud): hUM ni sngon po 'thur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// AHni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// dang po'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni// lugs 'byung
45a4(rgyud): lugs min dgod par bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la// dbyangs yig bcu drug rim bzhin dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la// lAM mAM paM taM/ yi ge 'di rnams g.yon nas dgod// oM traM hriHaH/ mtshams
45a5(rgyud): nas g.yas su dgod par bya// sprul pa'i 'dab ma bzhi rtsibs la// gsal byed yi ge sum cu gnyis// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog tshul dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ni// dbus nas drang por gnas/
45a6(rgyud): pa ste/ hUM ni dkar po 'thur bltas pa// mar gyi rtse la thug par dgod// g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te// kA li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// thabs la lan gsum bskor byas nas// lugs 'byung 'og
45a7(rgyud): tu kha bltas dgod// g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas la// ma mo dbyangs yig bcu drug ni// gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya// skal tshags la gnas srog la brten// rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i gnas der ni/
45b1(rgyud): tsun da / par ga la na ba dang rdul/ sa rtsonapa lda nga rmugs// 'did sa mas sa / tha bsas pasas //
45b2(rgyud): don yongs su gyur ba las/ ye sa 'khor lo zla gsum gyi// rmad na mo gsupa nyid yin te/ lte bar na dmar babs sa// 'ab sa gsum dz+dza// thugs sa thar la dgang byug
45b3(rgyud): gsum bsam par bya// rlung gi gnas su yi ge yaM// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la// tshad ni sor bzhi nyid yin no// dbus su 'dab ma lnga yin te// lte bar
45b4(rgyud): yang ni nag po bsam// 'dab ma lnga la d+ha lnga dgod// ba dan lnga yis mtshan pa'o// rlung gi dam tshig me sbar bas// dam tshig me yis gtum mo bskul// ye shes mes ni gtum mo bskul// 'khor lo
45b5(rgyud): gsum bsregs rnying pa tsam// yi ge ha ni bsros pa yis// haM bzhu badrud rtsi'i char yang bab// lte ba'i gnas su thig ler gyur// rgyun du 'bar bar gyur pa yis// rin chen dbyibs 'dra'i nang sdeb nas/
45b6(rgyud): rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong bas// rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal
45b7(rgyud): rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i// nges don du ni pa
46a1(rgyud): yis gsungs// de yi don la khyed rnams kyis// rtse gcig sems kyis yid la zung / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // byams pa dang //
46a2(rgyud): dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas/ rjes su yi rang nas lha'i mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod pa ni nam
46a3(rgyud): mkha' la rin po che'i char dang / sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang pa ta hi la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang /
46a4(rgyud): dri dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa ro brgya pa dang / gtum pa'i mchod pas mchod de/ gzhan yang nang dang / gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung bas mchod nas/
46a5(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rdo rje grub badra ba'i sdom pa'i rlud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgyu gar gyi mkhan po ga sa d+hAr dang /
46a6(rgyud): lotsa ba dge slong shAkya mi shes kyis bsgyur cing nus pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta gar+b+ha maHtan+ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs
46a7(rgyud): thathams cad kyi thugs kyi zhing po don gyi drung / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// la ma dpal gcon dur gyur pa'i phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gagigs pathams cad kyi/ gzu gsung
46b1(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje dag/ ming po mchog ni bcugs pa'i mu/ rdo rnasems dpa' la gzigs te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes bu// ma tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// mab dang la ba yi mo //
46b2(rgyud): srid dang 'khor bar rab tu grags// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye go rang byung bcom ldan 'das// nam ma pa'i bdag po sgra rdzogs nas// gsung gis par bdag
46b3(rgyud): rig sngags rgyal// skye med dbyings nas snang byed 'khrungs// 'gro drug 'dren pa khyod kyi gsung // nyid kyi zhal nas thig pa shor// ke ke ru dang mnad dang // sdug dang rdo yi snying po dang // rin chen kha dog snga lnga
46b4(rgyud): pas// ye shes gzhal yas kha dog sbas// nyid las mi gzhan 'jigs byed dang // rgyal sras dad pa gtam nyan dang // 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams so// de nas bcom ldan shAka thub kyi// gsung gi
46b5(rgyud): dgongs pa mkhyen nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi// rang byung ye shes bsdu ba mdzad// de bzhin gshegs kyis 'di skad du// ched du brjod pa rnam par mdzad// gang zhig rtsol med bde chen don//
46b6(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa ma mthong na// sgrub dang rtsol ba ci sprad kyang // byis pa don med ga chad du// rdzas bzung ba ni 'ching ba nyid// rten 'brel sgom pa gnyis pa'o// don med nyams myong 'dod pa yang // 'ching ba'i/
46b7(rgyud): rgyu ste gsum pa'o// kha cig e ri'i thal bas byugs// dbang phyug nam mkha'i rdzas rnams sdud// 'ching ba'i rgyu ste bzhi pa'o// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / mtha' dang
47a1(rgyud): bral ba'i rang bzhin la// gzung 'dzin nad kyis cil 'ching // gdong nas dag pa'i nam mkha' la// bag chags mtshan mas ci la 'ching // skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid la/
47a2(rgyud): rgyu 'bras nad kyis ci la 'ching // bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes la// rtog dpyod nad kyis ci la 'ching // e ma'o rnam dag sems nyid glong // lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'od gsal sna tshogs dus
47a3(rgyud): na bde// rnam dag 'khor lo bde ba la/ bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis// srid rgyu nges pa'i rtsa bar 'khyams// gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs// zhen chags can gyi gdul bya la// bde
47a4(rgyud): pa chen po bcos ma sbyin// khong khro can gyi gdul bya la// g.yo ba rlung gi bcos ma sbyin// 'dod pa chu bzhin gdungs pa la// bkri dang rang rgyud bcos ma sbyin// kun tu rmongs pa'i yid can la// stong pa
47a5(rgyud): snying rje bcos ma sbyin// ston pas de skad bka' stsal pas// 'khor rnams bsdu ba rnam mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs la 'di skad gsol// ye nas rnam par dag pas na/ khams gsum
47a6(rgyud): 'khor ba 'i sngar lags/ glo bur ba gcig lags 'gyur na// thog mtha' yod par mi 'gyur ram/ yang na rdo rje sems sogs pa// dmyal bar 'tshed par mi 'gyur ram// 'khor ba bde grung
47a7(rgyud): ban lhung bachub pa sa ni ci zhig gra de sa dgasol nas mi sdang gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// nga la zhan pa khyed legs so// rtse gcig med kyis dang bar byos/ gamangs
47b1(rgyud): pa / ma chags das rigs sa la// dpe nas ses pa // ran tus kyi bzhin so// bdags shing bdags shi thams su rnams kyi rigs
47b2(rgyud): mkha'i sna tshogs gzugs// deng bdag sems pa'i lus su 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mthon pos de gang du// bshad nas 'khor rnams dengs byer te// phyogs gcig tu ni 'khor gyur na// bcom ldan 'das
47b3(rgyud): 'di skad gsol// lba ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bu// ma bcos ngo bo dzi na du// ye shes spyod pa jis bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so 'dus pa'i tshogs chen pos// rnam pa drug gi
47b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid de/ khyad par bdun dang mtshon pa'i dge// bcu ba'i rnam pa ci rigs su// bcug sum ma nor zhes su bgang / gzhan cig sdes pa khyab bzlas pa// mngon sum dbang gi bor shar/ sbyin
47b5(rgyud): pas bzlog nas bltas pa yin// nam mkha' las 'bab bde skyong nas// 'thur du 'khor lo drug rims su// a ta rak+ta bde ba len// ye shes zer zhing sdug bsngal skye// rmongs pas mya ngan sdig
47b6(rgyud): bas 'dzin// de mi spong ba'i 'ching bar 'gyur// si ng+ga'i tshul du dge slong gnyis// dbang rdzogs ber zhing bde ba spyod// 'chi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar song // rgyal po'i khab na btsun mo can/
48a1(rgyud): tshom bu sdud cing rig pa yis// ye shes gzhan la 'chad cing ston// 'chi 'phos dur khrod sa ga yi// spang 'tshong ma yi srin bur skyes// 'jig rten khams gzhan sems/
48a2(rgyud): dmyal du// shin tu 'tshed cing 'bod par 'gyur// brig sha'i drung na a ko ta/ bka' yi bsgo ba rnam par byed// kha sbyor ba ni ye shes zhes// bzhin bzang ma la legs par dgod// tshe 'phos nas ni
48a3(rgyud): ngu 'bod skyes// 'chad pa'i skyes bu de phyir ngas// khyod kyis 'dri ba bstan par bya// sems kyi rang bzhin ma bcos pa// mi rtog lta ba mi dmigs shes// mi g.yo ngo bo mi 'da' 'am// de skad gsungs nas mi
48a4(rgyud): snang gyur// 'dri ba'i rtog pa dang po chod// 'chad pa'i skyes bus yang gsol ba// 'gro ba'i bla ma gnyen gcig pu// dam phog pa ni ji ltar lags// dbang gi rang bzhin ji ltar lags// rtog pa gnyis
48a5(rgyud): pa dris pa las// lta ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba yi// gang la ming de skad bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mtshon pa'i dpe ni 'di
48a6(rgyud): skad gsungs// mag po brtsegs pa bad ba ti// kri ta dang ni kang ka dang // ngag dang glang po gzhon nu ma/ rdza ba chu shel grang seng dag oMd chu bo gsum 'dres dang // gser dang nam mkha'
48a7(rgyud): me gsum pa bcu bzhir shes par bya// de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste// de las gang zhig 'da' byed pa// dmyal bar yang dag 'tshed par bshad// e ma'i rang rig gal chen po// nam mkha'i sprin la
48b1(rgyud): zung bar byed/ byis pa dang mi shes pas// bcas med dang bzhin rdzob tu byed// rlum 'ang gas pasas pa med ga lags rna nags songs byas/ kun du mas /
48b2(rgyud): l+h+wam 'tsha rdu ma ga byas pa'i ma ngas rgya// bsngon pa thams pa sa/ drub mas mas nga/ smra rnam la bar chu
48b3(rgyud): gi rgyu ba dril ba'i sgra// yig 'bru la dog go bar byed// sid dang rlung ni rmyab ni// snang ba 'gags pa ye shes so// de nyid log pas 'ching ba'i rgyu// tshangs pa li ni tsat+ta li// sa bas
48b4(rgyud): 'od du zhu// ka sogs g.yas dang g.yon du a// yig mgo tshig dang gsos pa dang // song phrag bdun bcu'i rtsa lam nas// bab pa bde ba sbed par byed// don dam pa'o zhes su smra//
48b5(rgyud): rmongs pa bsdams pas mdud pa grol// zag pa skyes pas 'ching bar 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pas rigs pa yis// ci rigs pa ru gzhan la ston// grol bar 'gyur zhes nga mi smra// a
48b6(rgyud): ma'o blo ni gnyis su snang // ji ltar spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / gang la ming de skad bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de nas
48b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rtog pa gsum la gcad pa'i phyir// stan las langs te 'di skad gsol// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// bsgom pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar lags// phyag 'tshal
49a1(rgyud): rdo rje dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal rdo rje rang byung sems// phyag rnams dag pa 'od gsal dbyings// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'gro ba'i bla ma ye
49a2(rgyud): shes gzugs// gsung gi thigs pa lhan cig skyes// rnam dag rang rig dbyings la 'dud// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// mngon du gyur pa sgom
49a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs 'bar ba ye shes drod// ci yang mthong la med rtogs na// ma mthong gnas na mthong ba ru// mthong na 'gag cing bltas na skye// shes rab ye shes 'od po che// ci dgar
49a4(rgyud): gzhag na bde ba 'gog/ ye shes rgya mtsho ye gsal la// sangs rgyas sgom par mi mdzad do// de la gnyen po yod dam ci// rigs pas ston pa 'ching ba'i nad// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi//
49a5(rgyud): bde ba de ni ston mdzad dam// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyid kyis// bstan par nus sam 'on te ci// bskad du med pas brjod dang bral// bsgrub tu med pas dpe dang bral// mtshon du med pas
49a6(rgyud): tshig lam chad// lhan cig skyes pas bsgrub tu med// mngon du gyur pas bsgom du med// dbyang du med pas bcos dang bral// ka ma yengs bri yis rtogs pa'o// bsgom pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa'i
49a7(rgyud): tshe'achad pa'i skyes bu nyid kyang ni// brgyal nas sa la 'gyel gyur te// lha min rig sngags 'chang ba rnams/ so sor byer te dengs par gyur// lha yi bu bo stong phrag ni// chos la rdul mig rnam par
49b1(rgyud): dag byang chub sems dpa' ni khri yang // de ma thag tu mngon sangs rgyas// 'jig rten khams ni drug g.yos pas// 'ur 'ur po dang chem chem gyis/ khams gsum po ni 'dar bar byed// de 'i mong la
49b2(rgyud): sems rdzogs pa// ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad gsol// e ma'i sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bde ba'i mchog/ skal ldan 'dul byed gnyen gcig pu// 'gro ba'i mar me ye
49b3(rgyud): gis ston// khyod kyi thugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma rig mo nga'i ling thog pas pa// rnam dag ye shes khyod la 'dud// dga' mthu rangs nas gsol pa dang // thams cad 'dud cing 'khod par byed/
49b4(rgyud): sgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de skad bcom ldan shAkya thug/ rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te// bka' yi bsgo ba 'di skad mdzad// legs so 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnam/
49b5(rgyud): yang dag ye shes la zhugs pas// rnam rtog 'ching ba'i nad dang bral// mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la// bzlog pas bltas pa tha dad 'dzin// gnyug ma'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes// de yang bcings
49b6(rgyud): pas ci la mthong // gang gis de nyid mngon gyur pa// de la sdig pas ci la 'dzin// dus gsum 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa// de la byin gyis rlob par mdzad// de la gal te gzugs yod na// dpag
49b7(rgyud): gam gzhal du btub bam ci// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de la ci rigs skyob par byed// gnod sbyin mthu chen thob pa yang // srung badrun du byed par 'gyur// grul bum srin po gdon rnams kyis// de yi
50a1(rgyud): bsam pa yongs su sgrub// nang dang shu ba 'bras dang rims// de yi lus la 'byung mi 'gyur// bskal par bsags pa'i sgrib pa srung // skad cig ma yis blang bar 'gyur/ d+han du/
50a2(rgyud): zhugs dang lan cig 'ong // phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dpa' yis// de yi gzi brjid 'phel bar byed// de bas sems dpa' chen po nyon// khyab pa'i 'khor lo bde ba'i mchog/ de nyid pha rol phyin drug
50a3(rgyud): ldan la yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung // dam pa'i don la 'jal bar nus// don gyis chos nyid 'jal bar ston// bla ma'i zhal nas dris na skye// rtogs na rnal 'byor skyes bu de// nam mkha'i
50a4(rgyud): rdul phran ston par 'gyur// ma rabs sgyu ma'i tshig la 'dzin// lhan cig skyes pa mthong ngam ci// gal te mthong na brtag par 'gyur// brtags na yengs te 'khyam par 'gyur// gnyis
50a5(rgyud): kyis tho la mya ngan snang // kha dog gcig tu bsgyur ba yi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo mchog/ rnal ma la gnas 'ching 'grol 'gyur// gang zhig tha ma'i drin shes dag/ skye ba med pa nyid du ston/
50a6(rgyud): tha ma'i bka' drin mi shes pa// de yis ldan skyes cil mthong // lhan cig skyes pa de yis bcings// de la 'gro ba skye zhing 'ching // tha dad gzengs pas nang du gyur// dus dang gnas su
50a7(rgyud): dgrangs pas ldog/ bdag dang gzhan du bltas pas ldog/ 'di dang byi mar bsad pas gol// skye med ldan skyes bcos pas 'ching // de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad// 'chad pa'i
50b1(rgyud): skyes bus 'di skad bstod// e ma'o rnam dag ye shes sku// khyab bdag gsung gi lde mig so// ma rig sgrib pa dral ba'o// bde bar gshegs pa ye shes sku// e ma'o rnal 'byor thugs kyi
50b2(rgyud): bcud// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir las bsgral// ma skyes lhan cig 'gag med cing // byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// phan yon gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de bzhin
50b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po'i don gyi chung rdzogs so// rje btsun gu dril na la snga nas dang / lo tsa ba seng kar shAkya 'od kyis pa ma mthing du bsgyur cing gtan
50b4(rgyud): la bab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sa~M ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza ad+g+ha/ shwa sA nA a la kA ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal/
50b5(rgyud): po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
50b6(rgyud): rdorje btsun mo'i thug rnams la bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje sing po la sogs pa'i dba' bo dang dnga' mo rnams kyis phyi'i mchod pa dang / nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod nas/
50b7(rgyud): 'di skang ces gsol so// kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'i ltar lags// 'khor lo zhes pa gang la bgyi// sdom panyid kyang 'i sa pa// rgyud kyi don ni 'i mar lags// de bzhin rgyad kyirgyal ba //
51a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ru brjod// khyin gas pa / dang po phyi'i 'khor mon// mung dog phyag mtshan b+ha yi swA/ drug
51a2(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis rim pa ste// ye shes dam tshig sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams rim pa bzhin// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// tha mal gcod pas byi ru bshad// gnyis pa/
51a3(rgyud): nang gi 'khor lo ni// gnas sogs bcu yi rim pa rnams// mtho ris sa steng sa 'og dang // 'khor lo sgo la dgod pa ni// phyi rol spros pa gcod pa'o// gsum pa gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// sprul pa
51a4(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod dang // de bzhin bde ba chen po ste// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// gnas su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang // rnam par dga' ba'i gnyen po ni// /
51a5(rgyud): bde ba stong pa mi rtog gsum// dbyer med rtogs pas lhan skyes la// de kho na yi 'khor lor brjod// sdom pa phyi nang gsang ba nyid// 'dod chags zhe sdang ti mug dang // nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs
51a6(rgyud): ga gnyen pos ye shes ngang du sdom// bdag dang dngos por lta ba dang // tha mal pa yi rnam rtog kyang // dag pa lha yi 'khor lor sdom// gdod nas lus la grub pa yi// rtsa dang rlung dang byang sem
51a7(rgyud): kyang a ba d+hU ti'i nang du sdom// bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang // dngos dang dngos med ye shes kyang // dbyer med gtsug ma'i rang du rdzog// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te// gnas skabs gsum gyi drim dang /
51b1(rgyud): 'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa yis// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la// gnyis pa thun mong bya ngan 'das// rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// 'og pa'i son tan ldan/
51b2(rgyud): pa dang // nges pa'i don la dbang byed dang // gnyen po ye shes che ba dang // gzhan la khyab pas rgyal po yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dur khrod brgyad ni ji ltar lags// de yi dgo
51b3(rgyud): pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyis// dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur// dang po phyi yi dur khrod ni// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol lam// yang na phyi rol
51b4(rgyud): grwa rnams su// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// gtum drag dang ni tshang tshong dang // 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang // 'jigs sde rnams ni shar sogs kyi// phyogs su g.yon
51b5(rgyud): nas bskor te gnas// ha har dgod pa dbang ldan te// dpal gyi nags tshal byin zar ro// 'jigs pa'i mun pa bden bral du// rlung mtshams ki li ki lir sgrogs// shar du ha ri pA s+ye la/
51b6(rgyud): gtum drag dkar po glang po'i gdong // byang du byang chub shing bu la// g+ha ra ser po mi yi gdong // nub tu mya ngan med shing la// 'bar 'khrugs dmar po chu srin gdong // lho ru tsu ta'i shing bu la//
51b7(rgyud): 'jigs sde nag po ma he'i gdong // me ru ka ran tsan ste// dpal gyi nags tshal ra gdong dmar// bden bral a nu'i shing bu la// 'jigs pa'i mun pa ma he'i gdong // rlung ngu srid grub shing bu la/
52a1(rgyud): ki lir sgra sgrogs ri dgas gdong // dbang ldan n+ya gro d+ha shing la// ha har dgod pa ba glang gdong // g.yas na gri gug thod pa g.yon// shing lo'i steng na stod byung ngo //
52a2(rgyud): shar du brgya byin dkar po la// rdo rje sdigs mdzub glang po zhon// byang du lus ngan ser po la// dbyug pa 'dzin cing gter la zhon// nub tu chu bdag dmar po ni// chu srin zhon nas zhags pa
52a3(rgyud): thogs// lho ru ga shin rje nag po la// ma he zhen nas be con thogs// shar lho me lha dmar ser la// ra la zhon nas me thab 'dzin// lho nub srin po spug nag la// ral gri thogs nas mi la
52a4(rgyud): zhon/ nub byang rlung lha mdog sngon po// ri dgas zhon nas 'phan ni 'phyar// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// khyu mchog zhon nas rtse gsum thogs// thams cad rang rang rig mas 'khyud//
52a5(rgyud): nor rgyas dang ni 'jig po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dang // shar nas brtsams te g.yon du dgod// pad+ma che dang mtha' yas dang // rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ni// g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod
52a6(rgyud): pa'o// sna sgrogs pa dang thugs pa dang // mun pa can dang kun tu 'khyil// shar nas byang gi phyogs su dgod// 'khrigs pa gang ba 'bab pa dang // drag po sprin tshogs mtshams la dgod/
52a7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma// sna tshogs 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni// ro la spyod cing mkha' la rgyu// gzhan yang rnal
52b1(rgyud): 'byor mchod rten dang // chu dang me sogs rim pa ste// gza' dang bar ta grub pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas// 'byung po'i gdon dang ro langs dang // stag dang khyi dang ce spyang dang //
52b2(rgyud): wa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // phyed tshig pa dang rnam par sbyangs// mgo bo lus po keng rus rnams// a la pho gyi sgra sgrogs pa// de nas nang gi dur khrod ni// lus kyi skra sen spu la sogs//
52b3(rgyud): skye zhing 'jig par byed pas ni// dur khrod chen po lus la dgod// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis nas// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni// dbugs
52b4(rgyud): rgyu zhes pa dur khrod do// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang // dngos po'i rtog pa sna tshogs pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dur khrod 'chi// gsung ba rig pa'i ye shes khrod// de nas ngur
52b5(rgyud): khrod dgos pa ni// rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la// phyogs skyong mi dge bcu po spong // sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan ma shing // thugs rje'i rtags su shing brgyad la// zhing skyong sngags kyi theg pa
52b6(rgyud): srung la gdug pa 'joms byir klu brgyad dgod// mchod rten rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs spyod pa byed// chu ni brjod bya zab pa la// me sngogs rtog pa bral ba'o// rdo rje
52b7(rgyud): snying pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// su dang gsung thugs ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji lta bu// bzhugs pa'i don ni che/
53a1(rgyud): skar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud// lha yi bu dang phung po'i badrud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom ldan 'das/
53a2(rgyud): skal ba yon tan drug nyid de// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni// drug po de la ldan zhes gsungs// 'khor ba'i
53a3(rgyud): chos ni mya ngan te// de dang bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs
53a4(rgyud): kyi ngo bor gnas/ btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyings// de la yod phyir b+ha ga ste// mi byed pas na bzhugs zhes bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bgyi// de bzhin
53a5(rgyud): dpa' mo nyid kyang ci// de yi mchod pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bo la yang rnam bzhi ste// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms
53a6(rgyud): pa yis// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong // des ni phyi yi dpa' bor bshad// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa rlung thig le bsgoms pa yis// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa ni/
53a7(rgyud): nang gi dpa' bor bshad ba yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi//
53b1(rgyud): gnyis su med pa gang bsgoms pas/ pa dang rdog pa 'joms pa'i phyir/ mtshan sa dnga' bor bshang // dpa' mol ya rnam pa pa'i/ ma ni shes rab paros byis/ gdong nas thos tha baspun
53b2(rgyud): grub la// lte ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni// de ni phyi yi dpa' mor bshad// rang du rtsa dang thig le sogs// rang bzhin med par byed pas ma// gsang bar dga' ba bzhi rnams la// rang bzhin lhan cig
53b3(rgyud): skyes pas ma// rang rig sems kyi ngo bo ni// nam mkha' lta bur gang bsgoms pa// de kho na yi dpa' mo'o// mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po byi yi mchod pa ni//
53b4(rgyud): me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang // rol mo sel snyan dbyangs nyid dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// ro dang rig bya 'jam pa dang // 'khor lo rin chen glang po
53b5(rgyud): ta/ btsun mo dpag dpon blon po rnams// phyi yi mchod pa thun mong ngo // rang gi lus las byung ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang / sha sgra lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ phung po khams dang skye
53b6(rgyud): mched kyi// 'khor lo rnams la mchod pa nung // de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rang snang thabs kyi rig ma yis// sna gzung thag ku ca btsir// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le sogs// draga'
53b7(rgyud): ga dag 'dag 'a thal dang / gsan cigaskyes pa'i bdebs mchos 'a rig spong ba rnags pa yi// 'a gas pa da chos skul// zhen pa rnams dang brel ba ni// blan med pa'i maco
54a1(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// gtor ma zhes pa gang la bgyi// de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru/
54a2(rgyud): gsungs// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po byi yi gtor ma ni// thun mtshams lha yi mdun nyid du// raM las me dang yaM las rlung // skyed gsum a las dum gcig pa'i// nang du bdud rtsi sha
54a3(rgyud): lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang // mkha' 'gro dgyes par byed pa'o// gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// lus
54a4(rgyud): ni lha yi 'khor lo la// rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// gsum pa gsang ba'i gtor ma ni// 'khor lo bzhi yi ka pA lar// rlung dang thig le bdud rtsi la/
54a5(rgyud): dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs te// lhan cig skyes pa mchod par bya// de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni// phyi nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun// chos kyi dbyings kyi pad snod du// don dam
54a6(rgyud): sems kyi sngags kyis su// bde ba chen po'i lha la mchod// phan yon dngos grub ster ba dang // phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang // zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang // khams dang skye mched rtas pa
54a7(rgyud): dang nas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing // skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang // 'khor ba'i pha rol son pa'o// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das/
54b1(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// de nas 'khrul nas ji ltar 'khor// ma 'khrul don la ji ltar lags// de las yon tan ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems las/
54b2(rgyud): ma gtogs sangs rgyas dang // sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing // ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur te// des na sangs rgyas thams
54b3(rgyud): cad kyis// sems kyi gsang 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa// snang ba myong zhing grub pa med// de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med// thog mar ma skyes rang
54b4(rgyud): bzhin dag/ glo bur sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang bzhin rig pa 'od gsal sogs// smrar med brjod du med
54b5(rgyud): pa ste/ dper na lkugs pas ro myong 'dra// ras dang shel 'dra'i rang bzhin la// log rtog rtsi sogs rnam par 'khrul// khams gsum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing // 'dod pa'i byang chub
54b6(rgyud): sna tshogs dang // de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ de nyid g.yeng dang rnam rtog ste// rang gis 'khrul nas rang gis 'ching // rang gis gsod cing rang gis pa// rang gis ltung ni
54b7(rgyud): rang sdug bsngal// rang rig le nas spos bral la// skra dang tha sad 'jug na 'khrul// rang rig rang gis 'od gsal la// ma rig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul// dngos po spong par
55a1(rgyud): mnyam la// thang dang dor bar byed na 'khrul// 'dod yon dang gis 'gags pa la// de dag dka' bas spong na 'khrul// rang rig ye nas song ba la// 'dod yon
55a2(rgyud): lnga la brten na 'khrul// dman dang gya nom med pa la// sgo dang skur pa 'debs na 'khrul// gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la// sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems
55a3(rgyud): can gnyis med la// de dag gnyis su 'dzin na 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la// bden pa gnyis su 'byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal// skye 'gag
55a4(rgyud): gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul// stong nyid ro la mi gnas par// dngos po mtshan mar gzung na 'khrul// sems kyi glang chen mi 'dul bar// g.yeng ba'i sems su 'dug na 'khrul//
55a5(rgyud): rnam rtog rlung gis bskyed pa la// rang rig ye shes 'dod na 'khrul// rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar// che ba'i nga rgyal sman 'khrul// rang rig nyams su ma myong bar// dkar po'i
55a6(rgyud): chos rnams spong na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul// rang bzhin ma 'khrul rang rig 'khrul// sems nyid ma 'khrul bag chags 'khrul// sangs rgyas las 'khrul sem
55a7(rgyud): can de/ garang rig las 'khrul gzhan rig sdang // sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung // des na rang sems 'khrul pa dag gdon du snang ba rab tu bya// skye ga med pazhin skye sa 'phrug
55b1(rgyud): lcags bsregs sa gzhi rang gi sems// me sogs byed pa gzhan na med// bkres sgom sdug bsngal rang gi sems// bas som bkres pa gzhan na med// rdeg bcog ldag gdus rang gi sem//
55b2(rgyud): srog gcod gshan pa gzhanan med// 'gro ba thams cad rang sems kun// rang gi sems su ma shes na// de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin// tha ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// theg chen
55b3(rgyud): zab mo'i mdo rgyud blta// bsgom du med pa'i don bsgoms nas// ma bsgoms na yang bsgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la// stong par mi 'gyur gang yang med// de
55b4(rgyud): las mya ngan 'das pa 'byung // su dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung // de dag sems kyi rang bzhin no// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rten gyi/
55b5(rgyud): gang zag rnam pa du// rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis// gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas/
55b6(rgyud): gdol pa ko lpags ma pan la sogs// gzugs ngan gsod pa'i don gnyer ba// theg pa 'di las 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgoms pa dang // gtso bo lapa
55b7(rgyud): sum bsgom pa dang // dgra pa'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed pam tshwas dang bcas pa'i lam// rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'gyur cis// gra migs su mo mtshan ldan la/ chags pas mas
56a1(rgyud): pa spong ba ni// las kyi phyag rgya chags pa'i lam// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa byang sems dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar
56a2(rgyud): thug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa// chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam// rten yod ma yin rten pa med// dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal te// lhan cig skyes pa'i don sgom pa/ phyag rgya
56a3(rgyud): chen por rang byin rlab// de rnams gnyis su bsdu ba ste// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// las dang po la phyi nang gnyis// mchog la yang ni phyi nang gnyis// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i
56a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste// 'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum// bshad rgyud
56a5(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis te// yan lag rgyud ni grangs las 'das// rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar bsdus pa yin// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // dmangs rigs gdol pa
56a6(rgyud): gdul don du// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gnas gang du ni gtso bo bsgom// thabs ni rnam pa du
56a7(rgyud): zhig mchis// de bzhin thabs las byung ba ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ri rtse dur khrod ro steng du// gcer bu skra bshig lhor bltas te// A li kA lis lus bsrungs la/
56b1(rgyud): dpa' 'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// sbyin par byed pa dbang bzhi la// grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam// lam gnyis la ni brten nas su// sngags pas byang chub bsgrub par bya/ khrus pas/
56b2(rgyud): lus kyi dri ma 'khrud// gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khrud// gsum pas sems kyi dri ma ste// de ni kun tu brtags pa la// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa bshad// gnas dang
56b3(rgyud): ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang // byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim la// nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'i rim// rim gnyis mnyam par gnas
56b4(rgyud): nas su// rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do// stong pa mngon gyur chos sku la// mtshanas bde ba longs spyod sku// rol pa'i mdzad pa sprul skul// sku gsum dbyer med bde chen dang // lha mos gsol pa/
56b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// gang la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa// 'khor bas skyo nas rlom gsam ldan// thos
56b6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan mtshan nyid bzang // dben par dkyil 'khor bris sgra bcad// chos gis gyon la bdud rtsi spyad// bun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// den pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la/
56b7(rgyud): 'bras bu'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yeng ba che ba'i rnal 'byor la// nom pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// lel
57a1(rgyud): che ba'i rnal 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu// rtsa ba'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi/
57a2(rgyud): bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin la// rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus// yod pa
57a3(rgyud): rgyu la sgrub pa lam// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin// thog mar gsungs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud// phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud// don rnams ston pas rtsa ba la// gsal bar byed
57a4(rgyud): pa bshad pa'i rgyud// skal pa rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis dang // rtsod ldan dus bzhi'i rim pa yin// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa/
57a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la sba// ji lta bu la sbyin par bya// ster na lung nod ji ltar bya// bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gdab// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
57a6(rgyud): snying rje med cing khrol gdug khongs shing chags pa tshul khrims mod// dang med rigs ngan thams s+ho// thos chung zhing ring rnams las// dpa' zhing dul la blo zas ldan// bzod ldan drang la
57a7(rgyud): g.yo sgyu med// dang ldan rigs bzang gtong bod che// thos mang dam tshig ldan la sbyin// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis// sngon du tha ma mnyes byas la// yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu la/
57b1(rgyud): dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lha mo rnams la rnyed gtad ltar// de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams// zung la sgrub pa ched du gyis// ldan gsum brjod la
57b2(rgyud): rgyud rnams sbyin// phyi rabs dus kyi snyigs ma la// chags sems myong ba'i slob ma ni// gus pas mi zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod// thos nas khungs su ba rang che 'byin// de la bstan na dam tshig nyams// nges
57b3(rgyud): bar dad nas zhu ba yi// gcig nas gnyis la ma spel na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs rgyun chad// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i
57b4(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyis rgyud kyi don rtogs nas rjes su yi rang ngo // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra
57b5(rgyud): dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI a nA bi la tan+ta rA dzA nA mra bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po
57b6(rgyud): dang la rtog pa med pa zhes byab/ rdornamapa'i grol phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la ngan 'dod pas/ nas med rab tu bshad per bya/ blang ba med cing dpe med pa// tshig gi yul las
57b7(rgyud): rnam par 'das/ zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid// mtshan mang mtshan pa'i rnam par spangs// ngang gis sangs rgyas 'dido nyid tshul// khyad par dulang mdor bsdus pas// khadag gis gsal pas
58a1(rgyud): bag ba yin// mongs pa rnams la pan 'dod pas// ming nges 'don bstan pa yin/ 'amig slong par 'dod pa dang // khacig mig gzugs can dag
58a2(rgyud): khyab 'jum tshul gyis ni/ khro dmar dag ni 'jog par byed// de nyi nges par yang dag par// dz+hal gnas pa spyod yul nyid// d+hu dang 'bras bu ba gruban// bsgoms pa med cing byang chub da/
58a3(rgyud): rgyu yi yid ches spangs pa 'di// thog pa tha ma med pa'i bdag/ sgyu ma'i ye shes las byung ba// rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed// kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du// kha cig zhi ba chen po che// bcig/
58a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs// kha cig 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang // glu gar de bzhin sil snyan dang // lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid// kha cig sngags ni yang dag dgod// kha cig dkyil 'khor bri
58a5(rgyud): ba dang // dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang // 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i lus// de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags// gang tshe sems ni legs
58a6(rgyud): gnas pa// de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid// dkyil 'khor de nyid 'gyur ba ni// phan 'dod rnams kyis shes par bya// phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa//
58a7(rgyud): lus ngag yid gsum bcos pa'i phyir// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// sems kyi dkyil/
58b1(rgyud): 'khor das pas/ rang ba'i dmed par byams par bya/ ye slongs bu'i gcig nyid de/ dang po blang na rtogs par bya// ma mar rtog pa zhes gsungs pas/ dbye bung nga par ba /
58b2(rgyud): bya ba nan tam khyad 'phags pa// byang gi grur ni rnam par thos// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni// bag chags med gu rjes rtogs byed// gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// grwas dbus
58b3(rgyud): ni thams cad du// de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas// ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag/ sgo bzhir yang dgra brjod pa ni// de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba// de bzhin grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni// sbyir ba/
58b4(rgyud): bzhi ni rnam dag pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs su ni// mi bskyed pa yis rnam par brgyan// zhi dang chos don brgyad pa las// de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'grub// dra ba rnga byed
58b5(rgyud): zla ba sogs// dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang // rta babs la sogs thams cad ni// ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid// sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste// de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs//
58b6(rgyud): gang zhig sems kyi rab 'phel ba// ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas// de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs// dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste// dril bu do shal brtag pa ni// rang gi btsun mo rtogs par/
58b7(rgyud): byed pa sgra bstan rnam pa lta bur na// chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs// chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir// de nyid rgyal mtshan 'phreng bar gsungs// bla re la sogs gang bres pa//
59a1(rgyud): dngos po la sogs dang po nges// sems ni b+hA re zhes byar bshad// dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o// gos 'phreng de dag thams cad ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs/
59a2(rgyud): snang ba nyid// gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems// dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan// dri yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs// grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir//
59a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin po che yis spras// zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs pa// zabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sems// ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan// sku gsung
59a4(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs// sku gsung thugs ni nye ba'i phyir// rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med// bla ma slob ma rnam gsal bar// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid /
59a5(rgyud): gsungs// sbyin sreg kyang ni bshad pa yang // lha rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod// rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni// thab khung sgra yis mtshan ma nyid// bye brag phyed pas me nang du// gzus
59a6(rgyud): kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams// sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid// thams cad kyi ni sreg thugs bya// gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba// yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags// de ltar
59a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg pa gang nas ni// rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni// gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur ba// de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngos
59b1(rgyud): bo mi gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// de ni gsal bar brjod par bya// yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang // gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod// skye ba med cing sdang med pa// mtshan//
59b2(rgyud): bzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir// 'di ni nga yis sngags su gsungs// sngags ni gsal bar bshang nas ni// lha rnams kyang ni brjod par bya//
59b3(rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang // yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags shing // gal te sems kyis nyer brtags gang // /
59b4(rgyud): lha zhes bya bar yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs// lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni// gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya// de
59b5(rgyud): nas skyil krung bcas nas ni// sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang // rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid mthong bar gzhag par bya// snying ka'i gnas su lag pa gnyis// 'bad
59b6(rgyud): pas mnyam par sbyar nas su// mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du// gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams
59b7(rgyud): cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtog pa'i bdag/ thugs kyi rdo rje gsum pa bzhin/
60a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur// nga yis gsal bar brjod pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don// thabs
60a2(rgyud): dang shes rab spyod yul don// sems can don du snying rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// sna rtse dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs// de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du// mdor bsdus/
60a3(rgyud): thams cad ma byas so// res dga' dam tshig 'khor lo yang // de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so// rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni// gang 'grub de ni res 'ga' yang // gsung gi
60a4(rgyud): 'khor lor gsungs pa bzhin// rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas// sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par bya// khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/ bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid// dam tshig ces
60a5(rgyud): bya ba 'bang bar // gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa// de rnams kun la de bzhin ga shegs// de nams tha sad tsam gyis gnas// gang tshe dam tshig 'dod chags sems//
60a6(rgyud): ni de nyid rab tu spyod// gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa// de ni sems can sod ma yin// de la kun tu rtog pa yi// khrag ni zabar 'gyur ba'o// khrag ni chen po thos nas ni// 'od dpag
60a7(rgyud): med pa'ang bas bar bya// ga shig chos rnams las skyes pa// khra ba'i skar ni bsngags par bya// de sem gyis rtogs pa'i phyir/ khapa' bar yang dag gsungs pa 'is/ gdas pa
60b1(rgyud): kun gyi mnyam pa nyid// sha chen du ni rab tu dbye// mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod// gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems// nus pa'i rjes su
60b2(rgyud): sbyor ba las// phyag rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis// de yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod// chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems// sbas pa'i chad ni gnas pa 'di// chos rnams thams cad rab
60b3(rgyud): rtogs pa'i// bshang ba za bar yang dag brjod// dam tshig nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad// 'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kun
60b4(rgyud): gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma drab sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya
60b5(rgyud): ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ga sa d+har dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
60b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sa pa ra kha sa ma tran+da rA dza~M nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal
60b7(rgyud): shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun
61a1(rgyud): mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bas kyang ches
61a2(rgyud): gsang ba/ gsang ba chen po de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje snying po khyod nyon cig/ sog dang lnga pa de bzhin te// lam dang 'bras bu nyid yin no// rdo rje
61a3(rgyud): snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srog gang lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste// sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do// rdo rje snying pos
61a4(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lnga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// lnga pa yang ni gcig nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/
61a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying rje chen po las skyes pa// dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
61a6(rgyud): mchog bde ba chen po lam yin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni gang / dga' ba ni gang / thabs ni gang / shes rab ni gang / gnyis su
61a7(rgyud): med pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog/ dga' ba gnyis med bde ba che// thabs ni he ru ka dpal nyid// shes rab
61b1(rgyud): rje na la 'byoras// gnyis sa med pa zung 'jug mchog rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das te du ka ni gang lags / rdul 'byor ma ri gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
61b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// he ru ka ni phung po nyid// phung po yang ni he ruka/ khams ni rdo rje ma dpal te// rdo rje ma dpal khams nyid do// skye mched de yang de bzhin du// lha yi ngo bir shes par bya//
61b3(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phung po'i he ru ka gang lags/ khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa// he ru ka dpal
61b4(rgyud): bdag nyid dngos// dri ma med pa'i kha dog can// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// drug gis brgyad cing dgu dang ldan// zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rje dang // rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par brgyan//
61b5(rgyud): spyan gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste// chags pa med pa'i sham thabs can// shes rab rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma// ban+du rA ka'i kha dog can// gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan cing // dag
61b6(rgyud): ba lnga bcu'i 'phreng bas mdzes// rdo rje pad+ma'i snod bsnams pa// yab la 'khyud cing brkyang bskum bzhugs// gnyis med bde ba la dgyes pa// chu skyes nyi ma'i dbus na 'gying // khams
61b7(rgyud): nyid kyang ni lha nyid do// dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom
62a1(rgyud): ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa gang lags/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brtan dang g.yo
62a2(rgyud): ba thams cad kun// shes rab rang bzhin ma nyid de// lnga pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal nyid// ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku// brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab/ brtag tu med pa nam mkha'i
62a3(rgyud): dbus// gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can// gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med// gnyis su med pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o// dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang /
62a4(rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa rnam par dag pa ni gang
62a5(rgyud): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // dbang gi rnam par dag pa dang // maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du// bum pa'i ngo bo ltar shes pa// sngags
62a6(rgyud): kyi de bzhin nyid gnas pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang sbyin sreg ni gang / gtor ma ni gang / dbang ni gang / maN+Dal ni gang bum pa ni gang /
