62a7(rgyud): sngags kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags ni gsang sngags rgyal po ste// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka hU hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dz+wa la sa par swAhA/
62b1(rgyud): oM hrIHgas cu thub na/ oM sar+b+ba prad+h+wa dz+nyA ki ni la badz+ra dz+nyAni me T+Ta d+hU pa n+ta swAH/ mo badz+ra zar can la d+hu sku la Ta swAH/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag gis// bskul pa spyod la sogs pas
62b2(rgyud): sdig pa ma lus dag byed chu// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes// a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro dang // dUr ba la sogs de bzhin du// bzhi pa'i ngo bor yang dag shes/
62b3(rgyud): sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// gyen po gyi sgra bsgrags pas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes// dbang ni tha ma'i lam nyid do// bdud rtsi chu yis legs byugs nas// me tog dmar pos
62b4(rgyud): mchod pa'o// rin chen sdod bzang blo gyis mdzes// dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byang chu// zhal bzhi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing // spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa
62b5(rgyud): can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kyo bcom ldan 'das skye mched kyi mkha' 'gro ma gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gcer bu thal ba'i mdog can te// nyo shAcu na//
62b6(rgyud): yul rnams 'grim// lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / gtor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM dAl/
62b7(rgyud): pu khi Ta ki d+h+ri ka ka ni hUM phaT/ oM pa ra ni ya ni Ta ki ni hUM baH/ oM ma D+ha ki nI hU phaT/ oM par mu kha~M DA ki nI tru paH/ oM u lu ka tiD+ha ki ni sa Ta/ oM a ra Na ma DA ki ni hU phaT/ chu skyes dag
63a1(rgyud): gis rnam brgyan cing // bdud rtsi lnga yis rnam par mdzes// dpa' mo drug ni mnyes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smin pa'i lam ni ga
63a2(rgyud): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste// de yi rnam par de la gnas// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang
63a3(rgyud): sprul pa'i ngo bo ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam pa'i ngo bo lnga nyid de// sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag por bshad// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
63a4(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po ni gang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang gi kha dog dmar po ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sprul pa 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas// brkyang
63a5(rgyud): ba skum tshul gyis mnan pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen par bya ba sngags nyid de/
63a6(rgyud): oM gaN be ta ye swAhA/ nag po 'bru yi ril bu la// bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i lhar gnas pa// sngags kyi ngo bo shes par bya// dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ las sa
63a7(rgyud): tshogs kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
63b1(rgyud): rdo rje gnos gnas la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
63b2(rgyud): kha tsho'i mkhan po dz+nyA na badz+ras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maHkA la kro d+han tha raha s+yA sid+d+hi thA ba tud+d+ha
63b3(rgyud): rnam bod skad du dpal rdo rje dag po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba dngos grub byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i/
63b4(rgyud): ye shes mngon par mkhyen pa yis// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa// bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba
63b5(rgyud): bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// kun mkhyen bde gshegs bzhugs gyur pa// mya ngan
63b6(rgyud): bzla bar mi mdzad cing // de srid mtshungs med sems can don// rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba kun// srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par// byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus
63b7(rgyud): kyis// rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par// smon lam rnam par sbyong byed cing // snying rjes don brtson sems kyis ni// dpa' bos srid
64a1(rgyud): pa skyong bar mdzad// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// 'di ni rgyud rnams kun tu yang // ka klo'i skad kyis smras pa ste// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
64a2(rgyud): 'joms pa po// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gyur pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che// myur du dngos grub ster byed pa// 'phral du yang dag yid ches byed// bsam pa gang dang gang
64a3(rgyud): dag gis// mi rnams sems dang mthun par 'jug/ de dang de yi gzugs sprul te// sna tshogs g.yogs te bde bar bzhugs// de phyir 'bad pa du ma yis// sna tshogs tshul gyis
64a4(rgyud): mthun par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ru ka/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs can// rang gi lha yi rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid ye shes mchog 'grub 'gyur// 'di yis rgyal ba rgya
64a5(rgyud): mtsho dang // dkyil 'khor pa dang zhing skyong tshogs// gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod gnas// mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug mgon po che// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las tshogs// ye shes
64a6(rgyud): yon tan rigs kyis// nag pa chen po 'khor dang bcas// lha mo chen mo bka' 'bangs bcas// rdo rje 'dzin pas dus kun tu// snu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i
64a7(rgyud): mgon por// bde ba chen po'i rol pa yis// ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid/
64b1(rgyud): de sa nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// khams gsum po na ma lus pa// 'gro kun snga ma lta bu yin// bdun pa dang ni g.yo ba yis// 'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste// mthong ba dang
64b2(rgyud): thos la sogs// thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'char// gang gis skye bo 'ching gyur pa// banyid yongs shes rnam par grol// phyag d+ha'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sa gsum bde ba rnon
64b3(rgyud): por bsgyur// nyon mongs med na ye shes med// nyan rang byang chub lam las ring // phung po khams dang skye mched dang // 'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams// thams cad gdod nas
64b4(rgyud): dag pa yi// ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dngos po du ma gsal bar snang // ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis rab bskul// de bas bla med//
64b5(rgyud): rgyud 'di ru// 'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya// gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med// dang po tha ma'i dam tshig dag/ thob pas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin
64b6(rgyud): te brtan pa dag ni longs spyod yon// nges par bstan pa mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor gyi ni dam tshig gnas// brda yi sbyor ba gsang ba dang // dbang bskur bas ni dngos grub ste/
64b7(rgyud): tha ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rgyal ba byang chub sems dpar bcas// dkyil 'khor nag po bla na med// sngags pa gsang ba 'dir zhugs gang // yang dag tha ma bsnyen par bya//
65a1(rgyud): 'dir ni byang chub sems kyis ni// bsnyen pa nye bar bsten pa dang // sgrub pa sgrub pa chen po yi// khyad par rim pa rtags dang dus// las la sbyar ba shes
65a2(rgyud): par bya// ji srid las kyi sbyor ba yis// mgon po 'khor bcas mnyes gyur na// las dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos
65a3(rgyud): grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems
65a4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsung rmi lam lta bur nye bar gsan te gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs so// rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig gis// sgyu ma brag cha'i
65a5(rgyud): sba brnyan ltar// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub// bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni// byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa// kun gyi snying por
65a6(rgyud): gyur pa ni// gsang ba zhing skyong mgon po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi mgon po 'dis// bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems/
65a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du rdo rje'i theg pa che// gsang ba bsdus pa'i/
65b1(rgyud): yang dag lam// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa'i// snying po 'bras bu lam byed pa// snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du// 'dren pa ye shes bstan pa bsrung // 'di nyid gsang ba'i sgrub pa
65b2(rgyud): gang / rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pA/ shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pa// ting 'dzin grang
65b3(rgyud): du bsgom gyur pa// bla med dkon mchog bstan pa ste// rgol ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad// thub pa mchog gi bstan pa la// 'dzin dang skyong dang srung ba gsum// lnga brgya dus kyi snyig/
65b4(rgyud): ma la// bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan par// gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bde ba chen po dbyings la rab tu
65b5(rgyud): zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas gsang ba rang
65b6(rgyud): byung bla na med pa'i rdo rje rab tu rgyal ba'i snying po ma byed pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku gsung thugs rdorje'i snying po ye shes kyi dngas grub sgrub cing bdud kyi g.yul las
65b7(rgyud): ba turgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos mi zad pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba stan par mdzad do// rdo rje gzhi la gnas pa'i cha/ gter gyi bum pa la rtser lda ni// dus kyi rgyal po dgas dpa/
66a1(rgyud): chu 'dzin phyogs tsam byed ldan nyid// skra dang sga las khyab pa ste// du ma ma yin gnas pa'i yul// dam tshig gsang ba 'byung ba las// rgyal ba rin chen 'bar ba'i gso/
66a2(rgyud): phyogs dus med par rang byung ba// chos 'byung po brang dkyil 'khor du// rigs kyi yon tan ldan par ni// nam mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis 'grub// mi
66a3(rgyud): phyed lhan cig skyes pa rgyal// pho brang gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug pa// ge sar pad+ma'i dbus su ni// kun nas zlum por 'khor ba ni// tshad med 'phreng
66a4(rgyud): bas brgyan pa ni// bkod pa dpag med rim par ldan// ri rab lhun po mchog byung ba'i// de nyid kun nas yongs bskor ba'i// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rnams te// shin tu mnyam zhing
66a5(rgyud): mtshungs par 'khor// de nyid rim pa yongs su brtan// bye brag mtshungs med dmar che mtsho// rim pas chu gter 'o ma'i gnas// 'byung ba bsdus pa mi lus kyi// phung po rus pa'i ribo la/
66a6(rgyud): byi nang mnyam pa'i tshad can gyi// lhun gyis grub par bstan pa yin// de las dngos po sna tshogs kyis// zla dang snang ba ye shes gzugs// rang byung bde ba chen po nyid// mnyam pa med pa kun tu 'byur/
66a7(rgyud): dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa mi// 'byung gnas snying po rdo rje'i gdan// rdo rje skyil krung mi phyed las// thog mtha' med pa'i rang bzhin can// gsang ba chen po'i rags dag pa'i// 'dod chags
66b1(rgyud): darje'i skur na pa// mabyugs pan pa dang // dadul phyir lamadu rdzogs pa// rgyu na pa// / brgya shes byas pa'i dngas// sa 'thung gAs byu gas/ smras smra
66b2(rgyud): ba 'i 'dzes ba sags// gsang ba sngags kyi rna ma tshal// ma was rgyal ba bzod pa'i yul// gsang ba cos kyi dbyings chen po/ dpal cas rgyas da kyil 'khor du// ba zo'i yul gyiman/
66b3(rgyud): dang // lha dang lha min dri zar bcas// gsang chen yongs su rdzogs pa yi// rang byung ye shes po brang du// tshangs dbang khyab 'jug dbang phyug bdag/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bcug nas kyang //
66b4(rgyud): skye bo chags can rab 'dul phyir// mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po gsungs// phyogs bcur gnas kyis sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // dpa' bo rnal 'byor dpang
66b5(rgyud): phyag tshogs// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// khrag khrig ri rab rdul mnyam pa// de dbus seng ge'i khrir bzhugs pa'i// thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/
66b6(rgyud): rdo rje snying po sems dpa'i che// bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te// pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs// thal mo sbyar te 'di don zhus// gsang chen khyad par 'phags pa yi// lhun gyis grub
66b7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya che// mi 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i lam// dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste// spyod yul bstan pa'i khyad par gyi// grub dang sgrub pa 'phrin las tshogs// thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste/
67a1(rgyud): ma pa mngon byed tu sman pa/ 'ad ma ldan gsang dag sul// shes gsalaso// danas ldan dus dzin smra stsal pa/ sas
67a2(rgyud): bsten pa la// dga' zhing mgul rab dad pa'i// sems dpa' chen pos gsang ba'i dod// rab tu nus pa lags so legs// shin tu can du byung ba sa// gdum dkazhan lus gdum no/
67a3(rgyud): du// byang chub sems kyi ye shes 'dzod// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi// grub pa rab tu ster byed pa// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste// gsang ba las/
67a4(rgyud): kyi rim pa nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa srung zhing bka' la gnas// dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhing skyong la// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso// dpal ldan rig 'dzin
67a5(rgyud): thams cad la// mchog tu gyur pa'i las sgrub pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// 'dis ni lha min 'dus pa yi// g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa yin// lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas/
67a6(rgyud): mchod 'os gtso bor gyur pa yin// dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang // nag mo re ma tir gyur pas// lcam dral gyur pas bstan pa srung // sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba// phyi nang de nyid lo
67a7(rgyud): ni'i don// yon tan 'phrin las dbang phyug tu// dam tshig mgon po zhing skyong ba// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gtso bo ste// gzhan du sa gsum dbang byed pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud la
67b1(rgyud): gsang ba spyil dgongs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// 'di nyid tha med sgrub pa po// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lgang ba yi// sems can sdug
67b2(rgyud): bsngal gzigs nas ni// ji lta ji ltar grol 'gyur ba// de dang de yi thabs ston mdzad// dus ni bskal pa bzang po yi// rdzogs ldan tha mar gyur pa yi// dpag med dus las 'das nas ni//
67b3(rgyud): gnyis ldan dang ni gsum ldan las// rtsod pa'i dus kyi rim pa la// bcom ldan tshe lo brgya pa'i dus// de nyid bstan pa'i snyigs ma yi// lnga brgya pa yi dus kyi mthar// shin tu gdug cing rtsub
67b4(rgyud): pa yi// mi bsrun pa yi rus kyi tshe// de tshe mgon po'i bstan pa 'byung // gang zag la yang gnyis su bshad// bsgral bar bya ba'i gang zag dang // sgrol bar byed pa'i sgrub pa ste// dang po
67b5(rgyud): bstan pa 'jig byed cing // dkon mchog gsum pa spyod pa dang // tha ma la snang bdag la spod// de dag la sogs bya bar bshad// sgrub pa po ni rnam pa gsum// be ru ka dpa la rnal 'byor pa/
67b6(rgyud): dgacing sbyangs te ting 'dzin gsal// rim pa go 'bang thob pas// thun mong spyi dang bye brag tu// dam tshig gnas pa'i rje 'dzin// gnas kyi byud par 'byung ba yang // bsnyen pa'i dus dang bsgrub pa/
67b7(rgyud): las la spang ba'i dus shes pas// yi bong dben dang du grad migs/ bsam gan 'phel dang khyad par ba'o// sus dang dbang po'i phyi lusas// mthong ba dang ni thas pa dang // rig pa das/
68a1(rgyud): ni dran pa yis// dkyil 'khor pa yi snang ba yang // ma lus dngos po gang shar ba// bde ba can du shes par bya// bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lam/
68a2(rgyud): las kyang // gsang ba 'bras bu lam byed pa// rdo rje theg pa 'di nyid de// bstan pa 'dzin skyong srung dang gsum// 'di ni khyad par bsrung ba yin// grub pa bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang // nye bar
68a3(rgyud): bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang // dpal ldan zag 'thung ye shes che// rnam dag mtshan nyid kun grub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa// rnam dag stobs ni rgyas par byed// bsnyen pa'i
68a4(rgyud): dus su rang lha yi// he ru kar ni gnas pa yi// mdun du bka' sdod dam tshig gi/ mgon po phyag bzhi bsgom par bya// de nas thugs ka'i rang sngags las// 'od 'bros 'khor ba'i bzlas
68a5(rgyud): ba las// khyad par dran ska bcas dang // shin tu dal bar bzlas pa bya// nye bar bsten pa'i dus sun// bdag nyid ci ka las ni// d+ha byung mdun du 'od 'bros pas// bskyed cing ma pa
68a6(rgyud): du/ smya pa'i dus su nan pas// rgyas rnyes su rin / dod gas sags phyogs bcas pa/ da' de mams da 'drim bc-igs pasas// gas gshing rje la
68a7(rgyud): ga ma ga sa sa pa sa mas // sa ga segasas / dzi
68b1(rgyud): sgrub pa chen po bla na med// ye shes mgon po chen po nyid// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad// rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor po brang dbus su yang // dur khrod du ni mgon po rog
68b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba// dam tshig spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni// rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa ste// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya'o// 'phrin las khyad par gang yin pa// las la sbyor ba
68b3(rgyud): rim shes bya// rengs par byed dang skrod pa dang // rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug/ rnam par rmongs dang lkugs par byed// dug gis 'dzin dang 'on long dang // rang sha rang gis za byed
68b4(rgyud): cing // gshis ngan dug dang khrag tu skyug/ 'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa// las kyi khyad par yongs su bstan// char dbab pa dang sprin dral dang // thog dang ser ba dbab pa dang // rang phyogs su
68b5(rgyud): ni zlog cing srung // byad ka bzlog dang ngag bcing dang // nus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang // phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba'o// thabs ni las kyi rim pa ste// rten gyi gang zag 'ga' zhig gis/
68b6(rgyud): dang por tha ma mnyes par bya// gnyis par dbang ba'i thob pa dang // gsum par byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bka' ske'i rjes gnang tshul bzhin du// mnar 'jug pa'i go ma shes// rten tshul ldang
68b7(rgyud): ba shes par bya// slobs ni chos rnams thams cad la// snamag bur shes pa dang // yang dag bden pa'i skabs kyis ni// rang bzhin med par rtogs pas 'byung // 'dug pardzun mong ma yin pa//
69a1(rgyud): byams pa snying rje byang chub sems// tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba'i don la sems pa po// mngon du byed pa nyer sgrub ste// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma ste/
69a2(rgyud): dang po bar dang tha mar yang // gtso bo dang ni 'khor rnams kyi// gang grub rab 'bring tha ma ru// rtags kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin// rgyu ni thog ma med pa yi// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/
69a3(rgyud): mngon sum du ni 'byung ba la// gang gis dgag par mi nus pa// de las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// snying po smin pa bzhin du 'byung // gang du thogs med rdo rje yi// snying po zad pa med
69a4(rgyud): pa'i don// yang dag ye shes snang ba bo// bla ma'i drin las thob par 'gyur// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum
69a5(rgyud): pa'o// de nas dpal ldan bdud 'joms pa'i// sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i mgon po chen po yi// sbas pa'i yum dang bcas pa yi// gsang ba
69a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang // lhan cig tu ni dgyes par rol// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// mi thung khros pa ut+pal
69a7(rgyud): mdog/ mgo skyes gyen 'greng brngam pa'i sku// ro yi gdan la bzhugs mdzad cing // klu brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// khros pas char sprin nag po ltar// me stag phung po lta bu yi// spyan gsum
69b1(rgyud): drag po'i lta bas gzigs// glang po'i tshul can stobs ldan pa// rgyu ma'i do shal sbyangs pa yi// mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng bas klubs// shin tu mi bsrun sgeg pa'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po lha yi
69b2(rgyud): lha/ nyams ldan gzi brjid phur sum tshogs// ma rig mun sel sgeg pa'i nyams// rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston// brtul zhugs spyod pa dpa' bo ste// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'jig
69b3(rgyud): bar ston// log lta spong byed gtsigs pa'i nyams// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs par ston// ngo mtshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing // khro chags mi g.yo zhi ba'i thugs// g.yas
69b4(rgyud): kyi dang pos gri gug bsnams// g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag 'dzin// g.yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'debs// g.yon pas kha T+wAM 'dzin par mdzad// gsung gis ha ha zhes sgrogs pa/
69b5(rgyud): log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// sna tshogs chu skyes nyi mar bcas// rang byung rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas// de yi mdun du gtum pa mo// lha mo
69b6(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// mun pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can// gri gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad// yab la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// yum la wa/
69b7(rgyud): yis rgyas btab gnas// sku dang gnyis med 'khril bar bzhugs// me 'od 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'khor bsrungs ma// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro 'phrog ma dang /
70a1(rgyud): phyogs glang sna ma zhes bya// nub kyi srin mo ral pa can// byang dus yi gtsug yin no// gang du rgya mtsho chu dang sa dang // nag po'i chu dang 'dra ba'i sku// ma rungs 'joms byed/
70a2(rgyud): nag po che// 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa nyid// gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid// snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya// mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan
70a3(rgyud): pa 'khrug byed pa// zhe sdang rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// re zhig tsam du gsad par bya// gzas pa'i sha la rtag tu rol// kun tu gtum pa'i shugs 'chang ba// yum dang yul du rol byed pas//
70a4(rgyud): shing rnams la ni gnas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor zhing rnams skyong bar byed// dur khrod gnas kyis yongs su bskor// ma mo'i gnas sogs khyad par byed// klu yis mchod pa'i zhing
70a5(rgyud): skyong ba// me yi phye mas yongs su bskor// sgo dang mig gis khyad par 'gyur// gtso bo'i sngags kyi lus can te// sgrub pa po yi lus la gnas// de dag rim par dus bstan pa/
70a6(rgyud): dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams khyad par las// 'bru nag gtor ma rab tu shis// sha chen gyis ni brgyan pa yi// tshogs rdzas pU dza gus pas dbul/
70a7(rgyud): phyi nang gsang ba khyad par las// bstan pa'i tshul gyis 'phrin las las// bye brag rgyun dang gnas skabs pa// grub dang sgrub pas mngon du 'gyur// dus rnams kun tu zhe sdang gis// rnam pa kun
70b1(rgyud): tu gags mi bya/ yul min pa la bas byas na/ rnal 'byor dam tshig las nyams byed/ grub pa nas yang long mi srid// khyad par ye shes bla med pa gdam tshig mgon po sgrub pa yi dang /
70b2(rgyud): tshig 'di ni rmang po che// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad// byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di// yar ngo mar dro rab tu gnas// yar ngo yis ni skyed byed la// mar ngo la ni 'grib par byed/
70b3(rgyud): yar ngo yi ni bco lnga la// byang chub sems kyi mkha' 'gro yang // bde ba chen por 'dra bar mdzad// 'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs// dkyil 'khor lha nyid lus nyid yin// gzhan du lha dang dkyil
70b4(rgyud): 'khor ni// btsal yang rnyed par ma 'gyur zhes// 'dren pa dpa' bos rtag tu gsungs// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la// drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa// yon tan 'phrin las dbang phyug gi/ phyi nang
70b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po yin// ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin las// 'khor lo dgug bya gnyis med bstim// dngas snyigs las ni rgyu 'bras dang // gnas pa khyad par rten 'brel te// 'khrul dang 'khrul
70b6(rgyud): ba ma yin pa// khams gsum kun la dbang byed pas// 'jig rten las dang ye shes kyi// mgon po'i khyad par mngon 'byung ba// gdags pa tha snyad khyab pa po// thun mong bar ni bstan pa yin// 'di
70b7(rgyud): dag las dang skye bo las// sgrib pa thun mong lha yin// dngos dang brgyud pas lung bstan pa// srog dang srog ma yin pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang bskul ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas pa mngon par phye// 'di
71a1(rgyud): ni mngon du 'byung ba'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang /
71a2(rgyud): dag bshad bya ga/ he ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi// gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po che// 'di yi sgrub rim bshad par bya// gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs mchog ste// skal ba can la sbyin par bya// gang
71a3(rgyud): du sgrub pa'i sa phyogs su// mi mthun g.yeng ba spang byas nas// de nas nag po bsgrub par bya// 'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas// tshad med byang chub sems kyi blos// sing rje chen po bskyed byas
71a4(rgyud): nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// lhor bltas skra grol gcer bu yis// dang por skad cig tsam gyis ni// rang lhar bskyed pa'i snying kha ru// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // bsil
71a5(rgyud): zhing 'od dang bcas pa bsam// rang steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// rta bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang // me yi rang bzhin 'phro ba bsam// de dbus yi ge hUM nag po// ye shes lnga pa'i rang bzhin can//
71a6(rgyud): de yi 'od kyi snang ba las// dpag med kha dog bzhi bcas bsam// rang bzhin gnas su 'phros pa las// bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcas pa dang // nag po chen po
71a7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas// mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la// skyabs su 'gro dang mchod pa 'bul// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// bzod par gsol nas gshegs su gsol// de rjes
71b1(rgyud): dngos po thams cad kun// ma lus song ba nyid gzhug cing // oM swA b+hA ba shud+d+haH sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho che/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHbadz+ra shud+d+hoH/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho/
71b2(rgyud): zhes brjod par bya'o// phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun// gdod nas dag pa'i ngang du bsam// de nyid hUM dang bcas pa yang // nA da tsam du gnas pa las// nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni// tshangs
71b3(rgyud): ba'i gnas bzhi khyab par bya// de las sa bon 'di dag ni// 'chad bzhin pa las rim pas bsam// ye las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las me yi dkyil 'khor dang // baM dkar chu yi
71b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor te// laM las gser gyi sa gzhi nyid// de steng bruM las ri rab 'byung // de dag phyi nang ngo bo nyid// de dag steng gi cha la yang // dbus su paM las pad+ma ni// sna tshogs pad+ma rgya
71b5(rgyud): che ba// lte ba ge sar bcas dbus su// ha las sna tshogs rdo rje ni// kha dog lnga dang ldan par bsam// de dbus raM las nyi ma yi// hUM yig sa bon las byung ba// sa gni ma lus rdo rjer gyur//
71b6(rgyud): steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang // ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang ni// phur bu gri gug kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang ni// rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sngags// du ma rnam par 'phros nas ni/
71b7(rgyud): shin tu rgya che bsam par bya// bla re rab sogs dang ni// gur gyi rnam par mtshams bcang bya// me 'od 'bar ba khyad par 'gyur// 'di dag srung ba'i khyad par ro// bruM las byung ba'i 'khor lon//
72a1(rgyud): rtsibs bcu pa ni yongs su 'khor// de steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// de yi dbus su hUM mdzad do// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// rin chen klu dbang rgyan dang
72a2(rgyud): ldan/ rol pas rnam par sgeg par bsam// re las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus// de steng hUM bcu rnam par bsam// de las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu// zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam//
72a3(rgyud): khro bo de dag re re zhing // phyogs skyong bcu po gdan la ni// bkug nas gnyis med bzhugs par bsam// de la gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis// phur bus gdab dang brdung bar bya// des/
72a4(rgyud): ni bla med mchog dag 'gyur// khro bo de dag re re zhing // brtan par bya phyir gsang sngags brjod// oM dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa// 'od ldan de las spros bsdus pa// bcom ldan rang
72a5(rgyud): bzhin yangs shing khyab// 'od du zhu nas gzhal yas khang // rin chen sna tshogs las grub pa// gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas// rdo rje dang ni nor bu yi// 'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa'o//
72a6(rgyud): pho brang nang ma zlum po la// re mig dgu pa rdo rjes bskor// phyi ni pad+ma mu khyud bcas// de yi nang na e yi dbyibs// drag po'i gnas su bsam par bya// dbus ma'i nang du paM las ni// pad+ma nyi/
72a7(rgyud): zlar bcas pa bsam// A li kA li 'dus pa las// de las nam mkha'i sa bon te// nam mkha' las ni hU~M byung ste// gnyis med zhugs las 'od du zhu// de la rdo rje gri gug bsam/
72b1(rgyud): 'od kyi snang bas khyab pa las// skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa// nag po chen po bsam par bya// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dpa' bo chen po rol pas bzhugs// yab
72b2(rgyud): yum gnyis su med par bsam// de ltar yab yum rdzogs bskyed nas// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab bya ste// sngags brjod pas ni dgyes pa bskyed// de las dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnam//
72b3(rgyud): yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa las// yum gyi mkha' dbyings bde chen du// so sor tshogs bskyed byas la// phyi rol du ni rim gyis 'byung // dang por gtso bo'i rgyan dang bcas// rdzogs
72b4(rgyud): par byung ste d+hU tI nas// gyen du thugs ka'i pad+ma las// 'thon te 'gro ba'i don byas la// slar 'dus rang la thim gyur pa// dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs su gnas// de las rim pa ji bzhin du//
72b5(rgyud): phyung nas so so'o gdan la bzhugs// gtso bo'i phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro bzhi// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// gar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo ni// g.yas brkyang ba ni rnam par 'gying // dpa'
72b6(rgyud): mo bde ba'i skur bskyed pa'o// mtshams bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis bkang // sna tshogs pad 'dab la gnas pa// nyi ma la gnas mgon po ni// shar du sku yi mgon po dang // lho ru yon tan mgon po
72b7(rgyud): dang // nub tu gsung gi mgon po dang // byang du las kyi mgon po ste// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gri gug thod pa bsnams pa'o// so so'i g.yon du yu ma re re// gtum mo dang ni drag
73a1(rgyud): mo dang // zlog byed ma dang dpa' mo ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas// de yi phyi yi gru chad la// beng 'dzin pa dang kha T+wAM ga/ gaN+DI 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin//
73a2(rgyud): so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o// de yi phyi rol sgo dang grwar// lha mo brgyad po gar gis rol// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gar stabs
73a3(rgyud): ldan pas bzhugs pa'o// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs pa dang // de nas gtso bo yab yum dag/ snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu// de nas lha mo bzhi yis ni// rdo rje tshad med
73a4(rgyud): dbyangs kyis bskul// e baM si ta u Da na rI bA/ dza ti d+ha ma d+ha ma g+ha ma g+ha ma a ka ma/ d+ha d+ha sha ri d+ha re/ sa ni sa sas ni ga ma sa sa sa/ reg mo bu ma te sa ri sa ra sa ri ri sa ni sha/ ma hA ma
73a5(rgyud): a d+ha ma sa sa/ shu tri na sA sa sA/ sa ni sa ri ta g+ha ma a g+haM/ a ta ma ta ya/ sa sA pa pa/ ma ya a pa sa d+h+waM na ma a i/ de ltar bskul bar gyur pa las// de ltar nye bar ga san nas ni/
73a6(rgyud): thugs rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad de// nag po gsang ba'i bu dang bcas// shin tu 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas// spro ba dang ni bsdu bar mdzad// de
73a7(rgyud): nyid brtan dang mnyes par mdzad// sku gsung thugs ni rgyas gdab cing // ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang / byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang // sngags kyis brtan ched bzlas pa bya//
73b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul// ting 'dzin don pas mnyer bsdu bya// de nas ldang bar gyur pa na// gnyis pa lha rnams thams cad kun// skad cig gis ni rdzogs bya ste// de yi dang la ting nge 'dzin/
73b2(rgyud): gsang ba khyad par rdzogs par bya// rnam rtog bag chags kyis bcings la// rtog pa dag pa'i thabs mchog ldan// rnam rtog rang bzhin yongs shes na// de nyid thob tu med pa ste// bde ba
73b3(rgyud): chen po yang dag 'byung // chags pa med pas kun tu spyad// 'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa// rig ma rnams la rol byed na'ang // de nyid shes la bcing med de// rnam par rol pa'i tshul mchog
73b4(rgyud): go// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gang du
73b5(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge dang // bzang po'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di// rdza rnga bcings pa las shes bya// ri mig bdun pa'i grangs kyis ni// kun nas mnyam par dgod par bya// mkhas pas dbyangs
73b6(rgyud): dang gsal byed ni// sde tshan rim pas phye ba nyid// kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni// rim pa bzhin du btu bar bya// sde tshan drug pa'i lnga pa ni// ha yi mgo na gnas pa blang // us+phA Sha yi bzhi pa
73b7(rgyud): nyid la 'og gnas pa de nyid de// sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po ste// pa yi steng na gnas pa zang // ar+thamra yi gsum pa ste// ya yi steng ma yang dag blang // sde tshan brgyad pa'i bzhi pa ni// ma yi steng
74a1(rgyud): na gnas par sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa nyid// nya yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa ste// Sha yi 'og na gnas par sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i
74a2(rgyud): bco lnga pa// d+ha yi steng na gnas pa yi// zla chos thig les brgyan par bya// sde tshan dang po'i bcu bzhi pa// de yi 'og ma'i yi ge la// dbyangs kyi bco lnga pa yin te// d+ha yi 'og mas brgyan
74a3(rgyud): par bya// de nyid thog mar sbyin bya yin// sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa yin// na yi 'og nas gnas pa ste// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma gang // ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas te// tha mar 'byung ba'i drug po
74a4(rgyud): ste/ 'di ni yid sbyin nor bu ster// tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang // b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blang // Da yi steng mas brgyan par bya// ha yi 'og na gnas pa dang // wa yi 'og ma gzung bar bya//
74a5(rgyud): pa yi steng ma nyid btu bya// ya yi steng na gnas pa las// nya yi steng mas las kun byed// ma yi steng gnas yi ge nyid// ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas la// nyes 'gyur d+ha yi steng mas brgyan// /
74a6(rgyud): rtsa yi steng na gnas pa la// i yi steng ma drug tu gzhag/ 'di ni dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// da yi steng ma'i yi ge la// d+ha yi steng mas yang dag brgyan// rig byed mngon sum dang por
74a7(rgyud): gnas// ma lus ye shes skur gyur pa'o// Sha yi 'og na gnas pa la// b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge dang // Na yi 'og nas rab sbyin dang // sa yi 'og ma yang dag blang // za 'og Da 'og stan du sbyar//
74b1(rgyud): tsas par gnas yi ge dang // dzA yi 'og ma bdag po ste// shA yi bar na gnas pa gzung // kha dang a yi bar gnas pa// ta yi 'og mnya steng ldan pa'i gleng sas sos sbyar krig les brgyan panyi su gyur lam
74b2(rgyud): steng na gnas pa la// a yi steng mas brgyan pa drung // 'di ni sbas pa'i snying po ste// rang srog yi ger gsang ba'o// da yi steng ma'i yi ge las// d+ha mi steng mas brgyan par bya// sangs/
74b3(rgyud): rus kun gyi ye shes che// snying po bzlas pa'i rig pa ste// bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar// na yi steng mas yang dag brgyan// dza yi gong ma d+ha steng sbyar// sa la bar gnas Da steng sbyar/
74b4(rgyud): thig len 'das brgyan par bya// na 'og d+ha steng mgo bor sbyin// 'di las ma steng ri 'og ldan// thig le zla tshes dag gis mtshan// tsa yi steng na gnas pa la// ra yi 'og ma drung du sbyin//
74b5(rgyud): b+ha steng gnas pa la 'og sbyar// nya yi 'og ma yang dag ldan// sha sa bar gnas nya 'og sbyar// 'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa ste// bya ba stobs ldan nyid yin no// gang du mngon par phyogs pa/
74b6(rgyud): yil dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// gsang sngags mchog tu gyur pa 'dis// stong dang brgya pa bcur 'gyur gyis// rigs ni dam pa'i sa la gnas// thob pa yul dang yul du gnas// @
74b7(rgyud): yi 'og ma dang por zang // ha li 'og ma blang byas la// tha yi stong ma sbyin par bya// Da li steng ma'i drung nyid du// sha yi thog mas brten par bya// pa yi steng mas btu bar bya// la yi spang ma'i
75a1(rgyud): yi ge la// Da yi steng mas san du sbyar// nya yi steng mnyis 'gyur la// phyi ma nya yi 'og mas brgyan// e yi 'og gyur bsdus pa la// sha yi steng ma drung du sbyar// la li/
75a2(rgyud): 'og ma rgyun du byas// nya yi 'og gis sbyin par bya// oM yi 'og na gnas pa la// nya yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// da yi 'og mar gnas pa la// thig le nA da dag gis brgyan// da yi 'og
75a3(rgyud): ma'i yi ge la// u yi steng ma sbyin par bya// tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang // b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blangs// ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya// d+ha yi 'og ma gnas pa dang // wa yi 'og ma
75a4(rgyud): gzung bar bya// sa yi steng ma nyid bsdus la// ya yi steng na gnas pa las// nya yi 'og gnas de la brgyan// nya yi 'og ma kun gyi rten// sa yi steng ma blang bar bya// b+ha yi steng na gnas
75a5(rgyud): pa la/ la yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// pha yi steng ma nyid de blang // dz+nyA yi 'og ma da steng dang // pa yi steng na gnas pa la// su mi steng ma yang dag drang / e'i 'og banas yi ge la// d+ha yi steng ma mgo bor sbyin/
75a6(rgyud): la tha bar gnas pa la yang // NA yi steng mas brgyan par bya// ma steng thig le nA das brgyan// dza 'og gnas pa'i yi ge la// nga steng sa yi steng ma dang // pa 'og ta yi 'og mas brgyan// dza
75a7(rgyud): yi gong na gnas pa dang // ma yi steng ma sa stengs gnas// ya yi steng ma nyid dang ldan// dza 'og nya yi steng ma la// d+ha yi steng mas mgo bor brgyan// Da yi 'og ma sha stengs ldan// thig le nA das/
75b1(rgyud): brtan pa'o// Da yi skyeng mas cha nyid du// sha yi thog mas brten par bya// pa yi steng ma btu bar bya// la phreng gnas pa za steng bsgyur// nya yi steng du nyis 'gyur ba// bye ma'i nya yi 'og mas
75b2(rgyud): brgyad// dbyangs yig dang po ka 'og can// sa steng gnas pa nyid dang yang // mu steng gnas pa yang dag bcas// sa steng gnas pa thig les brgyan// nya yi steng ma'i gnas pa la/
75b3(rgyud): aM yi 'og gnas ga bdun gnas// ta yi 'og ma mgo bor sbyin// nga steng gnas pa Na 'og sbyar// la steng gnas pa Ta 'og bcas// la 'og zur gnas sbyar bar bya// bla yi 'og ma'i yi
75b4(rgyud): ge la lam steng gnas pa stan du byas// sha 'og dza yi steng mar sbyar// Na 'og gnas pa nyid drung ste// b+ha steng gnas pa'i 'og mas brgyan// sha steng drung du sbyin par bya// la steng /
75b5(rgyud): sha yi thog ma la// phyi ma nya 'og gnas pas mdzes// Ta 'og sha thog thig les brgyan// sha thog ri yi 'og mas brgyan// ba thog la steng gnas par sbyar// de la nya 'og sbyin par bya/
75b6(rgyud): ba steng gnas pa la 'og ldan// nywa 'og dag gis yang dag mdzes// ka ga bar gnas pa nyid la// nyis 'gyur du ni bsdu bar bya// gla steng gnas pa de nyid la// nya 'og brgyan pa nyid du bya// ma
75b7(rgyud): yi thog mar Da 'og bcas// g+ha steng gnas pa nyid dang ni// wa 'og gnas pa the 'og sbyin// ha 'og Na yi 'og mar ldan// de yi nyis 'gyur shes par bya// kha 'og ma yi yi ge la// u ri bar
76a1(rgyud): gnas sbyar bar bya// ma steng pha 'og 'og tu sbyin// de ni nyis 'gyur sbyar bar bya// tsha yi steng ma pa thog drung // Sha yi thog ma drung du gnas// de ni zung du sbyar bar bya// ma
76a2(rgyud): steng gnas pa sa thog drung // nyis 'gyur rim par shes par bya// sha thog gnas pa wa thog drung // lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// ka 'og gnas pa pa stan pa// ba 'og stan du byas
76a3(rgyud): pa nyid// nyis 'gyur dag tu shes par bya// b+ha steng gnas pa Ta steng drung // Sha yi 'og ma stan du byas// sha steng Da yi 'og mas brgyan// d+ha 'og i thog stan du sbyar// pa yi steng ma drung /
76a4(rgyud): du gzhag/ ha yi 'og ma Na 'og ldan// pha thog drag por 'gyur ba'o// sha steng tha yi 'og ma sa brgyan// 'di nyid rim pa mngon spyod pa'i// mA ra ya yi thog mar sbyar// ma yi steng gnas/
76a5(rgyud): ri 'og sbyar// nyis 'gyur thig le nA das brgyan// tsa yi steng na gnas pa la// i yi steng ma brgyan pa drung // b+ha thog tha thog gnas pa sbyar// de la nya yi 'og mas brgyan// ma steng
76a6(rgyud): gnas pa nya 'og ni// yang dag stan du bya ba'o// 'di ni dri med bde ba'i gter// snying po gsang sngags 'di nyid ni// gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// /
76a7(rgyud): ma lus zhing skyong 'khor dang bcas// dur khrod rol ce spyang dang // sha za'i tshogs rnams 'du ba bzhin// nges par 'du bar byed pa ste// bstan pa rgya mtsho srung byed pa'o// dpag tshad brgyad//
76b1(rgyud): khri'i bar du ni// de yi bgegs rnams ma lus pa// til 'bru tsam du byed par mdzad// snying po 'di ni zlos byed cing // gang du nyi ma gcig tu yang // ma chad mngon par sems pa yi// he drug
76b2(rgyud): dpal rnal 'byor la// 'jigs pa kun las srung ba dang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod la// thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi
76b3(rgyud): bar du 'bad de bsgrub par bya// mtshan ma byung nas tha ma yi// man ngag bzhin du las la sbyar// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// gsang sngags kyi le'u ste drug
76b4(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yang dag ye shes bskyed pa po// gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// gtum po de yi gsang ba'i yum// lha mo bzhi dang bcas
76b5(rgyud): pa yi// gsang sngags btub bshad par bya// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dag la// thig le na das rnam par brgyan// rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas// drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar
76b6(rgyud): gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni dang po nyid// ana? sA yi gsum pa ste// dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin// lnga pa'i lnga pa gsum pas brgyan// gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/
76b7(rgyud): an+tasma yi gsum pas stan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// drug pa yi ni dang po dang // dbyangs kyi dgu pas gnas der sbyar// gnyis pa yi ni dang po ni// an+tasma yi gsum
77a1(rgyud): pa dang // de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po la// dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng 'og sbyin// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pa mgo bor sbyin/
77a2(rgyud): gsum pa yi ni dang po la// drung du lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyar// lnga pa'i bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// dang po'i dang po'i drung du ni// gnyis pa'i gsum pa sbyar ba dang // mthar gnas las kyi phyi ma yi//
77a3(rgyud): de la dbyangs kyi gsum pa sa brgyan// an+ta s+tha yi dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// brgyad pa yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pa dag gis brgyan// thig le nA
77a4(rgyud): das mdzes pa'o// drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma sbyar// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtum pa mo// drag cing shin tu cher 'jigs byed// yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs 'dzin gter//
77a5(rgyud): bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig bdun pa steng 'og sbyar// thig le nA das mdzes pa yin// usma Sha yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig drug pa
77a6(rgyud): dang sbyar ba// an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar// de nyid thig les mdzes par byas// gnyis pa'i dang po blang byas la// dbyangs kyi dgu pa blang ba nyid// drug pa yi ni lnga pa la// usma Sha yi bzhi
77a7(rgyud): pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // dbyangs yig bcu pa sbyar bar bya// bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gnyis pa yi na dang po dang // lnga pa'i dang po btu bar bya// drug pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs/
77b1(rgyud): yig bco lnga pa yis brgyan// gnyis pa'i lnga par gnas pa'o// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // phyi mra'i yang ni bzhi pa la// lnga pa
77b2(rgyud): yi yang lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas rgyan par bya// dang po yi ni dang po dang // drug pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan par bya// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa
77b3(rgyud): yi gsum pa la// an+d+ra s+tha yi dang po sbyar// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // bdun pa yi ni lnga pa dang // drug pa yi ni bzhi pa sbyar// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // dbyangs kyi dgu pa'i yi ge la/
77b4(rgyud): lnga pa'i gsum pa gdags par bya// usma Sha yi gsum pa la// lnga pa'i dang po sbyar bar bya// thig le nA das yang dag brgyan// drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // an+ta s+tha yi dang po ste// yi ge
77b5(rgyud): gsum gi bdag nyid kyis// nyis 'gyur dag tu sbyar bar bya// usma Sha yi bzhi pa la// dang po'i drug pa dang sbyar ba// an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar// thig le nA das brgyan par bya// 'di ni gsang
77b6(rgyud): ba'i yum dag gi/ snying po sbas pa mchog gyur pa// lha mo nag mo ye shes che// sngags ni drag cing sdud pa'o// de nas ye shes lnga ldan pa'i// rig byed mngon sum dang por gzhag/ drug pa yi ni
77b7(rgyud): lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// gnyis pa yi ni dang po nyid// ar+yas+tha yi gsum pa ste// dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin// dang po'i bcu drug pa mtha' bya// mthar ni hUM paT sbyar bar bya//
78a1(rgyud): sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po la// an+taswa yi gnyis pa sbyar// dang po'i dgu pa blang ba nyid// drug pa yi ni lnga pa la// thig le nA dras brgyan pa'o// gnyis pa yi ni dang po/
78a2(rgyud): la drung du de nyid lnga pa sbyar// gnyis pa'i dang po de nyid dang // dbyangs kyi dgu pa sbyar bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa sbyar// de la thig le nA das
78a3(rgyud): brgyan// gnyis pa yi ni dang po la// an+tas+tha yi gsum pa dang // bdun pa yi nin gnyis pa sbyar// lnga pa'i dang po nyid la yang // dbyangs kyi bdun pa steng 'ogo sbyar// bdun pa yi ni
78a4(rgyud): gnyis pa la// thig le nA das mdzes byas pa'o// 'di dag kun gyi thog ma dang // tha mar yang dag brten par bya// 'di ni DA ki bzhi dag gis// snying po sbas pa mchog tu gsungs//
78a5(rgyud): dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las ka gsang sngags rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// gsang ba
78a6(rgyud): sngags kyi 'khor lo las// mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya// lha yi 'khor lo rgya mtsho nyid// lan tshwa chu rgun 'bab pa'i ngang // gangs kyi thigs pa bdud rtsi'i chu// me tog mdangs gsal
78a7(rgyud): snying po yi// ge sar ze 'brur ldan pa la// 'dab rgyas ye shes nyi shar bas// rang grol mdangs 'bar rab tu rgyas// rdo rje rin chen ral gri dang // 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs dag las/
78b1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgyu las 'od zer 'gro// steng 'og dag las rim pa ni// 'khrul cing gcod pa'i gri gug gis// las dang 'phrin las rang byung du// byed cing bskul ba'i las grub pa// phyi nang gas
78b2(rgyud): ba rim bzhin du// dbab dang sngags pa bzlog pa ste// rtsa ba yan lag las bzhir 'gyur// dang po thun mong dgu pa ste// gnyis pa bye brag phyed pa dang // bskyed pa'i ye shes mi bzlog pa//
78b3(rgyud): klungs su chud pa phyag rgya che// snying po gcig la dus gsum du// 'gyur med de nyid dbye ba nyid// gcig las du ma'i ngo bo can// 'jig rten pa dang ye shes che// mi 'gyur ba dang 'gugs/
78b4(rgyud): pa dang // las rnams byed pa'i srog gyur pa// gsang sngags 'khor lo 'di dag ni// bye brag rnal 'byor pas shes bya// oM ma hA kA la hUM hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ka lu
78b5(rgyud): ma hA kA la ya hUM hUM phaT/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya// tad+ya thA/ oM shrI ma hA kA la ya// shA sa naM u pa hA rI NAM/ e ShA pa sh+tsi ma kA la a yaM/ i de rat+na tra ya/ a pa kA riNAM / ya di pra ti dA/ s+phu ra si
78b6(rgyud): ta drA i daM duSha satwa/ kha kha khA hi lA hi/ ma ra ma ra/ gred+d+ha that+ta/ ban d+ha ban d+hA/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pA tsa pa tsa/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ di na me ke na mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT sahA/ oM ma hA kA li ni kro
78b7(rgyud): d+ha sa ki la rak+Shi NI tsaN+Da ak+Shi ye hUM phaT/ oM hrIHhUM kA li ma hA kA li rak+ta mAM se na/ b+hak+Sha Ni/ a mu ka s+ya/ sar+b+ba ba liM staM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM AHmaM hr-i raM hUM phaT se hA/ oM ka ri li mi hUM phaT/ oM ka
79a1(rgyud): kA li hri hU~M phaT/ oM kA la ra kri ra hUM phaH/ de las dngos dang nyams su yang // nag po chen po'i zhal ston dang // tha marmi lam lung ston pa// me nag bong thung gsus 'byung /
79a2(rgyud): dang bya nag khwa ta la sogs 'ong // de yang rab 'bring tha ma yi// bye brag rtags su 'char bar 'gyur// grangs ni bdun 'bum dag gis ni// mngon sum gsal ba'i nges pa 'char// zi zag
79a3(rgyud): bdun dang khri phrag dgustong phrag bdun gyis nye bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab bcas pa yi// sngags kyi stong phrag bcu dag ni// dus ni zla drug zhag bdun par// rnal 'byor smra ba bcad de
79a4(rgyud): bzlas// mi tshig bar mchod pa yi// gsang sngags 'phrin las nges par grub// thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma dang // bstod dang bcol bskul las la brtson// rang nyid he ru kar gsal
79a5(rgyud): ba ri rab steng du yum bcas bsam// de mdun nag po chen po nyid// gsal ba bskyed tshul dbye ba yis// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs pa ni// mngon gsum lta bur blta bar bya// bdag dang
79a6(rgyud): mdun gyi mgon po yi// thugs kha'i sa bon rang sngags las// de ltar spro bsdus ting 'dzin bsam// de ltar dus dang gzhan du yang // rten bcas dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang // rten gtsug
79a7(rgyud): brtan byed de nyid bsnyed// de nas rten bcas tsam gyis ni// nges par de yi mdun song ba// mchod dang gtor ma bsham par bya// sha chen sreg spos phul nas ni// dmigs pa gtod par byed/
79b1(rgyud): pa dang // gang la bya ba'i bsgrub bya de// dmigs pas bkug cing btab pa dang // gtor mar dbul zhing bka' sgo bya// lha dang dral zhing nyes pa bsgo// de nas mnyes nyes pa bsgrag dbang btsug
79b2(rgyud): las la bcol bskul bya// de yis nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de las khyad par 'phrin las ni// lha sbyin dang ni mchod sbyin sogs// bsgral ba'i zhing de gang yin pa// dol zag pa'i rdzas
79b3(rgyud): rnams dang // phung shul sa dang g.yul spang sa// grog mkhar sa la sogs pa rnams// bdud chad sa la bong bu'i chus// sbrus te ling ga sta gon bya// de nas dben par song nas ni// mar ngol
79b4(rgyud): ni tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la sogs bsgrub dus la// gza' skar shin tu drag po la// de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya// d+hu ni ro ras shin shun dang // zhing lpags dag la dug sna dang // khrag dang dug
79b5(rgyud): gi me tog gi/ du ba mtshan ngan thod chag la// mchog pur bstod pa'i snag tshas bri// rgya skyegs dag gis bsres la bri// tshad dang ldan pa'i mu khyud ni// rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa la// nang du le tshe
79b6(rgyud): dgu pa bya// phyogs pa ni dbus dang lnga bor ni// gru gsum nag po sa bon bcas// las rnams byed pa rlung yig dang // ma hA kA la 'bru bzhi dang // steng non oM dang badz+ra ste// de yi b+hi ri ma
79b7(rgyud): rtsibs brgyad la// a mu ka dang ba yi ni// yi ge bcu gsum gnyis gnyis pa// g.yas skor dag tu dgod par bya// de yi phyi rim par 'dab brgyad// sgo mtshams lha mo'i 'khor lo'i sngas
80a1(rgyud): ming spel bcas pa dgod par bya// de yi nang gi gru chad bzhir// hUM gnyis paT dang bcas pa la// ming spel bcug la bri bar bya// khyad par sbas pa'i 'khor lo ni/
80a2(rgyud): dbus su rlung gi sa bon nyid// phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro ma bzhi gnas// phyogs bzhir sngags kyi 'phreng ba las// phyi rol rtsib sa la gcod pa'i sngags// 'dab brgyad cha la tsat+ti ka
80a3(rgyud): mtha' rten snga ma dag dang mtshungs// yang na rim pa gsum pa yi// gsang sngags ma hA kA la yi// 'phrin las khyad par dgod par bya// 'dis ni shin tu mngon spyod myur// thabs dang shes
80a4(rgyud): rab khyad pa ra dang // steng 'go bar gyi dbye ba yis// zangs dang lcags kyi gri gug gis// bla dang tshe srog don snying la// myur du 'khor bas gcod par byed// sdud byed 'phrog cing len pa'i srog/
80a5(rgyud): bsgral ba rdo rje rigs kyi las// thun mong du ni bya ba yin// khyad par 'khor lo zil bya ste// dus kyi rim pas las la sbyar// 'di ni kun tu mnan pa ste// las kyi gshin rje'i gnas su gtad/
80a6(rgyud): 'khor lo la yang bsnyen pa dang // bsgrub pa go rim nor mi bya// 'dis ni bya ba mi 'grub med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// gsang sngags dang 'khor lo sgrub pa'i le'u
80a7(rgyud): ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la zhugs te// mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya// khyad par//
80b1(rgyud): dur khrod pa yi shing // lha 'dre gtum po gtas pa las// ma mo'i bye brag brtags pa las// bcad pa mgo mjug ma nor bar// gnyis gshegs de nas sngags bris la// bsdams te
80b2(rgyud): blang ba mig gis ni// phye ba'i bdun phrag gsum pa la// legs par gzhag ste tshad du bya// dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa la gzugs// gzhan yang bsgrub bya'i gzugs dag ni// zur
80b3(rgyud): gsum tshud pa sngags dang bcas// ming spel bskul tshig ldan pa na// grangs ni rab 'bring tha ma ste// ci rigs par ni bya bar gsungs// yang ni ro sgrom shing la yang // byang bu byas la
80b4(rgyud): ling ga bri// gzhan du mgon po yab yum gyi// 'khor lo legs par bris pa dang // bsgrub bya srogs gi 'khor lo ni// gri gug lnga pa 'khor ba dag/ de dag bar du bcug pa dang // yang na
80b5(rgyud): mgon po'i 'khor lo dang // bsgrub bya du yod ling ga rnams// de yi nang du dril bar bya// 'khor lo tshon skud rnam lngas dkri// de yi phyi rol ku sha yi// rtswa yi mi gzugs byas nas kyang /
80b6(rgyud): rang mdun gru gsum nag po yi// nang du gzugs de bzhug par bya// de la lha dang dbye ba dang // nyes pa bsgo zhing bsgrag par bya// de nas bdag nyid lha dang ni// mdun du nag po chen po ni// zhal
80b7(rgyud): gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yum dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang // spyan drang mchod cing bstim par bya// las mgon rnams dang ma mo bzhi// rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu//
81a1(rgyud): lha srin sde brgyad ma lus dang // gzhan yang dur khrod sha za dang // mu mo ro langs ce spyang dang // stag dang dred dang bya gcan sogs// bya rog khA ta la sogs pas/
81a2(rgyud): yongs su bskor cing 'phrin las byed// de nas rang dang mgon po dang // lha mo bzhi la sogs pa yi// sa bon las ni 'od zer yang // lcags kyu lta bu dpag med pas// bsgrub bya de dag ma
81a3(rgyud): lus pa// snying gi srog rtsa nas drangs te// rang dbang med par rlung gis bteg/ myur du 'og pa mdog nyams pa// rid cing sgra 'dzings shin tu 'dar// yed yid dngas zhing skrag pa de/
81a4(rgyud): zhags pas bcings dang bsdams pa dang // dril bu la sogs sgra yis ni// shin tu dbang po myos gyur te// de yi rnam par shes pa ni// ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs la bstim// de//
81a5(rgyud): yi dus su gsang sngags ni// 'phrin las sngags rings mtha' ru ni// A kaR+Sha ya dzaHzhes brjod// mgon po nag po yab yum gyi// lte bar gru gsum lcags khang ni// btson dong
81a6(rgyud): mun khang gnas par bsam// de las thar dus med par bya// de nas dong de ro g.yam la// rdo rje rgya gram bris pas mnan// mtha' mar las sbyor dus su yang // bsgrub bya'i them pa 'am
81a7(rgyud): lam dag tu// mnan pa byas la 'phrin las bcol// gal te de nyid sbyin sreg gis// las sbyor bsgrub bya'i chu rjes sogs// dri ma gos dang skra sogs dang // tsha ba gsum dang dug sna dang //
81b1(rgyud): khrag dang se che shang tshe dang // da d+ha ra dang de la sogs// sa swa gzhan dang sbyar bar bya// bong bu'i chu dang bsres nas ni// 'jim pa byas la g.yog par byas// drug chu ro sol dag gis ni// de la/
81b2(rgyud): byug cing gnas lnga ru// seng ldeng lcags pur btab la gzhag/ de yi lus po thams cad la// spra tshil gyis ni byug par bya// de la drag po'i shing gi ni// tsher ma sna tshogs btsug la gzhag/
81b3(rgyud): gru gsum e yi nang du ni// de gzugs phyi gan dag tu gzhag/ kha nang dur khrod thal bas brdzang // de nas dong khwa bcad la gzhag/ de la thun bzhir bya ba 'am// dus drug dag tu bya ba ni/
81b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis lhor bltas la// nyin phyed mtshan phyed dus su bya// yang na dus bzhir las la sbyar// phyogs kyi DA ki bzhi yis ni// dgug gzhug bstim dang bsngags par bya// de nas
81b5(rgyud): thod pa mtshan ngan du// yungs kar nyungs nag la sogs pa'i// thun rdzas rnams la sngags bzlas shing // dus dus dag tu bdeg par bya// skabs skabs dug gi chu yis brdeg/ gal te gu
81b6(rgyud): gul nag po dang // sha chen dag gis bdug par bya// yang na 'bras phub me la ni// spra tshil ma zhu tsam du bsro// de nas sngags kyis brdog par bya// 'di ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar
81b7(rgyud): cho ga'i thabs 'di yis// dgra yi khang par bya rog dag/ mang po 'ba' zhig skad 'don dang // lus la tsha bas thebs la sogs// du ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur// dang por nang rtags
82a1(rgyud): gsal bar 'char// byi rtags rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// drag po'i mngon spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu
82a2(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gdug pa 'dul dor du// nag po chen po khros pa yi// sgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa// gzhar yang rab tu bshad par bya// rje btsun he ru ka dpal/
82a3(rgyud): nag po chen po'i lha tshogs rnams// nam mkhar mngon par bltas nas ni// bdun po yongs su dag par bya// bzod par gsol la gshegs su gsol// de rjes stong pa'i ngang las ni// tshad/
82a4(rgyud): med bzhi po bsam par bya// byang chub sems kyi ngang las ni// pad+ma zla nyer gnas pa yi// hUM yig nag por bsam par bya// de yi 'od kyis khyab pa las// bsdus shing skad cig yongs gyur pa//
82a5(rgyud): dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// phyag gnyis su mdog shin tu gnag/ dbu skra kham nag gyen du brjes// g.yas pa gshin d+hA'i skye 'dra ba'i// gri gug non
82a6(rgyud): po 'dzin par mdzad// g.yon pa thod pa khrag bkang bsnams// thod pas sgra mtshams bcings pa dang // yan lag thung zhing rags pa'i gzugs// mche gtsigs 'jigs su rung ba ste/
82a7(rgyud): ltos 'gro brgyad dang rin chen brgyad// rgyu ma'i gsha stag lpags can// mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba 'chang // zhal nas khrag 'dzag gang rgyangs can// phyag rgya drug gis sku la spras// drag po'i
82b1(rgyud): nyams dang ldan pa ste// skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya// de yi thugs kar nyi ma la// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs// deng 'dzin sems dpa' dang bcas pa// den dang gan
82b2(rgyud): bar bcas pa bsam// de la 'di yi gsang sngags byung // oM badz+ra ma hA ka la ya tru d+hu paT/ ji srid spro bar ma gyur pa// gsang sngags 'phreng ba bzlas par bya// de nas sha chen spos sreg
82b3(rgyud): cing // gzhan yang dug dang khrag la sogs// bdug pa'i dra bas mchod par bya// ma sha 'bras dang so ba dang // 'bru nag me tog byug pa dang // sngon pa lnga dang mi 'chi la// 'khrur ba can
82b4(rgyud): dang chang la sogs// gtor ma rig po che la dbul// mchod dang bstod pa tshul bzhin bya// 'di yi nye bar spyad pa ni// bsgrub bya'i zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang // tsha ba gsum la sogs pa la/
82b5(rgyud): gang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs// byas te dug gis byugs nas kyang // tsher mas bkang ste thab khung du// 'bras phub me la gdung la sogs// bya ba sna tshogs las bya na// skad cig/
82b6(rgyud): gis ni rlab par byed// rdo rje slob dpon spyod byed cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig byed pa// dkon mchog gsum la sdang ba dang // sems can kun la 'tsho ba rnams// 'di dag nag po
82b7(rgyud): chen pos sgrol// yan lag dag gi shachod la// mgon po nag po'i zhal du gsol// yang na dos sbyinas ni// til tsam du ni mdzang du gsol// khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung bar ma chod/
83a1(rgyud): de ltar 'phrin las las bcol bya// de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya// phung shul g.yul spang la sogs pa// dur khrod sol bas byug byas te// gru gsum rim
83a2(rgyud): pa kha khyer ldan// de yi nang du drag po'i shing // tsher ma can gyis brtsig par bya// mchod dang bsreg rdzas gtor ma dang // bsgrub bya'i ling ga sha chen dang // nyungs kar bcas pas yongs
83a3(rgyud): su bskor// sngags pas lhor bltas ting 'dzin zhugs// me lha bskyed cing dgug gzhug bya// ling ga phur btab gtubs byas la// me sbar bsregs pas lha la mchod// gsang
83a4(rgyud): sngags 'dod yon bskur ldan pa// phrag gcig gis ni lan cig ste// lan grangs rol mtsho'i khyad par gyis// phyir mi zlog cing srog gtor byed// de rjes gsol gdab bcol bskul
83a5(rgyud): bya sa shin tu myur bar rtags rnams 'grub// nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i las// ma grub lan gsum spogs pa dang // sa bon 'phrog cing gtsud pas 'grub// dpal mgon po chen po
83a6(rgyud): dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dur khrod gnas pa'i zhing skyong dang /
83a7(rgyud): gu rtsa bzhi'i zhing skyong bcas// de dag rim pa bshad par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'phrin las dang // 'di nyid gsang ba'i mgon po yi// thabs mchog 'di ni can/
83b1(rgyud): tu b+h+yas// dpal ldar mgon po rdo rje can// bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra// dkyil 'khor dbus bcugs dpa' bon// shin tu 'gying zhing 'bar ba'i sku// le rje dgu pa'i dbus spyan//
83b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dbus la// dpa' bo chen po byed skyil tshul// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum b+hi ru la ltar dmar// sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po// thod pa'i 'phreng
83b3(rgyud): bas rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya lnga ldan gar gir rol// dang pos gri gug thod pa dang // gnyis pa ral gri kha T+wAM ga/ klu brgyad rgyan gyi 'phrin las can// de yi thugs kar gnas pa yi//
83b4(rgyud): sa bon spro dang bsdu ba'i dngos// oM mA hA kA la A kaR+Sha ya ma pra sha mA nA ya ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thams cad sdud cing dbang byed pa// skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya// de yi shar gyi le tshe la//
83b5(rgyud): drag po shin tu 'jigs pa ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mthing nag brngam pa'i tshul du gnas// de yi mdun du rgan byed ma// g.yas su mi sdug drag po che// g.yon du
83b6(rgyud): 'jigs ma gnas pa dang // rgyab tu u ma rnam par rol// nag po'i lho yi phyogs su ni// drag po chen po ngu ba'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// thod 'phreng gis brgyan
83b7(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i tshul// de yi mdun du rnam rgyal ma// g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba ma// rgyab tu mi sdug ma gnas la// g.yon du gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o// lha gter mnyam gnas
84a1(rgyud): nub phyogs su// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mdog ser rgyu ma'i 'phreng bas dkris// shin tu gzhad pa'i tshul du gnas// de yi mdun du nag mo/
84a2(rgyud): che g.yas su drag chen drag shul chen// rgyab tu nag sbom ma ning gnas// g.yon du bzang mo mche ba can// nag po khyab byed byang phyogs su// zhal gcig phyag ba'i spyan gsum pa/
84a3(rgyud): char sprin nag po'i mdog 'dra ba// shin tu gdangs shing ljags 'dril ba// de yi mdun du dbang mo ste// g.yas su zla ba mo zhes bya// rgyab tu drag tu sdang ba la// g.yon du rna ba 'phyang /
84a4(rgyud): ba'o// gtso bo nag po chen po yi// shar lho mtshams kyi gnas bzhugs pa// gtsigs pa can ni shel gyi mdog/ stag lpags gos kyis dkris pa'o// mdun du lha mo 'phrog byed ma/
84a5(rgyud): g.yas su 'bar byed ma gnas la// de yi rgyab tu 'jig byed ma// g.yon du yul skyong ma gnas so// gtso bor gyur pa'i sku yi ni// lho nub mtshams su bzhugs pa ni// mi sdug pa ni du ba'i
84a6(rgyud): mdog/ shin tu mi bsrun gzugs 'chang ba// gcig gi ko brtson pas dkris// mdun du 'jigs byed drag mo che// g.yos su gzugs chen mo zhes bya// chab tu mchu ba gcig sa ste/
84a7(rgyud): g.yon du thong can ma yin no// nag po chen po'i sku yi ni// nub byang mtshams kyi grwar gzhugs pa// dga' bar ldan pa pad dmar mdog/ glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa'o// de yi mdun
84b1(rgyud): du thod 'breng 'dzin// g.yas su 'phreng ba 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu tri shU la 'dzin ma'o// g.yon du lces 'gro bsnams pa'o// gtso bo nag po rnon po yi// byang shar mtshams su gnas pa ni//
84b2(rgyud): log sred can ni rdza gsar mdog/ spre'u'i pags pa 'dzin pa'o// de yi mdun du ral gri mA// g.yas su dgra sa 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu rdo rje mda' thogs ma// g.yon du rdo rje'i gzhuma'o//
84b3(rgyud): khro bo'i pho nya 'di dag ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gar gyis rol// dang po gri gug thod pa 'dzin// gnyis pas Da ma ru dang ni// tri shU la ni 'dzin par mdzad// pho nya'i rnal 'byor ma 'di
84b4(rgyud): dag/ 'di dag phal cher zhal gcig la// phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa can// nug mo ser dang dmar ljang skye// phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o// dur khrod gnas su rol par mdzad/ pho brang de yi
84b5(rgyud): phyi rol du// zhing skyong rnams kyis yongs su bskor// ka Ta ha re ka te shing // shan+ti pa la yab yu ma can// ke la kir ni re yi shing // g+han d+ha pa la yum dang ldan// d+ha ra parta pa yi shing /
84b6(rgyud): gi pa la yab yum sbyor// ko krir d+hi ba pa d+hi shing // dz+wa la pa la yab yum sbyor// d+hi ra tsarte a mra'i shing // shwa ra d+ha sa gnyis med gnas// o Ta dbyangs can ka na ka'i// ka pA la
84b7(rgyud): yi lha srub byed// saT b+ha rur dza ti'i 'bras// g+han stod dang lhan cig sbyor// oM la pU ri ra ma Na// ha ti pa yi rna ba can// han mo ha yab yum sbyor// karmer bar rtsa ba'i sdong /
85a1(rgyud): tsan d+ha sa ni go Ta'i bdag/ mar rdzi bar zang ston shing // 'byin pa ste d+ha ma lam ldan// nAg pa raras shing can// keng rus ldan pa rol par 'gyur// sarke bar ri tre l+r-i'i/
85a2(rgyud): shing // pu yi rkang pa rtag tu rol// dzA lan d+ha ra ra khang brtsegs shing // bum pa can de bde bar rol// b+ha sna gu bar drag klog 'khrug/ dza Ta tri pa mnyam par gnas// so sa par ni tril
85a3(rgyud): sha yi shing // sgra gcan bsgrags pa'i yul dang bcas// tsa ri Ta pa'i kA ran tsa ra// mdzes pa shag ti can yul ldan// o Ta ya bar a shog ka'i// shin tu sgra gcan gsang mor bcas/
85a4(rgyud): gzung 'dzin sa sar ka ko li// sred pa dpa' bo dbang phyug bcas// k+Shi ri ka pa ra sa la'i shing // lhun po 'bar ba dbang phyug bcas// k+Shi ri ki sar sa la'i shing // lhun po 'bar ba
85a5(rgyud): lhan cig bcas// b+ha yang ma 'bur 'byung po'i shing // stobs chen 'jigs pa gnas byed pa'o// pu Ta nar ni d+ha du pi'i// a b+ha ke pa brtul zhugs 'dzin// rA dza g+ha har dza pA na/
85a6(rgyud): sna chen dzi li sgra gcan no// khang pa can du rang byung brag/ thub dka' rgyal mtshan 'dzin mar bcas// ma hA tra yer tsan da shing // sna tshogs dbang phyug dbang bskur bcas// 'di dag k+She/
85a7(rgyud): Ta pA la ni// zhing skyong zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// gri gug cang te'u g.yas pa na// g.yon pa thong khrag rtse gsum can// yum ni so so'i phyag mtshan ldan// skye gnas lngas byung sgra sgrogs mdzad//
85b1(rgyud): rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams kyi// lus la yang dag gnas nas ni// dngos grub ster byed stobs mchog byed// 'di dag zhing skyong thugs brtse bas// rtag par mtshan mo 'dra bar mdzad// 'di dgas/
85b2(rgyud): gsum khyab pa ste// sna tshogs mdog can 'bar ba'o// oM shId+tha k+She pa hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA s+thi ti hUM phaT/ oM b+ha la pu hU~M phaT/ oM shaM ka ri hUM phaT/ oM kA lA d+hi pa hUM phaT/ oM dza ya b+ha la hUM ba Ta
85b3(rgyud): oM be pra b+ha ga d+hA \u0f7f/ oM baHsan dz+nyA phaH/ oMk+She tre pA la sa si~M ts+tsha baH/ ma ga yo ki la pa pheM piT / k+ShaMk+ShaM k+ShaM k+Sha~M/ ka hA ka sa/ hrIhr-i trA~M dz+dza/ pA tsa paH/ hU~Md+d+ha/ barba paH/ d+hA tA/
85b4(rgyud): dAdwA r-I/ kr-i rbe r+d+rasa?/ 9 Sh+Ta/ drAd+bad+bad+d+ha[]/ []6/ krak+Sha seM sa seMs/ ma mal yaM/ za ba pa ba~M/ d+hAd+d+hat+s+yad+b+h+yAM/ k+ShAk+ShAk+ShA/ b+hAH
85b5(rgyud): paM baM paM baM swahA/ yul ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// drag po'i zhing skyong nyi shu bzhi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yi// sa gsum rnam par khyab nas gnas// 'di dag gsang ba'i sngags yin te/
85b6(rgyud): gzhan du rapa yang 'phrul par 'gyur// oMDA ka ni/ ka kak+Sha tan/ b+ha ba bi d+hAnra/ kha la khA d+hi/ bran d+hAn/ sar+b+ba dud+d+ha/ han ha na/ b+ha b+ha g+hA ta lag+hA ta ya/ sarba pA pa a mA ka sa shrI karba/
85b7(rgyud): du drub Tas rba/ 'di dag grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// dngos bu'i stsal bar ba tsom med// 'di nyid dkyil 'khor dgad pa yis// sna tshogs 'phrin las byas pa ste// ngur khrid brgyad kyi 'dag
86a1(rgyud): po mchog/ pho nya legs brten 'khor lo yin// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dur khrod kyi bdag po rnams dang pho nya ba khyad par ba rnams
86a2(rgyud): dang rnam mo dang zhing skyong gi 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang nyi shu bzhi// gsang ba'i mgon po 'di nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor
86a3(rgyud): pho brang gnas pa'o// mkha' 'gro'i gsang sngags bstan par bya// pho nya legs skyes rnal 'byor ma// rgya mtsho dang ni ro yis ni// phye ba'i rdo rje nor bu dang // pad+ma ral gri'i rigs dang ni/
86a4(rgyud): bde gshegs ye shes dam tshig gis// sna tshogs sha za'i ma mau rnams// gnas skyes yul dang grong gnas pa// klu yis mtshon pas ku tu phye// oM b+hai ra khi ni srahA// Du tri ni/ Da sha ka ra li ni
86a5(rgyud): dzA la mu khi ni/ bA yu be ga ni pra tsarti Ni/ ru dra ak+Shi Ni/ ma hA se ni/ a se ni ya ma ni/ kIrti ni/ lak+ShA Ni/ bi dza ye ni/ shrI dza na ye/ shri dza ya ka ra Ni/ shrI badz+ra Ni/ kAM kA li ni/ kA la rA tri NI/
86a6(rgyud): pra kro d+ha mu khi ni/ kA la dzi hwA ni/ kA rA l-i ni/ badz+ra b+hai ra ba ka rA Ni/ d+hu ru si rI/ ya ni mA nA a ka ro ni/ pri kA ra sa ti s+thA nI rat+na mA li ne/ su kra ak+Shi rI/ ku su li ni/ khit+ta Ni/ badz+ra pra b+ha Ni/
86a7(rgyud): badz+ra kA la ya ni/ sa ma bany+dza Na~M/ ka ma ni b+hi/ tsi tra li ga ni/ shu ki ni/ sarba d+hi ni/ su tra ri Ni/ g+ha las sa ni/ pad mA k+Shi ni/ dzi la dza la kha Di b+ha ba b+hu d+hi ni/ shrI g+ho ra Ni/ tsaN+Da le kha ne/ tsaN+Da mu rba/
86b1(rgyud): ni khaMs la.i Ni/ wa ki me shwa ra Ni/ b+hi ta ru dra ye/ kA ra NI sa kA b+hi ru sa ni mri d+hi ni d+hi/ b+hu ri NA sho sha Ni/ swa shrIH/ thaM du thA ra Ni/ shrI su Shi ni/ par ka li ni/ ka la~M ni/ ha ri Ni thA ye/ bad+hi ni/ na zla ba
86b2(rgyud): ak+Shi ni/ b+hI ma la tsa gri ni sar+b+ba/ bak+Sha pak+Sha sarba yo gi ni kA me shwa ri/ sar+b+ba dun+d+ha gar+b+ha gar+b+ha grah+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ tshes brgyad dang ni nya ba dang // nyi shu dgu dang dgu stong dang // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi/
86b3(rgyud): las ni the tsom med 'grub pa'o// dbyug gu drag po'i pho nya dang // chu tshod kyi nim mo dang // 'pho ba gnod sbyin brgya phrag gnyis// thun na po nya brgya dag go// dus sbyor bcu gnyis gnas pa'i yul/
86b4(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi de yi phyed// rtsa rlung yi ge khams la rgyu// 'ching grol tshar gcod rjes 'dzin pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// phyi dang nang gi dngos po pho nya ma'i
86b5(rgyud): las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nag po chen po gtum po ni// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril cing /
86b6(rgyud): la la yi sgra sgrogs pa// rab 'jigs bzhengs pa'i stabs kyis ni// gsang ba mchod byed lha mo brgyad// kun nas gar gyis rol pa ste// 'di yis 'phrin las dbang thob byed// oM badz+ra/
86b7(rgyud): lha ma hA kA lA ya pU hU~M phaT/ oM gr-i b+ha sa gA ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM b+ha ga bya g+h+ra ya hUM hU~M phaT/ oM thAn su ba rA ya hUM hU~M phaT/ oM se ma lA ya hU~M hUM phaT/ oM b+ha na She tA s+yai hUM hU~M phaT/ oM kr-i ne d+ha kar s+yai
87a1(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ oM su lu kA s+yai hUM hUM ba n+ya/ oM ga na gA s+yai hU~M hUM phaT sa 'di ni dpal nag po chen po 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'i sngags so// mtshan phyed dus na
87a2(rgyud): gtor ma 'bul// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// myos byed stobs dang bcas pas mchod// gsang ba sgrub pa'i mchog tu bshad// bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis// dben par dug dang tsha ba
87a3(rgyud): dang sA la dgra bo'i gzugs bya ste// gro ga 'am ni ro ras la// rgya skyegs dug dang khrag rnams kyis// bya rog mo yi rus pas ni// gzugs bris de yi snying khar ni/ e yi rnam pa'i
87a4(rgyud): 'khor lo la// mA ra ya yi mtha' can gyi// man ngag bzhin du bri bar bya// de nas rkang pa nas brtsams te// dril la dur khrod skra yis dkris// sngar gyi gzugs kyi snying kha ru/
87a5(rgyud): bcug ste tshigs dang lci ba sogs// drug dang bcas pa'i tsher ma gzugs// de nas sngags pa 'dod lha yi// nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas// snying kha'i hUM las 'od 'phro bas// lha la
87a6(rgyud): bka' bsgo rnam shes ni// man ngag can gyis dgug par bya// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la che ge mo A kaR+Sha dza/ dzaHhUM baM ho sa dgug pa dang / gzhug dang bcing dang myos par bya// de nas tsha ba
87a7(rgyud): dug gis bra ba// de bzhin bdun phrag nyi shu gsum// zla ba gcig tu las sgrub la// drag po'i thab tu tsher ma dang // bra me'i me la bsro bar bya// des kyang 'dud par mi byed na// bstan
87b1(rgyud): pabade la gnas pa'i phyir// snying rje chen po rab bskyed de// TI lpags las byas mtshon gyis gtub// khrag dang dug dang nga ba dang // tsher ma li dgar bcas kyi bsregs/ khal ba tha nga/
87b2(rgyud): mar dag ltar// mnan dang chu bor dor bar bya// gzhan yang mi shis thod pa la// dug gi sdug gus gzugs zis te// de yi lce la ung ma ni/ ming spel bris la thod pa gnyis// bsgyur/
87b3(rgyud): skud pa nag pos dkri// nag po'i gos kyis gtums nas ni// mi shis sa phyogs dag tu mnan// bsnyen dang sgrub pas mnyes gyur na// 'chi dang smyo bar gyur pa ni// the tshom yod pa ma yin
87b4(rgyud): no// yi dgas sam ni dgra bo gang // gro ga la ni gzugs bris la// snying khar sngags 'dis bskor bar bya// oM badz+ra ma hA ka la che ge mo mA rA ya hU~M hUM phaT// ces pa'i sngags bris
87b5(rgyud): gtor mar gzhug/ de nas sgrub sngags bzlas par bya// de yi rjes la gtor ma dbul// mgon po nag po 'khor bcas la// sha khrag rkang sogs bstabs byas nas// gtor mas
87b6(rgyud): gsad pas bsgral bya ste// dmigs par bya ba myur du rlag/ gzhan yang gdug pa pha rol de// nus pa cung zad yod gyur na// rang shed rang la dbab pa'i phyir// ngag mnan sbyor ba 'di
87b7(rgyud): ltar bya// gro ga 'am ni ro ras la// khrag dang dug dang bdug pa yis// gzugs ni lces khengs sngags bri ba// stam+b+ha ming spel ldan pas bskor// phyin ci log tu dril la bcings/
88a1(rgyud): / zag pa'i rdzas sogs sa la ni// tsha tsha byas pa'i nang bcug la// bstim zhing mnan la mdun byas la// rnal 'byor spro bsdu phyag rgya bcing // thun gyis thabs la
88a2(rgyud): bzlas pa bya// las bcol zhag bdun thun bzhir bya// de la sngar bzhin byas nas ni// gnod pa'i sa phyogs dag tu mnan// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// thod pa 'am ri snod gzhan du/
88a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de// thuran rdzas kyis bra ba ling gar bcas// yang na drag po klu la gtad// gru gsum dong bcug brdzi bar bya// kha bcad nas ni drag po yi// nges par thob par the tsom med//
88a4(rgyud): de ltar las la sbyor dus su// nyes pa bsgo ba'i thabs shes nas// srung byed nyes pa 'di ltar skrag/ bstan pa 'jig par byed pa yi// dgra bo srung byed lha khyod nyon// gdug pa'i sems
88a5(rgyud): ldan dgra 'di yis// dkon mchog bla ma la smod cing // rnal 'byor la sdang sems can 'tshe// sgrub pa po la bskas gyur pas// dpag tshad stong du ltung ba yi// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
88a6(rgyud): myong gyur pas// bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni// gzugs kyis lha rnams mchod pa yin// khyed kyis srung bar ma byed par// sdig can 'di ni myur du spongs// zhes brjod par bya'o//
88a7(rgyud): bstan pa bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang // snying rje chen po ldan pa yis// yengs pa med par byas gyur na// nges par 'grub par gdon mi za// brgya byin dag gi srog kyang g.yo// sdig can
88b1(rgyud): dgra bgegs spos ci dgos// byang chub sems dang rab ldan na// ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mgron po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ lha mo'i 'khor lo dang las
88b2(rgyud): sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i cho ga nyams dga' ba// dpal ldan lham dral thams cad kyi/
88b3(rgyud): sgrub pa rab tu nyams dga' ni// mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag drug pa// dang po gri gug thong khrag 'dzin// spyan gsum mthing nag brngam pa yi// g.yas g.yon
88b4(rgyud): bar mas 'phreng ba dang // Da ma ru ni 'dzin cing rdung // tha ma gnyis kyis kha T+wAM dang // sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'ching bar mdzad// klu brgyad kyis brgyan khrag 'dzag zhal// sa bon+da rang
88b5(rgyud): sngags 'greng ba can// rgyas btab pas ni byin parlabs shing // rdo rje sems pas dbu brgyan pa// t+ya mo d+ha li shing la brten/ bi na ya~M ka mnan par bsam// oM badz+ra ma hAk+Sha la k+Sh+mI De
88b6(rgyud): big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka naM hUM hUM phaT swatwa/ sha chen bsregs spos phul nas ni// skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags bzlas// de la gtor ma dbul bar bya// khyad par byin rlabs gyur par bya// 'phrin
88b7(rgyud): las thogs pa med par 'grub// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ sku'i mgon po'i sngags so// oM ma hA kA la gu Na hrid hUM phaT/ yon tan gyi mgon po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra
89a1(rgyud): ma thA kA la rak+Sha ru ngi b+ha Sha ni hUM phaT/ gsung gi mgon po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kriSh+Ta tsaN+Da mA rA ya ma hA kA la tsit+ta la hrIHdzaHlas kyi mgon po'i sngags so// oM
89a2(rgyud): badz+ra ma hA kA li ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ yi ge bcu pa'i gsang ba'i mgon po'i sngags so// oM tsaN+De shwa rI ye swA hA/ gtum pa ma'i sngags so// oM tsat+ti tsi kA ye swAhA/ drag mo'i sngags so// oM
89a3(rgyud): ka li kI yai swA hA/ zlog byed ma'i sngags so// oM ku li she Sha rI ye swa hA/ dpa' mo'i sngags so// oM shrI ma hA kA la ga Na me tI dzaHbeng 'dzin ma'i sngags so// oM re din+ta ma hA kA li tri shU la
89a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba sha tAM dzaHrtse gsum 'dzin pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la kro tri gar+b+he sa ya hUM phaT/ gaN+DI 'dzin pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la te tsi tso tra ka ra ma rA NA hUM phaT/ rgyal mtshan 'dzin
89a5(rgyud): pa'i sngags so// gsang ba beng 'dzin mgon po yis// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer ni// sum brtsegs la sogs khang bzang rnams// khro bo tsan dan beng bsdams kyis// lha dmag bye ba dung /
89a6(rgyud): phyur rnams// byung nas rlag par mdzad pa yi// grong khyer 'bum phrag brgyad cu yang // rlag byed bdud 'dral chen po ste// 'di nyid g.yon gnas lha mo ni// kun tu dgyes nas gar stabs
89a7(rgyud): gnas// oM shrI ma hA kA la du bo ni dza a mu ru Ta b+h+yaHoM shrI ma hA kA la trag rak+Sha/ bon dza/ mun ga shig b+h+yaHmu shig b+h+yaHche ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la rak+Sha tri / kayak+Sha ru dza sa ma ya/ sar+b+ba sha d+hu ru ru
89b1(rgyud): nabra la la/ ma nga chang zad / ni cang bu drang sa// rgyal pa tshul pa ni sha sa rus mA ya/ sgye ge mo gdu s+yA d+ya drA/ oM rba rbam ma b+h+yaHma ma \u0f7fdz+dza/ tsit+talA / mA r+ya sa rbadrA rbud/ d+hen \u0f7f A.A nA d+has
89b2(rgyud): lo li b+ha sha ni ma prakA la yAk+Sha shA sa na/ a pa ka ri di na me ken me ru ru ma ma thuH tsit+pa la zi dzi rjed/ tro tri bi tri ka tsi saH/ tI ka pa tran+tu/ a~M traka ti sa mo ga mo s+yA/ cig drug shig/ ku mai ta rbad
89b3(rgyud): rlud sod/ gaN+DI 'dzin pa'i khro bo che// ma rungs klad pa 'gem par byed// tsa muti ldan rol pa ste// gdug pa 'dul ba'i las la shes// khan rtse gsum 'dzin pas ni// dgra bgegs lus pa/
89b4(rgyud): yid la 'debs// gtum po thogs 'beb mig sgyur ma// sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba'o// gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs skrag byed// 'di nyid legs
89b5(rgyud): ldan rgyal po che// rdo rje bas gdong sna tshogs gdang // dkyil 'khor lnga tshogs 'di dag gis// gsang sngags rim pas bstan pa'o// thun mong khyad par bye brag gis// lus kyi mtshan nyid/
89b6(rgyud): rtags bcas pa// grub pa kun tu bgrod pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor ba'i mgon po dang yum dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags dang 'phrin
89b7(rgyud): las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bden pa tsam gyis ni// grub pa stsol bar mdzad pa'o// dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya//
90a1(rgyud): bya rog g.yang gzhis brgyan pa yi// nag po phyag bzhi pa yi sku// gsang zhing dam tshig ldan pas bri// de yi sku yi rten du bshad// gser dngul la sogs kyis bris pa'i//
90a2(rgyud): nag po chen po'i snying po dang // nye ba'i snying po bris pa rnams// gsung gi rten du 'dod pa'o// bya rog sogs dang rta nag snying // khyi yi snying dang mi yi snying // rin chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams/
90a3(rgyud): thugs kyi rten du gzung bar bya// snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang // nya sha la sogs 'bru yi chan// sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang // bsnyen pa'i gtor ma bya ba yin// rdzas dang rta gtor steng dang
90a4(rgyud): 'og/ steng nas dar nag gur gyis dbub// sha lnga sman lnga myos byed bcas// rgyun du thugs dam bskul phyir mchod// rta nag lug nag g.yag rog la// mgul du snying po bris la gdags// de yi
90a5(rgyud): ngo bo legs phul la// phyi yi rten du bya bar bshad// nag po ras sam dar la yang // rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis// nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// bris pa nyin gcig gis rtogs nas/
90a6(rgyud): bar chad med par rab gnas bya// gsang rten lus la bcang ba'o// sna tshogs 'bru nag dpal byas pa'i// gtor ma mi shas brgyan pa dag/ pho brang rten dang brten par bcas// nang gi rten du
90a7(rgyud): slob pa'o// skyes pa grir shi'i thod 'phreng ni// yon tan ldan phyir rtag tu sba// mi bsad mtshon las byas pa yi// rdo rje gri gug hUM bris pa// 'phrin las byed pa'i khyad par ro// dam tshig gnas pa'i rnal
90b1(rgyud): 'byor pas// nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas nyid du// lha mo'i rten yang 'di ltar ro// rigs med kyi ni thod pa la// gsang sngags yi ge 'di dag ni// bris pa tsam gyis las 'grub byed// bsgrub mi/
90b2(rgyud): dgos par nus pa 'byung // dur khrod sol bas sngags 'di bri// oM shrI de wi tsa puN+Da rak+ta tsa mur+t+ti/ so ka mor/ d+ha ke saM ha si ta/ mu khe ka ra ha ra/ kI la kI la pre k+Sha ti ta sa na sa ta dz+nyA b+h+rUM la la ta ya/ ka
90b3(rgyud): pA la mA la d+ha ra Ni hUM hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ thod pa'i nang du 'khor bar bri// phyi yi rten du bshad ba yin/ bong bu nag mo'i thod pa la// rten pa lha mo'i sru bris pa// nang gi rten du bshad pa yin// nal gro
90b4(rgyud): snying ni ma nyams pa// mtshon gyi rtse la bskon pa gzhag/ gsang ba'i rten du gzugs par bya// bu mo'i thod pa dza ril dang // gri gug dar gyis gtums pa dang // dri bzang mtshan gyis bdug par
90b5(rgyud): byade kho na nyid rten du bshad// de nas nub phyogs dag nas ni// gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i rdo// mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can// rdo rje mgon po/
90b6(rgyud): 'khor bcas pa// rang bzhin gnas nas sku bzhengs la// 'dir ni bstan bsrung bzhugs su gsol// lan gsum brjod nas bzhugs par bya// rol mo'i sgra dang spos dud dang // sna tshogs/
90b7(rgyud): rol mos bsus nas kyang // 'phrin las gang 'grub mi shes bya// 'di ni rang bzhin rten yin no// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ phyi nang gsang ba dang sku gsung
91a1(rgyud): thugs kyi rten gzugs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// bka' yi tshogs kyi
91a2(rgyud): 'khor gyur pa// 'di ni kun tu shis par bya// las kyi mgon po rnams dang ni// lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas// lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa// pho nya mngag gzhug las byed pa'o// gzhan
91a3(rgyud): yang phyogs skyong bcu dang ni// klu chen brgyad dang lha chen brgyad// gza' chen brgyad dang rgyal chen bzhi// chu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// gnod sbyin brgyad dang 'phrog ma'i bu// sha za dang ni ma mo dang //
91a4(rgyud): 'jig rten pa dang dam tshig gnas// zhing skyong ma lus 'khor dang bcas// 'di dag las kur byed pa yi// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcas pas// grub pa rab tu stsol mdzad pa// lha dang lha
91a5(rgyud): min mi 'am ci// lto 'phye grul bum sul po dang // lus srul grib gnon skem byed sogs// nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang // 'byung po ma lus 'dus pa kun// 'di dag sgrub la grogs byed/
