91a6(rgyud): cing // mthu stobs dpung dang nus pa yis// srung zhing bar chad nges par sel// sgra gcan 'dzin pa'i rA hu la// 'di la sogs pa thams cad la// tshogs kyi gtor mas cher mchod na/
91a7(rgyud): dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster// 'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi// nye dang nye ba'i mtshan ma dang // rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni// phyi nang gsang ba rtags gyur pa//
91b1(rgyud): dngos dang nyams snang rmi lam dang // sprul pa'i 'phrin las nges 'byung ba// gtso bo nyid dang 'khor rnams kyi// rim pa rjes su 'brel bar 'byung // rtags byung nas ni las la bskul// dpal
91b2(rgyud): mgon po rin po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa mchod par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// dpal ldan/
91b3(rgyud): mgon po chen po yi// thar pa'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar// dbang bskur cho ga bshad par bya// 'dis ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs// de las rgyal bar byed pa yi// cho ga bzang po bla na med// dkyil
91b4(rgyud): 'khor bzang po bzhengs par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// rgyud shes yang dag bla ma la// snod ldan dag pa'i slob ma yis// gsol ba lan gsum gdab byas la// maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro
91b5(rgyud): yin/ rdo rje 'dzin pa ma lus dang // rgyal ba mgon po ma lus dang // dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol// lan gsum brjod nas gnang gyur pas// dang po bsnyen
91b6(rgyud): pa brtsam par bya// mtshan mnye ba'am tshul shes nas// de nas sngon 'gro brtsam par bya// dang po bgegs rnams nyer ni yi// 'phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yis// ye shes lha rnams mchod pa dang // lus
91b7(rgyud): dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i// sngags dang bcas pa'i nyungs kar gyis// me sbar sreg dang bral bar bya// de rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma las// sa brtag pa dang sbyang bar bya//
92a1(rgyud): sa blangs nas ni bka' thob pas// brko zhing ro lnga bsal bar bya// de nas bsrung zhing bcag par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje gom pa'i gar stabs kyis// hUM hUM drag/
92a2(rgyud): po'i sgra brjod pas// phyogs kun bcing ba byas nas ni// bgegs la bka' bsgo gtor ma sbyin// slob ma kun la bsrungs byas la// rdo rje mgon po chen po yi// ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la// gsol
92a3(rgyud): ba gdab pas gnang ba sbyin// khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrungs// yang dag ye shes sems dpa' che// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal byed pa// rgyal ba ma lus bstan skyong che// de nas lhag
92a4(rgyud): par gnas pa brtsams// sa 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pas// bka' byin ras ni thim par blta// bum pa bkra shis yang dag ldan// ma nyams mtshan nyid ldan pa lnga// kha tshar ma nyams ras zung dkri// snying po/
92a5(rgyud): sman dang 'bru lnga sogs// spos dang rin chen dag gis dgang // rgyun 'bab chu yis gang ba dang // 'bras ldan shing gis kha brgyan pa'o// de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yi// bka' yi khro bo rnam par sgom// dkyil
92a6(rgyud): 'khor dri yi thig le la// me tog gcal bkram lha rnams ni// bskyed cing mchod la gnyis med bstim// so shing dor dang ltas brtag pa// bsrung skud ku sha sbyin par bya// de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas
92a7(rgyud): pas/ dam tshig gsang ba sbyin par bya// khyad par lha la gsol btab nas// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// dang por ye shes thig gdab cing // phyi nas dam tshig nges par gdab// go rims ma
92b1(rgyud): nor nges pa'i tshul// srad bu shes rab can thig gdab// tshon ni byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // pra brtag rdul tshon rim par dgye// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes pa yi// zlum
92b2(rgyud): bskor pho brang lang tshe dgu// dbus ma e dbyibs drag po nyid// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// lha khyams bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'dod yon rin chen sked pad dang // dra byed pa ku li yi 'phreng //
92b3(rgyud): yang na kha bang mdzes pa'i rgyan// chos 'khor ri dag sa gdugs dang bcas// thod skam pad+ma'i 'phreng bar ldan// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su 'khor// rdo rje me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs// dam tshig ye shes/
92b4(rgyud): gnyis med pa'i// gsang sngags nye ba sngags par gnas// bstan zhing mchod la gsol ba gdab// nye bar brgyar cing yongs su bskor// de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu shis//
92b5(rgyud): dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las ka gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya// yang
92b6(rgyud): na ling tshe dgu ldan pa'i// pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi rol du// mu khyud 'khor lo rim gsum la// e dbyibs zhing skyong rim pa dgod// lha dang sa bon phyag mtshan ni// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas
92b7(rgyud): mtshan// slob ma khrus byas rgyan btags te// maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing // ras kyis mig ni bkab nas su// dang por me tog dor bar bya// mtshan ma mthong bas legs par drang // sgo bzhi nas ni nang
93a1(rgyud): 'jug cing // gu gul bdug cing ting 'dzin gyis// nag po chen po'i lha tshogs kyang // nges par spyan drang bstim par bya// de las nges par rtags rnams byung // yang na so
93a2(rgyud): so'i mgon por bskyed// ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab// bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las// 'od 'phros rang byin brlab par 'gyur// mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor// gdong g.yogs
93a3(rgyud): bkrol zhing lha ngo bstan// de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis// nges par rim pas dbang bskur te// bstan pa 'dzin cing bstan pa skyong // bstan pa srung bar byed pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel mdzad pa//
93a4(rgyud): sku yi mgon po 'khor bcas kyis// bla med dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir// yang dag ye shes dbang bskur ro// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las lha yi khyad par ro// me long ye shes dbang nyid can//
93a5(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ri// zhe sdang dag pas dbang bskur ro// mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang // bya ba nan tan chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rigs kyi gtsang // nges
93a6(rgyud): par dbang bskur bstan par bya// 'phrin las bzhi yi dbang yang bskur// lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub// bum pa spyi bor byin pa dang // thod pa'i bdud rtsi blugs pa yis// gsang ba bde chen ye
93a7(rgyud): shes nyid// rang byung dri med dbang bskur ba'o// de rjes pa ling gtad pa yis// rus pa thogs med sbyin byed yin// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mchog/ lha dang sngags kyi zab pa'i chos// ting 'dzin
93b1(rgyud): chen po'i phyag rgya che// 'di nyid dngos grub kun gyi gter// zab cing rgya che'i don sgrub pa// skal ba can la sbyin par bya'o// he ru ka dang nag po che// bla ma tha dad med pa la// tshogs kyi 'khor los leg
93b2(rgyud): mchod cing // zhabs la gtugs la smon lam btab// 'di ni thob par the tsom med// 'phrin las kun tu grub ster byed// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur zhing
93b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan mgon po de nyid kyi// phyogs bzhi yongs su skyong ba yi// rgyal
93b4(rgyud): po chen po rnam pa bzhi// shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs nas ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs nas ni spyan mi bzang // byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sras// sangs
93b5(rgyud): rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa// 'di nyid grub pa ster byed pa'o// rab tu dben zhing gtsang ba dang // bkra shis nyams dga'i sa phyogs su// rnam thos sras ni bsgrub par bya// sa gzhi ba yi lci bas
93b6(rgyud): byug/ dri bzang tsan dan dkar dmar dang / a ka ru dang du ru ka/ kha che gi wang sna tshogs sman// sreg cing tshogs pa'i sman du bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi mda' gang ba// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs/
93b7(rgyud): dang rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba// pho brang rin chen las grub pa// sna tshogs pad+ma rin chen zing // gter dang dpag bsam ljon shing bcas// ka pa stong phrag du ma yis// rab tu rgyas shing yongs
94a1(rgyud): su bskor// lte ba rin chen mu khyud la// lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// bar ma lha khyams mdzes pa la// gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor// phyi mar
94a2(rgyud): bas bskor ba la// klu chen brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi bkod pa// dbus su rin chen seng ge'i khri// sna tshogs pad+ma ge sar bcas// de dbus zla ba dar
94a3(rgyud): gyi gdan// de la sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// sa bon phyag mtshan sku dgod bya// sna tshogs mchod pas yongs bskor te// 'bras dang gro dang 'bru sna la// gtor ma shin tu bzang /
94a4(rgyud): bar bsham// khyad par me tog sna tshogs ni// nA ga ge sar ku mu da// pun ta ke ba ba ku li// par shi ka dang tsam pa ka/ d+ha nu ska ri ma li ka/ su ti ka dang ut+pa la// pad+ma man dA ra ba
94a5(rgyud): dang // darjod pa la sogs pa'o// sna tshogs chu dang sreg spos tshegs// gu gul khyad par bsreg par bya// ka ra bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // 'khur ba 'bras chen zhun mar dang // zhal zas
94a6(rgyud): bye brag thams cad dang // snang gsal mar me byug pa dang // sgra skar sna tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // 'phan dang bla re la sogs pa// sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi dang /
94a7(rgyud): de ltar bkod pas legs brgyan nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang // rang lhar bskyed pa'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la// rab tu 'phros pas 'od du 'bar// de las dbus su
94b1(rgyud): rgyal chen ni// sku mdog gur kum mdog 'dra ba// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// seng ge'i khri la legs bzhugs pa'i// phyag g.yas yid bzhin nor bu ste// rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan can// gan
94b2(rgyud): pa ne'u le'i snod can las// kha nas rin cher skrag par bsam// gnod gnas dbang po gang ba bzang // nor bu bzang dang rta yi bdag/ yang dag shes dang 'brog gnas dang // lnga rtsen pi rtsi kuN+Da li// sna tshogs
94b3(rgyud): rgyan dang phyag mtshan bcas// re re'ang du mas yongs bskor nas// shin tu gsal zhing brtan par bsam// de nas sa bon las 'phros te// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs la// mchod cing bstod de gnyis med/
94b4(rgyud): bstim// khyad par gsol ba gdab par bya// rgyal ba mgon po 'khor bcas pa'i// yid 'ong khang bzang po brang 'di// yid bzhin nor bu'i char 'bebs pa'i// rin chen gter gyi dngos grub gsol// oM baM/
94b5(rgyud): sar+b+ba/ oM ba~M shra ma N+Da ya sAhA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhU~M/ oM pUd+d+ha thA drA ma swAhA/ oM ma ti b+ha drA ya swAH/ oM kr-i be rA ya swAt+ma/ oM saM pra dz+nyAn ya swA hA/ oM ku h+ya tan+t+ra la swAhA/ oM drAts+tshik+Sha ya swAhA/ oM pa tsiH/
94b6(rgyud): lA ya swA hA/ dang po lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid// gsum pa kun nas bstod par bya// de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya// gsol ba btab nas 'phrin las bcol// de nas
94b7(rgyud): ye shes gshegs su gsol// der gnas pa ni bzhugs par bya// phyi rten nang rten khyad par ba// rim pa 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// mis mi mthong bar sbas te bcang // khyad par rtags na gsal/
95a1(rgyud): bar 'byung // nye ba'i mtshan ma nges mthong nas// dngos grub blang zhing gtor ma dbul// sbyin sreg las kyis myur du 'grub// gsang sngags 'bum phrag bcu yis ni/
95a2(rgyud): 'bras bu yid la 'dod kun 'grub// kha skong me yi mchod pa bya// gtor ma chen po dang bcas pas// lan bdun nye bar bsnyen pas 'grub// 'don lha rnams kun gyi gter// sgrub pa po la stsol bar
95a3(rgyud): mdzad// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ khyad par du 'phags pa rnam thos sras gnod sbyin chen po brgyad dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
95a4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'phags pa chen po de nyid la// klu chen brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba// rim pa 'di ni bstan par bya// khyad par sa bcu'i dbang phyug che// dpal ldan thugs rje'i
95a5(rgyud): bdag po nyid// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa nyid// sman gsum cung zad khro bo'i tshul// sku mdog dmar dang ljang ku'i mdog/ rin chen 'bar ba'i dbu rgyan can// sku la dar ber sum rim la// sna
95a6(rgyud): tshogs cod pan rgyan gyis spras// phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// lha yi ba dan mdzes pa 'phyar// g.yon pa mchod rten sku gdung bsnams// ne'u le'i rkyal pa nor skyug 'chang // 'khor du khyad
95a7(rgyud): bar klu chen brgyad// sku lus mi yi rnam pa la// sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gdengs ka can// phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba nas// yid bzhin nor bu legs bsnams pa// sems dpa'i 'dug stangs phyed skyil can//
95b1(rgyud): thams cad gcol 'dud par byed// nor rgyas pad+ma nyid dang ni// stobs kyi rgyu dang 'jog po nyid// pad+ma che dang hu lu che// dung skyong rigs ldan brgyad po nyid// rgya mtsho chen po'i nang dag gi/ padra la ni gnas bcas /
95b2(rgyud): de ltar bskyed la ye shes pa// spyan drangs mchod la gnyis med bstim// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor la// yid 'ong dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur// oM shrI badz+ra yak+Sha bai shra ba NA ya hUM phaT/ oM ba ru tA ya/
95b3(rgyud): swA hA/ oM a nan+ta ya swAhA/ oM tik+Sha kA ya swA hA/ oM shaM kha pA lA ya sAt+ma/ oM karko TA ya swA hA/ oM pad+ma ya swAhA/ oM ma hA pad+ma ya swAhA/ oM ku li kA ya swAhA/ der ni gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/
95b4(rgyud): sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// de nas klu rnams thams cad la// yid 'ong gtor ma dbul bar bya// nA ga ge sar pus pa dang // rgya mtsho lbu ba a ru ra// dza tri pa la gur kum dang // tsan dan dkar
95b5(rgyud): dmar bu shel ci// dbang po lag dang snying no sha// chu srin sder mo le brgan dang // 'gron bu dung dang mu tig dang // nya phyis bla gor zho sha dang // mkhal mazho sharma bya'i mdongs// rta ru rgun 'brum mngar
95b6(rgyud): gsum dang // gser gyi bye ma ras skud dang // 'o ma dang ni 'bru sna lnga// rin chen sna tshogs ma lus pa// khyad par du ni dbul bar bya// de nas mchod cing bstod bya ste// dngos grub gang 'dod stsol bar
95b7(rgyud): bsam// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya// gsang sngags khri phrag bcu bzlas nas// rtags byung nas ni dngos grub blang // dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la/
96a1(rgyud): klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// drang srong sras mchog de nyid la// lha mo brgyad kyis yong
96a2(rgyud): bskor ba'i// thabs nyid rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rin chen bdun pa'i khang bzangs su// nor bu sna tshogs gdan bzhugs pa'i// 'phags pa sku mdog bai DUR+Ya// zhal gcig phyag drug spyan
96a3(rgyud): gsum pa// rin chen sna tshogs du mas spras// gdug pa klu yis nyer brgyan cing // g.yas kyi dang po rgyal mtshan 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po rin chen snod// bar ma gnyis ni rdo rje dang // pad+ma 'bar
96a4(rgyud): ba bsnams pa dang // tha mas zhags pa tho ba 'phyar// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// dar gyi cod pan dag gis mdzes// skad cig gis ni bsam par bya// oM badz+ra bi ru ka ku be ra At+ma ka/
96a5(rgyud): ma hA yak+Sha rA dza rat+na sid+d+hi hU~M sA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa yis// gnod sbyin mo rnams bdun du 'gugs// oM tsan+d+ra kAN+yai swA hA/ oM su b+ha drA ye swA hA/ oM dat+ta ye swA hA/ oM gu hA yAM swA hA/ oM su/
96a6(rgyud): dat+tA ye swA hA/ oM di byaM swA hA/ oM Ar+yA yai swA hA/ oM sa ra swa s+yai swA hA/ zla 'od can ma rab bzang mo// sbyin byed ma dang gsang ba ma// rab sbyin ma dang dpal lha mo// 'phags ma dang ni dbyangs ldan te/
96a7(rgyud): thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// kun tu rgyal ba 'od 'phro ma// gdu bu dpung rgyan mgul rgyan dang // zhabs gdub do shal legs brgyan cing // dar dang nor bus rnam par mdzes// dkar dang ser dang dur
96b1(rgyud): ba'i 'od// gser 'od pad+ma rA ga dang // ut+pal can du ri ka dang // ba la sha li mdog mtshungs pa// 'od kyi 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i nang // rin chen sbom bu gter gyi snod// rin chen gnod pa
96b2(rgyud): drung chos dang // be tsur dang nor bu me// dpal be pany+tsa li ka ste// g.yon pa kun tu pad+ma bsnams// sgeg cing 'gying dang ldan par bsam// gtso bos lha mo brgyad po bskul// lha mo brgyad po tham/
96b3(rgyud): cad kyis// rin chen char pa phab nas ni// bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnam par bsam// mgon po myur du bskul ba'i tshe// gtso bos mi 'jigs seng ge chibs// thun mong gi ni las byed pa'o// stobs
96b4(rgyud): ldan glang chen rab brtan chibs// khyad par sgrub pa'i las rnams byed// g.yu 'brug sngon po chibs nas ni// snang srid ma lus dbang du sdud// dbang du byed pa'i las rnams dang // khyad par sbyin/
96b5(rgyud): sreg drag po ni// bzhad dang bajam pa'i tshul gyis ni// myur du las la 'gro ba yin// phyi nas gsang ba'i rim shes pa'i// stong phrag bcu yis 'grub pa ste// 'di ni rin chen ga'u'i nang // rin chen
96b6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'khor lo la// gsang sngags yi ge'i 'phreng ba can// sa bon spro bsdus ting 'dzin sgom// na mo bai shra ba Na badz+ra mu sa la/ mu su na sti/ tri shU la aM ku sha/ pA sha pa ra shu baM d+ha mud
96b7(rgyud): ga ra lA laM kI da/ hasta s+ya/ na mo na maHsar+b+ba de wa ta su tsi ta/ kr-i ta Ta s+ya/ ma hA kI la kI lA ya/ sarba gra hA/ a ka ri Sha ni ya bi dza yA/ dza yaM du/ b+ha ga bAM/ nA da ku be rA/ kA ti sa ti/ tsakra ti ni/ ka la ka la/ nA da
97a1(rgyud): ku be ra ki ri ki li/ na da ku be ra/ k+Sha ti pa ti/ tsakra ti ni/ bi dzi ma hA b+ha ga ba ni/ nA da ku be ra/ bi kra ta/ drang srong ka ra la/ ban d+ha na/ rai tra/ d+hi h+ya sa/ gu h+ya/ kan ga na pa ri bridA/
97a2(rgyud): bai shra ba Na/ b+ha ne b+ha ne/ b+hi ba na bA si ti/ ku ti ku ti/ ku be ra/ nA da ku be ra na maHstu ste swA hA/ 'di ni khyad par sgrub pa ste// gsang sngags gnod sbyin stong sde'i tshogs// ma lus 'di yis skul bar byed//
97a3(rgyud): gar mkhan mchog ces bya ba yi// lha ni du mas yongs bskor ba'o// 'di ni bskyed cing spyan drang ba// spyan drang mchod cing bstod pa dang // gang sgrub las la bskul bar bya// 'di yis rnal 'byor
97a4(rgyud): dgos pa sgrub// zhi bas nad gdon ma lus pa// dbang gis khams gsum ma lus bsgyur// rgyas pas nor dang 'bru sogs 'phel// mngon spyod kyis ni gdug pa 'dul// nor bu bzang pos
97a5(rgyud): gter la spyod// yang dag shes kyis dus gsum mthong // gang ba bzang pos longs spyod 'phel// gtsug na 'khyil pas tshe dpal ster// 'brog gnas rgyal bas dud 'gro spel// gnod sbyin lnga po 'di/
97a6(rgyud): ngag gis// sa gsum g.yo bar byed pa ste// 'di dag sgrub pos mchod gyur na// phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal rnams ster// rang nyid lhag pa'i lha yi ni// sa bon las 'phros lcags kyus ni// 'di
97a7(rgyud): dag srog gi dbang po la// dbang byed las byed mi zlog 'gyur// gnod sbyin rnams la shing thog dang // klu rnams gtor mas kun tu mchod// lha mo a ru ra yi 'bru// ma lus myur du mchod pa'o// gang po
97b1(rgyud): dang ni mdzes ma dag/ khyad par mngag gzhug gyur pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
97b2(rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// 'khor ba'i srid pa ji srid par// byang chub sems kyi chos rnams ston// ri bo'i
97b3(rgyud): rtse dang nags tshal brag/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang shing gtsigs// gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod de// gnas 'di dag tu bsam gtan bsgom// las kyis mgon po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/
97b4(rgyud): gru gsum pho brang la gnas pa// dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar ba ni// me dpung 'bar ba 'phro ba'i dbus// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// sku mdog nag cing mche ba rno// yan lag thung zhing
97b5(rgyud): gsus pa 'phyang // thod pa skam po'i dbu brgyan byas// spyan gsum sdang mig khro tshul ston// bzhin sgyur mi sdug lus can ni// phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug 'phyar// g.yon pa da ma nyams snying
97b6(rgyud): khrag gis// thod pa bkang nas gsol bar mdzad// dug sbrul gdug pas lha tshigs brgyan// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes// mi thod rlon pa'i do shal byas// ro yi gdan la brdzis nas
97b7(rgyud): kyang // drag po'i nga ro sgrogs pa'i gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po ni// gsod byed rngam byed sgrol byed che// bsgrub byed nges par sgrol ba'i tshe// sku yi mgon pos dam nyams kyi// lte ba'i srog
98a1(rgyud): rtsa gcod par byed// gsung gi mgon pos dam nyams kyi// mgrin pa nas ni khrag rnams 'dren// rdo rje thugs kyi mgon po yis// snying gi dkar nag mtshams su yang // bya rog mchu ni
98a2(rgyud): btsugs nas kyang // srog rtsa myur du gcod par byed// pho nya sha za'i gdong car gyis// spyi gtsug nas ni rtsa la 'jig// las byed ma mo tsaN+Di kas// gsang ba'i mdoms sor dngas ma rngub// rtsa 'jib ma dang /
98a3(rgyud): khrag 'thung ma// srog 'phrog mas ni las la sbyor// nyin mtshan dus las 'da' mi byed// 'di dag gsang sngags ma yengs bzlas// dus gsum dag tu ting 'dzin 'bad// rtsa ba'i sngags ni
98a4(rgyud): srog yin te// gsung gi dngos grub snying po yin// nye ba'i snying pos thugs bskul ba'o// ye shes sa bon mi shigs pa// dngas ma'i gnas par de bshad do// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las//
98a5(rgyud): rim par bzlas pas bsam gAtan 'grub// rtags rnams nye bar ma byung na// 'bad pas bsten cing mchod par bya// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// oM ma hA kA la gu Na hr-i da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA/
98a6(rgyud): 'thag gang de/ ma dA kA la sid+hi lI du // A li kA li mnyam ldan pa'i// rtsa brgyad 'phred ba rab tu bsgrags// rim par byin rlabs ldan pa'i phyir// bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// bkrong 'phreng nus par
98a7(rgyud): ldan pa yis// las ni myur bar shis pa yin// shel gyis zhi ba chen po 'grub// mu tig gis ni rgyas pa la// dred po'i so yis gsad pa 'grub// de gnyis 'gyur ba bong ba'i so// sdang dang bskrad pa rnga
98b1(rgyud): mo'i so// ka sogs rnam dag sum bcu drug byis pa 'tsho byed dbang sogs la// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams bsres pas// bzhi yis lhag pa'i pad 'bras shing // lung tang dmar po bdun gcig/
98b2(rgyud): drug/ yang na tsan dan 'bru dgu 'am// rgya skar phyed pos grangs mnyam pas// lung tang nag pos rmongs byed nus// dbyangs dang gsal byed phyed sbyangs pas// ru rag sha ni mngon spyod la// de lnga'i cho ga
98b3(rgyud): shes pa yis// tshar gcad pan gdags las rnams spyad// gsang sngags yi ge'i 'khor lo ni// mgal me bzhin du bskor bar bya// de ltar dus bzhir bsgrub par 'gyur// des ni nye bar 'grub
98b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// rang nyid ye shes nag po yis// gdug pa 'dul bar bsams nas ni// las byed mgon po'i srog rtsa 'phrog/ de ltar bskul bas las la sbyor//
98b5(rgyud): gzas pa po de sgrol bar byed// gal te las la 'gyangs pa na// srog gi thigs pa blang ba dang // gsang sngags snying po go bzlog cing // lto ba dkrugs pa'i las byas na// shi sa bstan par 'gyur ba/
98b6(rgyud): ste srog ni dmar len byed par 'gyur// ma rungs 'dul ba'i las 'di dag/ sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba las// gzhan du byas na nyes par 'gyur// sbyin sreg dang ni mnan pa dang // de bzhin zer gyi
98b7(rgyud): las bya ba// gsad pa rang gshed gnad la dbab// de las myur bar rtags byung tshe// thugs dam bskang zhing gtor ma 'bul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang // rnal 'byor nar mar 'grub par 'gyur//
99a1(rgyud): dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ las nye bar sgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad
99a2(rgyud): par bya// dpal ldan lha mo 'khor dang bcas// nag mo mngon par 'byung ba yi// las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad// dam tshig gsang ba'i sngags pa yis// brag nag rtse mo rno ba yi// kha lhor bltas
99a3(rgyud): pa'i brag phug gam// gzhan yang ri bo'i zom mam rtse// shing gcig dur khrod ma mo'i gnas// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas mchog tu// maN+Dal dang ni mchod pa dang // gtor ma legs par
99a4(rgyud): bshams nas ni// sha cher bsregs spos phul nas kyang // bar chad bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// gru gsum khrag dang dug gis byug/ dug shing tshe ra ma can gyis rtsig/ gzhan yang ling
99a5(rgyud): ga byas pa la// mi bsad lcags kyu tri shU la// de yi lus la gdab par bya// tshil chen mar me zur gsum pa// btang nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la// dkyil 'khor gsum la legs gnas pa//
99a6(rgyud): ma hA kA la phyag bzhi pa// mdog nag khrag 'dzag me dpung dbus// zhal gcig spyan gsum 'bar ba ste// g.yas kyi dang po chu gri dang // 'og ma tri shU rtse gsum pa// g.yon gyi dang po sa mda'
99a7(rgyud): gzhu dang // gnyis pas mgo bo khrag 'dzag bsnams// dur khrod kyis brgyan sham thabs can// de yi g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// sha za gnyis ni gnas par bsam// las kun byed pa'i pho nyar
99b1(rgyud): bskul// dang po lha mo chen mo ni// me dbus gsang sngags las grub pa'i// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum shin tu sku mdog gnag / shin tu bajam zhing sgeg pa'i sra// g.yas kyi dang po/
99b2(rgyud): ral gri 'chang // 'og ma shag ti 'bar ba can// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'dzin// 'og ma kha T+wAM bsdams pa'o// ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes// mche gtsigs thod pa dug sbrul brgyan// glang po/
99b3(rgyud): stod yogs sngag sham dang // re lde nag po'i sham thabs gsol// bong bu g+ha dmar stengs ni ni// phyed krung 'bar bas bzhugs pa'o// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// ral gri ne'u le'i rtul pa
99b4(rgyud): 'dzin// dam tshig bskyed la ye shes dgug/ 'phrin las bcol bar bya ba'o// oM shI ya de bi kA li kA li ma hA kA li b+h+yo hUM/ oM ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha pA to si tri tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo dzaHma hA kA li de wI ka/
99b5(rgyud): rA li bi kra ta kA la ra tri tsaN+Da rU pi Ni hUM hUM phaT/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma hUM b+h+yaHoM ma hA kA li de wi gri h+Na ba li ta kha kha khA hi khA hi da ha da ha da ha da te/ ba tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya ma ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ kha hi hUM
99b6(rgyud): phaT/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // skyes pa grir shi'i snying khrag gis// nag po chen po'i gtor mar blugs// ma nyams grir shi'i baM blangs la// ma hA ru dra bstim nas ni// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su/
99b7(rgyud): bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// gan kyal bzhag la bsgral bar bya// de yi sha dang khrag dang ni// pags pa tshil bu rkang mar bcas// klad pa klad rgyas zhag dang ni// dbang po lnga dang don
100a1(rgyud): snying lnga// rus pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis// ye shes dag po chen po dang // dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// las kyi mgon po 'khor dang bcas/ po nya bran g.yog dur khrod gnas/
100a2(rgyud): DA ki'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang // de yi sha yi tshogs rnams kyis// nag po stong gi thugs dam bskang // de yi khrag dang chu ser gyis// ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang // de yi chu rgyus rus pa rkang /
100a3(rgyud): sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskung // mkha' 'gro lnga dang lha mo brgyad// de yi 'phrin las mgon po dang // sha za 'khor dang bcas la dbul// phung po bsgral ba'i tshogs kyis mchod// rnam shes
100a4(rgyud): bsgral ba ye shes bsgyur// mi bskyod pa yi zhing khams su// rgyal ba'i sras su skyed pa yin// rnal 'byor 'chi ba slu ba dang // bar chad thams cad zlog par byed// ma rungs bstan la sdang zhing
100a5(rgyud): 'tshe// sgrub la gnod na las 'di bya// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// de yi sha la sbyin sreg bya// tshal ni zhun chen mar me bya// klad rgyas thod pa'i rnga lpags bya// pags pa tshogs kyi gdan
100a6(rgyud): du bya bsregs pa'i rus pa tsha tsha bya// 'di ni mgon po 'khor bcas tshogs// mnyes par gyur cing thugs dam bskang / gzhan yang phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba rab tu bshad par
100a7(rgyud): bya'o / dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'phrin las kyi rnal 'byor dang rab tu ldan pas zhi ba'i las sgrub pa la na/ bil ba la sogs pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o// 'bras ldan gyi shing gang las rgyas pa'i las
100b1(rgyud): sgrub na stong phrag gis bya'o// khA Di ra'i shing dang dmar pa'i shing gis ni dbang gis sgrub na khri phrag gis bya'o// shin tu rtsub pa'i tsher ma dang ldan pa'i shing dag gis ni mngon spyod la 'bum phrag gis bya bar shis/
100b2(rgyud): seM bskrad pa la ni shing gi lo ma rlung mar byung ba'i ches la ma lhung bar blangs te/ gzugs par na bris nas yul gzhan gyi hor khral btags te gtang bar bya'o// gal te bzlog par 'dod na zhi ba'i
100b3(rgyud): sbyin sreg gi thal bas gtor zhing ba ser skya'i 'o mas lus bkrus na zhi bar byed do// rus phye sna tshogs pa la khrag blugs te gzugs brnyan bris la dgra bo de'i phyogs su gtor bas ni sha za chen pos
100b4(rgyud): 'jigs par byed do// yang na ce spyang gi sha la sbyin sreg byas te dur khrod du thal ba phyar nas/ lhag ma gzas pa po'i sgo la gtor nas btang na dur khrod kyi ce spyang gi tshogs rab tu 'du zhing dul sgo la sder mos
100b5(rgyud): 'brad par 'gyur ro// de lta bu lan gsum byas na ce spyang gis za bar 'gyur ro// gang du thog gis shi ba'i rus pa la rab tu bsngags te ri bong gi thod par bcug ste shing rkang gcig pa'i rtse mo la btags na/
100b6(rgyud): thog 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na de nyid kyi gzugs byas te de nyid rigs mthun pa'i rus pa rnyed na nyungs kar gyis brdeg cing / pha mes kyi dur khrid du grib so lpags pa dang sras te gtor mas
100b7(rgyud): mnan cing dong brus par sbas la/ ro bsregs pa'i g.yam pas mnan na rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs byas la/ de la dug dang til mar gyis byugs la 'bras phub kyi me la rab
101a1(rgyud): tu bsro zhing sngags brdegs na rims tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur ro// gzhan pa la ni spra tshal gyis byugs shing tsher ma'i rigs mang po btab par byas nas dus ma yin pa'i
101a2(rgyud): rlung la phyar yul gzhan du gshis ngan du 'chi bar byed do// mtsho nang gi nyes pa bzung ste gro ga la ling ga bris pa de bag zan gyi gzugs dang bcas pa la rab tu bsngags te slar btang na chu grir myur du 'chi
101a3(rgyud): bar byed do// bse shing la ling ga bsregs te sgo khang du sbas na spangs pa chen pos btab par 'gyur ro// gal te grog mkhar gyis sa la gzugs byas te/ mchod rten ring pa'i 'og tu 'byung po'i nyi ba la
101a4(rgyud): mnan nas ro g.yam gyis kha bcad na ni 'khor dang bcas pa rus pa med cing rab tu gnon par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi zag pa gang yin pa dang phung shul nas sa blangs te gzugs brnyan byas la gnas kyi
101a5(rgyud): sar rus pa'i phur bus btab na ni 'on pa dang // long ba dang / yan lag nyams pa dang / lkug par 'gyur te/ klu gnas pa'i sar sbas na dbang po nyams pa nyid byed do// gal te sa phyogs der char
101a6(rgyud): mi 'bab par gyur na ka ra bI ra'i shing btsugs la/ ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma gtor bar byas pas klu gnas pa'i sar song nas/ rang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bka' sgo na char chen po 'bab par byed do//
101a7(rgyud): bal po se'u shing dang 'brug shing du bcas pa g.yab cing klu gzir na char 'bab cing sprin sad par byed do// gal te sprin dral bar 'dod na rlung lha'i gtor ma byas la rlung gi ba dan g.yab par bya'o// khrag sna
101b1(rgyud): tshogs pa nyungs kar nyungs nag tu sbyar te klu gnas pa'i sar sbyin sreg tu byas nas bzlas pa'i thun bar du gtor na ser ba mod la 'bab par 'gyur ro// nyungs kar nyungs nag thal chen la rab tu
101b2(rgyud): bsngags nas gtor na ser ba med la gcod par byed do// dra du ra'i shing la sbyin sreg byas na smyo bar 'gyur ro// nim pa'i shing gis ni rengs par byed do// me tog ban d+ha ri ka dang pa la sha yis 'gug
101b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas na gang la'ang gso bar byed do// a ru ra'i sbyin sreg gis myur du zhi bar byed do// ma he'i 'o mas bkrus na bcings pa thams cad grol lo//
101b4(rgyud): a ka ru'i shing 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i shing dang gcig tu bsregs te mtshor dor na rgyas par 'gyur ro// glang po che'i rus pa la gi wang dang bcas pa'i glang sna can gyi me tog dang ser ba'i rigs kyi/
101b5(rgyud): me tog dang bcas pas kun dga' ra bar sbyin sreg byed na 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byed do// de dag thams cad sngags dang bcas pa'i nus pas 'grub bo// drang song gi rus pa ri bo'i rtser
101b6(rgyud): sbas te 'bra snas mchod pa byas te chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa mthong ba'i sar spyod yul du gyur na rigs thams cad rab tu 'phel bar byed do// a mra'i 'bras bu dang / shing thog ji tsin ta ka dang / dzu lu
101b7(rgyud): dang / dzi ba ka rnams la snod du bkang ste gtor ma byas nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du phul na ni gnod sbyin gyis 'byor pa thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro// pur bus gdab cing nyungs kar thal chen gyis
102a1(rgyud): mtshams bcad par gyur na gnod pa thams cad las srung bar 'gyur ro// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rab tu byed pa
102a2(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shin tu gsang ba bla na med// nag po mngon par 'byung ba yi// las kyi dngos grub cho ga
102a3(rgyud): bshad// dpal nag po chen po'i phyogs kyi 'phrin las kyi lha mo la// shar gyi lha mo 'phrog mas 'gugs pa'i las byed pa'o// lho'i lha mo glang snams 'ching ba'i las byed do// nub kyi lnga
102a4(rgyud): mo ral pa can gyis sdom pa'i las byed do// byang gi lha mo sa'i gtsug gis myos shing dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// lha mo bya rgod kyi mgo bo can mas rengs pa'i las byed do// stug gi mgo bo can/
102a5(rgyud): mas bskrad pa'i las byed do// phag rgod kyi mgo bo can mas sbyor 'jug pa'i las byed do// ce spyang gi gdong gis dbye ba'i las byed do// khyi gdong mas ni rnam par rmongs pa'i las byed do//
102a6(rgyud): kha'i gdong gis ni rnam par gnon pa'i las byed do// 'ug po'i gdong gis ni khrag drang ba'i las byed do// khyung gi gdong gis ni brgyal ba'i las byed do// gzhan yang grong khyer dkrug pa'i las/
102a7(rgyud): bya bar 'dod na tho ga'am shing shun la dbyangs dang gsal byed spel zhing go bzlog tu bris la// bsnol bar byas la rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya gang gi gzugs dang ming spel gyis 'khrul 'khor
102b1(rgyud): bzlog tu bris la bsnol bar bya ste// rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya dag gi gzugs dang ming spel gyi gnas de myur du bskyod pa rlung dang / me dang / chu bsnol ma rnam par 'khrug par byed do// de nas yang
102b2(rgyud): kha sbar dbye ba'i las ngag gris pha rol gyi sde dag gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dbye bas phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul nas lan bdun myur du 'grub
102b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gal te klu'i dug gis gzas pa po 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod na ti tha la'i 'bru la byas pa'i dug sbrul gyi gzugs mgo gsum pa lce brgyad pa 'am/ ci rigs su byas pa de'i kha'i
102b4(rgyud): nang du gang la dmigs pa'i rdzas de ming dang bcas pas klu gnas pa'i phyogs su btang na sbrul gyis 'dzin pa'i las byed do// ma he dang rta'i 'khrul 'khor 'byung po'i nyi ma la sa ti tsa'i khu bas
102b5(rgyud): bris te// de nyid kyi sha khrag dang bcas pas bskul bar gyur na ni shin tu 'khrug cing 'bye bar 'gyur ro// yang na bi ta na ro pa la traM zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i thabs kyis bgegs chen po bsgral ba'i
102b6(rgyud): gzugs la brten nas cho ga phyag mtshan dag btsugs te las su bya'o// yang nas nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'i tshogs kha phyir bltas pa dang nang du bltas pa dag bkar de/ pha rol rgol
102b7(rgyud): ba'i phyogs su bskyal ni ni myur du yul dang bcas pa rlag par byed do// sha za chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jigs pa kha gdangs pa nag po gri gug dang zhags pa thogs pa mdun du dmigs la/ phur bus
103a1(rgyud): btab pa dang bcas pa'i thabs kyis pha rol gyi dpung g.yo ba dang bcas pa zlog par byed do// gtor ma chen po byas te yang gtor na g.yul bshams pa las rnam par rgyal bar/
103a2(rgyud): byed do// ri rab kyi gzugs la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bkod de 'phrin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas btab na g.yul chen po las rgyal bar byed do// dpag bsam gyi shing /
103a3(rgyud): ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las a sho ka 'am bi Ta ka'i shing la brten nas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongs su rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byed do// rdo rje bya khyung gi phyag rgya bcas la/ des klu non
103a4(rgyud): par byas nade nyid kha dog dkar por gyur pa'i 'jam pa'i spyod kyis 'dul ba la/ nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thabs kyis dkrugs pas klu'i gnas thams cad du ltas chen po drug byung bas thams
103a5(rgyud): cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa snyam byed nas/ myur bar 'ongs te bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun chen pos rab tu gang bar byed par 'gyur ro// gang du skyes pa
103a6(rgyud): g.yul dor bsad pa'i mgal dum dang lag ngar gyi rus pa la dpal nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan ji lta bar byas la bskyed pa dang bstim ste bzlas pa bya/ dben par sbas nas gsol ba btab na
103a7(rgyud): gang 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sa kun la'ang srung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'das pa la sogs pa'i don shes pa dang / de'i mdun du khrus byas te nyal na lung ston pa 'am/ dge mi dge gsal
103b1(rgyud): bar ston par 'gyur ro/ yang na dur khrod kyi rasas su dang nag po la'ang rung ste/ dam tshig dang ldan pas bris te/ mchod pa dang gtor ma ldan pas rab tu gnas par byas na su byin rlabs dang ldan/
103b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de nyid kyang rin po che las byas nas de'i mdun du gsol ba btab na zla ba drug gis nges par yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na nag po chen po'i gsang sngags sngon du byas te shes
103b3(rgyud): rab yongs su 'dzin pa khri phrag gcig bzlas na thos pa'i gzungs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / blo yongs su dag pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// bsrung bas srung zhing bcings
103b4(rgyud): pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo// gang du sgrub pa po phun sum tshogs pas sku gsung thugs yon tan 'byin las kyi rten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas na dngos grub thams
103b5(rgyud): cad 'grub pa dang bar chad thams cad las bzlog par 'gyur ba yin no// khyad par du'ong gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang dus thams cad du ye shes kyi nag po chen
103b6(rgyud): bos rjes su skyong ba dang / rgyang ring po nas kyang nges par gzigs par mdzad do// 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang / tshe dang / dpal rab tu ster cing mi zad pa'i
103b7(rgyud): ye shes thob par byed pa dang / nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i stobs kyis rgyu zhing / bdud kyi ris kyi phyogs ma lus pa pham zhing skrag ste 'gas pa tsam byed par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i
104a1(rgyud): mthar thug par 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gang gis gtum pa dang / dpa' ba dang / drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi shigs par 'gyur ba med
104a2(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis khyab par rgyu ba'o// gnas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / pho nya'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma dang / sha za'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dbang
104a3(rgyud): phyug tu 'gyur ro// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis kyang 'phrin las thogs pa med par 'grub par byed do// zhing skyong chen po dang nye ba'i zhing skyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi po dag gis
104a4(rgyud): kyang 'phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa'o// gdul dka' ba ma lus pa'i 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar byed do// gang du rgyud 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
104a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / sems pa dang / de bzhin du gang gnas pa dang / rnal 'byor du gang gnas pa la nye bar skyob par byed do// nye bar dgongs pas mkhyen par 'gyur ro// dpal mgon po chen po dngos
104a6(rgyud): grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u me nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsung ba mngon par 'byung
104a7(rgyud): ba'i gnas// drang srong thub pas yang dag bstan// nges par gsang ba 'dzin gyur pa// rgyal ba yon tan 'byung ba'i gter// ye shes mgon po chen po dang // las kyi mgon po dum
104b1(rgyud): bcas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo ni// 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste// sbrul ldan lam 'di 'dzin pa gang // nga yis lung bstar gyur pa yin// gdug pa rnams ni gzung ba'i phyir// mkhas/
104b2(rgyud): pas snying rje bskyed nas ni// cho ga kun mchog gis rab sgrub// bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de// de bzhin bdag de dam pa'i bdag/ dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas// 'di la the rlom mi
104b3(rgyud): byas ka sun 'byin pas ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rnam dag rnam pa can sems kyi// rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das// ma rungs pa ni gang dag gis// skye bo bcings par gyur pa gang // de nyid thabs
104b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa yis// srid pa'i bcings las grol bar 'gyur// de ltar grub pa'i lam brten cing // thun mong khyad par 'grub par 'gyur// dus bzhi dag tu gtor ma 'bul// bgegs
104b5(rgyud): med bsod nams 'phel byed pa'o// 'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal ye shes kyi mgon po lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ sha chen po/
104b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ oM ba li ma Ni ra hUM dza/ rAk+Sha Ni rakA Ni rak+Sha mi/ kha la khA hi khA hi kreh+Na gre h+NA ba la~M/ ma hA bi ShaN/ pra swa d+ha ya pra swA d+ha ya/ su lu Ta lA bAT/ kha kha wa tsiH/
104b7(rgyud): A ya / sarnangs nas rba/ la ri ba d+hi bral sa na seMn/ mi tshwazhes pas mtshan byed nagator ma sreg sus dang bcas pa dbul bar bya'o// mtha sa cag sa ma la ni su lems sa/
105a1(rgyud): ma hA kA la bud d+ha dzaM/ pra ti to si/ ka ra ya ka ra ya/ pra duSh+TAn/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ shI g+h+raM/ dra ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hu ra hu ra/ ma raM hUM phaT/ i
105a2(rgyud): de ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ shrI sar+b+ba oM AHhUM/ dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang bu grub pa dang gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / dpal
105a3(rgyud): mgon po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa/ bstan pa 'dzin pa/ bstan pa skyong ba/ bstan pa bsrung nges pa/ gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar
105a4(rgyud): byed pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi snying por gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no// rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA
105a5(rgyud): biN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mkhas pa chen po khe rgad 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
105a6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ be badz+ra tan nganA ma/ bad skad du/ tse'i rdo rje zhes bya brgyad kyi rgyal po// kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sang bdug gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
105a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i blag la bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / zugs /
105b1(rgyud): nga brje brnyan pasung pa las chos shin tugs nga / dam pamam ldan 'das kyis bu 'phrul du/ skye m+bu byung rgyumasems dang sems da rgyun du/ rang bang ba sna
105b2(rgyud): lags so legs so// rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam chog sems dpa' chen po snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rtson cig/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// gang phyir
105b3(rgyud): sems dpa' lags// ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags// gang gis dam tshig sems dpa' lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis
105b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod// sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa// 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// ye shes
105b5(rgyud): chen po'i ros gang ba// sems dpa' chen por brjod par bya// rtag tu dam chog la spyod phyir// dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ming bsdus pa ni rje
105b6(rgyud): lta bu// gang gis kye yi rdo rje lags// he yi rnam pas ci zhig bshad// badz+ra yis kyang de bzhin ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// he ni snying rje chen po nyid// badz+ra'ang shes rab brjod
105b7(rgyud): par bya// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang // don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang // rengs par byed dang skrod pa nyid// sde rengs
106a1(rgyud): khyed dang dzu spyo dang / jis rigs pa la 'byor ma'i// bskye d+ha gnas dung byed d+ha dang // dod d+he stegs nas shes dang // sa rnams pa rna 'byung bas+ho//
106a2(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rgyu// dang por gcig ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing // dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur// de yongs shes pas grol ba yin/
106a3(rgyud): dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas// dngos po sgom 'gyur shes rab can// dngos po med pa yongs shes pas// de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya// lus la ye shes chen po gnas// rtog pa tham/
106a4(rgyud): cad yang dag spangs// dngos po kun la khyab pa po// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags// bcom ldan 'das/
106a5(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te// byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa'o// de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso mo
106a6(rgyud): ste brkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma'o// brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis// thabs kyis rom yang dag gnas// kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par sbyangs/
106a7(rgyud): rkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste// ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing // shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa// de ni kun 'dar mar rab grags// mi phyed ma dang // 'phra gzugs ma dang / rtse ba ma dang / g.yon pa
106b1(rgyud): ma dang / thung ngu ma dang / rus sbal skyes ma dang / sgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug ma dang / ma mo dang / mtshan mo dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / tsha ba ma dang / btung ma dang / kun 'dar ma dang /
106b2(rgyud): rom dang / gzhol ma dang / rengs ma dang / shin tu gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang / rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sdug gum dang / grub ma dang / 'tshed ma dang / de bzhin du yid bzang ma dang / sum
106b3(rgyud): bskor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud bral ma'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das
106b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// yang na thabs ni thams cad gyis// dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag/ sdom pa'i dbye ba'ang
106b5(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ A li kA li ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / shes rab dang / thabs so// chos dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs so// e baM ma ya ni/
106b6(rgyud): e yi rnam pa lha mo spyan// baM ga rnam pa bdag mar brjod// ma ni lha mo gos dkar mo// ya yi rnam pa sgrol mar brjod// sprul pa'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chos kyi
106b7(rgyud): lo la 'dab sa brgyad dang ka longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma bcu drug dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis so// 'khor lo'i grongs kyi rim pas rnam par gnags/
107a1(rgyud): skad cig ma bzhi ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang //
107a2(rgyud): kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// de kho na nyid bzhi ni/ bdag gi de kho na dang / sngags kyi de kho na dang / lha'i de kho na dang / ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do// dga' ba bzhin/ dga' ba dang /
107a3(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// sde pa bzhi ni/ gnas bstan pa dang / thams cad yod par smra ba dang / kun gyis bkur ba dang / dge
107a4(rgyud): 'dun phal chen no// rdza ba dang / nyi ma dang / A li dang / kA li dang / 'pho ba bcu drug dang / dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / thun tshod bzhi ste/ de ltar thams cad
107a5(rgyud): bzhi'o// lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing // spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te// bsregs pas ri bong can haM 'dzag/ rdo rje rigs kyi len/
107a6(rgyud): skye dang po'o// / sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// oM a kA ro mu kha~M sar+b+ba d+harmA d+h+waM/ Ad+ha nuta ban+na tAta oM AHhUM phaT swAhA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngag/
107a7(rgyud): so// zlum dz+ra kha dz+dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon no// mi ra ba pi tsu ba rba hU~M hU~M d+ha phaT kyi rdo rje'i seng po'o// sngags thams cad kyi rkang par dang po sa gyi rnam pa dang / mthar/
107b1(rgyud): ni sra dang / druban gyi rnam pa ni nang du gzugs// oM ya ka can 'a pa lagasar+b+ba/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so// a ya/ i nI/ s+yA s+ya/ ra na la / a/ a so/ a/ rnal 'byor ma
107b2(rgyud): rnams kyi sa bon no// oM trai lo k+Sha k+She ba hu~M hu~M hu~M phaT swAhA/ phyag gnyis pa'i'o// oM t+pal dz+wa la b+h+yo tsu hu hU~M phaT swAhA/ phyag bzhi pa'i'o// mo ki Ti kI TI badz+ra tsu tsu tsa phaT swAhA/ phyag drug
107b3(rgyud): ba'i'o// oM AHhU~M/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs sbyin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hu hU~M phaT swAhA/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM hUM swAhA/ rengs par byed pa'i'o//
107b4(rgyud): ma snang / dbang du byung ba'i'o// mkhes na/ skrod par byed pa'o// mdzA swA/ spang bar byed pa'i'i// mi nusaH/ mngon gyud kyi'o// man+tas / 'dugs par byed pa'i'o// b+h+yas/
107b5(rgyud): gsod par byed pa'i 'o// oM ku ru kul+le d+hIHswA hA DA ku ru kul+le'i sngags so// a phu'i rnam pas mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngas ni thugs/ me tog nag pos ni mchod
107b6(rgyud): 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byug/ glang po che'i chang gis ni mgo bo byug/ kham por kha sbyar du ni gnag/ ba nag mo'i 'ams ni dgang / gnon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud paswa ni dkri/ rlung
107b7(rgyud): gi phyogs su rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der gzhag go// de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste/ dur khrod kyi sol bas ni rdul tshon nag po/ skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni rdul tshon
108a1(rgyud): dkar po/ ljong ros kyis ni rdul tshon ser po/ dur khrod kyi so phag gis ni rdul tshon dmar po// rkun ma'i lo ma dang / skyes nga'i rus pa'i phye ma dag gis ni rdul tshon
108a2(rgyud): ljang sku ste/ rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so// dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya ste/ de'i dbus su mtha' yas mnan pa'i kye'i rdo rje
108a3(rgyud): zhal brgyad pa/ zhabs bzhi pa phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba/ 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o// de nas slob dpon gyi nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems
108a4(rgyud): kyis dben pa'i gnas su sngags bzlas ste/ oM g+hu ru g+hu ru g+hu Du g+hu Tu na ma sa ma sa/ g+ha TA g+ha Ta/ g+ho Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/ a nan+ta k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye he he ru ru ki sap+ta bA tA la ga tA na nA/
108a5(rgyud): gA nA kaR+Sha ya baR+Sha ya/ gar+b+ha ya gar+b+hA ya/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHhUM hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog la bzla ste char 'bab bo// gal te mi 'bab na de'i
108a6(rgyud): tshe mgo mardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so// char dbab pa zhes bya ba'i tshi ga'o// sprin dral ba bshad de/ drung khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shing dral te/ oM AR+tha ya sh+ma shAn
108a7(rgyud): pri yA ya tsU hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o// pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir kha Ti ka'i sgrub pa bshad de/ kha Ti ka dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / ku b+hA ra ts+tshin+da dang lhan cig bdag/
108b1(rgyud): sa bya bya'o// sngags na ma bajug rig brdul dun rtsub na/ dngas grub kyi na du ba zlas shing sngon du bsten pa 'bras bya smra te/ de bsgrubs la ril ba ti gags kyi sa'i par gyur
108b2(rgyud): zhing bsor nas bcag na dgra thams cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro// rdo rje rdzi gug gi cho ga'o// lha rnams dgas par 'dod pas thig le bsgrubs te/ tshangs pa'i sa bon d+ha la la bsgrubs
108b3(rgyud): nas ku bA ra sIn+d+ra dang bsred la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyed pa dang btag cing btags nas dgra sta byas te/ de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzlas te/ oM badz+ra kuSh+Ta ra pA Da ya pA DA sa dz+rar+d+ha
108b4(rgyud): hUM phaT swAhA/ bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gas so// lha dgas pa'i cho ga'o// tsha bas gdung bar bya bar 'dod pas/ at+pa'i lo mA la dug dang / ske tshe dang
108b5(rgyud): tsi tra ka'i khu bas dgra bo'i ming bri zhing 'bras phub kyi me la gdungs te sngags khri bzlas so// oM he badz+ra dz+wa ra dzA ra sha truM b+hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ tsha ba'i cho ga'o// khri bzlas pas 'grub bo//
108b6(rgyud): chang skyug par bya bar 'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte bar yaM gi rnam pa sgom zhing / maM gi rnam par gyur pa las chang lte bar bsgoms te skyug par byed par bltas na chang skyug go// rab tu myos ma dbang
108b7(rgyud): du bya bar 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i brgyad la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgos nas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing / ka kA ma tsi ka'i khu bso thig le byas nas sngags
109a1(rgyud): bzas te/ oM a mu kaM mets+tshi tha si thab tu snang / khri yis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zla ba dang rim dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sA lu btags pa'i 'gyur ba la zlab dang
109a2(rgyud): ma byas nas rdo rje'i tshul gzhug cing sngags bzlas te/ oM badz+ra mAr+b+ba mA tsa la mA tsA la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha he badz+ra ya hUM hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi ma dang zla ba yang dag par gnas shing rkyen
109a3(rgyud): mtshan bye brag med par 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o// oM na grA na grA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dus ma yin pa'i dus su don sgrub pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma'i mig
109a4(rgyud): dag la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas/ me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod cing snyan gsan dbab bo// bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa'i snga ba'i dus su bum pa la so/
109a5(rgyud): pa gzhag cing 'bru mar dang a lak+ta'i khu ba la sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngag go// de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i a lak+ta'i khu bas sngags pa'i mthe bong rgan po
109a6(rgyud): la bskus nas/ 'bru mar gyis kyang thugs la/ gzhon nu ma la bstan te/ nga'i rdzas sus khyer smros/ de la des smras pa/ che ge mo zhes bya bas khyer ro// rdo rje skar ma'o// be Tu yA ban+du
109a7(rgyud): zhes brjod na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro// mahA mAr+b+ba zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro// til+li yA til+li yA zhes brjod na bsre 'bros par 'gyur ro// i li mi li bu phuH zhes brjod na sprul
109b1(rgyud): 'bros par 'gyur ro// nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag gis lag pa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ma dang / dkar mo dang / chu ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / bdag med pa dang
109b2(rgyud): sa spyod ma dang / mkha' spyod ma'i rnal 'byor las rengs par byed pa la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis byed do// sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha'i
109b3(rgyud): le'u bshad par bya'o// dang por byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis par snying rje rnam bsgom zhing // gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang // kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so// yang ni sdong
109b4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub ste// gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu// gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs// bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod// re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas// nyi der hUM byung
109b5(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang // gur bcing ba yang rnam par sgom pa nyid// dang por ro ni rnam bsgom pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod// de stengs rnal 'byor
109b6(rgyud): pa gnas nas// he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom// rang gi snying khar re pha bsgom// de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor// der ni hUM gi rnam pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can// hUM
109b7(rgyud): las byung ba'i rdo rje ni// kha dong nag po 'jigs chen po// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par// yang ni hUM gi de nyid bsgom// hUM gi rnam par gyur bltas nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom//
110a1(rgyud): rdo rje skye ba nag po che// 'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog/ yangan sngo dang nyi ma'i mdog/ dad pas nges par rnam par bsgom// nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni// rdo rje skyeg
110a2(rgyud): snying rje che// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod// dkar mo ri dgas mtshan ma 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod// ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/
110a3(rgyud): g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing // puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'i lag/ de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin// gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdung // 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas//
110a4(rgyud): g.yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid// A li zla ba kA li nyi// sa bon nang du son gyur pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// nam mkha'i dkyil
110a5(rgyud): 'khor khyab pa yi// rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro// bsdus nas snying kar bkug pa na// yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur// sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog ban du dmar po'i
110a6(rgyud): spyan dang ldan// skra ser gyen du 'khril ba dang // phyag rgya rdzas ni rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo rnam nor bu dang // lag gdug dang ni sa rags nyid// sangs rgyas wa ni rnam dag ga/
110a7(rgyud): rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags// sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo mo tshul// g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang // g.yon pa nas kyang laT+wA~M ga/ g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid// rmugi ye shes 'don pa'i bdag/
110b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bsor nas// dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis// dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod// phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par/
110b2(rgyud): rgyal ba rnam par dag pa ste// gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang // sku mdog dang / hUM las byung ba'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/
110b3(rgyud): de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdorje/ phyag lhag ma dag gis shes rab la 'khyud pa/ shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can no// phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa// gson/
110b4(rgyud): dmar ba ka g.yas zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu/ dang po sngon po'o// gcer bu gong du brjod pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang
110b5(rgyud): na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na dril bu/ phyag g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyoms par 'jug pa/
110b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar shes rab ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o// lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
110b7(rgyud): de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rang gi snying khar sa bon bsam mo// sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas/ des khams
111a1(rgyud): gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la/ ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// oM a b+hiShits+tshan+tu b+hA sarba ta thA ga ta zhes
111a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur ba ni me tog gi char 'bab par
111a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rnga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gur kum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// rdo rje'i glu spyan la sogs pa rnams kyis
111a4(rgyud): blang bar bya'o// dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'dis ni he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do// thun gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa rnam par sgoms nas ladra/
111a5(rgyud): telha'i gzugs su gzhag go// dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba po// sgra med thos pa po
111a6(rgyud): yang med// dri med snom pa po yang med// ro med myong ba po yang med// reg med reg pa po yang med// sems med sems las byung ba'ang med// skyed byed ma dang sring mo nyid// rnal
111a7(rgyud): 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// gar ma chos ma rdo rje ma// gdol ma de bzhin bram ze mo// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// de nyid rigs pas rtag tu mchod// ji ltar bya bar mi 'gyur bar/
111b1(rgyud): rab tu 'bad pas bsten pa nyid// ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang // sa spyod ma yis sdug bsngal byed// rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba// thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya// rdo rje 'dis ni
111b2(rgyud): bdag pa nyid// des phyag rgyar brjod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma de bzhin las// de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen nyid// snying rje chen po dam pa yi// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod// rdo rje'i phyag
111b3(rgyud): rgyu gsung mo nyid// de bzhin pad+ma'i gar ma nyid// las ni chos mar rab tu bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram ze mo// rin chen gdol mar shes par bya// phyag rgya lhur ni rnam par
111b4(rgyud): nges la 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing // de bzhin sngar yang gshegs pa nyid// 'dis ni
111b5(rgyud): shes rab rigs pa yis// de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya// rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing // mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lta// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// phyi nas/
111b6(rgyud): rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang // phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni// rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sgom pa
111b7(rgyud): po med sgom pa'ang med// lha med sngags kyang yong ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas// rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang // rin chen dpag med/
112a1(rgyud): sems dpa' bo// tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang / thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod// tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// 'jug phyir khyab 'jug
112a2(rgyud): brjod par bya// rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de/ bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas// gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid/
112a3(rgyud): lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya// b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod// dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon//
112a4(rgyud): mongs la sogs bdud// bcom phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya// gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa yi// shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya// gang phyir skal ba ston pa yi// shes rab sring mo
112a5(rgyud): zhes bya nyid// btso blag ma dang bu mo dang // gar mkhan ma yang brjod par bya// sems can thams cad 'tshed pa'i phyir// btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod// yon tan 'jo phyir shes
112a6(rgyud): rab ni/ bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya// snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir// shes rab gar mar brjod par bya// gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa// de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya// A li kA li
112a7(rgyud): rab brtags pas// brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad// rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid// nyed phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya// lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin// sor mo nyed pa'ang
112b1(rgyud): de bzhin no// gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni// gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no// ji skar pa las pa de thob pa// de yi bde b.rang shes bapa'// bde ba gang gis 'chi ba 'di// dmi
112b2(rgyud): bde ba bsam gtan brjod// de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// sdod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid// gang gis dngos grub mthar
112b3(rgyud): 'gro ba// kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub brgyas// sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa// rna ba dgal rnacha bzang // spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin// lag pa dag la lag gdub nyid// rked pa la/
112b4(rgyud): yang ska rags nyid// rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo// lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin par rus pa'i 'phreng ba ste// bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed
112b5(rgyud): de he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa// rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag/ kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba
112b6(rgyud): mtshon mi bya// shong gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang // yang na dben pa'ang bas mtha' ru// sgom pa bzang por brjod par bya// cung zad drod ni thob pa na//
112b7(rgyud): gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas// gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na// 'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can// rdo rje
113a1(rgyud): bu mo 'di khyer nas// spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na// rang 'dod lnga yi rigs kyis bya// yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba khyang
113a2(rgyud): chub sa bon gdab pa dang // sbyang ba yis ni gzung bar bya// gal te dga' bas glu blang ste// de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no// gal te dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste// de
113a3(rgyud): tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar// yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa// rna che'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med// mgul gyi 'phreng ba rin chen bdag
113a4(rgyud): lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod// ska rags la ni don yod gnas// kha T+wAM ga gzugs shes rab ste// thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid// zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa// glu ni
113a5(rgyud): rnam dag sngags su gnas// gar ni bsgom pa byas pa nyid// de yi phyir na gru dang gar// yo gis rtag tu rtag tu byas// sman ni rnam par gza' ba ste// chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid// rga
113a6(rgyud): shis zil gyis mi non cing // rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin// rkun ma'i sgra las cod pan byas// de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas
113a7(rgyud): rnam par 'dzin// thod pa sor lnga pa yi tshad/ byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed// thabs dang shes rab ring bzhin las// swa yi ska rigs nyes bskor nyid// thal ba ste yi mchod byar/
113b1(rgyud): thogs// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzid// cang te'u skra ni bzlas pa ste// kha T+wA~M ga sgom shes rab nyid// rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa yis// 'di dag bzlas dang skom pa yin// pad ma dang /
113b2(rgyud): rmongs dang 'jigs dang khro// ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang // bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas// the tsom med par spyod pa bya// lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni// phyi nas spyod pa
113b3(rgyud): yang dag spyad// sal dang skal min rnam spyad pas// de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// gza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'o// yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog byer//
113b4(rgyud): zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o// bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang // de bzhin btung dang btung min nyid// bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// dngos grub rnyed/
113b5(rgyud): pa'i slob ma gang // yang dag ye shes snang ba po// mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir// grub pas bla ma mngon phyag btsal// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i
113b6(rgyud): 'bras bu nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje che// sbyin sreg mchog sbyin dka' thub 'das// sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam tshig sdom las/
113b7(rgyud): rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed// nges par sngon du lha min gang // brgya byin lta bu yin na yang // de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu/
115a1(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya// rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa// gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med// spyod pa'i le'u ste drug
115a2(rgyud): pa'o// de nas ts+tsho ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o// gang gis spun dang sring mor yang // the tsom med par shes par bya// gang zhig sor mo gcig sngon dang // gnyis
115a3(rgyud): kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin// g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs pa las// bskur gyi phyag rgyar rnam par shes// gang zhig srin lag ster ba la// de yi mthe'u chung rnam par sbyin// gang
115a4(rgyud): zhig gung mo stor pa la// de yi mdzub mo rnam par sbyin// gang zhig srin lag ston pa la// de yi mgrin pa rab tu bstan// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de yi rtse gsum rab tu bstan//
115a5(rgyud): gang zhig ru ma ston pa la// de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig so na ston pa la// de yi kha ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la// gtsug pud dgrol bar brjod par bya//
115a6(rgyud): gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la// de yi brgya pa ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la// lnga yis rnam par rtse bar bya// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// dam tshig gis ni rnam par
115a7(rgyud): dbye/ de la rnal 'byor mas smras pa// e mabu ni snying rje che// gal te 'phreng ba lag ston na// 'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin// 'phreng ba mngon par gtad byas na// dam tshig la gnas
115b1(rgyud): brtul zhugs bzang // de la phyi rol zhes 'dug/ bzang po'i spyod yul gnas pa ni// de la 'dra bar rnal 'byor mas// gang spras de ltar thams cad bya// kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i
115b2(rgyud): gnas du lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang // ts+tshan+do nye ba'i tsAn+do dang // de bzhin 'du ba nye 'du ba//
115b3(rgyud): 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid// 'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya// kye
115b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas nI dzA lan d+ha rar bshad// de bzhin du ni u Di nyid// gnas ni ko lA gi rI nyid// de bzhin
115b5(rgyud): du ri kA rI nyid// nye gnas ma la wa zhes brjod// sin d+hu na gar nyid do// zhing ni mum+bu nir bshad de// zhing ni byed pa'i grangs nyid do// de wi ko Ta de bzhin zhing // zhing ni lcags pa'i grangs
115b6(rgyud): nyid do// nye zhing ku lu ta zhes brjod// de bzhin arbu ta nyid dang // b+ha yi mchod sbyin khra ba'i ri// nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o// ts+tshan+do ha ri ke la dang // lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang /
115b7(rgyud): lam pa kA dang kAny+dzi nyid// de bzhin sau raSh+Ta nyid do// nye ba'i ts+tshan+do ka ling ka/ gser dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni// kong ka NA yang nye tsAn+dor// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// 'thung
116a1(rgyud): / da myong bye dang lang/ lung rdzogs gnas pa// tsa tra da ko sA la/ bin d+ha gzhon nu'i grong khyer ro// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// lte ba'i 'thung gcod de nye ba'o// dur khrod rab son/
116a2(rgyud): dge 'dun dang // dur khrod rgya mtsho'i 'gram nyid do// skyed tshal ra ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram// nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma rgyud kye rdo rje
116a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi legs 'du ba// nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya// kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yi dgas zla phyed bcu
116a4(rgyud): bzhi dang // de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshan bsnun nyid// lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya// 'bad pas snying rje skyed pa yis// gsad par bya bar brjod pa nyid//
116a5(rgyud): snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid// thams cad gdug par gzhug pa ste// cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya// de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid// nyin mo bcom/
116a6(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya// mi bya cung zad yod ma yin// rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin// 'di la mi bsam yod ma yin// bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med//
116a7(rgyud): ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan// de bzhin bdag nyid nga mchog nyid// 'di ltar sems pani 'byor bdag/ bza' dang btung ba la sogs spyang// yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang // tshig
116b1(rgyud): rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid// he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas// de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya yin// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni tshogs dang /
116b2(rgyud): bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi// shi na mkhas pas bza' bar bya// sems can de de'i dbang du 'gyur/
116b3(rgyud): brda dang gnas gtan la bab pa'i le'u sde bdun pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// nam mkha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam// dbus su
116b4(rgyud): rnam par sgom pa ni// 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// 'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon// ji ltar rigs par byin za dang // lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang //
116b5(rgyud): ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'ang // chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo nyid// 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// ze'u 'bru lngas ni gcig 'gyur te// gru gsum gyi ni phyi mar brjod/
116b6(rgyud): de dbus shi ba bco lnga yi// gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam// de yi steng du zla ba yin// zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid// phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan// gnyis 'dus pa
116b7(rgyud): las bde chen po// A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas// kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do// zla ba nyi ma 'dus pa las// dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags// zla ba mi long
117a1(rgyud): ye shes ldan// bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni// so sor rtog par brjod par bya// thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid/
117a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste// mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa yis// rnam pa lnga po sgom pa nyid// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan// yi ge las
117a3(rgyud): byung gong bu la// hUM phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par sgom// phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba
117a4(rgyud): chu shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'di ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// A li shes rab kA li thabs// 'di las dkar mo la
117a5(rgyud): sogs pa// kha dog dbye bas so so yin// re zhig nang gi 'phar ma la// rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// dbang por/
117a6(rgyud): rdo rje gshin rje dkar// chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma// phyi rol gyi ni 'phar ma la// dkar mo chom rkun ro langs
117a7(rgyud): ma g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI// ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyad pa Tom+b+hi nI ru brjod// 'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid// mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis//
117b1(rgyud): snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas// lha mo thams cad kha dog gnag/ drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba dang // lag par gri gug thod pas khyab// 'khor lo rnam
117b2(rgyud): mgul rgyan dang // lag par lag gdub ska rags ni// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag pa'o// ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par
117b3(rgyud): bshad// lag pa gcig ni thod pas bral// g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pas kha T+wAM gnyid do// stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing // ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar//
117b4(rgyud): phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes ser// nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams// gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi/ mgo bo pad+ma'i snod du ni// bdud rnams
117b5(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi yi khrag/ dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya// stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wAM ga/ thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag/ 'di ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms ni// dngos grub myur du thob par
117b6(rgyud): 'gyur// dang por nag po rab tu bsgom// gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom// gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom// bzhi par ljang ku de bzhin no// lnga par kha dog sngon po dang // drug par
117b7(rgyud): dkar po'i lus can te// yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas// dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// rdzogs pa yi yang rim pa nyid// rim gnyis mnyam
118a1(rgyud): par gnas nas ni// rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do// bskyed pa yi ni ma bshad do// nam mkha'i khams ni bad+mal/ b+ha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod// sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug/
118a2(rgyud): nyid/ de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod// sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid// rig pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid// lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems// ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rnam
118a3(rgyud): pa gnyis// re zhig btsun mo shes rab yin// skyes bu thabs su brjod pa nyid// kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las// phyi nas de yi rnam pa gnyis// re zhig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis// de yi//
118a4(rgyud): khu ba'ang bde ba nyid// skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang // de yi khu ba bde ba nyid// de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid// bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis// skye med rim pa'i phyogs las ni// 'di/
118a5(rgyud): ltar lhan cig skyes rnam pa'i// dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid// mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor mo// shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges// de bde'i thabs las thams cad rig/ dga' ba'i
118a6(rgyud): bde ba cung zad de// mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag/ dga' bral dga' bas chags bral yin// lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// dang po reg par 'dod pa dang // gnyis pa bde bar
118a7(rgyud): 'dod pa dang // gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid// des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya// mchog tu dga' ba sring bar brjod// dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das// dbu ma dga' btsam nyid de//
118b1(rgyud): 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu dmar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'di la thabs dang shes rab med// yang dag de nyid snang ba'o// gzhan gyis
118b2(rgyud): brjod min lhan cig skyes// gang du yang ni mi rnyed de// bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa dang // bdag gi bsod nams las shes bya// dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // gzhan dang gang
118b3(rgyud): rnams de rnams kyang // ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta// dman pa rnams ni phra ba'i don// mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya// dbu ma gnyis kyis
118b4(rgyud): spangs pa nyid// gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug/ gang rnams de rnams brtan dang gAyo// 'di kun zhes bya ba nyid de// mnyam nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid// ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms
118b5(rgyud): ba ni// mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjod// de yi 'khor le ro zhes brjod// sgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid// 'dis ni don gyis brjod par bya// nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung // nga las
118b6(rgyud): gnas gsum po yang 'byung // nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong // de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes na// shin tu mnyam gzhag gang goms pa// bsod nams
118b7(rgyud): chung ba'i mi yis kyang // de ni 'grub par the tsom med// bza' dang btung dang blugs pa dang // nyal dang log dang sems pa na// phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas// de nas mngon du 'gro bar 'gyur//
119a1(rgyud): pa byer yid kyis me sgom par// 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad chos na yongs shes pa/ ma du 'i ni mom pa men// ga/ na dang bso 'dungs so/
119a2(rgyud): rtswa lcug 'bri shing la sogs pa// bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las// dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya// de rnams dam pa gcig yod min// rang rig bdeg chen po nyid// rang rig nas ni bya
119a3(rgyud): chub 'gyur// rang rig phyir na sgom pa nyid// rang gis rig par 'gyur ba las// mnan pa la san las skyes te// rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed// rang rig rgyal po rang gtsog// 'dod
119a4(rgyud): chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang // de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid// de kun de gnas nyams dga' bar// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// rlos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni// mkha' mnyam lhan
119a5(rgyud): cig thabs dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes// khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan yin// de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod// gcig dang du ma
119a6(rgyud): bral ba ste// skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di// ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul te// 'di ni byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir// kur mkhyen ye shes de lta bu/
119a7(rgyud): sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang ram mkha' nyid dag ni// rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis// kun gyis skad cig mi gnod de// mtho ris mi yul rkang 'og gi/ skad cig las ni gzugs gces
119b1(rgyud): 'byung/ garang gzhan nami rnam rtog gis// gnod pa nyid ni rus bu mid// thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang // de bzhin las rdzas la sogs pas// srid pa dag du'i dngos grub pang// yang /
119b2(rgyud): srid mthar skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rjer 'di dang pha rol tu// de med pas kyang dngos grub med// gang gis mi shes kye'i rdo rje// de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur// chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang / mar
119b3(rgyud): me'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar// rtar tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis// nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag/ rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
119b4(rgyud): de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyi nas re ro'i dbye ba yis// lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya// drang
119b5(rgyud): po lnga dang dbang po drug/ skye mched drug dang 'byung cher lnga/ rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/ nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib byang bya// rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol
119b6(rgyud): min / yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba// dngos po dekun dag pa ste/
119b7(rgyud): 'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzugs la sogs pa'o// ci'i slad du zhe na// gzung /
120a1(rgyud): ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'ang gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/
120a2(rgyud): mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya// sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya// dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya// lce yis ro ni rig par bya// dngos po lus kyis reg par bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni//
120a3(rgyud): dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid// gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te// tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod// 'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor mA// 'du byed rdo rje mkha'
120a4(rgyud): 'gro ma// rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// de ni nang gi 'phar ma la'o// de nas/
120a5(rgyud): phyi yi 'phar ma bshad// dbang ldan du ri ru ka sI// mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma// bder bral gdol pa mo gzhag cing // rlung du g.yung mo rnam par gzhag/ phyi ma lha mo dkar mo sogs// dbang dkar/
120a6(rgyud): gshin rjer chom chur ba// tu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma// lus ngan por ni graswa re// 'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod// steng du mkha' spyod pa zhes bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs//
120a7(rgyud): srid dang ni pa'i rang banar gyis// khro mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas// gzugs la dkar por dag tu bgang // sbal tsham rkun ma rabathegs/ dril chal ro longs ma/ rol byas ro rab
120b1(rgyud): grags// reg la sa spyod ma zhes bshad// chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid// bdud dag
120b2(rgyud): pa las zhabs rnams nyid// rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid// rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan// sa ni puk+ka si zhes bshad// chu khams rngon pa ma zhes brjod// me ni gtum mor
