120b3(rgyud): shes par bya// rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags// zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rnga ma// 'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma// phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ser sna gsang ba'i dkar ma nyid// gti/
120b4(rgyud): brag de bzhin rdo rjer bshad// zhe sdang la sogs rnam sbyong ba// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las ni// 'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya// gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba/
120b5(rgyud): dang rjes ni 'ching ba las rdol te// de nyid mi shes 'jig rten mi grol zhing // de nyid rnam sbyangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med// ro dang sems kyi rnam
120b6(rgyud): par dag pa med// reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i 'grol 'gro bar shes// rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dag pa'o// / de nas
120b7(rgyud): ma pasang dag pa la gang/ gang gis thob pa dang slang ba'i// tshan 'a sa ba gad par bya// dang ba kyil bdag cad kyi// la byor ba na pa bya/
121a1(rgyud): 'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can// byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang ni// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i
121a2(rgyud): nang du yang // dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs// rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni// yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la sogs pas so// de nas
121a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang // mthe bong gsum ni lhag par bya// der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i// rig ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug/ yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de// de ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid//
121a4(rgyud): snying khu ba ldan gyur pa// de sring phyag rgya bstan par bya// phyag rgya'i gdong sang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no// bsten pa de las gang byung ba// skyob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya/
121a5(rgyud): mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid // de 'a la yang bya bar bya// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs// mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dngos dang dngos man
121a6(rgyud): sa shes bzhi sa// rtags dang gas thal rab par 'dzes/ ngo'o sog chags rnams kyisas/ dashid mi ba das panyid// 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/
121a7(rgyud): khyod mam cad rgyab po// thams cad lus rab par gnas// dngas dang ngas med de las zung // gan dang gang rnams de rnams dang // rnam par shes bkun gyi tshul// skyes bu ldan rapas
121b1(rgyud): dbang phyug dang // bdag dang gso ba sems can dang // dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// dang po dga' btsapa nyid de// gti/
121b2(rgyud): pa'i grangs la mchog dga' nyid// gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ni// rdo rje snying po la sogs kun// mkhas pas de/
121b3(rgyud): skad nges thos nas// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni// brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar gyur// dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs// de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid// dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro
121b4(rgyud): ba nyid// gsum pa lhan cig skyes pa med// bcom ldanag 'phrul kye'i rdo rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa// rdo rje seng pos rtogs bya'i phyir// the tsom legs par sel ba ni// 'dod cha/
121b5(rgyud): med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir/ lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod// yang na de nyid thams cad bdag/ yang na kun gyis rnam
121b6(rgyud): bar spangs// de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon// dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs// dang po sprin dang 'dra ba yin// grub pa sgyu ma sa bur 'gyur// gnyid logs sad par mi byed par// 12/
121b7(rgyud): dang log pa'i khyad par las// rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur// dngos grub mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i// phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs// gru bzhi
122a1(rgyud): yang dga' bar ba nyid// sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste/ gdo shal do shal byed pas brgyan// 'phreng ba sna tshogs rdalab ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// rdo rje srid
122a2(rgyud): bu mnyam par ldan// me tog sna tshogs nye bar brgyan// bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri// bum pa brgyad la sogs pas ldan// de yang yal ka la sogs ldan// mgrin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang / rin
122a3(rgyud): chen lnga ni yongs su gzhug/ rnam par rgyal ba shar du sbyin// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni// gsar pa legs par bka' ba dang // shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa yi// srad bus shes rab can gyis
122a4(rgyud): gdab// 'khor lo'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum// dkyil 'khor tsan gyi de bzhin khri// gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis// mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par sbyang // gong gi a sogs
122a5(rgyud): sngags kyis ni// de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin// ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir// srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// gang zhig dbang ni rab bye ba// rang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs sbyin// mchod
122a6(rgyud): dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid// ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir// 'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas// myur du dkar mo la sogs bri// shar du gri gug rnam par bri// lho dang nub tu'ang de
122a7(rgyud): bzhin no// byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni// bden bral rlung du'ang de bzhin no// dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa// de lta de ltar 'og dang steng // rdo rje sems dpa'i snyems byas nas// rkang pa
122b1(rgyud): g.yas pa btung byas te// phrag gnyis kye yi rdo rjer sbyor// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid// khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim las// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// hUM hUM sems pa byas/
122b2(rgyud): nas ni// hi hi rnam par 'jig byed bdag/ phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad// rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// khyad par cung zad yod ma yin// mchog
122b3(rgyud): dgar sgom pa med cing sgom pa po'ang med// lus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa'ang med// sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshang dang gci da'ang med// snag bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir
122b4(rgyud): thogs med dang // chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med phrag dog med// ser sna med dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med// sgrom dang sgom pa po med pashes dang dgra med cing // rlom sems med pa'i
122b5(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid// rdo rje snying pos 'di skad gsol// gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi// lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni// ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags// de nas bcom
122b6(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can// mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs// rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag/ thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las
122b7(rgyud): gyur pa'i phung po lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni// sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur// byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las/
123a1(rgyud): / chu yi khams na 'byung bar 'gyur// spyod pa las ni drod skye ste// 'gro ba rlung du rab tu grags// bde ba nam mkha'i nyid kyi khams// lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor//
123a2(rgyud): gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba// de phyir bde ba de nyid min// lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa// lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod// rnam pa thams cad sdom
123a3(rgyud): pa gcig/ phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las// yo gi snying rje thabs su 'gyur// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med dang
123a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg med// dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med// de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg/ de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid// mdor bsdus
123a5(rgyud): nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no// dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can// rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod// dbang gi lha
123a6(rgyud): ltungs g.yon na gnas// g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// g.yas pa'i cha la dgug pa nyid// steng nas kyang ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// dbu mi rengs pa'i lta stangs nyid// sna yi rtse
123a7(rgyud): mo'i dbus su gnyis// 'byung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed// rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed// dgang ba yis ni dgug pa nyid// zhi ba yis ni rengs par byed// rlon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid// dbang
123b1(rgyud): ni me tog rab tu grags// rdo rje'i shing la dgug pa nyid// g.yo bcas rtsa la rengs byed nyid// zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 'di la 'khrul par mi bya/
123b2(rgyud): ste sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni// mkhas pas sems can gzhug par bya// gsad par 'di la bya ma yin// dam tshig nges par nyams
123b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// sems can bslu ba spangs nas ni// bya ba ma yin thams cad bya// sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni// phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de la dam tshig bza' bya ba/
123b4(rgyud): na dang ga ha dang po dang / mtha' yi shwa dang dang po'i shwa// kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'// kye yi rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid// skye ba bdun pa'ang de nas mtshon//
123b5(rgyud): dga' bral dga' ba la spyod pa// lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang // dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang // de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur// mthong nas rnal 'byor
123b6(rgyud): pa yis mtshon// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig la ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste// gong du brtag pa bcu gnyis par// rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu//
123b7(rgyud): hriHlas byung ba'i lha mo ni// kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma// mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma// ut+pal dang lcags kyu 'dzin// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/
124a1(rgyud): 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams// khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid/ khye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs// 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin// 'bum phrag/
124a2(rgyud): gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid// brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so//
124a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol/
124a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ci gsung sbyin sreg byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang // snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang // sta gon la sogs byas nas ni// nam mkhar
124a5(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// sku gzugs snying khar rab tu gzhug/ rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa// rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM swAhA/
124a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+he pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he aHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra ne wi d+ye AHhUM swA hA/ sna tshogs hUM ni rdzogs pa dang // me tog la sogs dbul ba nyid// gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga rim pas// mchid yon zhabs/
124a7(rgyud): bsil gong ma bzhin// zhi ba'i thab khring zlum po nyid// rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa// gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod// 'di nyid la ni lhag ma sgrub// khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin//
124b1(rgyud): khru do dang ni khru gang nyi pa brgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu brjod// sor mo nyi shu'am de yi phyed// gsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu yang // zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur// rgyas par ser po de bzhin no// gsad /
124b2(rgyud): ba la ni kha dog gnag/ dbang la dmar por rab tu grags// dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug/ gsad la ji ltar zhe sdang sogs// zhol til dang rgyas la zhi// gsad la tsher ma de bzhin no// sdang la
124b3(rgyud): sogs pa'ang cher mar brjod// dbang dang dgug la ut+pa la// oM a g+ne ye ma hA te dza sarba kArma pra sA d+ha kaH/ ka ru No kr-i ta sa twAn+ta a smin sin+da hi to b+ha bAHme dkrug pa'o// ma ma rin chen sna tshogs
124b4(rgyud): 'dzin kye yi rdo rje khros mchod pa'i// lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// che ge bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dra// sAr+tha ts+tshab pa rAN+Dar+tha sA d+hi t+taM gats+tsha ha bya b+hu ka/ A ga miSh+Ta si ya thA kA le sarba sid+d+hi ku ru Sha
124b5(rgyud): me me dga' ba'i sngags so// oM dzaHhUMHbaM hoHkhaM raM/ mchod yon gyi sngags so// e ni ri ti hUM khaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags so// oM d+hi d+haM/ lha bshos kyi sngags so// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro
124b6(rgyud): ma dra ba'i sdom pa las brtag pa gnyis pa rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa ka nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la// rnal mtshor bkur ba ji lta bar/
124b7(rgyud): rang 'dod lha yi gzugs las ni// sems can ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa 'am// yang na he ru ka dpal brtson// gzhan
125a1(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis skad cig kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so// dang po goms par byed dus kyi// gnas ni gang du bsngags pa'i sems// gcig tu mnyam
125a2(rgyud): gzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i// gnas ni bzang por nges par brtag/ rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su// bdag nyid 'grub pa'i sems kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma sgom shes rab can// yang na he
125a3(rgyud): ru ka dpal gzugs// rkang pa 'khrud dang za ba dang // 'thor 'thung so rtsi za ba dang // tsan dan gyis ni lag nyed dang // smad g.yogs kyis ni rked 'gebs dang // 'byung dang sgra dang 'gro ba
125a4(rgyud): dang kha 'dug dang khro dang rgod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma brten pa dang // shes rab brtul zhugs can nyid kyis// rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par sgom// gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig kyang /
125a5(rgyud): 'dug pa'i sems ni ma rigs pas// dngos grub 'dod pas dngos grub phyir// mkhas pas 'bad pas mi gnas so// bsam gtan nyon mongs 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje snying po nga yis bshad//
125a6(rgyud): brtse bas dngos grub don du yang // zla ba phyed du yongs su rtogs// bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas// lha yi gzugs su sems pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu ma chad par// sgom pas
125a7(rgyud): yongs su brtag par gyis// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// 'khor bar thabs gzhan yod ma yin// rig ma lhan cig goms byas pas// 'phral du mngon du byed pa nyid// 'jigs skyo de bzhin sdug/
125b1(rgyud): bsngal dang // mya ngan gdung ba 'tshe ba dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tshe// sgrub pa bran nyon mi mongs// phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar// de sar nges par shes nas ni// ji skar de ni skad
125b2(rgyud): cig kyang // rnal 'byor pa rnams ngu bod gnas// mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang // gzhan lang skye ba dman gang dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las byed dang //
125b3(rgyud): gzugs ngan yan lag ma tshang bas// bsams pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dge ba bcu la goms pa dang // bla ma la gus dbang po dul// nga rgyal khro las rnam par grol// des ni re zhig
125b4(rgyud): nges 'grub 'gyur// rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob// zla ba gcig tu gsang la spyad// ji srid phyag rgya ma rnyed par// gnang ba rnyed 'gyur sngags pa la/
125b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yis bstan par bya// phyag rgya che ge mo khyer la// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// rnyid pa de yang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// si h+la ga pur yang
125b6(rgyud): dag ldan// byang chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang // dge ba bcu las brtsams nas ni// de la chos ni rab tu dbye// lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni// dam tshig sems kyang gcig pa nyid//
125b7(rgyud): zla ba gcig gos skal ldan par// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// mchog thob pa yi bud med gang // rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// yang na bdag gi nus pa yis// lha dang lha min mi/
126a1(rgyud): rnams dang // gnod sbyin ma'am ci las cang // phyag rgya bkug la rab tu bdag/ de sa khyer la spyod pa spyad// bdag gi dal ba mngon du'i phyir/ gang bshud 'jigs/
126a2(rgyud): pa'i gzugs can gyi// spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs// yid ni brtan nam g.yo 'am ci// rang gi sems ni so sor brtag/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa
126a3(rgyud): yis// phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod// phyag rgya phyag rgya nyid dag gis// phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bud med gzugs ni spangs nas ni//
126a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya// ru ma spangs pa po lar 'gyur// kak+ko la dbus yang dag gnas// 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur// ze'u 'bru bo la can du 'gyur// lhag ma bdag
126a5(rgyud): nyid chen po nyid// dga' chen he ru ka yi gzugs// he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// 'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur//
126a6(rgyud): chags dang 'jig pa bdag gis kyang // thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur// gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid// 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed// des na rab 'jig yod pa yin// de nyid/
126a7(rgyud): la ni chags pa med// la la 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig pa'i dngos med zad pa med// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa sgom// spros pa rmi lam
126b1(rgyud): kyar byas nas// rnam pa cad yum med byed/ jibyar sgyum rmi lam dang/ gyur bar ma thong yin pa/ su goms pa'i spyod bulas/ kyil 'a' ni shin 'dang /
126b2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen por dbang bskur bar// ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po// 'di ni de yi byin rlabs yin// gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med// bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser// bde ba
126b3(rgyud): dmar po bde ba dkar// bde ba ljang ku bde ba sngo// bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde// bde ba dngos po dngos med bde// rdo rje sem
126b4(rgyud): dpa' bde bar brjod// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// de yi bde ba bde chen brjod// rdzogs pa sgom pa med pa ste// bskyed pa yis ni ci zhig 'tshal/
126b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' che// dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams// lus kyi dngos med gang las bde// bde ba smra bar mi nus so//
126b6(rgyud): khyab dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni// bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid// ji ltar me tog la gnas dri// me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pa so// bde ba/
126b7(rgyud): nyid kyang dngos med 'gyur// dngos dngos po med pa nga // dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa// gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang // rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes// rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga ni//
127a1(rgyud): e yi rnam pa'i chu byad gzugs// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs// 'chad pa po chos kyang nga // rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pang // 'jig rten/
127a2(rgyud): ston pa bsgrub bya // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga // mchog mtha' dga' bral dang por ni// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// de bzhin bus kyang yid/
127a3(rgyud): ches gyis// btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde chen du// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// khu ba zhes bya'i rnam par gnas// de med pas na bde med 'gyur// bde ba med/
127a4(rgyud): na de med 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba// de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min// de nyid dngos med tshul yang yin// zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs
127a5(rgyud): can nyid// mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid// /
127a6(rgyud): lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni// skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas// 'on kyang bag chags phal pas so// dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis// skye bo thams
127a7(rgyud): cad 'chi bar 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa de// dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la// mon sran sde'u yi bza' ba sbyin// bzlog pa'i sman ni brtags pa
127b1(rgyud): yis// rlung gis rlung la snun par byed// rnam rtog las ni rnam rtog dang // srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag/ ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa// chu gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed// de bzhin
127b2(rgyud): dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang // rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tshod pas tshig pa yang // me yis kyang ni gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags mes 'tshig pa// 'dod chags me yis/
127b3(rgyud): gdung bar bya// skye bo mi bzad pa yi las// gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyi// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// chags pas 'jig rten 'ching
127b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba// 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las// kun tu rul lnga ru
127b5(rgyud): 'gyur// dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i bag chags nyid// sra ba gti mug chos kyi phyir// gti mug rnam
127b6(rgyud): par snang mdzad brjod// gang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid// gsher ba chu yi khams su brjod// chu ni mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir// zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa// gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i
127b7(rgyud): sbyor ba las// drod ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin// 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// kak+ko lar ni gang zhig sems// de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can// phrag
128a1(rgyud): dog don yod grub pa yin// don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid// bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu 'gyur// dga' ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// nam mkha' ser sna rdo rjer
128a2(rgyud): 'gyur// ser sna nam mkha' las byung nyid// sems ni chen po gcig nyid la// lnga yi gzugs kyis rnam par mtshon// rigs ni lnga po de nyid las// stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid// de phyir 'di
128a3(rgyud): dag rang bzhin gcig/ bde chen mchog tu rtag pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yi// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung ni bcu yi bye snyed nyid// rigs gcig la ni de bzhin
128a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs kyi tshogs la rigs ni du ma rnams// de rnams rigs la rigs ni rnam pa brgya// de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams// bye ba'i rigs la grangs
128a5(rgyud): ni med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la dbab
128a6(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams la rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa// sdom pa dang ni dbang dang
128a7(rgyud): yang // de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang // dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang // gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs pa// de la sdom pa bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e ba
128b1(rgyud): rnam par rab tu gnas// e baM rnam pa'i bde chen po// dbang las yang dag shes par 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol/
128b2(rgyud): to// bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa nyid// e baM rnam pa ci zhes brjod// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// e li
128b3(rgyud): cha byad bzang po gang // dbus su baMgyis rnam par brgyan// bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ skad cig dbye bas phye ba nyid// dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur// skad
128b4(rgyud): cig shes nas bde shes pa// e baM rnam par rab tu gnas// sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang // rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral// skad cig bzhi ni rab shes pas// de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes/
128b5(rgyud): 'gyur// 'khyud dang 'o byed la sogs pa// sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad// rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/ bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid// bdag gi bde ba zos pa yi// gros ni rnam par nyed par
128b6(rgyud): brjod// mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan// chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid// rnam smin la ni mchog dga' nyid// rnam nyed dga' ba dga' bral
128b7(rgyud): nyid// mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni// dga' ba la sogs rim shes bya// dgod pa
129a1(rgyud): dag pathob dpon nyid// rtsu ba gsang ba de bzhin no// lag bcangs las ni shes rab nyid// gnyis gnyis 'khyung la de yang nyid// sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir/
129a2(rgyud): dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// gtor dang blugs pa zhes bya 'dis// des na dbang zhes brjod par bya// shes rab bcu drug lon pa la// lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud// rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas//
129a3(rgyud): slob dpon dbang du rab tu brjod// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// mthe bong srin lag dag gis ni// slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya// de nyid du ni mnyam
129a4(rgyud): pa'i ro// slob ma'i spyod yul dag tu bya// ston pas shes rab rab tu mchod// rjed par byas nas gtad par bya// ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che// phyag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer// phrag dog khro ba rnam/
129a5(rgyud): spangs pa'i// slob mcher gyur shes nas ni// ston pas de la gnang ba sbyin// kun tu ru gyis rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar dbang bskur gsol btab pa'i// slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya// bla ma phyag rgya ldan
129a6(rgyud): mthong nas// bstod dang mchod pa ji bzhin bya// bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kyi// rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa// mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid
129a7(rgyud): che// mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzes// 'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu// bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs// zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang // ba la che mchog ma dan// bdug pa lha
129b1(rgyud): bshos 'phreng ba dang // dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa yis// 'di rnams mchod pa rnams kyis ni// slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// sna tshogs spangs pa'i
129b2(rgyud): skad cig la// ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che// bde ba chen po rnam par zung // ji srid byang chub bar du ni// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// slob ma snying rje can mthong nas// rdo rje can gyis
129b3(rgyud): 'di skad smras// 'di ni ye shes chen po nyid// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul// dngos po dngos med bdag nyid gtso// brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas
129b4(rgyud): gnas// sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs kyis ni// rtag tu nges par 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la bzod par gsol
129b5(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ci zhes brjod// sangs rgyas kun bdag grong khyer la// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas// rim pa ji ltar
129b6(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil ni snying po zhes byar brjod// byang chub sems ni bde chen po// dang po mthar byed ces bya ba// 'dus pa dkyil 'khor nyid du
129b7(rgyud): brjod// 'khor lo zhes bya nam mkha'i khams// yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong // bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ sdom pa zhes bya
130a1(rgyud): gang gis dang // dam tshig gang gis gnas par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags gsad pa dang // brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra ba dang // khyod kyis ma byin
130a2(rgyud): par yang long // pha rol bud med bsten par gyis// sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid// gang phyir srog ni sems su brjod// 'jig rten bsgral ba zhes bya ba// brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrag//
130a3(rgyud): btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin par// gzhan gyi bud med rang mtshungs mdzes// de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// yul de rnams kyang ci lags/ dbang
130a4(rgyud): po rnams ni gang lags// skye mched ni ci legs// phung po rnams ni gang lags// khams rnams de'ang ci lags// 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
130a5(rgyud): yul drug ni// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin nyid// 'di rnams yul ni drug tu brjod// dbang po rnams ni drug ste// mig dang rna ba sna dang
130a6(rgyud): ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// 'di rnams dbang po drug po ni// gti mug rdo rje la sogs ldan// yul dang yul can dag gis ni// skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur// phung po lnga ni
130a7(rgyud): gzugs la sogs// mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che// dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang // dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams go cha'i phyir// khams ni bco brgyad rnams su bshad//
130b1(rgyud): rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa// brdzun min bden min de bzhin du// thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar// 'dod pas rnal 'byor mas shes kyis// 'di lta ste/ gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / skyes
130b2(rgyud): bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me skye bar 'gyur ro// me de gtsub shing la'ang mi gnas// gtsub stan la'ang ma yin// skyes bu'i lag pa dag la'ang ma yin te// rnam pa thams cad du yongs
130b3(rgyud): su btsal na gcig na'ang yod pa ma yin pas// me de'ang bden pa'ang ma yin zhing brdzun pa'ang ma yin no// de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la gyis shig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma
130b4(rgyud): bdag med ma la sogs pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad bdud rtsi lnga thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas thogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed// kun tu ru'i sbyor bas rjes su
130b5(rgyud): chags par byed// bdud rtsi lnga'i ro'ang 'thung bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis brlabs pa bstan pa/ kye kye rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad
130b6(rgyud): pa la de nyid bdag gis gsang mdzad pa// rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis// bshad kyis 'dod pas rab tu nyon// lha mo thams cad dga' bar gyur// rangs par gyur te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
130b7(rgyud): lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang /
131a1(rgyud): bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing // khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste// grong gi chos ni rab tu spang // blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing // bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya/
131a2(rgyud): gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste// dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go// bal thams cad bza' bar bya// kha dog lnga la mnyam par spyad// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// btsun mo thams cad dag
131a3(rgyud): bar bya// mdza' bo sdug par mi bya zhing // de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang nyid// rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi// lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya// g.yung mo gdol pa ko lpags mkhan// phyag bdar/
131a4(rgyud): mkhan sogs reg rim dang // bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dmangs rnams// bdag gi lus ltar reg pa nyid// bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang // dug dang nim pa bu btsas sdes// skyur dang dngar dang
131a5(rgyud): bska la sogs// kha ba lan tshwa tsha ba dang // dri nga dri zhing mchi rnag dang // byang chub sems kyis rab tu bza'// gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni// mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin// rang byung/
131a6(rgyud): me tog rnyed nas ni// pad+ma'i snod du gzhag pa dang // lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis// bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung // smad g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang // ro bsregs thal
131a7(rgyud): bas de bzhin brgyan// me tog rab song gnas rnyed pas// mgo skyes legs par bcing bar bya// de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar
131b1(rgyud): gsungs na// nges par dbang po drug gi grangs rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig la gti mug rdo rje ma// rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sA la ser sna ma zhes
131b2(rgyud): bshad// kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma// dbang po rnams ni dag bya'i phyir// 'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che// rdo rje snying pos gson
131b3(rgyud): pa/ dgongs pa'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis nges gsung gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che// nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa// dgod dang lta ba dag gis dang // 'khyud
131b4(rgyud): dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyi// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// dgongs pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa// bcom ldan nges par gsung du gsol// dgongs pa'i skad ni skad chen po/
131b5(rgyud): dam tshig brda na rgyas pa ru// rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis// khyod ni tse gcig sems kyis nyon// ma da na chang ba la sha// 'du ba ma la ya dze brjod// 'gro ba khe Ta ro na shrI pa// rus pa'i rgyar
131b6(rgyud): ni ni rI shu// 'ong ba pro kha Na ru brjod// cang te'u kr-i pi ta ru brjod// skal med du du ra zhes brjod// skal ldan ka li dza ra brjod// reg min Din Di ma zhes brjod// thod pa pad+ma b+hany+dza naM// bza'/
131b7(rgyud): ba kri pi ta zhes bya// tshod ma mA la tin+t+ran// bshang ba tsa tu sa maM brjod// gci ba kas+phu ri zhes brjod// rang byungasi hAr shes par bya// khu ba ka pu ra zhes brjod// sha chen shA li dza zhes brjod//
132a1(rgyud): dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// rdo rje bo la zhes bshad do// pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer// kha dog dbye bas phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad// 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin/
132a2(rgyud): no// phyag rgya lnga ni bsdus pa nyid// g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// gar ma de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs// ras 'tshed ma ni rin chen rigs// skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod// chos ma las/
132a3(rgyud): kyi rigs nyid de// phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin// 'di rnams khu ba rdo rjer 'gyur// brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas btung // rdo rje snying po sems dpa' rje// gsang ba'i skad ni
132a4(rgyud): mtshar che ba// nga yis khyod la gang bshad pa// de rnams thams cad gus pas zung // kye rdo rje 'dir dbang bskur gang // gsang ba'i skad kyis mi smra ba// de yi dam tshig nyams par ni// 'gyur/
132a5(rgyud): ba 'di la the tshom med// 'tshe ba dang ni rkun ma dang // gdon dang rims dang dug gis kyang // gal te sangs rgyas gsang ba'i skad// mi gsung na yang 'grongs par 'gyur// rang gi dam tshig rigs
132a6(rgyud): rnyed na// gal te tshig 'di mi smra ba// gnas bzhi las skyes rnal 'byor ma// de yi tshe na khro bar byed// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang ba'i skad ces
132a7(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad the tshom du gyur// yid gnyis su gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la
132b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan the tshom bsal du gsol// spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa// glu dang gar ni dngos grub sbyin// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// glu ni ci lags gar yang ci/
132b2(rgyud): lha yi le'u las gang gsungs pa// zhe sdang la sogs phyag rgya rnams// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// gang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya ci// sngags btub lus gang gsungs pa// bdag med la sogs
132b3(rgyud): sa bon nyid// de la bdag ni 'khrul par gyur// gang gis sa bon sa bon gang // rigs kyi le'u las gang bshad pa// bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa/ bcom ldan pa dag ni 'khrul gyur pas/
132b4(rgyud): de rnams rnam dag bshad du gsel// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kol+ma i ren+ti a bo lA mum+mu Ni re kak+ko lA/ g+ha Na ki pi Ta ho bAdz+dza i ka ru Ne ki a i na ro lA/ ta hi ba la khadz+dza i
132b5(rgyud): ga Do ma a NA pidz+dza a i ha li kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i du d+hu ra badz+dzi A i/ tsa u sa ma kAts+tsha ri si d+hA kap+tA ra lA i a i/ mA la i in+d+ra Na shA liny+dza ta hiM b+ha ru khA i a i/ phreM kha Na khe Da ka ran+te shud+d+ha a
132b6(rgyud): shud+d+hA na mu Ni a e/ ni raM shu aM ga tsaTA lI ta hi dza sa rA ba pa Ni a i/ ma la ya dze kun+d+ha ru bA Ta i Did+d+hi ma ta hiN+Da bIdz+dza a i/ dran pa mi 'phrogs rnal 'byor pas// he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gang/
132b7(rgyud): chags bral min goms sems kyis ni// 'dod chags sems kyis bsgom pa nyid// rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas dang // rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo yis// glu dang gar ni 'di dag gis// legs
133a1(rgyud): par glu blang gar yang bya// 'di nyid kyis ni tshogs srung zhing // de bzhin bdag kyang srung ba nyid// 'dis ni 'jig rten dbang du byed// 'dis ni sngags kyi bzlas pa nyid//
133a2(rgyud): gang du gus pas glu len dang // gang du gus bcas gar byed pa// tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas nas// de la dri ni mtshon par bya// sgog pa'i dri ni dang po nyid// de nas yang ni bya rgod dri//
133a3(rgyud): pur ma la ya jo nyid// ngang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra// klu yi mthar nas mnyam par bya// ba lang 'tshe yi sgra yang ni// phyi rol du ni mtshon bya ba// gru yi byin rlabs mtshan nyid do// phyag rgya rtags dang /
133a4(rgyud): mtshan ma ste// 'dis ni rigs ni mtshon par bya// rigs 'tshol sgom pa'i sbyor ba las// dngos grub med cing sgrub po'ang med// zhe sdang phyag rgyas bdag med ma// gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rje ma// ser
133a5(rgyud): sna'i phyag rgyas dkar mo nyid// chags pas chu ma phyag rgyas gdab// phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha' 'gro ma// zhe sdang phyag rgya puk+ka sI// gti mug phyag rgyas ri khrod ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol pa mo//
133a6(rgyud): 'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid// yang ni dkar mo zhe sdang las// gti mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma// ser sna'i phyag rgya sa ro langs ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g+ha sma rI// gti mug phyag
133a7(rgyud): rgyas sa spyod ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas mkha' spyod ma// 'dod pas phyag rgyar shes par bya// a li dang po bdag med ma// a li gnyis pa rdo rje ma// a li gsum pa dkar mo nyid// bzhi pa chu yi rnal
133b1(rgyud): 'byor ma// lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// drug pa puk+ka sI zhes brjod// bdun pa nyid ni ri khrod ma// brgyad pa sme sha can du brjod// dgu pa yang ni g.yung mo nyid// yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid// bcu
133b2(rgyud): gcig chom rkun ma zhes bshad// bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod// bcu gsum pa ni g+hasma rI// bcu bzhi pa ni sa spyod ma// bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma// rnal 'byor ma yi sa bon nyid// rigs
133b3(rgyud): kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang // bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs// rtsen gnyis gnyis rnal 'byor ma// re re rnam pa gsum du brjod// brkyang ma ro ma kun 'drar ma// bdag med rnal 'byor
133b4(rgyud): ma zhes brjod// gang phyir bcu drug cha med pas// 'bad pas kun gyi lhag ma spangs// de ci'i slad du zhe na khyod// don gyi bya ba mi phyed phyir// bco lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid kyi// zla ba byang chub sems
133b5(rgyud): su 'gyur// bde ba chen po a li'i gzugs// rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// rnal 'byor ma kun las byung ba// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid//
133b6(rgyud): 'grib med btung mchog nam mkha' nyid// ga pur nges par cis mi spang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// thabs
133b7(rgyud): gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs dang ni// rang byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang // kun rdzob don
134a1(rgyud): dam gzugs can gyi// byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no// bud med kak+ko la bde ba can// e baM rnam pa/
134a2(rgyud): rang bzhin du// bde ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir// bde ba can zhes rab tu bsgrags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas// 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste// 'di nyid//
134a3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa nyid// 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur// 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs// 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa// 'khor ba dbang po rnam
134a4(rgyud): nyid do// 'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa// 'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das// rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid// rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// /
134a5(rgyud): byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam tshul can no// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// sngo bsangs dal ma rigs bzang ma// sih+la/
134a6(rgyud): ga bur 'byung ba'i gnas// rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje// skra bzang sgrub pa po la dga'// de yi chang yang btung bar bya// de nas rang yang btung ba nyid// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// phyi nas
134a7(rgyud): phyag rgya rjes chags bya// bo la kak+ko lar bcug nas// kun tu ru byed brtul zhugs can// der ni sbyor ba las byung ba'o// ga pur mkhas pas mi spang ste// de ni lag tu mi blang zhing // nya phyis
134b1(rgyud): drang chos nyid du min// nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir// mi 'chi lce yis blang ba nyid// ga pur nyid ni bdag med ma// bde ba bdag med tshul can nyid// de yi bde ba phyag rgya che// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor/
134b2(rgyud): nyid du gnas// dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te// blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las// de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma// de ni ring min
134b3(rgyud): thung ba min// grub zhi ma yin zlum po min// dri dang ro dang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can// de las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi bde ba myong ba nyid// de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che// /
134b4(rgyud): bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang // shes rab nyid kyis dpyad par bya// de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i
134b5(rgyud): gzugs// bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// de ni me long ye shes gzugs// mnyam nyid ye shes dngos po can// yang
134b6(rgyud): dag gyur pa so sor rtog/ de nyid bya ba nan tan te// chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag pa// de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag po nga// de nyid bdag med rnal 'byor ma// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can//
134b7(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// 'khor lo bsgoms pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsungs na// sdom pa yang dag bshad du gsol// bcom/
135a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma yi lus dbus su// a yi rnam pa'i sdom pa gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo la/
135a2(rgyud): bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mched thabs chen nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis ni bstan du med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis
135a3(rgyud): brjod par bya// sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // bde bzhin du yang bde chen nyid// skye gnas snying mgrin
135a4(rgyud): mgo bor yang // sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi sems can gyi// skye ba gang la brjod par bya// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// lte ba sprul pa'i sku nyid yin//
135a5(rgyud): gang gis bskyed dang sprul byed pa'i// sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod// sems ni chos kyi rang bzhin te// chos kyi sku yang snying kar 'gyur// ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi// bza' ba nges
135a6(rgyud): par longs spyod brjod// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas// e be rnam par rgyu mthun nyid// rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las// longs spyod skyes bu'i
135a7(rgyud): byed pa nyid// bde ba'i 'khor lo dri med nyid// rgyu mthun sogs par rab phye ba'i// 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yi// las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod//
135b1(rgyud): ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod// rgyu mthun zhes ni rab tu bsgrags// las chung 'bras bu che ba'i phyir// rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/ rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid// bskyed pa skyes bus byed//
135b2(rgyud): pa nyid// gang phyir sprul pa gnas bstan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid// chos ni smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lor thams cad yod// gang phyir mgrin par kun
135b3(rgyud): bkur phyir// longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid// gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas// bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che// sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod// lto ba gnas su brjod pa
135b4(rgyud): bya ba skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// mngal gyi phru ma chos gos nyid// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// sngags kyi
135b5(rgyud): bzlas pa a dang haM// skye gnas 'khor lo'i rnam pa a// bde chen gyi yang rnam pa ho// gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs// sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid// 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can
135b6(rgyud): rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// zla ba bcu yang sa rnams yin// sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste/
135b7(rgyud): spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / tsun dA dang / pan+d+ha ri khrod ma dang / 'og zhal ma dang / de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor
136a1(rgyud): ma rnams tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing brgyal ba dang // skrag pa dang / sa la 'gyel ba dang / 'dar bar gyur to// yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de rnams
136a2(rgyud): thams cad gzigs nas bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par bstod pa// sa dang chu rlung byin za yi// lha mo snod can khyed nyid la// gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa// de nyid nga yis spro yis nyon// bcom
136a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu nye bar thos nas de rnams thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang glo//
136a4(rgyud): bur dri mas bsgribs// de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te// bden pa'ang ma mchis shing brdzun pa'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan
136a5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa// btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni// de yis de nyid yongs su gcod// de bzhin
136a6(rgyud): zhi ba'i thabs shes shing // kye yi rdo rjer ngal bsos na// ma rig sogs pas mi 'dzin cing // gti mug la sogs 'ching bas min// rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las// sangs rgyas ma yin
136a7(rgyud): sems can ni// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang // lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang // bde ba gang
136b1(rgyud): phyir mi shes pa// rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur// sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du//
136b2(rgyud): med// gdol pa smyig mkhan la sogs pa// gsod don don du sems pa po// de rnams kyi rdo rjer shes na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa// 'di yi bgrod
136b3(rgyud): pa mi shes pa// 'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar// gang zhig rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// ce yi rdo rje'i thabs rnyed pas// gang zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba// de ni bla med
136b4(rgyud): rnyed par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// sa ni puk+ka sIr bshad pa// gang phyir gti mug sra ba nyid// sku ni rnam snang nyid gsungs pa// ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
136b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// sems spangs nas ni lus kyis ni// mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems// sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba// chu
136b6(rgyud): khams ri khrod mar bshad pa// mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid// gtso bo mo bskyod phyag rgyas ni// ri khrod ma la phyag rgyar rigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lus spangs nas ni
136b7(rgyud): sems kyis ni// gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur// de phyir sems ni gti mug 'gyur// thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// me ni gdol pa mor bshad pa// 'dod chags
137a1(rgyud): phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min na// ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa/
137a2(rgyud): khrag ni rin chen 'byung gnas nyid// drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir// 'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid do// don yod rlung gi gzugs
137a3(rgyud): can nyid// don yod phyag rgyas g.yung mo la// gtso bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni// gzhan du 'byung ba
137a4(rgyud): ma yin te// de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis// mkhas pas g.yung mo phyag rgyas gdab// gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid// dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid// sngar gsungs nyid
137a5(rgyud): kyi rim pa yis// sems kyi bdag po phyag rgyas gdab// de nyid rim pas chom rkun ma// de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang // de yi rigs pas b+haswa ri// ma log pa las phyag rgya'o// kye yi na
137a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin// snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la// sems can don phyir gtor ma che// de la bdag med mas zhus pa// e baM rnam par bzhugs nas ni// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las//
137a7(rgyud): sems cadan rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir// rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan// oM in+da dza ma dza la dzak+Sha/ b+hU da ba hI bA u rak+Sha/ tsan+da sudz+dza mA da bA p+pa ta la pA tA le aT+Ta sap+pa sAhA/ i daM ba liM b+huny+dzaH/
137b1(rgyud): d+ha pul d+hU pa mes pa b+ha/ a b+ha sa p+pa kak+Sha sA da 'i ng+ga khu Ni pe 'gyud/ oM a kA ro bu khaM sar+b+bad+har+m+ma s+thA A d+ya mud+ya rA tAHoM sa rtsub Ta swAhA/ gang gi tshe 'di'i gtor mas 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed na
137b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te/ de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang / lha mo rnams dang / 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag
137b3(rgyud): tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i sde 'jigs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas par yang 'gyur ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// phyag rgya gang /
137b4(rgyud): gis mkha' spyod ma// gang gi phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang gsum 'khor
137b5(rgyud): lo'i dbus su ni// sku gsung thugs su phye ba las// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas// sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can// steng zhal sku yi rdo rje ma// mkha'
137b6(rgyud): spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can// 'og zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma// thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma// sems ni bdag med tshul can nyid// sems ni dbus kyi gnas su ste// des na bdag med ma dbus skye// /
137b7(rgyud): rgyas par rab tu phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod// rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang // bshad kyis rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon// mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung // dpag med phrag dog rdo rjes so//
138a1(rgyud): zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog bad ba dag/ 'dis ni rim pas sgom pa nyid/ rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni// khyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga// 'dod chags na
138a2(rgyud): snasdang gti mug gis// de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// mi bskyod zhes sdang gzugs can gyi// thugs kyi bdag po rigs gcig gnyis// zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di// rigs ni drug dang lnga ru badz+ra
138a3(rgyud): kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po// dpa'/
138a4(rgyud): bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// bdag med mas ni mgul nas 'khyud// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la// bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus// bco lngas yongs su bskor ba yi// bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na//
138a5(rgyud): khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// bdag med tsum bla na mdzad nas// rnga rje thod par sbal nas ni// lha yi nam mnyed mdzad de// dkyil 'khor yang dag rang /
138a6(rgyud): tu dbye// 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa// do shal do shal phyed pas brgyan// mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje srad bus yang dag brgyan// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// 3/
138a7(rgyud): cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las/ khyod dang lhan cig bzhin bzang ma// de la dbus su nga yod de// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyi//
138b1(rgyud): 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po// mgo ba'i 'breng ba'i do shal mdzad// nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mo'i bcas// kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po// ma tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas hUn+da/
138b2(rgyud): zhing // thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid// bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing // dga' ba gnyis gnyis soms 'jug pas// dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba thob// rlom sems med pa'i rang
138b3(rgyud): bzhin can// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas pa la ni kun dmatshungs// g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa// spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa can// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che// lhag ma'i zhal
138b4(rgyud): ni bung ba bzhin// grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang // dga' bas shin tu rol pa las// dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung nas// shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// chom
138b5(rgyud): rkun ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas lho yi sgo ru ni// chom rkun ma ni sgo srungs ma// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// ro langs ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas nub kyi sgo ru ni// bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par
138b6(rgyud): gnas// dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug las// g+hasma rI yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// puk+ka
138b7(rgyud): sI yang phyung nas ni// byang nas dbang ldan mtshams su ni// drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// yang ni srub pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'tshed pa'i mtshams su ri khrod ma// srin po'i mtshams su
139a1(rgyud): gdol pa mo// rlung gi mtshams su g.yung mo nyid// de nas rdo rje chags chen las// rig mar bcas pa khu bar 'gyur// sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las// de nas lha mo rnam
139a2(rgyud): kyis bskul// rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig/ puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs pa// bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod// khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas/
139a3(rgyud): kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod// dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba// stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci// khyod med
139a4(rgyud): phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas// gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid// bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas// snying rje rgyun/
139a5(rgyud): tshad ma mdzad cig/ glang po rnga bong glang rnga mo// mi dang sha ra b+ha byi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang zla ba
139a6(rgyud): ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// rgod cing drag shul 'jigs rung ba// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yis// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa
139a7(rgyud): nyid/ aM dang hU~M gi rdo rje che// khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ri// zhabs rnams sa la rdeb pa dang // lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad// ga tso ba~M g+ha paM shaM la~M De// 'di yi sa bon phyung ba dang /
139b1(rgyud): bdag pol sa bon dag gis ni// mthu sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas// ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// bdag med pade basbyin pa po// gtso ba 'di ltar skom pa/
139b2(rgyud): nyid/ dkar mo'i g.yas na gri gug ste// de bzhin g.yon na ro he ta// chom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste// g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid// ro langs ma g.yas rus sbal te// g.yon pa yis ni
139b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i snod// g+hasma rI yi g.yas na sprul// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid// puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste// g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no// ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon
139b4(rgyud): pas gsil byed de bzhin no// gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste// g.yon pas thod pa de bzhin no// g.yung mo'i g.yas na rdo rje nyid// g.yon na sdibs mdzub de bzhin no// skyil krung phyed/
139b5(rgyud): pa'i gar gyis gnas// dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod// spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// go rI kha dog nag por 'gyur// chom rkun ma ni btsod dang
139b6(rgyud): mtshungs// ro langs ma ni gser bcos bzhin// g+hasma rI ni mar gang mtshungs// puk+ka sA ni dbang sngon mtshungs// ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od// gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo bsangs ma// g.yung
139b7(rgyud): mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod// tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag/ gshin rje dang ni nor ba dag dang // bden bral dang ni thags bzang ris// gau rI la sogs pa yi gdan// bo la gzhib par mdzad nas ni//
140a1(rgyud): dam du 'khyud cing 'o mdzad pas// bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni// bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so// bud med rnams kyi dbang byed sngags// de bzhin gdug pa
140a2(rgyud): bsdigs pa dang // klu rnams sdigs par byed pa nyid// lha dang lha min rnam nyed pa// de ni nga yis bshad bya yis// lha mo bde ba sbyin mnyon// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag
140a3(rgyud): gis gzhan du ma bstan no// 'di yi sngags kyis gang byung dang // rdo rje sems dpas gang mdzad pa// lha mo shin tu 'jigs pa ste// ngo mi chog pas khyod la bshad// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba
140a4(rgyud): 'khrug pa yis// dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje snying po dbang sbyin phyir// thig le mchog ni bkug pa nyid// bzlas pa khri yis gsal ba dang // sgra ring ba dang bzang ba yis//
140a5(rgyud): kye sa rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya// bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag/ ce yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di yis las rnam
140a6(rgyud): thams cad byed// rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// tha phyed thig les rnam par brtan// de nas/ yanan na la bi ga s+'ung+ga ke sha brgyan/ tsa tshig ti nA dz+wa la de'i rjes sa// log byu la/
140a7(rgyud): mungal bu las pa la ma la ne d+da \u0f7f/ sar+b+ba TAMr tsi la marjen du da'i / so ma ral ma ra la/ kA ra ma kA ra~M sa/ gad+ha la ga pA ya/ d+hi la bany+dza la/ sho'i ye she Shal/ sems gdan/ bar+b+ha brgyan
140b1(rgyud): kA kr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na sha d+d+hA/ pha hA tsi hrI/ chu hU be tsaHtsa co/ cesaHpaT swA hA/ de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// srub dang sgrub pa'i sbyor ba las// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// dkyil 'khor mid du'ong ba nas/
140b2(rgyud): de la ston pa ye shes che// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam bzhag pas// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad// 'phar ma gcig dang sgo bzhi pa// sna tshogs 'od kyis
140b3(rgyud): yang dag 'khrug/ rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje srad bus mnyam par brgyan// re khA lnga dang yang dag ldan// de nas bum pa brgyad po bri// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la
140b4(rgyud): sogs pa 'am// dur khrod kyi ni so phag gam// de bzhin dur khrod sol ba yis// de dbus pad+ma 'dab ma ni// brgyad pa ze bar bcas pa bri// snying por skyes pa'i thod pa nyid// mdog dkar
140b5(rgyud): cha ni gsum pa bri// dbang ldan du ni sha ra b+ha// me yi mtshams su dge slong bri// bden bral du ni 'khor lo bri// rlung du rigs kyi bdag po bri// shar sgor de bzhin gri gug nyid// lho ru cang te'u bri
140b6(rgyud): ba nyid// nub tu rus sbal bri ba nyid// lto 'phye byang du de bzhin no// lha mo kha dog dbye ba yis// phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grogs// dbus su thod pa dkar po yang // sna tshogs rdo rjes
140b7(rgyud): mtshan pa bri// de nas rnam rgyal bum pa nyid// sal ga'i rtse mo gos bzang can// lto ba rin chen lngas gang ba// sA lu skyes pas yongs bkang gzhag/ mang du rab tu brjod pas ci// ji ltar de
141a1(rgyud): nyid bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya// bcu gnyis brgyad gnyis lon pa yi// rig ma bde chen brgyad po nyid// do shal rkang gdub kyis brgyan nas// kyil/
141a2(rgyud): 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug/ ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang // ma yi spun dang sgyug mo dang // de bzhin pa yi sring mo nyid// rig ma brgyad du rab
141a3(rgyud): tu grags// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// 'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod// de las ga pur btung ba nyid// des ni dkyil 'khor bsang gtor bya// de rnams rnal 'byor pas btung bya// dngos
141a4(rgyud): grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de la chang yang btung dang // sha dang sA lu skyes pa bza'// de yang gos dang bral byas nas// b+ha gar 'o ni yang yang byed// des kyang po la gzhib par bya// gar bya glu
141a5(rgyud): yang blang bar bya// bo la kak+ko la sbyar nas// de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya// de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la// gos kyis mig ni bkab nas su// der ni slob ma bcug pa nyid// phyi nas dkyil 'khor
141a6(rgyud): rab tu brtan// mtshan mo skye bo med khyim du// slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas// dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// de la dbang ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa// slob ma
141a7(rgyud): bzang pos sngar shes bya// de la de nyid bstan pa ni// dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can// thams cad rgyud du sbas pa ste// mtha' yi mtha' yis phye ba nyid// rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas// de la lha mo
141b1(rgyud): des nus pa// lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags// gtso bo chen po bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med/
141b2(rgyud): 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid// bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid// longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la// rang gi g.yas dang lag gzhan gyi// mthe bong dang ni smon lag gis// de ni rnal 'byor
141b3(rgyud): pa yis btsir// de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur// de las ci zhig skye zhe na// gzhon nu'i bdaga' ba ji lta 'am// lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta ba'o// mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus//
141b4(rgyud): song dang stong min he ru ka/ kye'i rdo rje las kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing // bo la thod par bcug nas ni// dam
141b5(rgyud): dra nu ma bzung mdzad nas// skyes pa'i snga ni gzhibs nas kyang // choms kyi sum mchu bcir nas ni// mtshan khung sen mos rma mdzad de// mnyam sbyor bde bamyang mdzad nas// phyag rgya ldan rapa bye ba//
141b6(rgyud): ma slob dpon 'dod lha la// phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 'dzin// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la// smod tshig mnyan pa yi phyir// rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin// sngags kyi bzlas pa'ang mgul rgyan nyid// gdug bu srog
141b7(rgyud): chags gsod pa spangs// phyag rgya bsten pa ska rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni// rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab// de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas// choms kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// kye sa rdo rje zhes
142a1(rgyud): bya ba// ldan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can nyid// de la lha mo des zhus pa// gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang // de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni// k+She yi rdo rje'i bris sku yi// byed pa bde ba chen pos
142a2(rgyud): gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dir ni 'bri mkhan dam tshig can// sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni// bris sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid// skyes pa'i thod gnas kha dog lnga// ro yi sgra yi pir
142a3(rgyud): nyid kyis// bris sku bla ma bri ba nyid// gang gang srud pa 'khal ba dang // gang gang ras yugs 'thag pa yang // de yang dam tshig can nges pas// dam tshig byin brlabs rnal 'byor las// zla ba zla ba'i mang pos/

142a5(rgyud): pas// de nas dam tshig rab tu bza'// bzhin bzang snying rje ldan pa dang // gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma// me tog bcas shing sgrub por dga'// rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du gzhag/ kye'i rdoH/
142a6(rgyud): las bris sku'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas de la lha mos zhus// bo la kak+ko la sbyar nas// tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur//
142a7(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pas lha yis rab bye ba// glegs pa mang yis bshad bya yis// lha mo sel ba chen mo lon// sbrang chen sdug cha byas nas ni// mi mi rus pas sku gus ni// glegs pams/
142b1(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis pa// tho gar dam tshig can gyis bri// glegs pa ma dang ni bris ma nyid// gal te ska la med mthong na ni// smra ba 'dir ni dngos grub med// 'jig rten pha rol spyod yul med// yang dag rab
142b2(rgyud): sbyin ldan pa la// res 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa nyid// glegs bam las kyi spyod yul du// sgra dang mtshan khrung nyid du sgra// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// yang dang yang du'o mdzad nas// bde
142b3(rgyud): tshon mnyam par myang mdzad de// rdo rje can gyis bza' ba bstan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bza' ba ni// nyon cig lha mo mig yangs ma// gang du zos pas 'dod don kun// sgrub pa can gyis
142b4(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur// dur khrod ri yi bya skyibs dang // de bzhin mi med grong khyer dang // yang na dben pa 'am rgya mtsho'i mthar// bza' ba 'di ni rab tu bza'// de la gdan du brtag pa ni// ro yi//
142b5(rgyud): gzugs can dgu dang ni// yang na stag gi pags pa dang // dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no// dbus su kye yi rdo rje'i gzugs// ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas shes nas// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag/
142b6(rgyud): tu yang // de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams dgod// dam tshig mA la tin+ta no// stag gi pags pa'i steng du bza'// 'bad nas rgyal po'i sA lu yi// bza' ba der ni bza' ba nyid// der ni zos nas zos/
142b7(rgyud): nas kyang // der ni ma mo mchod par bya// sring mo bu mo skyug mo dang // gal te ma sring yin na yang // de rnams rtag tu legs mchod na// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur// skyes pa'i thod chen
143a1(rgyud): cha gcig par// chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste// bla ma la dbul skal chen ma// phyag 'tshal nas ni rang yang btung // badz+ri'i lag pas blang ba dang // de nyid kyi ni lag
143a2(rgyud): pas dbul// yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa// de ltar sgrub pa po yis bya// kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa// phyag
143a3(rgyud): rgya chen po ji lta bu// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyi ni// bde ba sbyin pas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu ring min thung ba min// gnag pa ma yin
143a4(rgyud): dkar ba min// pad+ma'i 'drab ma'i rnam pa 'dra// de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan// rdul yang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te// ri dgas lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs// pad+ma la yang dbang mchog dri// skad cig/
143a5(rgyud): pad+ma lta bur 'byung // de yi ga pur sisma dag/ mkhas pas dri bzang mtshon par bya// ut+pa la yi drir 'gyur zhing // a ka ru ni nag po mtshungs// dal zhing mi g.yo ba nyid dang // snyan par
143a6(rgyud): smra zhing yid 'ong ma// skra bzang dbus su gnyer ma gsum// bal pa pad+ma can du brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma// de rnyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag
143a7(rgyud): med mas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das smon lam ji ltar gdab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs su skye dang dmachog can// spyi med kyi mi rdo rje som// bla ma la gus nying rjer
143b1(rgyud): ldan pa/ skye ning skye bar 'azur bar shog/ lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'grol// zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ de nas lha mo
143b2(rgyud): dgyes nas// tshig ni 'di nyid yang zhus pa// skal med sems can gdul dka' ba// gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por gso sbyong
143b3(rgyud): sbyin par bya// de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid// de la bye brag smra ba bstan// mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no// de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid// de yi rjes su dbu ma bstan// sngags kyi rim pa
143b4(rgyud): kun shes nas// de rjes kye yi rdo rje brtsam// slob mas gus pas blangs nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// kye'i rdo rje las 'dul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
143b5(rgyud): de nas kha sbyar 'byed pa yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa ba la// brtul zhugs can
143b6(rgyud): gyis lag pas gdon// he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ bstan la gnod pa byed
143b7(rgyud): pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni// bla ma thub pa la zhus nas// snying rjes gsad par bya ba nyid// ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas// khrag ni skyug pa nyid dang yang // 'dar zhing mgo
144a1(rgyud): skyes grol ba dang // kha ni 'og tu rnam par sgom// de yi lam du khab ni me'i// gzugs can 'jug par bsam pa ste// snying kar byin za'i sa bon nyid// dmigs nas skad ci/
144a2(rgyud): gsod par byed// rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med// phyag rgya bcing dang bya ba'ang med// rgyud chen bklags pas 'grub pa nyid// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rtog med dngos
144a3(rgyud): grub sbyin pa po// srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' bar// gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis// nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzang ma// rin chen gzi brjid 'bar ba yi// 'phreng ba 'khrug pa lha mo ltos// 5
144a4(rgyud): phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur// phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa po// de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid// ma dag pas ni dug tu 'gro// dag pas bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur// 'khor/
144a5(rgyud): ba'i rnam pa he ru ka/ 'gro ba sgrol ba'i gtso bo nyid// gang gi gzugs kyi 'gyur ba nyid// de ni nga yis smra yis nyon// snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la// byams pa'i thugs las yan lag gnag/
144a6(rgyud): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// phyag ni stong pa bcu drug nyid// gug skyed kyis ni sangs rgyas lnga// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro ba/
144a7(rgyud): nyid// de nyid gsum ni spyan gsum mo// sha ni puk+ka si ru brjod// de bzhin khrag ni ri khrod ma// gdol pa mo ni khu bar brjod// g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dag/ pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun// rus pa bden/
144b1(rgyud): pa bzhi po nyid// bdag med mas gsol pa// sngags btu pa ni ji ltar 'gyur// gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yi// las kyi dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'ang/
144b2(rgyud): rdo rje can chen po rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa/ sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis// lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// puk+ka sIs
144b3(rgyud): brgyan stong pas mnan// mdog dkar mthar ni swA hA sbyar// 'dis ni bzlas pas bum gyis ni// 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed// dang por yi ge'i bdag po gzhag/ de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas//
144b4(rgyud): mthar ni swAhA sbyar byas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed// rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// dang po yi ni gnyis pa la// stong bcas mthar ni swAhA sbyar// sangs rgyas kyang snod shes rab
144b5(rgyud): can dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// ra dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan// stong bcas swA hA yang dag ldan// mi rnams thams cad sdang bar byed// dang por yi
144b6(rgyud): ge'i dbang phyug gzhag/ lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la// stong pa mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan// mthar ni sAhA mngon spyod che// yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyin// hUM ni khrag dang 'dra ba la// mthar ni swA hA thig
144b7(rgyud): le mchog/ dga' bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs// gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin// g+hu ni yang dag rab tu sbyar// mthar ni sA hA yang byas na// lha dang me rnams gsod par byed// dang por rnam
145a1(rgyud): par snang mdzad gzhag// dang po nyid kyi dang po la// dornam par 'gro ma dang sbyar// mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la// rdo rje mkha' 'grom dang ldan// yang ni dang po'i rtse mo/
145a2(rgyud): la/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// yang ni de nyid yang dag ldan// steng du chom rkun ma yis brgyan// de rjes hrIHyi rnam par sbyar// mthur yang swA hA spyod/
145a3(rgyud): pa nyid// ku ru kul+le'i sngags so// oM ni dang po bzhi pa yi// gsum pa chom rkun ma yis brgyan// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// pi tsu badz+ra sbyar ba dang // ul+la rnams kyi bzhi pa la/
145a4(rgyud): puk+ka sI yis rnam par brgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// kye yi rdo rje'i snying po'o// snang mdzad dang po dz+wa la
145a5(rgyud): gnyis// sbyar nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan// b+ha s+pha rI 'i rnam par brgyan// ul+lA rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan// stong pas man/
145a6(rgyud): cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so// dang por rnam snang dang po yi// dang po nang gi dkar mos brgyan// gsum pa nyid kyi da
145a7(rgyud): bo la// nang gi dkar mos rnam par brgyan// nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa'i gsum pa me yis brgyan// hUMg rnam pa gsum sbyar nas// lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang // gsum pa/
145b1(rgyud): dang ba mapa swAn/ byug drug pa'i grags so// dang ponam snang bzhi pa'i// dang babyin pa yang dag ldan// ro langs pasas rnam par brtan// bar gnas pa yi gas pa pa lA/ rgyu sgra rnamis rnam par/
145b2(rgyud): brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // rdo rje ma yis rnam par brgyan// k+Sha ni chom kun ma yis brgyan// lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang // su'u rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha
145b3(rgyud): 'gro ma yis brgyad// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te// phaT dang mthar ni sAha nyid// phyag gnyis pa'i sngags so// bdeg med dang po'i dang po dang // gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang // gsum pa
145b4(rgyud): nyid kyi dang po dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi dang po nyid// dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA// grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngag
145b5(rgyud): kyi bzlas pa ni 'bum mo// mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang // k+Sha yi rkang pa gnyis 'gyur nyid// hUM gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan// dang po rnam snang phaT nyid kyi// rnam pa nang bcug mthar
145b6(rgyud): sAhA/ sa skyong ba'i sngags so// dang por rnam snang de rjes su// rdo rje ma yi mtha' ru hUM// bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyis brlab pa'o// dang por rnam par snang mdzad nyid// de rjes a kA ro su khA// sur+b+ba
145b7(rgyud): rnams kyi gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa ni// steng du me yis rnam par brgyadan// d+harmAN+Ti rjes rdo rje ma// byin la d+ya nut+pan+da tAta/ oM AHhUM phaT swar+tha/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/
146a1(rgyud): ci'i rdo rje las sngags btu ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas chos kun sdom cig pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byas gsungs// bdag med ma la'o/
146a2(rgyud): mdzad nas// bzlas pa'i yul ni rab tu dbye// shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid// dbang la tsan dan dmar po nyid// lung tang gis ni mngon spyod nyid// ri raM shus ni sdang ba la// rta mi rus pas
146a3(rgyud): smod pa nyid// bram ze'i rus pas dgug pa nyid// glang po'i rus pas char pa la// ma he yis kyang gsad pa la// rengs par 'o ma'i btung ba nyid// dbang la rang gi 'dun pas spyad// gsad pa la/
146a4(rgyud): ni si rba nyid// dgug po la ni bzhi mnyam nyid// sdang la sA la skyes pa brjod// bskrad pa nyid la gla rtsir brjod// yang na mtha'i sha dang / dang po'i sha dang / na dang po drang / ga dang po dang / ha dang po nyid
146a5(rgyud): kyang de bzhin no// kye'i rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // kye'i rdo rje la dam 'khyud cing // tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// lus can rnams kyi
146a6(rgyud): rigs kyi gzugs// de la bdag med mas zhus pa// b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni// 'khor lo'i 'dren pas 'di skad gsungs// lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis// shes rab pha rol phyin/
146a7(rgyud): mnyon// bud med dam ni skyes pa yi// gang gi srin lag rtsa ba la// rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa// mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid// rnam snang mdzad kyi 'khor lor gyur// dpag med mgon gyi 'das skyes nyid//
146b1(rgyud): rin chen 'byung gi rin chen nyid// las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang nag po nyid// de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa// rdul 'byor pa gang dkar po che// de yi lha ni rnam snang mdzad// rnal 'byor/
146b2(rgyud): pa gang sngo bsangs che// de yi lha ni don yod nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che// rin chen bdag po rigs kyi lha// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyid// 'od dpag med pa rigs kyi lha// rnal
146b3(rgyud): 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser// de ni sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur// skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas// nga rgyal mi bcag mtho mi btsam// kun rdzob gzugs su gnas nas ni// de rnams bde
146b4(rgyud): gshegs rigs su 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// ji ltar skyes pa de bzhin no// kun rdzob tha snyad tshul las ni// de yi rigs su'ang de 'gyur ro// b+ha gar ling ga'i 'o mdzad nas/
146b5(rgyud): de la rdo rje che mnyes nas// bdag med ma yis go mdzad pa// lha mo rab tu mchod pa nyon// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang // gcer bus phyag rgya che byas nas// rnal/
146b6(rgyud): 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// 'o dang 'khyud pa byas nas ni// de bzhin b+ha gar reg pa nyid// skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa dang // ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi btung ba nyid// rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan ma las/
146b7(rgyud): bol ldan pas lag pas bya// khyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin shin tu skal pa yis// yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya// steng dang 'og tu lte ba nyid// dngos grub rgyas pa thob pa ste// sangs rgyas kun dang /
147a1(rgyud): mnyam par 'gyur// de la ga pur btung bar bya// de la ga pur rgyu yi phyir// sha ni bzang ba nyid du 'gyur// khyad par du ni chang nyid do// kye'i rdo rje las lhan cig skyes pa'i/
147a2(rgyud): sbyor ba'i don gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje can gyis dbang // bzhi pa'i don ni bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid// tshe dang dril bu chen
147a3(rgyud): po zung // di ring rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba// bdag gi gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// sems
147a4(rgyud): kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro// lha mos dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma// khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che// khyer la mchod pa rtag tu gyis// ye shes 'di ni
147a5(rgyud): ches phra zhing // rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu// rdul bral mthar byin ni ba nyid// khyod rang yang ni de yi pa// rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni// oM pad+ma su khad+hA ra ma hA rAg su kha dAd tsa tur
147a6(rgyud): nan+da b+hA ga bi shwa hUM hUM hUM kAr+yaM ku ru ShA me/ oM badz+ra ma hA dr-i Sha na tu rA nan+da dra ya kAH/ kha ga mu khaM ka ra so nA tha hUM hUM hUM kAr+yaM ku ru Sha me oM AHhU~M/ spyi bor ni oM gyi rnam pa// snying kar ni hU~Mg rnam pa/ ze 'bru la ni AH'i rnam
147a7(rgyud): pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//
147b1(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang // bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar
147b2(rgyud): skad du/ Ar+ya DA kI nI badz+ra pany+dza ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza kalpA rA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'
147b3(rgyud): bems bcas dang ba dang // go skabs med dang 'byed pa dang // sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang // sems can khams dang yid 'ong dang // sems can snod dang 'jig rten dang // sa dang sa 'og
147b4(rgyud): bar snang dang // yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni// gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang // drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang // bzhi dang skye 'gro rnams dang ni// gcig gis nyi shur ma tshang dang //
147b5(rgyud): khams gsum ma lus pa dang ni// pha dang bu dang ma mo dang // phyi rol dang ni nang dang ngam// btsun mo kun dang chos dang ni// thams cad las dang bdag med dang // 'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes/
147b6(rgyud): bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang // de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang // chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung dang // nam mkha'i khams dang rang dbyings dang // bdag med pa dang bdag ces dang // dngos
147b7(rgyud): po med dang dngos med min// bde ba can dang gru gsum dang // a skyes dang ni skyor bral dang // rdul bral dang ni sdig bcom dang // dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang // mthar ni zhi ba'i bde
148a1(rgyud): rig dang // gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa la// sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lU yi bdag
148a2(rgyud): po gcig pu nyid// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje// las ni dkyil 'khor lnga gsungs pa// rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid/
148a3(rgyud): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // rta bdun rgyal po lnga po'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dkar mo rkun ma ro langs ma// g+hasma ri dang puk+ka sI// ri khrod gdol pa g.yung mo'o// rdo rje phan pa'i dkyil/
148a4(rgyud): 'khor du// skam pa zhags pa nyi ma dang // dol zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin// me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char// rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi lag ma dang mar me dang // rin chen sgron
148a5(rgyud): ma glog lag ma// lA s+ye la sogs mtshams char ro// pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrog dang // 'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// gling bu ma sogs mtshams kyi char// bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas
148a6(rgyud): so// rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sgo lcags lnga kyog ma// sko ma dang ni gos 'dzin ma// de bzhin mtshams su spyan la sogs// rdo rje mkha' 'gro de rnams kun// rkang pa g.yon pa brgya
148a7(rgyud): bas gnas// snying khar g.yon bcangs sdigs mdzub ste// kha dog sna tshogs che 'bar ba'o// shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang re// gau rI la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu gti mug rmongs chen las/
148b1(rgyud): skam pa ma sogs cher gzung ngo // shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba// nyi ma la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu 'dod chags chen po la// pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o// phrug dog
148b2(rgyud): chen po'i sgrib chen las// sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro bdag/ rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni// gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che// rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib
148b3(rgyud): 'phrog/ rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po ni// 'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro phrag dog che// theg pa gzhan ni rnam par sbyangs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mi bskyod
148b4(rgyud): ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas// skye 'gro mi zad mgron gnyer phyir// sgrib pa lnga ni 'joms pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhe sdang gti mug
148b5(rgyud): nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams// bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo la// rdo rje gzugs ni du ma 'dzin// shin tu gdug pa drag po la// zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te// 'di mkhyen rdo rje can chen ni/
