148b6(rgyud): rang gis kye yi rdo rjer 'gyur// shin tu steng par zhen rnams kyi// yod min brtul zhugs 'dzin rnams kyi// sangs rgyas gti mug spyod don du// rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// shin tu nga rgyal
148b7(rgyud): gdug rnams kyi// skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid rgyal// nga rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms// byang chub chags bral las skyes spangs// sems can gang zhig bde byed pa// chags
149a1(rgyud): pas byang chub rab grub phyir// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gnas shing // gang zhig lam gzhan nas 'gro ba// de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir// rdo rje mcho/
149a2(rgyud): 'gro rang gtsog// dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid// de dang de yi ngo bor 'gro// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// gang dang gang gis dngos po yis// skyes pa rnams
149a3(rgyud): kyis yid sbyor la// des ra de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs nor ji bzhin no// gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste// de dang de yi rnam par yis// chos kyi bshad/
149a4(rgyud): ba bya ba'o// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i// sems can sna tshogs rang bzhin can// sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis// skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas// de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas// sems kyi
149a5(rgyud): rdo rje rnam par sbyang // sems dag pa ni bde ba yi// nyon mongs dug ni thams cad 'phrog/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na// de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// 'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir//
149a6(rgyud): thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin// lta ba rnams la log rnams kyi// bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi// bdag zhen bsam pa bzlog pa'i phyir// stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de phyir
149a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes// thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste// sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byad
149b1(rgyud): brgyad cur ldan// de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang // de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no// thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhi ba sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
149b2(rgyud): de nas rdo rje khams gsum thob// rnal 'byor ma ni rdo rje gur// dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba// 'khor lo rab tu bka' stsal pa// glu ni rdo rje can la dbul// gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul/
149b3(rgyud): ha rI mchog la de bzhin dri// 'jig rten rje la bza' dang btung // gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog la// 'di rnams dam tshig dam pa ste// rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yis// rdo rje can kun mnyes
149b4(rgyud): par byed// a ka ru gnag kye rdo rje// phan pa la ni tsan dan dkar// dmar po 'jig rten rjel 'bul// kha che rdo rje snang ba la// bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad de// hUM rdo rje las byung ba'i dri// 'di rnam/
149b5(rgyud): dri yi rab sbyor bas// dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer 'bul// mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la// skur ba rdo rje nyi ma la// de bzhin lan tshwa 'jig rten rjer// rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam//
149b6(rgyud): bska ba rab tu brtag par bya// kye yi rdo rje rdor can gyis// me tog mdog gnag rkang 'thung byung // ma l+li kA dang ma la ti// kun da rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bul// shing gi dbang mchog dri med mdog/ snang
149b7(rgyud): byed la ni sbyar bar bya// dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang // b+han d+hu dmar po pa ta lar// pad+ma gar gyi dbang la 'bul// rta mchog rdo rje can la kun// rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor khru/
150a1(rgyud): bzhi pa// snang byed la mi khru lnga nyid// pad+ma ga ra dbang drug pa ste// lcags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun// bza' la rdo rjenyi ma yi// lam du ljags kyu mchog gi dang // gnyid la sangs rgyas/
150a2(rgyud): mgon po yi// shin tu bde la gar dbang gi/ glu gar de bzhin rol mo'i sgra// sa gzhi yongs su gzung dus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas su// bdag gi rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub// rdo rje'i dbang
150a3(rgyud): po sngon po ste// zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi// mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me tog dmar// nor bu dmar rgyal mkha' mdzod kyi// pad+ma dmar po spya ra ras gzigs// rta yi yang mar ka ta ste// rin lnga'i rdul
150a4(rgyud): gyi rdul tshon mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur 'byung po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// dam tshig yang dag rab phye bya// kun tu bzang po'i sa bon bdag/
150a5(rgyud): dbang po sngon po lta bu'i 'od// phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste// mdzes pa'i khro bo yi ni lus// dbang ldan 'byung po mnan pa ste// g.yas pas rigs kyi bdag po nyid// lag pa g.yon pas mi
150a6(rgyud): lpags nyid// gnyis po dag gis phyag rgya sbyor// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas yang dag gnas// cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste// mgo 'dzings phyed du bcings
150a7(rgyud): par ni// ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// 'byung po 'dul bar 'grub par 'gyur// gnod sbyin du ma 'byung po dang // gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo dang // me mo lha yi mdzes mni// sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub/
150b1(rgyud): sngags ni/ oM b+hU Tha TA mar b+hU tA ti pa ti ma k+Sho b+ha ki ri TI na sarba b+hU Sha pre ta bi ga tsisA d+ha la paT/ de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje thar stobs po che'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// d+har /
150b2(rgyud): rab tu dbab bya ste// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam// der ni gru brgyad dgod par bya// stobs po cher ni rab sbyor bas// de rnams rngam yang dag mnan// char med spobs po che las ni// chu yi tshogs
150b3(rgyud): ni dbab par bya// kha dog gnag cing cher gsal ba// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste// skar nyi rdo rje gdan mdzad pa// phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag
150b4(rgyud): bsnams// phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags zlas shing / hUM dag nang du chud byas te// phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar bar bya// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyid// gsum pa ser po'i
150b5(rgyud): mdog lta bu// bzhi pa dmar po nyid du brjod// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis yang dag brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par brgyan// klu rnams kyis ni char dbab phyir// stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya// de nas
150b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur smra ba pos sangs rgyas kyi de kho na dbye bar bya'o// rdo rje pad+ma'o byas dang // ri dgas brgyan pa zos pa dang // rdo rje chu 'thung nor
150b7(rgyud): ldan pa// sangs rgyas de nyid 'di rig pa// dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang ba// rdo rje rin chen kun khyab pa// gang gyur nga yis bshad par bya// phan pa'i grong khyer yid 'ong bar// pa pa/
151a1(rgyud): 'gro rdo rje lu gu rgyud// zhen pa chen po sangs rgyas kun// lcags sgrog rdo rjes bcing bar bya// dga' ldan du ni 'deg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob// rgyal ba mgon po/
151a2(rgyud): byams pa ni// ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas// rgyal po'i tshogs rnams bcing bar bya// gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na// sgrog gis bcings nas dgug par bya//
151a3(rgyud): rdo rje kyo ba dkar mo che// rdo rje zhags pa chom rkun ma// rdo rje lcags sgeg ro langs ma// rdo rje dril bu g+hAsma rI// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang du byed// bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' ba'i// dngos grub gal te
151a4(rgyud): mi ster na// de tshe mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis// sangs rgyas rnams ni drag shul sgrub// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par
151a5(rgyud): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor 'bum// rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bum// 'bum gyis rdo rje nyi ma yi// 'bum gyis rdo rje chos kyi'o// 'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste// 'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag
151a6(rgyud): lngas kha lnga yis las ni rab rgyas pa// lnga yis sangs rgyas gar mkhan nyid// stong phrag gsum cu dag gis ni// ku ru kul+le'i brtag pa'o// lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni// cho ga'i rim pa rgyu kun gyi'o//
151a7(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro kye'i rdo rje'i// 'bum phrag lnga ni bris pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa blo dang ldan pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// gar dang glu la rab zhen pa'i//
151b1(rgyud): sems can rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas par mngan ros pa mdzad// sangs rgyas gar ma lan rdo rje yis// 'dod chags can gyis byang chub sdub// de nas rdo rje can 'thung ste// me tog rnaMs pa/
151b2(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// sems can kun la phan ldan pa'i// dam tshig der ni bshad par bya// sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa sgong las skyes pa 'am/ mngal las skyes pa/
151b3(rgyud): 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa can nyid rnams sam/ 'du shes
151b4(rgyud): med pa rnams sam/ sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o// dam tshig che bshad de nas ni// zur mig mi g.yo mgon byung ste// mi bskyod ye
151b5(rgyud): shes brnyes ldan pa'i// ston pa la ni rnam par smod// ci khyod dam tshig hUM zhes bya// thub pa chen po gzhu can yin// nga ming snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan// bdag stobs bcom pa min nam ci//
151b6(rgyud): ci khyod dam tshig oM zhes bya// khyod ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams// nga ming rnam par snang mdzad dpal// khyod ni me bcom 'dod pa bral// ci khyod dam tshig aHzhes bya// mnga' bdag mkha' lding
151b7(rgyud): mkhyen nam ci// nga ming padra gar dbang dpal// khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad mkhan// ci khyod dam tshig tA~M zhes bya// khyod ni gdugs te tshab 'phrog gang ming rdo rje nyi ma dpal// gdugs kyi rnam khyon/
152a1(rgyud): ji ltar min// ci khyod dam tshig khaM zhes bya// khyod ni mkha' stong rang bzhin no// nga ming rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yan// khyod ni rta ste pha rol 'gro// ci khyod dam tshig snying rje chang /
152a2(rgyud): e ma chang 'tshong mdzes ma'o// mi g.yo bdag min ma mA kI// zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci// ci khyod dam tshig zhi ba nyid// bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci// bdag ni ma yin lha mo sbyin// spyan/
152a3(rgyud): yin na ni g.yo dang bcas// ci khyod dam tshig 'dod chags che// smad 'tshong ma la slar ci yod// bdag ming lha mo dkar mo'o// ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin// ci khyod dam tshig dbang byed che// btsun
152a4(rgyud): mo'i pho nya min nam ci// bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma'o// sgrol ma mig ni bcom pa yin// mig yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal// de ltar ngo tsha med pas legs// ngo tsha med pas sangs rgyas min//
152a5(rgyud): mthong dang mi mthun myur du spros// de nas rdo rje mig yon po smod pa pos gsungs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs// 'dod la zhon pa 'jig rten bdag
152a6(rgyud): ser sna rdo rje snang byed do// don yon skyon ni thams cad byed// 'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no// sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa 'am// drod gsher skyes dang mtha' 'khob bzhin// gzugs can rnams sam/
152a7(rgyud): gzugs med dam// rdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes// khyod kyis dang po gsungs pa ni// khyod nyid sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// de rnams ji ltar rgyal ma mdzad/
152b1(rgyud): de nyid phyir na brdzun gsungs pa// mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs// sems can bslus na khyod kyi gang // sangs rgyas nyid de ngo mtshur rmad// 'chi bdud tshe'am mu ge 'am// phas kyi 'khor lan/
152b2(rgyud): gnod pa dang // rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // char med pa dang zhi ba dang // sngags dang bsgoms par ldan par ni// gang zhig bdag ni rtag rol pa// de yi mdun du bdag 'dug ste//
152b3(rgyud): der ni brdzun du mi 'gyur ro// slob dpon lnga dang lha mo bzhi// mi g.yo bdag nyid smod pa'o// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// khams gsum
152b4(rgyud): de bzhin rtsa ba 'am// ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gar// bde ba dga' bar byed dang bcas// chos 'byung grong khyer nyams dga' bar// rdo rje dam tshig gru
152b5(rgyud): yis dang // rdo rje rkang pa'i gom pas gar// mthar ni rdza rnga lA s+ye sogs// phyag rgya chen po rab ster ba'i// de nyid 'dir ni cher gsang ngo // rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' ji bzhin// rab tu 'bad pas
152b6(rgyud): bsrung bar bya// glu sna tshogs dang / rol mo'i snga dang / gar dang / 'dul bar 'jug pa dang / char dbab pa dang / mi gso ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i le'u me gnyis pa'o// de nas rdo rje/
152b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 'byung ba'i gtor ma gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya// dbang po shar/
153a1(rgyud): kyi 'dapa mar bsam// mthar byed na dgod par bya// rgyu bdag nub kyi 'dabam la// byang du nor sbyin dgod pa bya// seng ni byin pachen pa na// bden rdul ma sa
153a2(rgyud): skyong de bzhin no// rlung du gnas med bsam par bya// dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso// \u0f88\u0f90nyi tshangs pa la sogs dang // tshangs pa'i ros ni dam pa dang // tshangs pa'i 'dun 'du nyid dang /
153a3(rgyud): dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang // rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni// gang zhig 'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang // gtsang ma'i gnas su gang gnas
153a4(rgyud): dang bde ba can du 'dug pa dang // 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten khams// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang // de kun steng du gnas par bya// chos 'byung nang du son
153a5(rgyud): pa ni// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang // de bzhin mtha' yas nor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan nyid// pad chen pad+ma bzang po can// lha min dmyal ba sems can rnams// chos kyi 'byung /
153a6(rgyud): gnas 'og tu'o// oM las tshangs pa la sogs lha// hUM las ma chags pa la sogs// AHlas stobs kyi rgyu la sogs// lag gnyis gdod gcig ldan pa ste// steng gi lha rnams dkar
153a7(rgyud): po che la dbang po la sogs nag por mtshungs// stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che// rang mtshungs rigs ma lus sprad ldan// rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel// g.yas brkyang bas ni stan la gnas/
153b1(rgyud): tshangs sogs rtag pas phyag rgyas gdab// mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis// stobs kyi rgyu sogs gar bdag gis// thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o// dkar mos dgug par byas
153b2(rgyud): nas ni// chom rkun mas ni zhags bcings pas// ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings pas// g+hasma rIs ni dril bus dbab// de nas mchod de zhabs bsil dbul// sngags ni 'di yis bsang gtor
153b3(rgyud): byaHoM AHhUM/ phyi nas 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya// sngags ni 'di yis gshegs su gsol// yoM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya// ma nu pA la ya// badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su toSh+yo me b+ha lA/
153b4(rgyud): su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba kAR+Ye 'u me tsit+ta shre yaM/ ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga wa sarba ta thA ga to badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+ra b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa aHmuHde nas rdo rje 'dzin
153b5(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur rdo rje ming gi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye ba'o// ming gi dbang gi dus su ni// slob ma bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba/
153b6(rgyud): ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid// bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang / sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma rdo rje
153b7(rgyud): dang / pad+ma myu gu'i rdo rje dang / a la la rdo rje dang / pad+ma lcags kyu rdo rje dang / ye shes rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang / yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang / shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang / snying rje m+bu
154a1(rgyud): gu'i rdo rje dang / dam par dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje dang // 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje dang / shes
154a2(rgyud): rab rdo rje dang / pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ni dag pa'i gnas su phyag rgya chen po grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no// bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje snyems ma dang /
154a3(rgyud): rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang / rdo rje e ma'o bde ma dang / rdo rje bdag med ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje 'dril shing dang / rdo rje/
154a4(rgyud): mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba ma dang // rdo rje lA s+ye ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma dang / rdo rje 'khyud ma dang / rdo rje phye ma dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'byung ma dang /
154a5(rgyud): rdo rje chen po mo dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma dang / rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje do shal ma dang / rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje kong ka n+da dang / rdo rje lA ma dang / rdo rje dbugs dbyung ma dang / rdo rje rnam pa ma ni ma sa
154a6(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams kyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur pa/ kye yi rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rnam snang chen po dang ni rang byung dang // rdo rje ar l+li skems pa'i khro bo dang //
154a7(rgyud): de bzhin du yang rdo rje'i khro bo nyid// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang // he ru ka dang snying rje'i stobs nyid do// rtag pa dang ni gti mug rdo rje dang // rnam par snang mdzad dang ni thams cad skyob//
154b1(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas oM mdzad dang // sku yi rdo rje rab tu grags pa dang // sa snying dang ni gti mug chen po dang // gshin rje'i gshed dang tho ba'i dbang phyug dang // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
154b2(rgyud): dang // sangs rgyas zhes bya rab tu grags pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma de nas rin chen bdag/ rin chen rgyal po nyid de bzhin du yang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang ni rgyal po che// rdo rje bdud zil gnon dang snang byed/
154b3(rgyud): dol rta mgrin dang ni 'jig rten bdag po dang // rdo rje chos dang spyan ras gzigs dang ni// pad+ma gar dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang // 'jig rten mgon po rab tu grags pa'o// dam pa'i rta dang rta yi/
154b4(rgyud): rgyal po dang // bdun gyi rgyal po de nas lcags rgyal dang // dam tshig rdo rje dang ni rta mchog dang // de bzhin du yang las kyi rdo rje nyid// don yod dang ni don grub rgyal po dang // rdo rje mgyogs 'gror
154b5(rgyud): rab tu grags pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' de nas rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba phyag na rdo rje dang // dpe med ro mnyam shin tu dga' ba dang // dam pa dang po bde ba chen po'o// 'dod chags zhe
154b6(rgyud): sdang gti mug dang // dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni// 'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod// 'dod pa'i thar pa rab sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum
154b7(rgyud): pa'o// / rdo rje snying po sngon byang chub// brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid// sgyu ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa ste// rdo rje gar ni gsum pa'o// bzhi pa sna tshogs brtag pa ste//
155a1(rgyud): rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa'o// brtag pa drug pa stobs po che// brtag pa bdun pa mi g.yo mgon// brgyad pa gzugs kyi brtag pa ste// mkha' 'gro ku ru ka l+le dgu/ bcu pa
155a2(rgyud): 'dul ba'i brtag pa ste// rnam par snang mdzad bcu gcig la// dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa// sgrol ma'i brtag pa bcu gsum pa// rdo rje phag mo bcu bzhi pa// bco lnga pa ni gzibaci
155a3(rgyud): che bdag med brtag pa bcu drug pa// gshin rje gshed kyi bcu bdun pa// hUM mdzad la ni bco brgyad pa// dbyangs can gyi ni bcu dgu pa// sbyin sreg brtag pa nyi shu pa// rab gnas nyi shu rtsa
155a4(rgyud): gcig pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i brtag pa ni// nyi shu rtsa ni gnyis su 'dod// gtor ma'i brtag pa nyi shu gsum// nyi shu bzhi pa sta gon gnas// mngon par rtogs pa nyi shu lnga// de bzhin phyag rgya
155a5(rgyud): nyi shu drug/ byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// gru ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// gar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni// sum cur gcig med sum cu pa// brtag pa sum cu par ni ba shad// stong phrag sum cu'i grangs
155a6(rgyud): kyis ni// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'bum phrag lnga yi rgya mtsho che// kye yi rdo rje rdor 'chang gi/ rgyud ni e ma rgyas brtan pa// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje// dag pa'i snying po yongs
155a7(rgyud): su gzung // rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa ste// 'di ni rgyud kyi nges pa'o// ce yi rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyud// dang por rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// de nyid bud med gzung phyir ro//
155b1(rgyud): ma 'dang rjes ngan byam pa las bsdus pa lags// bskal pa bzung pa la byang chu skyem sa dpa' rnams dang sam bya rnams nga phyu thu / da nabyas lan
155b2(rgyud): ji ltar na de rnams thos par 'gyur// ji ltar na sems par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye bo phal pa tshe thung bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ re zhig gang dag slob dngan
155b3(rgyud): rnams su 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag spyod pa po de rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dgas su'i sgra ba de rnams srog chags
155b4(rgyud): gsod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
155b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par gyur cing dgyes pa brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa/ snying rje chen po kye rdo rje// da ni dur khrod chu 'gram dang // nags
155b6(rgyud): tshal skye bo med grong du// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// mtsho skyes rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong // sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang // rkang 'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu ni// nga ni sangs rgyas
155b7(rgyud): dngos grub ster// tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni// tshong dus rnam pa'i khyim du ni// rdo rje nyi ma brtan pa nga// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang // chang 'tshong ma yi
156a1(rgyud): khyim du ni// 'di ltar ba d+ma gar mkhan pa// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ste// rag tu 'gro mchogs zhon 'gyur dang // nges 'ga' lam du 'gro ba na// ta ni don yod/
156a2(rgyud): brtan pa nga // dngos grub rdo rje rnams ster ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// phyag rgya dang
156a3(rgyud): phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa// sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pa las// phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par bya// sku la lag pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya// sems
156a4(rgyud): la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yin// de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o// lag pa g.yas na skam pa ste// g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro skam pa ma 'jigs ma// gdug
156a5(rgyud): pa rnams kyi 'khur ba 'don// g.yas pa'i lag na zhags pa ste// gdug pa rnams bcing rnam par dgug/ de 'di zhags pa ma shes bya// g.yon pas gdug pa sdigs mdzub ma// g.yas
156a6(rgyud): nanya rgya zlum po ste// gdug pa rnams ni dkri bar 'dod// 'di ni rtag tu dal zlum bshad// g.yon pas gdug pa sdigs mdzub mdzad// lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste// gdug pa
156a7(rgyud): rnams ni dgug par 'dod// 'di de rdo rje gyo mar bshad// g.yon pas bdud la sdigs mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas panyi ma ste// gti mug mun pa rnam par dral// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mar/
156b1(rgyud): ni bshad// do ni rdo rje'i mar brjod/ lag g.yas par me'i sdong sdod de// de bzhin g.yon par sdigs mdzub bo// 'di de rdo rje mar myer bshad// rnam par rtog pa'i rab ba 'joms// lhag pa/
156b2(rgyud): gsas na rin po che// sems can rnams la sbyin pa ster// g.yon ni sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rin chen sgron ma 'dri rab brjod// glog ni lag pa g.yas par te// rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu 'dzin 'dzum
156b3(rgyud): de 'di glog lag mar shes bya// de bzhin g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas par pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya// g.yon pas sdigs badzub ma nyid de// 'di ni
156b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro pad+mar brjod// g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste// bde ba chen po rnam par 'brel// g.yon ni sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni chos 'byung mar ni brjod// g.yas pa'i lag na ljags
156b5(rgyud): ldog ste// byang chub zhen pas kun 'ching ba// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni rdo rje sgrog mar brjod// sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching ba yis// bdag nyid 'khyud par 'dod pa'i
156b6(rgyud): byang chub chags pas rab sgrub ma// de 'di rdo rje 'khyud par bshad// g.yas pa'i lag na sgra sngags te// ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo// g.yon na sdigs mdzubu 'dzin pa mo// 'di de rdo rje sngo lpags
156b7(rgyud): brjod// gams pa'i lag tu rdzo cog sa// ye shes blangs nas gcod pa mo// g.yon sngags mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di rdo rje lnga kyog brjod// galas pa'i lag tu mamon// me shes byas pa/
157a1(rgyud): ma spangs pa// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di ni rdo rje sgo mar brjod// lag pa g.yas par mol ba ni// rang mtshungs btsun mo srung ba nyid// g.yon na sdigs mdzub
157a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje yol ba mar ni brjod// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro lnga ni rab sgrub phyir// mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud gsungs so// de nas
157a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya 'phrog pa 'di ci nyi tshe ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya 'phrog pa
157a4(rgyud): lags sam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer can gyi 'jig
157a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams na rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yod de// 'di ni de'i yin te/ De baM hA ya sa ga ma ne'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par rtogs pa ste/ thams cad kun tu nam
157a6(rgyud): mkhar spyod par grub pas 'di ni mkha' 'gro mar rab tu grags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad tshig 'dri thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba nye bar skyes par 'gyur ba dang /
157a7(rgyud): tshig 'ad gsol pa/ sem mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud// rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang // tshogs su rtogs par dka' ba dang // rig dang mi rig pa nyid pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa
157b1(rgyud): la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/
157b2(rgyud): 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi bsdu ba yin// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/
157b3(rgyud): sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa ngas srid pa las bskal bar bya'o// zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i phyir na srog chags rnams
157b4(rgyud): bsad pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnams spangs lags/ lta ba rnams las log rnams dang // btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud bshad do// bde ba'i thabs
157b5(rgyud): ni mdor bsdus pa// gzhung nyung don ni rgyas pa ste// blo dman rab tu sad byed pa// rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges// sngags rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
157b6(rgyud): nge 'dzin to// 'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma nyid kyis// sngon du gar gyis mchod byas te// rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
157b7(rgyud): gal te rdo rje chos dang ni// dmachog rdo rje nyi ma yang // bdag gis spangs na mi 'grub ste// nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yum gyi gzugs kyis skyed par byed// de rnams kyi ni mdzes pang // de lang
158a1(rgyud): ni dngos grub ster// mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang // ral gri sa 'og sgrub pa dang // ri lu mkha' la spyod pa dang // mi sdang ba dang bcud kyis len// rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur/
158a2(rgyud): nyid dang // bu mo dam pa dgug pa ni// bdag mnyes pas ni sgrub pa pos// dngos grub rdo rje rnams thob bo// spros pa rnam pa mang por ni// spras pa 'dir ni ci zhig bya// bdag spangs nges par mi 'grub/
158a3(rgyud): cing byang chub med cing bsgom pa med// gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing // rtag tu klog cing sems pa dang // sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzlas pa dang // nga yi sku ni sgom byed pa// gal te sgyu ma'i tshul
158a4(rgyud): gyis sam// gal te rmi lam 'dra bar lta// shin tu bsgom pa'i rim pa las// mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las// de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya// rdo rje pad+ma/
158a5(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las// gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster ba// lus can de la smos ci dgos// gang zhig nyi ma gcig bsgom pa// rdo rje'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba las// shes rab
158a6(rgyud): pha rol phyin dngos grub// ster te 'di la the tsom med// bdag nyid he ru kar byas shing // rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas// gang zhig rnal 'byor cher 'dod pa// de rnams la ni nga mnyes 'gyur//
158a7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing // spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang // glu dang rol sgra'i rnam pa dang // 'dod kun bden pa spro ba dang // sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa dang // sna tshogs ro yi btung ba dang // sna tshogs/
158b1(rgyud): gos ni ri mo can// sna tshogs dri yi b+hag pa li// gang zhig bdag dang dag nyal ba// de yi dngos grub ser bang // phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug pa// de 'i 'dod pa mar gyur to// oM sa sU 'i A su sbyaraH/
158b2(rgyud): le l-I e e mo yo a swahA/ gang shig 'dis ngaskul bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de rnams kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'i bde ba yang dag par gnas kyi 'dug go// rdo rje ma ni shar du sbyin par bya'o//
158b3(rgyud): sngo phyogs su dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o// nub phyogs su ni chu'i mkha' 'gro ma'o// byang du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o// dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam
158b4(rgyud): par byed pa de'i bdag mdzes ma ste// phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma'o// gri gug dang skyes pa'i thod pas 'brel ba// stag gi pags pa bgos pa/ spyanu gsum pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/
158b5(rgyud): phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ shar gyi sbyor ni dkar mo chen ma'o// lhor ni chom rkun ma'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor ni chu ma'o// de bzhin du byang du ni g+hasma ri'o// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka si'o// 'tshe/
158b6(rgyud): pa'i mtshams su ni ri khrod ma'o// srin po'i phyogs su ni gdol pa ma'o// rtag tu 'gro bar ni gsung ma'o// 'di rnams ni mtshams dang mtshams bral du sbyin no// gang zhig bdag rab tu sgom
158b7(rgyud): par byed pa de'i lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nus so// thams cad kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs pa rab tu son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro mo chen mo dpa' mo// g.yon pa la
159a1(rgyud): T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa// rang gi
159a2(rgyud): rig ma skyes bu'i chus/ bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis// rdo rje thugs ni rab bsgoms pas// rdo rje can bsam dbang bskur bya// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms pa// der ni dbu rgyan sbyin par bya// thams cad
159a3(rgyud): sngon sbyin nges bsam nas// rdo rje'i tshogs bcad sbyor ba las// rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa// snying khar rang gi lag pa bya// slob ma'i 'jig rten dbang phyug byas// rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur bya// sas
159a4(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni// de ring khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// bzang bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje bzung // slob ma lcags mchog lha mo ni// sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par/
159a5(rgyud): bya ba lag pas rdo rje dril 'khrol zhing // rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra d+hi pa ti tAM b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya ste/ slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni// ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra
159a6(rgyud): satwa tAM b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badz+ra nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyi rang gtsor gyur// de de bdag nyid he ru ka/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o// 'di de
159a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas// rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung // oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya staM d+ha ra ya mi hIH
159b1(rgyud): bi hi hi hi hUM/ kun kyang cho ga gcig pa yis// rtag tu tha med mchod pas mi / slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin// phyis ni rdo rje la gnas lag/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems dpa'/
159b2(rgyud): dga' chen po// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i bdag/ yang ni der ni dril bu sbyin// shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i// rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba// sems can kun gyi
159b3(rgyud): don gyi phyir// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // dbugs 'byin thams cad byin/
159b4(rgyud): nas ni// shAkya thub par rang gyur pas// slob ma chen po lung bstan te// sangs rgyas nyid du the tsom med// khyod kyis 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med// de bzhin nad dang tsha ba med// bde chen theg pa
159b5(rgyud): rin po ni// 'di las nga yis lung bstan bu// oM e Sho he bya ka ro mi tAM badz+ra satwa swa thA ga ta/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te// shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub phyir// kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin/
159b6(rgyud): gshegs pa yi// ming ni rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rig ma chen mo'i dbang gi dam tshig bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje son
159b7(rgyud): pa pos// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba bton te// tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ bla ma rdo rje rnams mchod cing // bdun po rnam par dag par bya// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// chos kyi 'byung gnas
160a1(rgyud): rnam par bsgom// de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams nas// rnam pa lnga ni bsgom par bya// dang po skyes bu bsam de nas// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro// dri za mnyam/
160a2(rgyud): par zhugs pa ni// khu bar rjes su dran par bya// mtshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bskul nas ni// mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum
160a3(rgyud): dgod// byi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste// ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang // dbang ni rig ma brgyad rnams kyi// yang ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang // lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa nyid// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa
160a4(rgyud): bstod pa'o// rang byin brlab pas byin rlabs te// de la yan lag drug bsgom bya// phyi nas yang ni dam tshig gi/ cho ga'i go roms rim pa yis// mtshan ma yang dag mtshon par bya// dang po sprin gyi/
160a5(rgyud): rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin// bzhi pa mar me nyer 'bar ba// lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste// sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid// de ni thams cad
160a6(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i rgyu// dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar// rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub//
160a7(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams// ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa// de yi rjes su thams cad 'brang // ji srid skye gnas las byung ba// khams gsum las
160b1(rgyud): ri nyams dga' bar// phyag rgya chen po rabasbyar bas// de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi rdo rje rnam thos nas// dga' zhing rangs par gyur/
160b2(rgyud): nas ni// smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan// rig ma chen po bdag med dang // rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang // rta mchog thub pa chen po dang // rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che//
160b3(rgyud): rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen po ni// sku gsung thugs ni nyid dang yang // lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur// lan cig rgyal po ston pa yis// 'phral du mngon sum byed pa po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
160b4(rgyud): rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te tshig 'di gsungs so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa// zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che// phyag
160b5(rgyud): ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzi brjid chen po zhabs bzhi pa// sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs can te// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// rus pa'i rgyan
160b6(rgyud): gyis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// dkar po dmar pos rnam par brgyan// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// bdung bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste// spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa
160b7(rgyud): mchog/ der ni rdo rje mdog nag po// 'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya// dbang bskur ba yi gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan// glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// mi dang sa ra b+ha byi la/
161a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// drod dang zla ba nyi ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa/
161a2(rgyud): brgyad na'o// skyes bu chen po bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod// zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la// ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du// reg dang bdag med bsgom
161a3(rgyud): par bya// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid// lag pa dri gug thod pas brel// srog song steng du yang dag gnas// sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang /
161a4(rgyud): de bzhin rkang 'og gnas pa mo// 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// gnas gsum du ni gnas par sgom// oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni// sku yi rdo rje rnam par brgyan// thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che// rdo rje sems
161a5(rgyud): dpa' gnas na bzhugs// a ni mchog gi de nyid de// ngag gi lam ni gsal byed brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus
161a6(rgyud): gnas par// dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo// dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmar po dkyil
161a7(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// chom rkun ma yi gzugs can sgom// bcom gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// rdo rje zhags pa mtshon chen po// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ro langs ma ni khrag dang
161b1(rgyud): mtshungs// rdo rje lcags sgrog nga rgyal byed// byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nas g+hasma rI bsgom bya// rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel// margad ut+pal 'dra
161b2(rgyud): ba'o/ rdo rje mo sbyong ma rdo rje brtson ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mtshams su lha mo bzhi rnams ni// cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// byang sems bum pa ri rab dang // me yi thab khung rgyal
161b3(rgyud): mtshan che// phyi bcas gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// mgon po de ltar sgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas// dpa' rlabs med pa'i bde ba 'thob// 'byung ba bzhi'i
161b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa po thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ hUM las byung ba'i khro bo ni//
161b5(rgyud): rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o// nang du ma rungs sems kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badz+ra mud ga ra hAstA ya tsan+da maN+Da lA k+She ra karA la hUM phaT/ de nas 'dir khro bo
161b6(rgyud): chen po bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing 'dar bar gyur nas mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dran par byed do// skyes pa'i pad+ma gas chag med//
161b7(rgyud): bsrubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis pa// rig ma bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // rkang rjes rdul gyi sbyor ba yis// rkang pas mnan cing bsdigs par bya// sku gsum
162a1(rgyud): bskyed pa'i sgom pa yis// bu mo chen mo dgug par bya// gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ma hA dad+ha d+ha ra bi ba d+ha ra sa ra su ram
162a2(rgyud): na b+hU tin+tir+m+ma tha hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar ba gyur cing de dran par byed do//
162a3(rgyud): 'byung po dgas sha za nyid// mkha' 'gro grul bum zil pa la// hUM gis dregs byas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje brtsir bas bde ba nyid// gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
162a4(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mr-i ti ku ru ma hA bi ShA na aHbtsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o// brgyal ba bsrung ba de bzhin no// pad+ma'i dregs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
162a5(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya ma hA daSh+Tong+ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ badz+ra san+do ha dar+thA ya/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po bgegs 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
162a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi dga' bar gyur to// rlung gis bteg pa po dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byang bzung ste/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod
162a7(rgyud): ci hU~M phaT ces bya ste/ hUM gis nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa/ khro bos sngags kyi rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed do// rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
162b1(rgyud): shin tu legs par gsang bar ni/ khya ba 'di ni rab bskul bar// ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste// nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM ya ma daN+Da ya nI lA ya nI lang d+hA ya tu ru raH/
162b2(rgyud): mu ru mu ru sarba duwAn ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshar pas sems can thams cad dang / sangs rgyas rnams srog la the tshom du gyur to// brgya phrag brgyad
162b3(rgyud): bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang shin tu sgom par sbyor ba'i cho gas bskul ba las gdug pa thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur ro// dbyig pas mnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man bud+d+he/
162b4(rgyud): b+h+yo/ na mo ma hA ba lA ya/ uts+tshaSh+ma kro d+ha rA dza ya~M sar+b+ba nA gA nAM hri da ya~M tA Ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas gtum po chen po bshad pas// dug gis gdong 'jigs shing stobs dang bral ba dang / skrag cing 'dar ba
162b5(rgyud): zur te stobs po che dran par byed do// rdo rje stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo a tsa la ke Na tsaT+Ta tsen+da moT+Ta mon+ta/ tun tuD+D+h+ya g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+haH
162b6(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba skyes bu chen po bshad pas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin chen po brgyal te sa la bgyel to// 'di ni khro bo rgyal po yis// seng ge zhon pa'i cho ga
162b7(rgyud): yis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las// skyes pa dang ni lha rnams khugs// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha d+hu/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya greh+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga waM bid+ha rA dza ya hUM phaT/ rdo rjes 'og
163a1(rgyud): gnas pa yis// khro bo chen po bshad pa yis// lha mon bu mo klu mor bcas// nu pa 'dar zhing nar ba 'am// rdo rje zhags pas nges bcings te// lcags kyu yis ni dral nas ni//
163a2(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// bu mo thams cad dgug par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chos ni char sprin che// rdo rje sems dpa' char mchog
163a3(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje nyi ma dge 'dun che// rta mchog tshogs ni chen po dang // phan pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi// zhags pa lcags kyu'i sgom pa yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs brjod na// so so skye bo spos
163a4(rgyud): ci dgos// rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsams// sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par brgyan// lcags kyu la sogs sbyor ba las// bu mo bkug la bza' bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen
163a5(rgyud): pos dgug pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM Dak+ki hUM dzaHkha ti dang ni btsag la yang // rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// zla ba nye bar chags dus su// khar bcug/
163a6(rgyud): nas ni bsgrub par bya// ming ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang // bairgya ni gsal bar bzlas pa yin// sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag/ chung mar bcas pa dgug par bya// dam tshig lcags
163a7(rgyud): kyu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan sngags dang ting 'dzin gnas// rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdag/ dgug pa'i gnas su gzung bar bya// thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// na maH
163b1(rgyud): sa man+ta bud+d+hA na/ na maHsa man+tad+harmA NA/ na maHsa man+ta sa d+hA na~M/ oM sitwA ta pa tra/ oM bi ma la// oM shaM ka ra/ oM pra t+yaM gi ra/ oM badz+ra muSh+NI Sha tsakra wa ti sar+b+ba sar+b+ba man+ta mU la kar+m+ma ban+d+han tra Ta nA kI la nA bA ma ma kr-i te/
163b2(rgyud): yen ken tsi tA kri totata/ sarban+d+ha ts+tshin+da tsIn+da/ b+hin+d+ra b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ d+hun+yAn+na r+b+ba hU~M hU~Md+d+ha hU hU hUM phaT phaT phaT/ bdag nyid srung ba'i sbyor ba la// sbyor ba rgyang sogs gcig pa la/
163b3(rgyud): dpung ba'i rig mar gyur byas nas// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'da' mi nus// khro bo chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang // yid gnyis thams
163b4(rgyud): cad rnam spangs la// rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na// thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// khro bo chen po 'khor lo'i sngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
163b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// yang dag nges par rab tu dbye// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/
163b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom bya//
163b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te// ta yi don yod rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzug
164a1(rgyud): brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rtag bsgom bya// thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis// snying khar ye shes gnas su dgod// ye shes sems dpar
164a2(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang // phyag rgya dang ni phyag mtshan brtag/ spro dang bsdu ba byas pa ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'byung ba nyid//
164a3(rgyud): sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnam
164a4(rgyud): la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad bdag nyid// dril rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni// rin
164a5(rgyud): chen phung por rab tu grags// rol rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid// rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs// reg la rnam gsum
164a6(rgyud): rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod 'bras bu ster ba po// srung ba'i dam tshig bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsgom par bya// lnga lnga'i
164a7(rgyud): bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes ldani rnam par bsgos// 'dod pa'i yon tan lda dang ldan// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab// sna tshogs las ni byed par brjod// thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil mtsham
164b1(rgyud): mi nyi shus lnga'i dbye ba yis// rdul tshon gyis kyang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// phung po lngar ni rab tu thags// sangs rgyas mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// shar gyi char ni rab tu
164b2(rgyud): grags// g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma yi// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yi// byang du rta yi rgyal po yi// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yi// shar du dkar po chen po ste// lho ni ser po yang dag ldan// dam
164b3(rgyud): po nub kyi cha nyid du// bcod ni byang du yang dag ldan// mtshams kyi char ni thams cad dang // sgo yi logs dang sa phubs su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis ma
164b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor re rer bsgom pa'am// yang na
164b5(rgyud): bsdus nga'i dkyil 'khor ro// brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa'am// yang na nyi shu ru wA ru// gang tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yi// sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog de bzhin rdo rje nyid//
164b6(rgyud): 'jug pa'i sgo srungs dgod par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di bka' stsal to// dom dang bya rgod de bzhin pas// sdug glang dang ni stag nyid dang // spre'u dang sna thung ba glang
164b7(rgyud): 'tshe// rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na'o// khye'ug chu skyar seng ge dang // mtshor gnas de bzhin ra dang ni// ri dgas phag dang yang dag ldan// g.yas min par ni rtag tu gnas// rma bya ma he chu sridan dang // nya yi rgyal
165a1(rgyud): po rus sbal dang // 'og gi rlung dang ngang pa dang // ri bong phan pa'i g.yas pa na// sbal pa thu bo sprin shugs kyis// kha chu mig sman mtshungs byi la// g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin
165a2(rgyud): bzhad// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// ka ran da dang 'khor lo dag/ lug dang tsa ko ra dang ni// bye khra hor mo 'ol ba dang // ku rar nyi ma'i g.yas na'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang // rig
165a3(rgyud): ldan pad+ma pad bzang dang // 'jog po nor rgyas mtha' yas ni// rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o// gza' lag phur bu mjug rings dang // sgra gcan mig dmar pa wa sangs// spen pa khyab 'jug rta
165a4(rgyud): rgyal nyid// g.yas pa nyid du rab tu grags// dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag/ 'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can// gcer bu dang ni thag bzangs ris// stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na'o// blo dang
165a5(rgyud): dbugs dang de bzhin 'bog/ khong skem mdze dang rkang shu dang // mchin pa mcher pa'i rang bzhin yang // glang po la sogs rab tu grags// lcags stegs dang ni brjed byed dang // khrag rdo
165a6(rgyud): gcod nad rgyal po dang // gzhang 'brum sman dang bkres nad dang // mig ser dom la sogs pa'o// rdzi ma bya dang so nad dang // mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung // bad kan 'dzag dang
165a7(rgyud): lus skam dang // s+ya rbab 'bras ni rma bya sogs// rkang 'bam tshil nad rlig spangs dang // zlu ma 'phel dang gsud pa dang // tshang pa rims dang rab gas ni// kar N+Da sogs rab tu grags// rlung /
165b1(rgyud): mabris de bzhin mthu ba// sgrib g.yogs rab rib gcin sri ba// gzhogs byed na dang lkog 'bras dang // rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o// me yi 'gro ba dam pa ni// rab mchog de lta bu/
165b2(rgyud): 'gro ba// thams cad nad kyis khyab mthong nas// sangs rgyas lngar ni cher grags pa// bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya// sems can rnams la gdungs ma gyur// nad rnams zhi phyir sangs
165b3(rgyud): rgyas ni// glang po la sogs nad 'dzin to// de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa la// nad med ru dza trang grum med// 'chi med nges par bya d+hi med// nga rgyal med cing gti mug med// bkres pa med cing
165b4(rgyud): sgom pa med// sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med// lha dang lha min ma rnams sam// gang gis kyang ni nad byed min// nAd thams cad rab tu zhi ba dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
165b5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus thams cad 'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi rjes dran dmigs nas ni// sangs
165b6(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom// sems kyis rin chen bsams nas ni// chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom// las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'khor lo chen po rab bsgom bya// rnal 'byor
165b7(rgyud): 'di ni mchog rab ste// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje rnam snang bsams nas ni// phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas
166a1(rgyud): ma bdag / rdo rje'i phyag rgyu'i sbyor bayis/ den chen phung po rab bsgom bya// chos kyi phyag tu rabastor bas/ las kyi don phyag rgyas gdag / zhe sang rnal po rgyal po ma/ gyun/
166a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad zad par mdzad// spro zhing sbyor bar bsgom par bya// bsdu ba yang ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// spro dang bsdu
166a3(rgyud): ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya// sems kyi rin chen rin po ches// bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad// sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis// yang ni bsdu ba bstan/
166a4(rgyud): par bya// chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che// spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de// thun tshod bzhir ni byin brlabs pa// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsam/
166a5(rgyud): nas/ gzhal med 'bras bu stsol ba'o// rta mchog char sprin chen po yis// bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal
166a6(rgyud): to/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyis rnam par bsgom par bya// rnyog mad dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// swa yi yi ge rnam par bsgom// khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus
166a7(rgyud): gnas par// sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par// gsung gi yi ge rnam par bsgom// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// don yod yi ge gzugs can/
166b1(rgyud): sku gsum mi byed bsgom pa yis// ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mi byed pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang la// rin chen sems kyi rin po che// bad+ma bzang po 'dab ma ma /
166b2(rgyud): shes rab ral gyi don yod kyi// shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyis/ rnam rtog ri bo gcad nas ni// phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba brgya par ni// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par
166b3(rgyud): bya phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang // rin chen phung po 'od chen dang // chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las// sna tshogs 'od zer cher 'bar ba// sangs
166b4(rgyud): rgyas sprin gyis rnam par brgyan// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang // thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs//
166b5(rgyud): mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya// dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi// ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar// sangs rgyas
166b6(rgyud): kun mnyam rnal 'byor pas// skad cig la ni gnyis med 'gyur// ru rak+Sha dang dung ral gyi// bri yi 'tsho ba pad 'bras dang // mu tig la sogs byu ru sogs// bsam gtan ldan pa sngags
166b7(rgyud): bzlas bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang rang btsun mo// mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir// sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par brjod// dper na skyes chen la la
167a1(rgyud): zhig/ skad kyi nga ros bos pa na// thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa// de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs// 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang // nam mkha'i 'am/
167a2(rgyud): kyi mkha' grong du// phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs// rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// gang
167a3(rgyud): gis sngags kyi rim thob pa// e ma de yis byang chub thob// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin// rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas// mtshungs pa med/
167a4(rgyud): pa'i ye shes 'thob// de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te// sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa// 'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te// de ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa brjod// sangs rgyas nga rgyal
167a5(rgyud): dmigs nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba// gang zhig bsgom pa de bas na// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur// 'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te// ji ltar chos ni rtog
167a6(rgyud): med pa// sems cad khams ni de ltar bshad// rnam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gi/ rin chen sems ni dri can byas// sems dag pas ni dag par gyu
167a7(rgyud): jiltar rnam mapa' mi 'jig pa// dam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems// sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las// sems nyid bsgom pa sangs rgyas kyi// skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid ko na
167b1(rgyud): rkyen sems las snyir chu pa'o// ngas rnam me c-ing gang gas// ya gas pa'i nas do pa/ la zur chung ba me// med kyis sangs rgyas mas /
167b2(rgyud): gsum dbang phyug rten rjes// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal lom// sems gcig gis ni thob par gyur/ gzugs dang dang de bzhinan/ 'odang ga bya'i rung ba na te// sa
167b3(rgyud): ni mchog tuni// 'din rin chen mchog tu brjod// gzugs dang tshor ba 'dushes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid// 'di dag thams cad sems lus skyes/ zung ba 'di ni gdon/
167b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// 'dod don 'bras bu rab ster ba// sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin dag/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster// de nyid phyir na sangs rgyas kyis// sem
167b5(rgyud): kyis rdo rje bskul ba yis// zab mo'i rnam pa nges ldan pa'i// phyed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
167b6(rgyud): nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te// bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang // rnam pa/
167b7(rgyud): lnga po bsgom pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang // rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub dang // dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang // mchod bstod bdud rtsi la sogs pa// rim pas rjes
168a1(rgyud): su bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod// oM sar+b+ba thA ga ta ya b+hi She ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&6/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad/
168a2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA mr-i tra sA dan badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&6/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sU
168a3(rgyud): badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka&haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ bcom ldan 'das de
168a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA ru rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces
168a5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// spro ba dang ni bsdus pa'i sku// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad de// chos dbyings yi ge las skyes pa// des ni sangs rgyas gnas dgod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nI la ya
168a6(rgyud): badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// 'byung bzhi'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid// de yi steng du sangs rgyas
168a7(rgyud): bsam// spos nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya// rdo rje la bu mi phyed phyir// des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya// ma skyes rjes su dran pa las// rnam par snang ma 'ang phan pa nyid// rin chen rnams
168b1(rgyud): kyis mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rin chen sems su bshad// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// 'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las// rdo rje sebs dpa'i gnas 'dug pa'i// sems ni 'dod/
168b2(rgyud): chags zhes byar bshad// gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ster// de phyir don yod rab tu grags// rig ma mdzes ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste// gnyis
168b3(rgyud): pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor dam pa bris nas ni// dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis// haM dang bsam gtan
168b4(rgyud): bskyed byas nas// de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// mkha' 'gro lnga dang ldan pa dang // dam tshig lnga yis bkang ba dang // mkha' 'gro ma yis tshogs ldan pas// rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor
168b5(rgyud): bas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas la// slob ma rtag par nges bsams te// rgyun gyis rigs kyi ming gis ni// slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur// spyan dang bdag mo sbrul mAm dang // dkar
168b6(rgyud): mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyis// rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas// rdo rje tha med bshad par bya// bla na med pa'i de nyid 'di// gnyis su med cing yi ge med// chos kyi dbyings ni 'on/
168b7(rgyud): gsal byed// bde ba bzang po'i byung gis// sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gdang ba zhes bya ba dang / dang po mthar yang ba ldan pa'i// rab tu gsal ba dam pa
169a1(rgyud): ngas rtsub thams pa ga// rgyags rgyag/ gsasungs mapas s+ho/ smra pa nas gyu pa// na
169a2(rgyud): da rnams thams cad ras te// don gzi brjid sus chen po// 'jig can kun gyi yid 'phrog sa// pas kyi rgol pa kun las rgyal// 'jig rten kun gyi bdag thos brgyan// rnams cani 'dren pa
169a3(rgyud): brjod// mkha' 'gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur// chos kyi zas ni za ba po// dam tshig chen po'i bsam gtan zos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa// nad rnams thams cad
169a4(rgyud): rnam par spangs// rtag par chu shel chen por ldan// rdo rje nyi ma rgas pa med// don yod rgyal po chen po ni// rdo rje srog gi yan lag 'byung // don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan// des ni rnal 'byor par ni
169a5(rgyud): brjod// mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las// stong phrag lngas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// phan pa'i sa ni khri ru brjod// rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje'i 'bum// tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang // bdun gyis nam mkha'i
169a6(rgyud): ji srid bshad// rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag/ 'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid// 'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor pa// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes// 'di
169a7(rgyud): ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod// chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyi// thabs dang shes rab zhon pa dag/ khams gsum dag ni thams cad/
169b1(rgyud): sa drang sa 'og par snang la// khrag dang khra bas khyab pa'i lus// rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs// sen mo baspu de bzhin khams// khu ba la ni rnam snang gzigs// dpags dang zag la
169b2(rgyud): gzi brjid che// tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rtsa dang sha la bdun rgyal po// 'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar// rdo rje mkha' 'gros rnam par bshad/
169b3(rgyud): sa yi khams ni rnam dag pa// spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes pa nyid// rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// pad+ma'i bu mo che ba nyid// sgrol ma rlung ni rnam par drag/ rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes
169b4(rgyud): bya'o// gur gyis de rnams bka' stsal to// sngags thams cad rnam par dag par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te le'u bdun pa'o//
169b5(rgyud): khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba// thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rte
169b6(rgyud): dod gyi phyir// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni gti mug rdo rje longs sbyong ba// sku yi bdag po rjes kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/
169b7(rgyud): ri khrod pa de bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten ldan srad du// seng pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje longs sbyong ba// gsung dag
170a1(rgyud): legs par so sor rtog pa yis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// gtum par ldan pa bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du/
170a2(rgyud): stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong ba// gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/
170a3(rgyud): Dom pa bdag la mgon pos myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// thams cad bzhes par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
170a4(rgyud): 'dzin to// 'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi// 'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po de skad gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta khe tsa rI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma
170a5(rgyud): ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hU tsa rI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA tA la wa si nI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams kyi// byin brlabs gnas su rtag par ni// ye shes
170a6(rgyud): rdorje can gyis bya// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor ba// sku yi rin chen sbyang bar bya/
170a7(rgyud): bsam gtan rdo rje bsam nas ni// sems kyi rin chen rab sgrub byed// rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// ngag gi rdo rje dri ma med// gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas// mig gi rnam par shes pa sbyang // zhe sdang rdo rje
170b1(rgyud): bsams pa yis// sra yi sgo yi bsams pa'o// sna ni ser sna rdoH yis// ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje yis// lus ni phrag dog rdo rje yis// yid ni kun tu bzang po yis// de nyid mkha' 'gro bdag med ma/
170b2(rgyud): 'di rnams kyis ni rnam par sbyang // gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang // de'i tshe rgyal ba'i dngos po sbyang ba yod// kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas pa ni// 'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par bsgom
170b3(rgyud): chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa la// gang zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa// 'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te// chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag tshig pa rnams kyi gdung
170b4(rgyud): dang dug khyab pa'i// lus kyi sman ni gzhan gyi dug nyid de// ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la// yang ni chu ri thabs su 'gyur ba nyid// ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyi// de bzhin mkhas
170b5(rgyud): pas mon sran gre'u bzhin// 'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi// skye bo 'dod chags me yis gdung // 'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa// 'dod chags spad pas zad par 'gyur// 'dod
170b6(rgyud): chags rdo rje yongs shes pas// yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhags pas 'ching ba yis// 'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod// 'dod chags bral ba'i mngon byang chub
170b7(rgyud): 'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod// de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yi// sgrub thabs sbyin sreg las kyi ni// go chas 'dod don thams cad kyi// sgrub thabs yang dag rab bshad bya// de la 'di rnams
171a1(rgyud): ni gasngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TAM mA ma
171a2(rgyud): kr-i te Sham+b+ha ya/ sam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+pe staM b+ha ne tA re swA hA/ ma mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya// phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa/
171a3(rgyud): ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar bsgom// gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar// rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu brgya can// lang tshe
171a4(rgyud): la ni bab pa'i lus// g.yo ba gser gyi rna cham// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan// rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung // g.yas pas mda' ni 'gengs/
171a5(rgyud): ba'o// rdo rje lpags kyu ut+pa la// sdigs mdzub g.yon pas 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje spel krung sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya// shar dume tog sgrol ma ste// kha dag dkar/
171a6(rgyud): zhing yid 'ong ma// yi ge oM las skyes pa'o// me tog 'phreng bas lag pa khyab// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// g.yas su bdug spos sgror/
171a7(rgyud): ma he/ mdog gnag mdzes pa'i gzugs can pa// spos dang dung gis lag pa zel// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// nub tu mar me sgrol ma se// mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab
171b1(rgyud): mdog seng rnam par rgyun chen po// g.yo ba gser gyi rnamam// khwa ba du ji la sgrol ma ste// dri yi dung gis lag khyab pa// khrag gi mdog sar la mo na// dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya// lcags
171b2(rgyud): rtswa la sogs rab dbye bas// der ni sgo yi srung ma bsam// steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma// 'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab bsgom// 'khor lo klu zhabs bsnams nas ni// spro zhing sngags ni
171b3(rgyud): bzla bar bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sAhA/ yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu// pha rol phyin bcu la gnas ma// 'bras bu thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// sngags ni
171b4(rgyud): mchog dang phul du phyin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// bklags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste// rdo rje gur gyis bshad pa'o// sngags 'dis gos kyi thu bar bdun// mngon par sngags
171b5(rgyud): bar bya ba ste// mdud pas bcings te nags tshal du// 'gro na'ang sus kyang mi 'khyer te// stag dang / chom rkun dang / chu srin sna 'thung dang / seng ge dang / sbrul dang / mche ba can dang / ma he
171b6(rgyud): dang / dom dang / stug glang la sogs dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yi ba bo// sngags 'dis ut+pa lA la sbyin sreg ji srid du lan brgya rtsa brgyad ji tsam bsku bar bya ste/ oM tA re tut+tA re a mu ka me/
171b7(rgyud): wa Sham+ma na ya swA hA/ yang sngags de nyid kyis khwa'i sgro la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te dgra'i khyim du sbas na// nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed do// e tA re tut+tA re tu re tsa la pra tsa la shI g+h+raM/
172a1(rgyud): gA mi ni de wa dat+ta/ uts+tshaHSha hUM phaT/ de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re ta re/ a mu kA b+hI d+hA na ku mA rI ma d+ya mung+ga he na ta s+ya si ta dzA yA tsAn+tu me sA hA/ spa tshil dang /
172a2(rgyud): gtum pa'i sa bon dang / myos byed dang / a shaM ka'i lo ma dang / me tog sreg blugs bya zhing / mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag lnga'i skyon sreg ni bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te/
172a3(rgyud): nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM swas+thA na ta A kaR+Sha ya ma mIn+ta ke dzaHsngags 'dis/
172a4(rgyud): ba dA ra'i tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog sreg blugs bya bar brjod pa 'di byas pas skyes pa skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo'ang 'gugs par byed do// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla mtshan 'dzag
172a5(rgyud): pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig ma/ lag pa lcags kyu dang / ut+pal dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas me tog 'di rnams
172a6(rgyud): bza' zhing legs zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod nas phyi nas sgom pa dang ldan par sngags bzlas so// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kI ma ma i ba si taM swap+taM ka thA ya hUM phaT/ stong phrag lngas 'ong bar
172a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhags pas mgrin par bcings te/ lcags kyur drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te/ khol mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur
172b1(rgyud): bsgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par bya ste/ bdag gis mig gnyis mig sngan gyis bslu bar bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par bya'o// de nas rgyal po slob ma dang 'dra/
172b2(rgyud): bar gus par byed cing 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / bka' drin stsol zhing snyan par brjod par byed pa dang / bran du yang dag par 'gro zhing khros pa'ang dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mngon sum du mthong
172b3(rgyud): ba dang dro mtshar dang bcas pa'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ kha gnyis pa'i so dug thal bar byas/ ba kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang /
172b4(rgyud): arka'i shing bal las sdong bu rab tu sbar la mig sman bsdu bar bya'o// mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o// thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bsku bar bya
172b5(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje mig gis gang bltas pa de/ gal te pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mi 'bab na de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma ma lags te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bkrongs pa lags so//
172b6(rgyud): ras gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba byis pa so med pa'i lce blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas bung ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang / ba grang gi gi wang lhan cig byas pas dpral
172b7(rgyud): bar thig le yongs su bzung ste/ gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba lto ba'i srin bu la gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya ste/ rdo rje dang lhan cig so rtsis
173a1(rgyud): byas la byin te/ sbyor ba mchog zos pa ni mi spong ba dang / gzhan du mi dga' ba dang / gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang / rang gi bdag po'ang spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur/
173a2(rgyud): ba mar khu chen pos nye bar byugs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par bya'o// bzlas pa'i mthar sA lu btags pas mdag gu'i dri ma la khu ba byas te/ gang la byin pa de lnga por yang
173a3(rgyud): mi spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla ba la nye bar chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing brten pa byas la/ de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te/ dung gi
173a4(rgyud): thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu drag ma nyid la sbyin te/ ji srid du sngar yang rjes su 'brang ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzugs kyis ma dan pa la lan brgyad yongs su
173a5(rgyud): bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu des rta mgrin dang lhan cig pas bskus na dbang du 'gyur ro// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu ka s+dza ban+d+ha ne muk+ti ku ru muHswA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma
173a6(rgyud): la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris lagane'u le'i khung bur sbas na bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu bshad/
173a7(rgyud): par bya'o// gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis phas kyis rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// lha mo phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig ma/ sku mdog dkar ba g.yid 'phrog ma/ skra
173b1(rgyud): phyed du li ba/ chu skyes shin tu dkar ba la yang dag par gnas ma/ lag pa gnyis par pad+ma mdog dkar ba yang dag par bsgoms shing / g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdo rje skyil
173b2(rgyud): krung du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ le ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o// oM las skyes ma/ mchog tu dga' bar byed ma/ dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed
173b3(rgyud): nas ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing / rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu goms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo bdun du sbyor bas bstan bcos thams cad
173b4(rgyud): shes par byed do// 'bum bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyi ma re re la tshigs brgya byed par 'gyur ro// rab tu 'bad pa med par gzhung brgya'ang 'dzin par byed do// de la sngags kyi rkang par gyur pa/ oM
173b5(rgyud): pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri brad+d+hi badz+ra ni swA hA/ khA mi zer ba na sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ ma bslangs pa'i sings po skyur po ji srid
173b6(rgyud): zla ba drug tu gang 'thungs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags// sgrub pa po yI nges par 'grug
173b7(rgyud): dal zhing zab mo chos dang ldan// thams cad rig par mkhas dang bcas// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing // rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son// de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig
174a1(rgyud): nyan thos spyod pa srung ba'o// sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang // gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan// rtsa ba'i ltung ba
174a2(rgyud): 'jobs pa po// sngags dang lus skyob sbyor ba yis// 'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed// de ldan bla mar bcas nas ni// gang zhig bla ma smod byed cing // skye bo bla ma smod pa gang //
174a3(rgyud): dmyal ba chen por 'tshed par 'gyur// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rdul ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dang por mchod// rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis// de ltar bla ma'i non tan bya// bla ma'i grib
174a4(rgyud): ma bud med dang // lham dang stan dang mal stan rnams// rmongs chen gang zhig 'gong byed na// skyes pa de ni spu gri 'dzin// legs par dbang bskur slob ma gang // bla ma'i bka'
174a5(rgyud): las 'da' byed par// 'jig rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar gnas// g.yo dang rtswa yi sbyor ba yis// brdzun gyis mi nus smra ba las// khang skems mthu
174a6(rgyud): nad chen po can// dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur // de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis// tha ma'i bsnyen bkur pha rol phyin/ khra mo'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na// dngos grub nas
174a7(rgyud): 'a 'grub par zung / tshogs kyi bas ni cig tu bya// zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul// snga par dge 'dun chos ston bya// tham sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya// tha ma la ni man dbul zhing /
174b1(rgyud): marjem sa tshags kun la'o// bdag gi las ni brtsams nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// yan lab rnan rnams kun gyis bca/ rdo rje'i rnan gyis rnam par brtan// dodzon la bu zangs/
174b2(rgyud): nas ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma gtang // me tog bdug spos mar me dang // de bzhin dri yi drung sogs galas// g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon sdod// mdun du snod ni gzhag par bya//
174b3(rgyud): zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis// me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin// lU s+ye la sogs mchod pa yis// mchod par byas na bzang por sbyin// me tog sgyur ba'i tshul gyis dang /
174b4(rgyud): dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang // sdong pos mar me'i mchod pa dang // byugs pa'i lus kyis rjes su dris// lA s+ye'i lag pa lA s+ye ste// 'phreng bas 'phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// glu yis
174b5(rgyud): hUM gi dam tshig glu// brla bskum pas ni gar nyid de// mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod pas mchod// 'dod pa'i
174b6(rgyud): dngos grub byed par 'gyur// bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' zhing // rtag tu 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' ji bzhin// 'di rnams bla med mchod pa'o// me tog spos
174b7(rgyud): sogs mngon sum du// 'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis// sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min// de nyid byang chub yan lag mi// dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod// ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la//
175a1(rgyud): dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste// tha ma'i las la nag po'o// zhi ba la ni me tog dkar// ser po nus pa'i rdo rje la/ me tog nag po tha ma la// dbang dang dgug la dmar po brgya/
175a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang // gang zhig rab gnas ma mthong dang // gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// dri yi dngos grub mchog
175a3(rgyud): nyid med// gang gis slob dpon gsol ma btab// 'dir ni rigs su skye ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// gang gis byang chub ma thob na// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gnas su de'i/
175a4(rgyud): skye zhing skye bar 'gyur ba'o// yang na sa yi bdag po nyid// dag pa'i gnas su mngon par 'gro// bde ba can dang mkha' 'gro dang // dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skye// 'jig rten 'dir ni gang 'grub pa/
175a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos// khams gsum bdag po chen po 'di// 'chi med rgas pus khyab pa med// tshangs pa brgya byin de bzhin drag/ sgra gcan me dang rlung dang ni// 'dod pa'i lha dang
175a6(rgyud): mthong ldan nyid// 'di rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur// lnga klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha ma yin dang mi// mi 'am tso dang mkha' spyod gang // de rnams 'khor 'gyur the tshom med// 'di ni rang
175a7(rgyud): byung bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rigs dang byang chub byed pa dang // de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs dang // khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa dang // rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang /
175b1(rgyud): gyi ba yongs su len pa dang // yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni// 'di ni gzugs ni du ma byed// sangs rgyas sems can bslab bzhed pas// sangs r+b+baH/
175b2(rgyud): gar ni rol pa mdzad// ri bong stag dang seng ge dang // glang po rnams kyi rigs su yang // snying rjes phan pa'i sems kyis ni// phyag rgyas grub pa skye bar 'gyur// bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis//
175b3(rgyud): 'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo // bud med smra ba sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin gzugs su// bud med rtag tu yang dag gnas// sgyu mchen
175b4(rgyud): mo gnas 'dug nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster// g.yo zhing dang tshe ngo tsha med// rtag tu 'dod chags pha rol 'gro// dngos grub kyang na rab tu ster// gzugs dang yon tan nor la yang //
175b5(rgyud): 'dod pa gang yang btsun mo med// rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas// rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan// skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang // bde gshegs bka' las mi 'da' zhing // bla ma
175b6(rgyud): bsnyen bkur snying rje can// kye'i rdo rje rab phye ba'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma gtso mo dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa// zhe sdang
175b7(rgyud): rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// ser sna rdo rjes bdag la skyabs// 'dod chags rdo rje bdag la rtsol// yid dang phrag dog chen po dang // rdo rje kun gyi sa dam tshig
176a1(rgyud): mgon// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// rdo rje can kun dgyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te dbyangs 'di
176a2(rgyud): gsungs pa// thig skud gsar pa mdzes par ldan// shin tu tshad ma gtsang ma yis// he zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// shes rab can gyis thig gra ba bya// de la 'di ni slob ma chen
176a3(rgyud): po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad/
176a4(rgyud): du gsol// dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ da ni snying rje stobs dpal ldan// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba po// rdo rje yis ni gsal
176a5(rgyud): ba'i lus// sku gsum las ni skyes pa spro// gal te la la 'da' byed na// 'jig ste 'di la the tshom med// lus srul po dang kha cig gang // bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang /
176a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes// zur cig bgegs ni chen po rnams// 'khor lo yis ni brgyad nyid kyi// cha yis sgo ni rab tu grags// sgo khang lha yi snam bu ni// sgo yi tshad kyi tshad du bya/
176a7(rgyud): sgo yi phyed kyi cha ru ni// ya phubs dang ni 'gram nyid do// rig byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya// dra ba'i snam bu rig byed byed// dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni// gnyis par mtshams kyi thig dang yang /
