176b1(rgyud): gsum par ngos ni bzhi yi bzhi// thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// tshangs thig cha gnyis bor nus ni// cha drug tu ni gdab par bya// de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas// dgra yi rgyar ni rab tu gdag/
176b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go/ oM kha hU~M d+h+waM/ de la 'di ni ye shes spyan drang ba ste// oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha dz+dza/ de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM sa ma ya su tra mA tiH
176b3(rgyud): ma hUM/ de la 'di ni rdul tshol bri ba'i dam tshig ste/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can khams ni thar par byed// kye yi rdo rje rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzheng bar bya/
176b4(rgyud): dbang ldan du ni sa ra b+ha// me yi mtshams su dge slong bri// chos kyi 'khor lo bden bral du// rlung ngu rdo rje bri bar bya// ljags kyu shar du bri bar bya// lho yi sgor ni zhags pa nyid// nubasgo/
176b5(rgyud): de bzhin lcags sgrog ste// byung du rdo rje dril bu'o// dbus su thod pa dkar po ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin sreg gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba// rdo rje
176b6(rgyud): thab zung sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i sreg rdzas sbyor ba las// zlum por zhi bar byed par brjod// rgyas par ra ba'i rdzing bu'i gzugs// dbang ni zla ba byed pa 'dra// dbug pa lani lcags kyi'i dbyibs//
176b7(rgyud): gsang dang na sdang las la ni// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin spong byed mal ngan dang // yan lag nyams pa'i sbyor ba yis// tsan dan a ka ru shing dang // gzhan yang dri yi nang 'thung
177a1(rgyud): gis sbyin sreg yan lag me thar nas// byis ni lang ni dgug par bya// oM mA h+ye hi mthan+dA k+Sha pa ra'i di dzas d+ha ma tho hrI d+hA yA pra ti ma d+har sa mr-irba~M hi b+ha ba lugs
177a2(rgyud): rgyu nyid kyis dgug par bya// zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing // lcags sgrog gis ni zhabs dag bcing // dril buM 'khrol bas dbang du byas// lA sta la sogs mchod pa brgyad// mnod yon
177a3(rgyud): cho ga byas nas ni// mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las// yang ni me ni mnyes par bya// de la 'di ni rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste/ oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ de la 'di ni zhabs bsil gyi dam
177a4(rgyud): tshig ste/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya satwa s+ya sarba pA paM da ha swA hA/ de la 'di ni bsreg rdzas thams cad 'chu ba'i dam tshig gi sngags te/ oM badz+rA na ma la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya/ sarba b+husmi ku ru sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/
177a5(rgyud): dr-i sh+ya dzAHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya staM a haM/ phyi nas rang 'dod pa'i lha spyan drang ba ste/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan+di ha b+hak+Sha Na sa ma ye na tsa a gan+ta sa mA ti tsi taM pU dza dzA rA pra sid+d+ha maM/ de la 'di ni dgyes pa'i dam tshig
177a6(rgyud): ste/ oM kr-i to baHsarba sa twAr+thaHsid+d+hi rbat+tA ya thA ru g+ha/ gan+d+ha d+hi bud+d+ha bi Sha laM pu na rA ga ma nA ma mu/ bzhengs pa dang / las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba dang / sbyin sreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
177a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab gnas ni// 'jig rten tha sad la gnas te// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// dang po re zhig rig ma 'dzin// dril bu
177b1(rgyud): 'grol bar 'dod pa dang // rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba las// g.yas par rdo rje gsong pa dang // srod rnan mang ni chag pa ni// gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang // rin+da nAn mar gyis mangs/
177b2(rgyud): gang ba'i// bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// oM de wa pi tsu badz+rA a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM mo ha ra ti ad+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM dwe ShA ra ti i d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM rA ga ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra go
177b3(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya dzaHoM badz+ra tsau ri pra be sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra bai tA lI ban+d+ha baM/ oM badz+ra g+hasma rI wa sh+yaM ku ru hoH'di ni ye shes dgug pa'i cho ga'o// shun pa lnga dang ba spu lnga// khyad par du yang dri lnga
177b4(rgyud): dang // lus bshal la ni blugs par bya// mchod yon la sogs sngar bzhin bya// yang na de nyid sbyor bar bya// sdu bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab// mig la sogs par gti mug sog+sa//
177b5(rgyud): rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyi// mchod pa la sogs rim pas brtsam// rang gi sing nas ye shes bsam// sangs rgyas bzhugs par bsang gtor bya
177b6(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// ma pas mchod pa'i la ma s+ho// byang chub sems mchog bsam nas ni// sangs rgyas brjod pa yang dag bcas// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// stong ngo po/
177b7(rgyud): song rjetha dad med// khyod ni nal 'byor mtshogs yongs su bskor// khyodon nyid kyi thugs kyi mchog mnyes pa// khung kyi rgyu dang mi d+hu'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shing // nying rje'i thugs kyis
178a1(rgyud): sems can sa mdzad pa// sgyu ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phen mdzad pa// bdu ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis gyes// rdo rje sa gol sbyor ba yis// do rje rlom pa sgom paraH/
178a2(rgyud): rdo rje yi ge blangs nus ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje phung po rnam par bsgom// de nas rdo rje mched pa bsam// rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba las/
178a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcug nyid// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bsang gtor bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus
178a4(rgyud): son par// rtse ma lnga pa bris pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// stobs kyis sangs rgyas phur bus gdab// chos 'byung grong khyer yid 'ong bar// rdo rje badzub mo'i sbyor ba las/
178a5(rgyud): gal te dngos grub mi ster na// rdo rje sems dpa' gsad par bya// oM du ru du ru/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ hUM hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma mo
178a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje chos// phyag rgya chen por brjod pa las// pad+ma dmar po spyi bor 'dzin// sku mdog dmar po stobs po che/
178a7(rgyud): gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba'i las// bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste// g.yon pa bla mdzes dri ma med// dang po dmar po shes par bya// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung //
178b1(rgyud): ba chungs// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs pan pa// rnga rdzams ni gzi brjid ce// 'ad chags chen pa'i rdzas chags pas// bdud pa'i mnyam par mnan pa'o// mabyor dkyil 'khod dadus
178b2(rgyud): gnas par// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam// sku mdog dkar po gzi brjid che// phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// chos kyi 'kho/
178b3(rgyud): lo spyi bor 'dzin// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa// spyan dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// 'jigs pa 'di ni 'jigs par mdzad// dang po'i zhal ni dkar po ste// nag po dmar pos rnam
178b4(rgyud): par brgyan// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma rnam par bsgom// cod pan rin chen 'dzin par bsam// rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che//
178b5(rgyud): phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// sems kyi rin chen spyi bor 'dzin// bcom gser ltar gzi brjid che// dang po'i zhal ni ser po ste// g.yas pa sngon/
178b6(rgyud): po 'dra ba'o// g.yon pa zla 'od bzang po ste// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgya nu ral ze 'dzin
178b7(rgyud): par bsam// mang gangad ut+pal mtshungs pa'o// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bab drug phyag gis rnam par brgyad// dang po'i zhal ni sngo bsangs te// yi gzugs te 'jigs pa 'o//
179a1(rgyud): g.yas pa kha dog nag po ste// g.yon pa tha mdzes dri ma med// ral gri dngos grub spyi bor 'dzin// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// rdo rje nyi ma rta nyid kyis/
179a2(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni sgrol ma'i gzugs// lha mo rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod// gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kye yi rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ ral gri dag ni rtag pa nyid// phan par me long
179a3(rgyud): de bzhin no// rta mgrin la ni gos bzang ste// rdo rje nyi ma la ni gser// rta mchog la ni 'gro mgyogs te// mchog tu phan pa nyid kyi yon// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// b+h+ra ma la Nas/
179a4(rgyud): rgyun du dbul// skal bzang rdo rje sems dpa' bdag/ skal bzang thub pa rnam snang mdzad// skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang // skal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
179a5(rgyud): rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin ba pos mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa// oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marda madz+ra/ badz+ra d+h+r-i ka phaT swAhA/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa na/
179a6(rgyud): rdorje skye ba'i snying rje che// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni// rdo rje'i dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rta mgrin gyi sngags
179a7(rgyud): 'di gsungs pa// oM badz+ra d+harmA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hu lu hu lu/ oM A ro l-i ka phaT swahA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam na// rdo rje chos ni grags chen po// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni// chos kyi dngos
179b1(rgyud): grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// phan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM swa shwa taM pa ra ma swa shwa ta e h+ye hi dzi na
179b2(rgyud): dza~Mka phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs// brgyal zhing 'jigs par gyur nas ni// de nas sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
179b3(rgyud): rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya ta mo bi d+ha ma na ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM a he rat+na d+h+r-i kA phaT sAhA/ de nas 'di ni bshad/
179b4(rgyud): tsam gyis// rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che// 'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni// nyi ma'i dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ rta
179b5(rgyud): mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// phuHphuHphuHhi hi hi/ pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka phaT swAhA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// rdo rje don yod rigs byung ba// 'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni/
179b6(rgyud): rnams don yod dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor de nyid de// rdo rje can gyi zla phyed mtshungs// rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma 'dra// nyi ma yid bzhin nor bu sbyin// rta mchog ces bya de yi ni//
179b7(rgyud): thams cad du ni grwa gsum mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// phan pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// rin chen rtog gi 'od byed ma// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya che// rus
180a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par ldan// stag gi pags pa bsnams pa dang // dbu skra thod pa phyed pa ste// mchod par brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis// chags pa mig
180a2(rgyud): dmar mthong nas ni// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las// chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje
180a3(rgyud): 'dzin rgyal gyis// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsam// me tog 'bras sogs kyis brgyan pa// nags chen po yi mtha' nyid//
180a4(rgyud): du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro bar bya// rags tshal du ni slong mo rgyu// zas ni bzang pos brgyan pa nyid// de rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas ster// nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun ni// rdo rje/
180a5(rgyud): can ni 'khor du 'gyur// skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun// skye bo gang zhig skye 'gyur ba// gti mug rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar//
180a6(rgyud): sgra ni gang zhig rab grags pa// rna ba'i drung du gnas pa bzhin// zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// drang srong mngon par shes pas thos// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// mtshon ka lta bu'i mtshan nyid/
180a7(rgyud): ni/ lag mthil skyu ru ra lnga bzhin// rdo rje'i sems kyis shes par 'gyur// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// rang gi rigs ni stong phrag gcig rdo rje sbyor bas dran 'gyur te/ nyi ma gsum bzhin dran par 'gyur/ sgyu 'phrul drab du ma yis/
180b1(rgyud): 'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yis sbyor ba yi// sangs rgyas mngon shes thob par 'gyur// rdo rje skye mched rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
180b2(rgyud): phan pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste// rdo rje nyi mas rgyas pa'o// rdo rje chos kyis dbang zhes bya// rdo rje sems dpas gsad par bya// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste// dbang ni yang dag brtsam par bya// rgyas
180b3(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste// rdo rje char sprin rab bsgom bya// rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bu mo bkug nas bza' bar bya// me li char sprin 'bab pa dang // gdug pa'i sems kyis
180b4(rgyud): gsad par bya// 'phrog pa las ni dkar mo ste// skye gnyis pa las tshangs pa nyid// dpal ni sred med bu las kyang // ma bcag pa las re b+ha nyid// rgam chu srin rgyal mtshan las// phyag
180b5(rgyud): rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams thams cad nye bar bza'// shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rtse// 'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthar ni swA hAs zhi ba ste// rgyas pa'i dus su bo ShaT+Ta/
180b6(rgyud): mthar ni hUM phaT gsad pa la// dbang dang dgug la dzaHdang hrIH// las thams cad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje gas
180b7(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub phyir// thub pas tshig 'di bka' stsal to// me tog 'bras bus brgyan byas pa'i// ri khrod dang ni sman ljongs su// rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni// bla ma sangs rgyas
181a1(rgyud): mchod par bya// dkon mchog gsum la gdag skyabs mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung /
181a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi// rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed
181a3(rgyud): bgyis nas// sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi
181a4(rgyud): po yis// sems kyi ngal ni bso bar bya// phyi nas byang chub sems gnas te// rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ bden dang rdzun par spyad pa yis// brtag pas nye bar mi gos te// ma
181a5(rgyud): skyes pa yi sbyor ba yis// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/
181a6(rgyud): bcu yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo bcu ni rim pas dgod// gshin rje mthar byed shes rab mthar// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// Dak+ki khro bo dbyug pa sngon// mi g.yo ba dang stobs chen
181a7(rgyud): dang // gtor tor gdugs ni dkar po dang // rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa ni// bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du// khro bo'i sgom pas bsgom par bya// dpag tshad brgyar ni khyab pa ru// bsam/
181b1(rgyud): nas bgegs ni bskrad par bya// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom
181b2(rgyud): par bya// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yang ni chu ni bsgom par bya// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen bsgom// dbang chen
181b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya// brum las gnas ni bsams nas su// rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag bya// ye shes lnga las byung ba yi// sems dpa'i gzugs
181b4(rgyud): brnyan bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/
181b5(rgyud): mig la sogs par gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' spyod ma// gsung gi rdo rjes spyod ma// sku la zhabs 'og gnas ma ste// oM AH
181b6(rgyud): hUM las byung ba'o// rdo rje dkar mo chu bdag ma// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag med ma// zhe sdang rdo rje'i gnas mnan cing // dkyil 'khor snying por bsgom par bya// dkar mo chom rkun ro langs
181b7(rgyud): ma g+hasma rI ni sgo srungs ma// puk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma// gdol pa g.yung mo mtshams su dgod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad// 'og tu de bzhin sa spyod ma// dbus su bdag
182a1(rgyud): med mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod pa che sprul pa// bdag kyang rab tu bslab pa'i phyir/
182a2(rgyud): nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas las byung ba stsol bar mdzad//
182a3(rgyud): ye shes kyi dbang la gsol ba gdab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rig ma'i skyes bu dbang chen la// cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha// des ni dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni// bstod dang /
182a4(rgyud): mchod pa la sogs bya// ye shes gzhug pa de bzhin yang // lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi myang // nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las// brtul zhugs can gyis sngags bzlas bya// rnal 'byor
182a5(rgyud): ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skye bar gyur
182a6(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ces spyad par bgyi// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// rnal 'byor ma zhes mngon par brjod//
182a7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po rab sbyor las// gang phyi de nyid brtan pa yi// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gu// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ces bshad// pha rol phyin pa kun gyi thabs// bsam gtan tsam gyis grub par 'gyur// dga'
182b1(rgyud): mdzes mkha' 'gro ma yis mtsho// mkha' dang gser gyi char pa dang // dga' chen ma dang g+hasma rI// shin tu dgyes rol gsang yig 'phrog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro phan rgyud brgyad// k+She li
182b2(rgyud): rdo rje sangs rgyas kun// gsang mdzod rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang // 'khor lo sdom pa gur gyi 'byung gnas ni// rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ni rab tu grags// skyes bu rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir//
182b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag bshad// btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya ba rnal 'byor de lhag la// sems can
182b4(rgyud): mchog la rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor gong med de lhag la// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ re zhig bdag cag gi yul rnams ni
182b5(rgyud): 'tshal na// sems can gzhan rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// stong pa snying rje tha dad med// gang du sems
182b6(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// mu stegs can sun dbyung ba dang // rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang // rang gi sde'i gzhung
182b7(rgyud): mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bdag gi byang chub thob bya'i phyir// gang phyir gzhan dag bsgrub pa'i phyir// des na sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// /
183a1(rgyud): la sa tha/ sa sa
183a2(rgyud): rgyas par dang ma ye// 'i slar mgon po rnam snang ma nga/ rje 'dzin sbyin tham yid dzas pa rnams pa tu mtsham 'grub partsam / jis dzin pa //
183b1(rgyud): ra narnam pa dban badzad/ shes 'bar pa rnams pa gyis/ rdzu ba po san// gtugasas / rlu yang ma pa sa'o// nga phyugs bya /
183b2(rgyud): bcugasam pa/ denasas ma 'dus d+d+han bya rdzogs dpar ba // mapa gro 'dag med mas 'byud pas khadang mi byung
183b3(rgyud): dza gzugs su bkas nas te// ngi wA 'dod par 'dod pa yis// ga 'dzin 'khor lo gyur ba nyid// dgas pa med par 'grub par 'gyud/ tra~M m+b+ha yang blang sta nas saM// rdzas
183b4(rgyud): ni bsre bar b+ha// lpags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni// ril bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gung gum A ka ru wAn b+ha/ nyi ma 'cha ka'i mdog 'dru ba'i// ril bu la ru bcug byas
183b5(rgyud): nas panyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa ru// lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nus ni// rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// can
183b6(rgyud): dan dmar po kha che dang // dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni// ljags gsum gyis ni dkris byas pa// rta yi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po rnam bsgoms nas/ tsa na'i rus
183b7(rgyud): pa'i tshad tsam las// gu gul lcags kyis dkris pa ni// mgon po'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ril bu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// klu yi rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas/
184a1(rgyud): rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya// rdorje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mig sman rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ba bla'i sa bon ldan pa dang // sdug gi pags pa'i
184a2(rgyud): tshil bu mnye// sku yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// rkang pa'i byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// yan lag med pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus// dbang po'i brag phrag 'gram du ni// rdo rje rkang 'og
184a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis// lha yi bu mo rab bsgrub bya// oM Di'i yul du nye ba na// a mra 'bras chen po yi ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba yis// rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo
184a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rgyal po che// yang nas yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyis// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs// rdo rje gnod mdzes su chen po// phyag gnyis zhal/
184a5(rgyud): ni gcig pa can// sdigs mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang // kha dog nag por bsgom par bya// rdo rje mdzod ni grangs nas ni// rnam pa thams cad bsgom par bya// mi bskyod pa yis yang dag
184a6(rgyud): mnan// pra zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do// rab tu 'byung ba dang mig sma rdo rje gas b+ha ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung zas nas/
184a7(rgyud): dga' zhing mgu ba skyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smras so// sem po rdo rjes rdo rje// e mardo rje'i bstan pa ni// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// gang byor dngos grubar ba gnas pa/
184b1(rgyud): snying po med pa'i chu shing la// ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa// de ltar snying po med lus la// dngos grub 'bras zhim de bzhin no// nam mkha' 'byung po thams cad dang // chos rnams kun gyi/
184b2(rgyud): gnas yin te// sems ni ram mkha' lta bur dag/ dag pa'i sems ni mchog tu bde// don dam dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis// sems las phyi rol 'gyur ba med// gzugs sogs so sor
184b3(rgyud): 'dod pa yi// sems nyid du ni 'dod par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar se
184b4(rgyud): stong la/ sems las phyi rol gyi don sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung zhes gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// thogs med srid pa'i bag chags kyis// phyi rol don ni rnam par
184b5(rgyud): brtags// sems kyis thams cad rnam par brtags// sems ni kun tu 'gro bar brjod// byang chub sems rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// shin tu bzhin
184b6(rgyud): mdzes mig yangs ma// si h+la ga pur 'byung ba'i gnas// dbang du gzhug par byas nas ni// sra nas gzung bar yang dag brtsam// rdo rje'o yis 'o byas shing // rdo rje nyed pas mnye bar
184b7(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje 'khyud pas yang dag blang // rdo rje ma mchu rab btsor bya// rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya// rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis// rdo rje lce yis yang dag
185a1(rgyud): bza'// phyi nas de yi bde can du// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhug par bya// rdo rje 'chi ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la//
185a2(rgyud): sems ni brtul zhugs can gyis dbrog/ pad+ma me tog ldan pa yis// pad+ma dmar pos mchod par bya// pad+mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can// pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du'o// dri nga'i rab tu sbyor ba
185a3(rgyud): yis// rgyal mtshan ga pur mchod pa ni// 'di ni brtson 'grus bde chen dang // stobs dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang // mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di ni dbang du byed// gang
185a4(rgyud): gis dkon mchog gsum bsad dang // gang gis sems can bsad byas dang // gang gis slob dpon smod pa dang // sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba rnams// lcags kyu yis ni yang dag dgug
185a5(rgyud): lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcing // zhags pas mgrin pa dam par bcing // rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya// mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bsams nas ni// de rnams dbang por gsol bar bya//
185a6(rgyud): 'dis ni sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bkrongs pa ste// 'di ste sdig pa can chen po ste// mnar med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// 'di ni dmyal ba chen por ltung // de ltar bsams nas
185a7(rgyud): gsad par bya// rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsams nas su// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje dbyig pas brdungs byas nas// rdo rje can gyi gnas su skye// lcags kyu la sogs mi nus na//
185b1(rgyud): zar gyis kyang ni 'dradu bya zhing // de nyid kyis ni gzugs bsam nas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhag/ TIk+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste// dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsub
185b2(rgyud): pa/ mi g.yo gri rtse'i dkyil 'khor can// rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// thams cad dbugs dbyung rab gsol bas// dam tshig
185b3(rgyud): rdo rje bsrung don du// sbas pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa// rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// snying khar g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub// g.yas na rang gi
185b4(rgyud): mtshon cha 'phyar// gshin rje gsod pa'i dbyig to can// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje dbyig/ rta mgrin la ni dbang mchog dmar// mi phyed bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor las// Dak+ki rgyal po lcags
185b5(rgyud): kyu ste// dbyig sngon can la rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa// mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse// tshad skyob rgyal po rgyal po la// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// gtun
185b6(rgyud): shing rdo rje rkang 'og la// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o// dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar// mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni// 'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu
185b7(rgyud): 'dras pa d+ma'i khro bo dmar po che// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid gnas/ mtshams kyi khro bo tshar gnag cing // spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan// gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te// rdo rje sems dpa'
186a1(rgyud): dbyig pa can// pad+ma'i khro bo rnam gzigs rjes// rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya// 'og tu pad+ma'i gdang
186a2(rgyud): bsams nas// khro bo bcu rnams rab bsgom bya// ye shes rdo rje rang dngos su// bcu phyed dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de// bdud rnams zhabs kyi 'ogro bsams nas// dkyil 'khor lnga po
186a3(rgyud): bsgom par bya// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar// dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam mo// srung ba'i dam tshig stobs/
186a4(rgyud): kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan dpa' chen po// rang gi byin rlabs rim gnas te// rang gi byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid las ni bshad par bya// snying
186a5(rgyud): gi dbus su zla bar gyur// gzugs brnyan zla bar ma bcos pa// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab// de las rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdag med mkha' 'gro ma// tshogs bskul bas bsgom par bya//
186a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sna yi mthar gnas pa// yungs kar tsam du rnam par bsgom// yungs kar la ni 'gro ba kun// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// de ltar sgom par byed pa yi// rang gi byin rlabs rab tu
186a7(rgyud): 'grub// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa// der ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni// mi 'dzin de phyir bdag gzhan med// ji ltar rdor pad las byung ba// zhi ba'i bde ba'i rnam par 'dod// rba
186b1(rgyud): rlabs med cing snang ba med// rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/ myos byed cung zad rab 'thungs pa'i// bdag gi bdag nyid mi rig go// dga' bral dga' ba dag gi mthar// rtog pa'i dab rnam par spangs/
186b2(rgyud): 'gyur med 'khrul pa las 'das shing // kye yi rdo rje rnam par gsal// bems min rnam pa he ru ka/ rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor// rang nyid mgon po he ru ka/ de yis bdag nyid mi rig cing //
186b3(rgyud): de yis dus na thams cad rig/ 'byung po 'gro dang 'ong ba ni// rang gi kun mkhyen lta bur gzigs// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras po dang // yan lag kun dang bu ga kun// mgo bo dra ba'i skud/
186b4(rgyud): par bcas// lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing // skad cig kye rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin// ji ltar nam mkha'i mi gzigs shing // mtshan ma med cing ma byung dang // gos po med cing 'khrul
186b5(rgyud): pa med// sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par spangs// ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ni// rtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa// de bzhin bdag nyid he ru kA'i// rnam pa lta bur gsal bar mthong // de nyid
186b6(rgyud): don dang dbang po dang // phung po nam mkha' lta bur yod// lus ni bde ba nyid brjod cing // 'du byed rnams kyis zil mi non// gzugs ni mig gis mi 'dzin te// sgra ni thos pa po yis min/
186b7(rgyud): lce yis ro ni mi tshor te// dri ni sna yis yang ma yin// reg bya lus kyi gong bus min// 'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni// bud med bzang mo reg pas bde// rna bas glu yi bde bas bzang // mnams
187a1(rgyud): pas dri yi bde ba che// skye gnas reg pa'i bde chen dang // ro las btung ba'i sbyor ba las// gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed// bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyab// bde ba martog/
187a2(rgyud): mi shes so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// mkha' 'gro ma dang btsur mo bzang // sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni// bde bar phyin cing rnam par sang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
187a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig thos nas tshig 'di skad smras pa/ phal pa'i rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir// sgom pa yang dag rab tu bsgrags// phal pa'i gnas/
187a4(rgyud): skabs gzhom pa'i phyir// sgom pa yang ni sgom pa min// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin de/ 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs
187a5(rgyud): pa'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya'o// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus can sgom pa'i thabs kyi dgos pa nyid de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
187a6(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po dgos pa yod do// bcom ldan 'das ming ci lags// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas nyid do// sangs rgyas nyid ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad
187a7(rgyud): mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci lags/ lus can 'di ni bden pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing / dpe byad bzang po
187b1(rgyud): brgyad cus btsun pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir sgrub pa yin no// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das bems po lags sam/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pA/ nga nyid/
187b2(rgyud): me long lta bu'i ye shes so// me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa dang / skye ba ma yin pa ste/
187b3(rgyud): de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nga nyid so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang / nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang // de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// de'i phyir byang chub
187b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma smra zhig/ nga nyid dngos dang dngos med nga // dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod// gzugs dang gzugs med ldan pa'i mchog
187b5(rgyud): zab mo zhi ba'i chos dang ldan// sems dpa' chen po he ru ka/ bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba// bde chen las ni bems min nga // 'jig rten kun rdzob bems po nga// skyes pa bud med ma
187b6(rgyud): ning dang // 'gro ba nga yis yang dag khyab// de phyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid// rgyal ba rgya mtsho bdag gis bshad// rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams// ma ning gnas su yang dag grub// gang
187b7(rgyud): zhig lha mo bdag med de// rang bzhin gyis ni btsun mo yin// sangs rgyas he ru ka nga yin// de nyid phyir na ma ning ste// 'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong nas// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyidang /
188a1(rgyud): shin tu mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis// mi bskyod med cing bdag la'ang med// dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan/
188a2(rgyud): 'das dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin tu dga' ba chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ phyag drug pa dang sgeg par bcas// zhal gcig ral pa 'dzin pa dang //
188a3(rgyud): brgyad gnyis lo dang ser mo ni// rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub// dpa' bo'i g.yas par mda' nyid de// lag pa gnyis par ral gri nyid// gsum par me long rig par bya// lag pa g.yon par gzhu nyid/
188a4(rgyud): de/ gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid// kaM ke l+li ya yal ga ste// phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas par ni// bu mo'i snying khar bsams nas ni// rdo rje btsun 'grub par
188a5(rgyud): 'gyur// mnga' yis 'o ma 'dzin pa 'bigs// a sho ka yis snying khar brab// ral gris skyes ma bsdigs par bya// de nas me long bstan par bya// g.yu yis rkang pa bcings nas ni//
188a6(rgyud): ut+pal zhags pas dgug par bya// skra grol 'ong bar 'dod pa dang // snyan pa'i skad ni rab tu smra// ha dang si ni byed pa mo// rangs shing yan lag tshed mas brgyan// kha ni so rtsis gang ba dang //
188a7(rgyud): 'dod pa stobs dang bral bar bsam// rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags bya// 'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas// de yi snying ni bskul bar bya// oM a mu/
188b1(rgyud): kI me saR+Sha la man+ta g+ho Sha hriHdzaHde ltar bsgom pa byas pa yis// 'jam pa'i mgon po'i btsun mo ni// sgrub pa po la 'dod pa dang // dbang du byed cing 'ong bar 'gyur// zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis/
188b2(rgyud): bzlas pa khri yi sbyor ba las// g.yo ba gser gyi rna cham// shin tu dag pa'i sems kyis bsgrub// haM gi sa bon las skyes pa// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// chang gi btung ba'i
188b3(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// rdo rje yan lag med pa sgrub// ma bcos mchog gi sa bon ni// bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can// bde ba chen po mchog tu zhi// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// 'a
188b4(rgyud): ni srog ni chen po ste// mchog tu dga' ba mdzes ma nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal rtag tu de'i// dran pa de ltar rab tu grags// mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs// dga' dang dga' bral de
188b5(rgyud): bzhin no// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nyid dbyangs yig drug par brjod// zla ba phyed pas yang dag ldan// thig les mgo bo nyid du mchod// sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste// rgyud
188b6(rgyud): rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems sgrub pa gsal ba
188b7(rgyud): nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa// sems pa med cing sgom pa med// sngags med lha yang med pa ste// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
189a1(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsod nams med cing sdig pa med// byang chub med cing sangs rgyas med// ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// byang chub sem/
189a2(rgyud): ni brtan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sngags med bzlas pa'ang yod ma yin// 'gro ba gsum po thams cad med// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
189a3(rgyud): bzhin gyis// bsgom pa dang ni sgom pa med// bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// kun rdzob 'jig rten pa yang yod// dpyad na gang du 'jig rten pa// rtag tu
189a4(rgyud): 'jig rten pa nyid 'khor// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma skyes pa dang mi dmyigs pa// mi phyed nam mkha' lta bu ste/
189a5(rgyud): zab cing zhi ba'i rang bzhin ni// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ral gri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sgyu ma ji ltar mau long ltar// nam mkha' ji ltar bde ji
189a6(rgyud): lhur / ji ltar dngos po yongs shes pa// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas de skad ces bka' stsal to// stong nyid dri med dam pa'i gnas//
189a7(rgyud): rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// ji srid ma zhig bar du ni// sems kyi rang bzhin sgom par gyis// mA ma kI'o// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di ste bde chen rdo rje ste// gang zhig yid kyis sgos/
189b1(rgyud): pas bsgom// de ni mchog gi sgom pas bsgom// spyan gyi'o// sngags dang yi ge rnam par spangs// 'di ni sems med thig le med// 'di de dam pa'i bde chen te// bri ba med cing gang ba med// gos/
189b2(rgyud): dkar mo'i'o// gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji lta bar// de ltar dngos po bsgom par bya// stong nyid dri med mchog gi gnas// de ni bsod nams sdig pa med// sgrol ma'i 'o// ji ltar chu nang zla bste//
189b3(rgyud): bden mir rdzun pa min pa ltar// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med// 'khor thams cad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs byed
189b4(rgyud): pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mda' gzhu char 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // muHtsU DI dang ser sna yis// chang gzungs
189b5(rgyud): khu tshur bzung ba yis// g.yon ni 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis// bsdams pas dgra rnams bsdigs par bya// yan lag kos skor bzung nas ni// mtshon po'i khu tshur bzung nas ni// hUM gis/
189b6(rgyud): mda' ni gtang bya zhing // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor sngags par bya// brla ni bskum par byas nas ni// lus ni dbugs kyis dgang bar bya// lus la khu tshur bzung nas ni// brang ni rgyas pa nyid du
189b7(rgyud): bya// sems dang dmigs ni 'ben la bya// hUM gis kha ni dgang ba dang // g.yas brkyang la sogs sbyor ba yis// gshin rje srin po gsad par bya// 'dir mang brjod pas ci zhig bya// kun rdzob
190a1(rgyud): tu ni bsdus pa tsam// gzhu yi rig byed rtsa ba gang // de ni rdo rje 'dzin spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rol mo'i sgra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
190a2(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra'i sgeg pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tha hi tha hi/ thaka tha ka/ za za tha tha/ tha ho tha ho/ ba hi ba hi/ ur+thaM uD+haM/ kr-i ka kr-i ka/ tha ka tha ka/ tsi T+Ti hi nA~M//
190a3(rgyud): te Da wa ti DA wa tAM/ cha lang dang ni rnga dang yang // rdza rnga kha gcig pi wang rgyas// dang ra ba can dang gling bu dang // rgyud gsum ka ra ta ka ni// rnam gsum brdung bas brdung bar bya// chung ngur brdungs pas/
190a4(rgyud): rgyal bas te// dkyil 'khor gsol gdab la sogs pa// mchod pa 'di ni bla na med// rang gi tshigs bcad mang po ni// bstan pa 'dis ni ci zhig bya// ji snyed rol mo'i bstan bcos su//
190a5(rgyud): de ni rdo rje rol mo'i sgra// de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdug spos kyi mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
190a6(rgyud): las byung ngo // tsan dan nyid dang gur ku ma dang // brag zhun de bzhin 'dod ma ni// 'di rnams rdzas ni bdug spos che// he ru ka la rab tu dbul// ka tso ra dang ku ma nyid// de bzhin du yang sgra sgra
190a7(rgyud): nyid// bdug byed snying po 'di rnams ni// phan pa la ni sbyar bar bya// kun tu ru dang po la ka/ ri dgas lte ba sen mo ni// rin chen rgyal po'i bdug pa 'di// kun la mi 'jigs gur kum dang /
190b1(rgyud): shra tI dr-i yi sha thI dang // sha lA~M dza dang sha li kA/ 'jig rten mgon gyi bdug pa 'di// rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// sna tshogs dri ni khyad par du// sna tshogs rdo rje mchod pa las// bdun
190b2(rgyud): gyi rgyal po mchod pa 'di// kun tu stobs kyis bsgrubs pa ste// ji skad dri yi bstan bcos su// gong bu'i dum bu'i bdug pa mchog/ de kun phyag na rdo rje'i 'o// rdo rje'i mchod pa rab tu grag
190b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gom pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gar 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gus bcas dang por
190b4(rgyud): sgeg par ldan// dang po rtse bcas rjes rgyu bas// rkang stabs brgyad du cho ga yis// rdo rje gom pas rol pa bya// me tog snyim pa'i sbyor ba dang // spos kyi yal ga'i sbyor ba dang // mar me sdong po'i
190b5(rgyud): lag tshul dang // yang ni byug pa'i lugs dang ni// mig lag de bzhin brla nang dang // rkang pa'i ngos su bskor ba ni// gdung ba'i sbyor bas rol pa bya// de bzhin du yang g.yon pas so// de nas rgyun gyi
190b6(rgyud): gar byas nas// g.yon pas yang ni gar bya zhing // myur du brdungs pas de bzhin gar// byas nas 'khor lo lta bur bskor// phyi nas gru bzhi dgang bar bya// phyi nas 'dod pa'i lag pas bskor//
190b7(rgyud): sa la pus ni gnyis btsugs nas// lag pas mchod rten legs par bya// ji sed gar gyi bstan bcos su// byed pa'i cha lugs brjod pa ni// de snyed rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sreg pas byang chub
191a1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
191a2(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs nas// bzang po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// thams cad 'byor pa'am dmigs nas ni// bem po'i gnas su sreg
191a3(rgyud): blugs bya// shar lho byang dang nub phyogs su// phyogs gnas rnams ni dga' bar bya// phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams// dam pa'i tshe yis mchod par bya// yid kyis mar khu bsams
191a4(rgyud): pa dang // 'bras so chag med 'bras dang ni// 'bru dang zho yi zan dang ni// til dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i shing // ngur ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid// bsam gtan rdo rje sbyin sreg bya// de la 'dri ni sngags//
191a5(rgyud): kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM ag+na ye swA hA/ mar gyi'o// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya badz+ra satwa s+ya sarba pA paM da ha nA ya swA hA/ til nag po'i'o// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras ma chag pa'i 'o// oM/
191a6(rgyud): sarba saM pa dwe swA hA/ zho dang zan dam pa'i 'o// oM badz+ra bI dzA ya swA hA/ 'bras so ba'i 'o// oM ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o// oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ mon sran gre'u'i'o// oM badz+ra g+hasma ri
191a7(rgyud): swA hA/ gro'i 'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dur ba gzhon nu'i 'o// oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+rA ya swA hA/ ku sha'i 'o// oM badz+ra ya dz+nyA ya swA hA/ u dum ba ra'i'o// oM bo d+hi br-ik+Sha ya swA hA/ byang chub kyi
191b1(rgyud): shing gi'o// oM badz+ra la tra la swAhA/ ba lak+Sha'i'o// oM badz+ra ku be na ya swAH/ n+ya gro d+ha'i'o// oM ham sa ka rA ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o// tsam pa a sho kA ya kra// ka dam pa dang srid sgrub nyid//
191b2(rgyud): jiltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas// me tog 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya// rgun 'brum a mra sbrul 'jig dang // kha 'dzag skyes ma ban+de mA ni// 'khor lo lnga yi mchog rim pas// 'bras bu rnams/
191b3(rgyud): kyi sbyin sreg bya// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi nyid// dkyil 'khor lnga yi sgom pa yis// 'odas ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur// ye shes me ni rab dgyes bya// rgyal ba phan pa mnyes pa dang // gser
191b4(rgyud): gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang // pad+ma gar dbang mnyes pa dang // lcags sgrog bdag po mnyes pa dang // tshangs pa brgya byin dbang chen dang // khyab 'jug rlung dang me chen dang // thong ldan nyid
191b5(rgyud): dang 'dod lha dang // zla ba nyi ma gdong gzhan dang // sa ni zhags pa 'dzin pa dang // lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang // chos rgyal dang ni glu dang ni// dri za lha min mi 'am ci// sum cu rtsa
191b6(rgyud): gsum gnas pa'i lha// 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni// 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang // gang zhig dag pa'i
191b7(rgyud): gnas son dang // 'od zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang // mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang // gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can dang // gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang /
192a1(rgyud): snod ldan sems can 'jig rten dang // lcug ma'i tshogs dang rtsa sogs dang // gang zhig rab dga'i sar gnas dang // pha rol dri med gang byin dang // 'od 'phro can
192a2(rgyud): du gnas pa dang // mi g.yo'i gnas su byas pa dang // gang zhig chos sprin rjes song dang // gang zhig sbyang dkar son pa dang // gang zhig ring song thob pa dang // 'od byed du ni gnas pa ste/
192a3(rgyud): sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang // 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyid// rA ni ral gri'i gzugs can dang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor ba dag/ #
192a4(rgyud): seng ge mnyes byas nas// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang // lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// sbyin sreg tsho gas dgyes pa nyid// de nyid tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bsod nams dang ye shes
192a5(rgyud): kyi tshogs chen po rgya mtsho rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
192a6(rgyud): dam tshig la gsol ba gdab pa gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa ni// rdo rje pad+ma'i sgom pa ste// de yi mgo bo'i sna rtse la// phyag 'tshal yid bzhin nor bu ste// sbu gu'i nang du pad kyi ni// ye/
192a7(rgyud): shes ma lhung yang dag gnas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dgyes par mdzod// 'di ni phyag rgya'i cho ga las// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpar snyoms byas nas// gnas ni tham
192b1(rgyud): cad bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug nas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag/ shAkya se ge sems byas nas// rgyal po thams cad thob par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i gdas/
192b2(rgyud): 'dug nas// rang gi lhag pa'i ltar sbyor bdag/ kun gyi rgyal po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin ldan// dam tshig phyag rgya stor ba yis// gnas gsum po yang bsgrub par bya// rang
192b3(rgyud): gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// pad+ma gor gyi dbang phyug bdag/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// rta mchog rim pas
192b4(rgyud): gnas nas ni// dam tshig phyag rgyar sbyor ba yis// sgrol ma'i dngos grub rab bsgrub bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gar gi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
192b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i gar mdzad pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // g.yon pa brkyang ba dang / g.yas brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang skabs dang
192b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / sna tshogs thams cad dang / rus sbrul gyi rkang stabs dang / bung ba'i dra ba dang / rgya mtsho'i bskyod pa dang / ri bo'i mchog dang / mdzes pa'i gom pa dang / khro bo'i gom pa ste/
192b7(rgyud): dang stabs kyi dgod pa'o// ral gri'i lugs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / rin po che'i tshul dang / pad+ma'i lag pa dang / ral gri'i tshul dang / mdung gi tshul dang / gzhu'i tshul dang / dbyig pa'i tshul dang /
193a1(rgyud): dbyig to'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang / kha bcu pa'i tshul dang / ral gri bu mo'i tshul dang / sna tshogs dbyig pa'i tshul dang / mdung
193a2(rgyud): thung gi tshul dang / gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang / 'phan gnyis pa dang / 'phan lde gsum pa dang / me tog gi tshul dang / gdug spos kyi tshul dang / mar me'i tshul dang / dri'i tshul dang / lA s+ye'i lag
193a3(rgyud): pa dang / 'phreng ba'i lag pa dang / glu'i lag pa dang / gar gyi lag pa dang / gling bu'i lag pa dang / pi wang gi lag pa dang / rdza rnga'i lag pa dang / mu kun da'i lag pa ste/ lag pa'i dgod pa'o//
193a4(rgyud): rdo rje skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / skyil krung phyed pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs te 'dug stangs kyi dgod pa'o// sgeg pa'i ngo dang / dpa' ba'i
193a5(rgyud): nga ro dang / mi sdug pa'i nga ro dang / dgod pa'i nga ro dang / drag po'i nga ro dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i nga ro dang / zhi ba'i nga ro dang / brngam pa'i nga ro dang / snying rje'i nga ro dang / drug gi rjes su skyes pa'i glu dang /
193a6(rgyud): drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang / dri za'i rjes kyi glu dang / bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang / lnga pa'i rjes kyi glu dang / blo gsal gyi rjes kyi gru dang / 'khor nyan pa'i glu'o// nyung ngu'i dbye ba dang / sgrol ma'i dbye ba dang /
193a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i dbye ba dang / gang ba dang / phyi dbyi ba dang / rnam par 'dri ba dang / 'dod chags gnyis mtshungs pa byed padag / 'do ma gra gsu ma chung ba byed pa dang / zhon ma med dganan na pa dang / lce nyed pa dang / so nyenyid pa
193b1(rgyud): ste/ glu dgod pa'o// sa gni yongs gzung dus su ni// dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul ba// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya// 'di ni dam tshig rim pa'i mchog/ me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge
193b2(rgyud): dag pa'i skye gnas las dag pa// bdag gi dad pas 'bral lags kyis// gzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// tshal bdag ro yi phan pa dang // gang zhig dri dang bdug spos mchog
193b3(rgyud): bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// srin po 'joms shing dag byed pa// dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags
193b4(rgyud): kyis khabazhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'di ni dri bzang dge ba ste// dag pa'i skye gnas las dag par// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes
193b5(rgyud): par mdzod// oM badz+ra g+har+N+Na a/ dril bu blang ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA badz+ra hU~M/ rdo rje gzung ba'i sngags so// dngos po sna tshogs rnam par dbye ba'i le'u sde bcu bzhi pa'o//
193b6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje'i gur// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas la// tshig ni 'di dag bka' stsal pa// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// rdo rje las skyes
193b7(rgyud): rang bzhin can// lag par thod pa kha T+wAMg/ bsams nas spros shing bzlas pa'o// phyag bzhi pa ni nyid dang yang // zhal gsum rdo rje las byung ba// dkar po dmar po de bzhin sngo// phag mo
194a1(rgyud): lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba'o// phyag drug pa la kha dog gnag/ lcags sgrog ma dang lhan cig sbyor// sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa can// zhal gsum nyid du sbyor bar bya/
194a2(rgyud): mdog dmar phyag ni bzhi pa dang // zhal gcig ma dang dbang byed ma// rdo rje chos kyi gnas mnan pa// 'di ni ku ru ku l+ler brjod// 'di ni sngags ni brjod pa'o// btsun mo chos la gnas
194a3(rgyud): pa ni// khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag gis ni// dus gcig pa yi dus su ni// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di thos nas// rgyas pa nyid du rab tu dbye// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa ste// dus gcig dus ni
194a4(rgyud): gcig na'o// bdag gis bcom ldan spyan sngar ni// btsun mo'i chos su rnam rgyas pas// lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang // don byed rus dang char sogs dang // lam gyi de nyid las
194a5(rgyud): skyes pa// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mgon// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// mchod sbyin dang ni pad+mas brgyan// pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag gnas// dbu rgyan rdo rje chos dang ldan// mAM gyi
194a6(rgyud): de nyid las skyes pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni ser po ste// yan lag mchog sbyin ut+pal brgyan// mi bskyod rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// hUM gi ye shes las byung ba// lag pa ral gri sdigs mdzub nyi/
194a7(rgyud): ma he chen po'i rgyab tu ni// dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas// khro bo'i gzugs can 'jigs byed pa// kha sbyar mdur du mi bskyod 'dzin// hUM gi ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje \u0f7f/
194b1(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu'i sbyor ba yis// lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings// rkang pa g.yon nyid brkyang ba yis// 'jigs byed mnan pa yi ni lus// spyi bor rdo rje'i rigs bsams nas// 'jig rten
194b2(rgyud): gsum rgyal dran par bya// tAM gyi yi ge las byung ba// mchod sbyin dbang mchog mtshon cha ste// lha mo ljang ku lta bu nyid// rtag tu bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas// sna tshogs pad+mar yang
194b3(rgyud): dag bzhugs// spyi bor don yod 'dzin pa po// sgeg mo chen mo skal bzang ma// sgrol ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya// mAM gyi yi ge las byung ba// mchod sbyin yu shro ka 'dzin ma/
194b4(rgyud): nyi ma shar ba lta bu ste// rnam snang dpal ni spyi bor skyes// g.yon brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis// 'gro mgyogs bdun gyi shing rta mnan// yan lag sgeg pa'i ro yis brgyan// 'od zer can ni bsgom
194b5(rgyud): par bya// tsu gyi yi ge las byung ba'i// ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od// snying khar rin chen snyim par gnas// mdzes pa'i tshul gyis yang dag bzhugs// lha mo sna tshogs par gdan can/
194b6(rgyud): phan pas mgo bo mnan pa ste// byang chub sems ni 'dzag 'bab pa'i// lha mo stobs dang bral ba bsgom// baM byi yi ge las byung ba// nor 'dzin shin tu kha dog ser// lag pa mchod sbyin
194b7(rgyud): 'bras snyem// rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba las// yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas brgyan// spyan ni shin tu sgeg par ni// gnod sbyin rgyal mo bsgom par bya// nor gyi bdag po mtshungs par 'gyur// dzaM gyi
195a1(rgyud): yi ge las byung ba// nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba bsgom// kha dog ser zhing g.yas pa na// mchod sbyin rin chen ne'u le ste// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje yis// spyi bar/
195a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam par brgyan// rin chen char ni bsam par bya// snor gang rdo rje chur gzhug bya// praM gyi yi ge las skyes pa// lus ni dkar zhing yid 'ong ba// lha mo ral gri'i 'khor lo 'dzin//
195a3(rgyud): spyi bor phan pas mnan pa'o// rang gi mang po'i dus lta bur// dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag 'dug/ nam mkha'i gnas nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'byung bar rnam par bsam par bya//
195a4(rgyud): dri nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sngags sna tshogs nang du chud pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsal bar mdzad pa/ oM ma
195a5(rgyud): Ni bar+ya hU~M baT swAH/ oM ma dz+ra badz+wa la su AH/ a hrI Sh+Te wi ba~M tA nan hrI nu phaT phaT swAhA/ oM hU Ta sAH/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sra/ oM ma ri ts+yai swA hA/ oM tsa la tsu le rkun de swAH/ sob su
195a6(rgyud): d+hAd+ha re ba su briSh+pa pA ta ya ba su swA hA/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+ri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten mgon gyis nad rnams zhi// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis blo
195a7(rgyud): gros bzang // gshin rje gshed kyis yi dgas bsrung // lha dang lha min tu mdzad kyis// sgrol mas 'jig rten dbang du mdzad// 'od zer can gyis chom rkun 'jig/ tsun+d+ra sems can tham/
195b1(rgyud): cad ni// dkrug pa yi ni cho gar brjod// dzam+b+ha la dang nor sbyin bdag/ nor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs su 'dod// bud med gang zhig bu shi bas// so sor 'brang ma rtag dran bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsung/
195b2(rgyud): pa'o// sngags kyi rkang pas thams cad 'grub// bzlas pa 'bum gyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub// snying gi bde ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas
195b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // hUM gi yi ge las skyes pa// phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig ldan//
195b4(rgyud): dog gnag cing cher 'bar ba// gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa'o// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas do shal byas// mche ba chen pos 'jigs par byed// gzugs thung gzi brjid chen po nyid// kha nas
195b5(rgyud): khrag ni 'dzag pa ste// slob dpon la rtag gang sdang dang // gang zhig dkon mchog gsum khro dang // sems can du ma gsod byed pa// nag po chen pos za bar byed// rang gi lag g.yas sha
195b6(rgyud): gcod byed// khrag gi rgyun ni 'thung bar byed// de nas spyi bor de 'dug nas// de ni ti le tsam gcod par byed// mon sran gre dang 'dzam bu Ti// me tog gdug pa byug pa chang // sha lnga nyid
195b7(rgyud): dang bdud rtsi yis// nag po che la gtor ma sbyin// sngags ni/ oM shrI ma hA kA lA ya/ shA san u pa hA ri Ne me Sha sa pa sh+tsi ma kA lo a yaM i de rat+na tra yA a pa kA ri Na li de pra ti d+hA s+pha ra si ta dA i
196a1(rgyud): duSh+Ta kha kha wA bi khA hi mar ma ra gr-i gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ han sa na/ da ha daha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ din me klen d+hu phaT nu/ tsha ba gsum gyi gzugs brnyan ni// byas nas lus la tsher/
196a2(rgyud): mas dgang // dug dang ske tshe yis bris nas// de ni gang gi ming gis ni// de nas me la gdung bar bya// de yi dus na mi snang 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// phyag rgya'i dngos grub
196a3(rgyud): sgom pa nyid// phyag rgya'i dngos grub dngos grub che// dngos grub kun gyi spyod yul min// de dus de yi lus 'thob cing // skad cig na ni bde chen tshul// skad cig na ni de 'khor ldan// sgom
196a4(rgyud): pa dang ni sngags nyid dang // skad cig sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// spyan gyis phrag nas 'khyud pa'o// skad cig la ni gnyis med ldan// dga' ba chen po mchog tu dga'// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal
196a5(rgyud): skad cig gis// mA ma kI dang bde ba sdom// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas// skad cig gis ni gnyis med ldan// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyar bas// rdo rje gus pa'i pha rol son// rdo rje pad+ma mchod bya zhing /
196a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dod pa spang bar bya// bdag nyid rang bdag bsams nas ni// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas// rdo rje bu mo cher grags pa// rdo rje nag po lta bu mchod// rang rig skyes bu bsams nas ni// rdo rje
196a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas// bu mo de bzhin gshegs ma mchog/ phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod// rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsam// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas// gdol pa chen po las byung ba/
196b1(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod// phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub pa// rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// nyi me gnyis kyi cho ga dang /
196b2(rgyud): nyi ma gsum gyi sbyor ba dang // de bzhin du ni nyi ma bzhi// nyi ma lnga pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// me tog la sogs mchod byas nas// bsam gtan gnas su
196b3(rgyud): 'dug pa dang // phyag rgya lhan cig zhugs nas ni// rdo rje sbyor ba yang dag brtsam// rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na// sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag brtsam// nyi ma shar ba'i dus su ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
196b4(rgyud): med// 'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pas// 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin las// chags chen ting 'dzin gnas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya// shin tu dga' ba rdo rje zhes
196b5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+mar rdo rje can bcug nas// rang gi rig ma bdag mar bya// de dang lhan cig 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni phyag rgya chen por brjod// mi yi phyag rgya blangs nas ni/
196b6(rgyud): de la 'khor lo rab tu dbye// dri dang me tog mthun byas nas// 'khor lo goms par yang dag brtsam// spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang // dkar mo shin tu yid 'phrog ma// me tog dri yis
196b7(rgyud): 'thur byas nas// rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// sngags pas phan pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // phyag na rdo rje 'grub pa dang // rdo rje nyi ma 'grub pa dang // dam pa'i yi ge 'grub pa dang /
197a1(rgyud): bdun pa'i rgyal po 'grub dang // thams cad 'dren pa 'grub par 'gyur// chu yi dbang ni dang po ste// cod pan dbang la gnyis pa'o// rdo rje'i dbang gis gsum pa ste// rang gi/
197a2(rgyud): bdag po bzhi pa nyid// ming gi dbang bskur snga pa ste// drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// bdun pa bum pa'i dbang gis te// gsang ba'i dbang gis brgyad pa'o// shes rab dbang las dgu pa/
197a3(rgyud): de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// kun gyi de nyid brtul zhugs brjod// ston pa rang gis lung bstan te// de 'dir dbang gi cho ga'o// slob dpon spyad par mi bya ste// bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi
197a4(rgyud): bya ba spun la smad pa nyid mi bya// sems cad rnams la gdug byams dang // skal med de nyid gtam mi bya// skal ldan sems can sprad mi bya// bdag gi lus la nges mi smad// chos nyid tshad ni/
197a5(rgyud): gzung mi bya// gzhan gyi chos la smad mi bya// bud med nyid la'ang smad mi bya// rtsa ba'i ltung ba rab tu spang ba mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// dkon
197a6(rgyud): mchog gsum ni spang mi bya// rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'ang gzung bar bya// gtsug tor rtag tu gzung bar bya// rtag tu sbyin sreg dgang bar bya// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bzhengs
197a7(rgyud): par bya// rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya// 'byung po che la gtor ma sbyin// phyag rgya bcing ba rnam spang zhing // mchod rten las ni mi bya ste// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya// dkyil 'khor//
197b1(rgyud): la sogs lus kyi las// rmi lam du yang mi bya zhing // slob dpon gzhan la phyag mi bya// bla ma'i rgan rabs phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par rgyun du sngags bzla zhing // bsam gtan nyid kyang 'bral mi/
197b2(rgyud): byabartag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing // rtag pa ru ni bshad par gyis// rtag tu sems can bskyang bar bya// rtag tu sangs rgyas cher mnyes bya// dzam+ba la la chu sbyin zhing // las rnams thams cad yang
197b3(rgyud): dag spyad// bye ma'i mchod rten las la yang // mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // pho nya mo thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs
197b4(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje nges par brjod pa 'di thos nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems can kun gyi thams cad khyod// sdig pa thams cad rnam sbyong ba// chos rnams thams cad yongs su rtogs// /
197b5(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// sdang bas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// gti mug thams cad zad bya'i phyir// rgyal ba mgon po rnam snang mdzad// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod//
197b6(rgyud): 'gro ba bud med 'dul gzigs nas// bdag med rnal 'byor mar gyur gang // phyag 'tshal pha rol phyin thub la// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/
197b7(rgyud): ga'i mug thams cad zad mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// nga rgyal thams cad zad mdzad pa'i// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po sa
198a1(rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// chags pas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// 'dod chags thams cad zad mdzad pa// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// ser sna rdo rje phyag 'tshal/
198a2(rgyud): bstod// 'gro ba phrag dog mnan gzigs nas// phrag dog thams cad zad mdzad pa// bdun gyi rgyal po rgyal po ma// thams cad gzigs la phyag 'tshal bsod// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
198a3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ji ltar blta bar/
198a4(rgyud): bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// slob dpon ston par gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// bdag cag rnams kyi pha dang ma// 'di nyid yid la bsams par
198a5(rgyud): bya// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje ros dang gzi brjid dang // bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub rnams// gang pyir de yis da
198a6(rgyud): ba med// mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang // ral gri rkang 'og sgrub pa dang // ril bu dang ni mkha' spyod dang // mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len// gang phyir ye shes rdo rje dang // mnyes pas myur du thob par 'gyur//
198a7(rgyud): de phyir slob dpon drung gshegs te// de bzhin gshegs rnams phyag mdzad do// rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba// de ltar slob dpon gzugs 'dzin te// sems can rjes su gzung dmigs nas// phal
198b1(rgyud): pa'i gzugs su gnas pa'o// slob dpon gyis ni mthar dus su// shi ba 'jig rten mi gnas pa// skyes pa glen zhing rmongs pa gang // de 'di shi shes smra bar brjod// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog/
198b2(rgyud): gis/ dag pa'i gnas su khyer bar byed// yang na bde ba can du nges// 'dod pa'i rigs su 'gro bar 'gyur// me tog sna tshogs lag thogs shing // sna tshogs rgyal mtshan byug pa dang // glu
198b3(rgyud): gi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas sras dang rdo rjer bcas// sna tshogs sgra dang sil snyan che// bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs dang // dbang gi gnas rnams nyid kyis ni// lus las
198b4(rgyud): lus gzhan 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu lag byin te// mgo bo'i gtsug tor mnan nas ni// rdo rje'i sdom pa byin nas su// bum pa'i dbang ni bskur nas ni// mig la sogs par gti mug
198b5(rgyud): sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor bas// sbyang bar yang dag bstan pa'o// nyi ma dag ni gsum la ni// rus pa'i 'phreng ba sdus par bya// 'o ma dri bzang
198b6(rgyud): bsang gtor nas// de yi mchod rten yang dag brtsam// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
198b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' 'o// 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa'o// rdzogs so//
199a1(rgyud): rgyu gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hAH/
199a2(rgyud): dra ti la kaM nA ma ma hA yo gI ni tan+t+ra rA dza a b+hi rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag/ dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig la
199a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro ye shes nyid// gsang pad snying po'i kha 'byed pa// gsang pad lte ba'i nang na bzhugs// bdag gi zhu ba khyod gson cig/ ye shes rgya mtsho'i kye /
199a4(rgyud): 'bum lnga yi ni bdag nyid rgyud// gang zhig khyod kyis de nyid gsungs// sbyor drug rnal 'byor ma yi gzhung // thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ de ni dpa' bo bdag gis shes// don dam pa ni/
199a5(rgyud): ji lta bu// de ru bdag ni the tshom skyes// char yang thig le tshul dang ni// tshul tsam mchog gi mchog gzhan yin// sbyor ba drug gis rnam par shes// de yi gnas ni nang na yod// srog ni gang
199a6(rgyud): nas 'byung ba yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa gang du brlag/ rdor sems mtshan mo gang nyid ci// mtshams gang shar ba gang zhig lags// gang na nub pa'i dus dang rtsa// mchog gi dbang phyug du//
199a7(rgyud): tsam mchis// dus kyi mtshan nyid gang lags gsungs// de yi dus kyis don ci byed// A li kA li bya ba gang // mnga' bdag gang nas 'byung ba lags// ro yi bye brag du zhig bstan//
199b1(rgyud): dga' ba yang ni de bzhin no// gang gi dus kyi dga' ba rnams// rdo rje dbang phyug 'byung ba gsungs// chos kyi dbyings ni ji ltar bshad// rdo rje yang ni ji ltar bstan// bdag gi sgra ri ji ltar gsungs//
199b2(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// mchog ces bgyi ba ji ltar bshad// dgyes pa'i don ni gsol bar mdzod// rigs kyi bye brag du tsam bstan// phung po la sogs skye mched ci/
199b3(rgyud): tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang // gang nas skyes shing gang du gnas// chen po'i chen po de ji ltar// phyag rgya'i bye brag du zhig bshad// phyag rgya chen po rje
199b4(rgyud): ltar lags// mgon po mchod pa'i bye brag ci// de ru me tog ji ltar yin// mgon po chen po mchod sbyin ni// ji lta bu zhig 'tshal ba lags// mchog gi dngos po'i dkyil 'khor ni//
199b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ji lta bu// de ru lha mo ci 'dra ba// lha mo bgyi ba gang lags gsungs// bcom ldan dur khrod du zhig mchis// de ru shing ni ji ltar bshad// dur khrod dang ni shing rnams ni//
199b6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i dbang phyug de gnas gsungs// mgon po nang gi sbyin sreg dang // bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga dang // rnal 'byor ma yi 'du shes dang // de ru skad ni ji lta bu// bdag nyid kyi ni rang ngo bo/
199b7(rgyud): mgon po chen po khyod kyis gsungs// dpal phyag rgya chen po thig le las rgyud thams cad kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
200a1(rgyud): dris pa yang dag gting dpag dka'// snying po yi ni snying po mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po// mchog las mchog gi yang dag mchog/ lha chen po ni la sogs pa/
200a2(rgyud): bzang mo de ru byol song yin// don dam de ni khyod gcig pu// zhal bzang mo yi snod yin no// gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag rab// nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad// dang po re zhig slob
200a3(rgyud): ma la dbang rnams lan cig bskur ba yis// de tshe gsang chen bshad pa yi// nges par snod du gyur pa'o// dbang med na ni dngos grub med// bye ma btsir yang mar med ltar// gang zhig rgyud lung
200a4(rgyud): nga rgyal gyis// dbang bskur med la gsal byed pa// slob dpon slob ma shi ba thag/ dngos grub thob kyang dmyal bar 'gro// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma la ni dbang don zhu//
200a5(rgyud): dbang bskur yod dang de nyid shes// ye shes shes dang thugs rje che// yang dag rlabs che dpa' bo dang // ser sna med dang rang bzhin bzang // skal ldan mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs// phrag
200a6(rgyud): dog yul ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa// 'dod chags chen po gcig pu'i yid// sdom pa de ni shes pa na// bla ma de lta bu la bya// de lta bu yi bla ma yis// 'bad pas/
200a7(rgyud): slob ma brtag par bya// ji ltar bsregs la sogs pas gser// ji ltar mkhas pas rin po che// ji ltar bde ldan bu mo ni// de ltar slob ma brtag par bya// de bas thams cad rab 'bad
200b1(rgyud): de// phan tshun so sor brtag par bya// de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur// nam yang dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// ji ltar dug la rab sngags kyis// dag pa byas nas bdud rtsir 'gyur// de bzhin slob
200b2(rgyud): ma dbang sogs kyis// lus ni dri ma med par 'gyur// gang zhig dbang bskur sbyin byed pa// de ni rdor sems lta bur blta// bla ma sprul rgyal lta bung blta// dpal ni bla ma me 'drar ba lta/
200b3(rgyud): bla ma ston pa bas lhag blta// yid bzhin rin chen mnyam par blta// ji ltar rab sbyor dang sngags kyis// sbrul gyi rgyal po'i spyi bo las// tshad med pa yi rin chen rnyed// dbul ba thams cad
200b4(rgyud): med par byed// rab sbyor log dang sngags log gis// dga' mo nges par tshig par byed// de lta bu yi cho ga yi// khrims la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis// dpa' zhal de nyid rin dbang phyug/
200b5(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis rnyed par gyur// de ltar min te ma gus na// gsung gi me yis nges tshig byed// ji ltar me yis shing tshig pa// skad cig gis ni thal bar byed// gal te de bzhin dpal bla ma//
200b6(rgyud): mnyes na skad cig gis sdig tshig/ rgyud 'di la ni mchog gi ni// bcom ldan dbang bskur du zhig mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang bskur bzhi yi rim pa la// 'bras
200b7(rgyud): bu yis ni gsum du bstan// dang por slob dpon dbang gcig te// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang mchog go/ gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang // de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o// slob dpon
201a1(rgyud): dbang la bcu gcig dbye// gsang ba'i dbang dang bcu gnyis mchog/ shes rab ye shes bcu gsum pa// de ltar de bzhin bcu bzhi'o// dbang re la ni sa re ste/ de rnam
201a2(rgyud): sa yi dbang phyug bdag/ rgyu rtsa gsum gyis shes par bya// de yi 'bras bu bzhi pa'o// yang na 'bras bu gsum dang bral// yang na bdag nyid gsum po yin// dga' ba'i bye brag shes par bya//
201a3(rgyud): 'khor lo rnams kyi rim pas so// yar ngo yi ni gsum pa'i tshe// slob ma la ni dbang bskur bya// bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus ring ba// gzugs bzang lang chos brgyan pa yi// bcu gnyis yang na/
201a4(rgyud): bcu drug gam// ma rnyed nyi shu lon pa'ang rung // nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya gzhan// des ni dngos grub thag ring byed// sring mo yang na bu mo 'am// chung ma bla ma la dbul bya// de nas sna tshogs
201a5(rgyud): rdzas kyis ni// bla ma dad pas mchod par bya// sna tshogs ras ni brgya sogs dang // rin chen sna tshogs rgyal mtshan mchog/ mu tig 'phreng ba rin thang med// grangs med gser gyis mchod bya'o//
201a6(rgyud): de ring phan chad bdag ni 'bangs// chen po'i chen po mchod pa bzhes// de lta bu yi cho ga yis// 'bad de bla ma mchod par bya// bla ma'i gzugs ni bdag rang yin// bdag mchod byas na dngos grub
201a7(rgyud): 'thob// de yis skad cig phyag rgya che// mchod pa byas nas bsnyen par bya// bsnyen pa las ni gang zhig 'byung // slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya// sbom po mtha' ltag sbyar ba yis// longs spyod
201b1(rgyud): nang du gzhug par bya// de tshe yang dag ye shes ste// bu mo'i bde ba ji lta bu// srog dang rtsol ba mnyam byas nas// shin tu legs dgyes kyis mchod bya// rin chen kha la hUM phaT sngags// bkad/
201b2(rgyud): nas mda' la brtson par bya// de yi dus su dga' skad cig/ ji ltar rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur// de ltar phyag rgyal bshad bya// 'di ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do// de nas slob me'i lag tu ni// byin
201b3(rgyud): nas 'di skad smra bar bya// nga yi bka' lung rtog med pas// pad+mo'i don la ji bzhin gyis// pad+mo'i snying po'i dbus na ni// rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma ni bzhugs// de ma rnyed pa'i bar du ni/
201b4(rgyud): thabs gzhan la ni byang chub med// de ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i gzugs// phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchod// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las slob dpon slob ma brtag pa dang / yon dbul ba dang /
201b5(rgyud): dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// mchog dang rab mchog mchog gi mchog/ phung po lnga yi bdag nyid sku// legs dgyes
201b6(rgyud): dbang po 'khor lo drug/ zla phyed byad gzugs char yang ni// rlung gi 'khor lo'i nang na bzhugs// phyed min gang ba yang ma yin// chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong // sgyu 'phrul chen po 'gro ba'i ma//
201b7(rgyud): char yang grangs med rten pa yin// de ni mchog dang gzhan mchog phra// skye med gnyis med bsam du med// rlung gi 'khor lo skyed byed ma// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed dka' ba'o// me yi 'khor
202a1(rgyud): lo'i nang na ni/ thig le gcig pa yi ge med// thams cad dang yod lag kun yin// thams cad khyab dang bde bar 'byung // bde ba 'phel bar byed pa'o// dbyangs dang
202a2(rgyud): dpe byad dang bral lo// grangs med pa yi khams gsum ni// rgyu dang skye bar byed pa'o// tshul ni glo bur ba yi gnas// rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba// dngos po sbrul lde 'dra ba yin// mtho
202a3(rgyud): ris sa ni skyed byed pa'o// yi ge ma yin khams kyang med// zla chos thig le rgyan dang bral// skye med grangs med mi zad pa// de ni don dam tshul yin no// sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas// lte
202a4(rgyud): ba'i snyoms pa zhes su grags// chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tsam ni// dri ma med pa'i sbrul mi 'dra// dri med ma bcos pa yi gnas// gnas mer rnam pa med pa'o// g.yo ba med dang brjod du med//
202a5(rgyud): dbugs kyi rgyu ba med pa'o// mchog gi ye shes tshul tsam ni// bcu gsum dbang phyug gis ma shes// mchog gi longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// mchog gi rnam pa bdud rtsi mchog/ theg mchog
202a6(rgyud): mchog gi mtha' na yod// ji ltar chang gi mthu bzhin no// thams cad bdag nyid byad gzugs bral// gzugs med bdag nyid kyis bzhugs so// gzhan mchog bde chen 'khor lo la// thams
202a7(rgyud): cad mtha' yi mtha' na bzhugs// lta bar byed dang blta bya med// mtshan ngan thams cad med pa'o// brjod med mi zad zhi ba ste// rang dga' nyams myong rnam pa'o// bla ma yi ni bka' drin gyis//
202b1(rgyud): legs dgyes dbang mo rnyed par 'gyur// de la bu yi ye shes che// rnam par shes drug rang bzhin can// 'khor lo drug gi dbus su ni// don dam par ni bshad pa'o// steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba/
202b2(rgyud): yis la kha sbyar byad gzugs kyis ni yod// bcu gnyis byed dang drug gi phyed// drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad// brgyad gnyis dang ni brgyad bzhi ni// 'di ni 'khor lo chu skyes drug/ dngal
202b3(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las sbyor ba drug gi mtshan nyid dang // 'khor lo drug rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo// rtswa yi
202b4(rgyud): 'khor lo 'byung ba mchog/ stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// rtsa rnams kyi ni rigs bshad do// rigs chen po yi rgyud chen por// rgyas par bdag gis gsal bar byas// 'di ru 'khor lo
202b5(rgyud): drug gi grangs// mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par bya// rlung gi 'khor lo'i rtsa drug ni// g.yo ba nam mkha' med dang srubs// rab bskor dang ni 'jigs chen po// rtsa de rlung gi 'khor lo'i gnas
202b6(rgyud): 'dzin mad ni ro ma dang // rtog med ma ni gru gsum gnas// me yi 'khor lo'i nang du ni// rtsa yi dbang mo lngar shes bya// mgyogs ma dang ni yang dag mgyogs// shin tu bzang dang bzang
202b7(rgyud): 'gro dang // stobs chen ma dang 'jigs chen ma// nga rgyal che dang 'jigs byed che// mthus myur ma dang mthu yi che// mtho yi chu dang mthu dri dang // mthu ma dang ni mthus 'bab ma// chu ba dang nur
203a1(rgyud): dang mthu du ma// rngam pa za ba nam mkhar 'gro// byA yi yan lag bya 'gro ma// phyug mo 'jigs ma nga ro dang // brtul ma mchod ma myos ma dang // skam sgra 'byung sdig can/
203a2(rgyud): maH pad+ma'i sdom bu ma sngon mo// zil pa zil 'byung sbra ma dang // phyir phyogs kha dang dbyig pa dang // dbyig pa'i nga rgyal dang po ma// tshe'u lto ma dang tshe'u drug ma// tshe'u bdud ma dang brtson 'grus ma/
203a3(rgyud): tshe'u khyim ma dang tshe'u kha ma// tshe'u 'od ma dang tshe'u lug ma// 'bud ma bdag ma 'od ma dang // dri med dang ni dri sreg dang // thag lto ma dang thag dga' ma// thag mo dang ni thag dus ma// phug ron
203a4(rgyud): phum skyes phra ma dang // lo ma dang ni tsher lo dang // gos gyon ma dang gsal byed ma// rtsa 'di brgyad po brgyad du dran// drug cu rtsa bzhi chu skyes ni// lto ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// rin chen
203a5(rgyud): ma dang pad chen mo// gshes chen mA dang stobs chen ma// mgo chen ma dang myos chen ma// dga' chen ma dang mi dga' che// de brgyad chos 'khor 'dam skyes ni// zhal bzang snying kha'i rgya mtshor ro//
203a6(rgyud): chags ma longs spyod longs spyod min// nyi 'od 'od ma b+ha ga dang // lu ma dang ni thal gdong ma// bza' ster rang za ltogs ma dang // ra sa ya na ro sgyur mo// ro 'dzag dang ni ro ma dang // skung ma long/
203a7(rgyud): spyod 'khor lo'i gnas// brgyad gnyis 'dam skyes 'dab ma ni// mgrin pa yi ni rim pa'i rigs// 'dod ma 'dod spyong tshe'u lus ma// zla 'thung zla lha mdzod ma dang // skad snyam lkugs ma dur ba ma/
203b1(rgyud): ce spyang brtsam sems pa ma// me mngon ma zla ba ma// gang ba gnyid ma gnyid skyes ma// chang 'tshong chang ster bdud rtsi ma// dung ma dang ni dung rnam// dung mig ma dang dung snu ma// mthus phyug ma dang
203b2(rgyud): mthu sar ma// mthu rmongs ma dang mthu rnam ma// 'gyings ma dang ni ri rten ma// sum cu rtsa gnyis thod pa'i gnas// bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyal po 'di// des ni 'khor lo rnams la khyab// thams
203b3(rgyud): cad phra mo reg bya med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde chen bde ba'i rnam pa can// bde chen la sogs sbyin par byed// de yi rtsa ba'i 'byung ba ni// yang dag thar 'dod pas shes
203b4(rgyud): byab lha mo rtsa 'byung medar gyur na// phung po'i 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur// phung po med na ye shes che// rnal 'byor rnams kyis ji ltar rnyed// phung po lnga ni bdag nyid sku// mkha' 'gro lngar ni
203b5(rgyud): rab tu grags// mkha' 'gro lnga ni ye shes lnga// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can// rtsa nyid 'byung ba med gyur na// phung po rnams ni 'byung ba med// phung po med na dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor
203b6(rgyud): chen pos rnyed mi 'gyur// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal bar bya// ji ltar sprin gyi char gyis ni// rtag par de ni che bar 'phel// 'bras bu mang zhing mtha' yas
203b7(rgyud): ni the tsom med par sbyin par byed// de ltar phung po'i shing zhes bya// rtsa yis chu yi che bar 'phel// cher gyur 'bras bu thar pa ni// the tsom med par sbyin par byed// lha mo'i dngos po
204a1(rgyud): gzugs su ni// rtswa mi byad gzugs yin par 'gyur// reg khams rgyal mtshan sbyor ba yis// me 'khor nang du na skyes ni// glang tse rdo rjes spyad par byed// de tsam ni
204a2(rgyud): khong du chud// 'khor lo chu skyes thams cad ni// ji gsal je gsal kha dbyer 'gyur// de nas tsa kun 'jog 'gyur te// snod 'dzag pa yi chu thigs bzhin// de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor na/
204a3(rgyud): 'dus nas gcig tu gyur pa'o// rtsa gnyis kha yi rtse mo las// zla ba dang ni nyi ma 'dzag/ mngal gyi dbus na rtsa gnas pa// thag pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs su yod// de ni gcig pu rgyu zhes bya//
204a4(rgyud): 'bras bu'i bye brag gnyis su 'gyur// g.yon nas khu ba 'byung ba dang // g.yas nas khrag ni 'byung ba'o// gang tshe g.yas phyogs nyi ma ni// de tshe bde ba dmar por 'gyur// g.yon nas zla ba 'byung ba'i
204a5(rgyud): phyir// de ni bde ba dkar por 'gyur// de gnyis nang na me gnas pa// sgong skyes gnyid log ji bzhin no// sngon gyi las rlung rnam shes ni// gang tshe 'khor bar gyur pa ni// de yi tshe na b+ha ga'i nang // 'dod
204a6(rgyud): chags chen pos yid 'gyur ro// gang tshe ma mi zla mtshan 'byung // me dang nyi ma gsal bar 'byung // de tshe 'dod chags chen po'i yid// reg bya 'dun pa mchog tu 'gyur// bo la kak+ko la zhugs nas// ji la
204a7(rgyud): tshu la chu bzhag bzhin// de tshe sa bon 'byung ba yin// sa bon las ni gong bu 'byung // lha mo de las rtsa rnams 'byung // 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba'o// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las 'khor la
204b1(rgyud): drug gi rtsa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// srog ni 'byung bar thim pa'i tshul// nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// ma skyes pa yi char yang ni// gsang ba'i mngal/
204b2(rgyud): gyi nang du bzhugs// de ni rnam shes med pa dang // bdag nyid med pa'i ye shes sku// de yi gnas nas srog 'byung ste// srog can rnams kyi srog ni mchog/ rtag tu bdag nyid srog chen po// gnas
204b3(rgyud): lnga'i gnas na bzhugs pa'o// nam mkha' lnga zhes bya bar grags// nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim// 'byung ba chen po bzhi po ni// srog gi rten du shes par bya// yang na srog ni de rnams rten/
204b4(rgyud): legs dgyes dbang mo shes par 'gyur// rnam shes las ni rlung skye'o// de las me ni skye bar 'gyur// de las chu ni skye 'gyur te// de las sa ni skye ba'o// de rnams kun las phung po 'byung //
204b5(rgyud): de nas skye mched 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas ye shes rang bzhin skye// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rim pas so// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen las// sngar ni bdag gis bstan pa'o// mtshan mo gang yin//
204b6(rgyud): nyin gang yin// mtshan mo bdag gis bshad par bya// mtshan mo shes rab tu ni grags// shes rab mtshan mo yin par 'gyur// mtshan mo'i rnam pa zla bar 'gyur// zla ba mya ngan 'das
204b7(rgyud): rang bzhin// kun rdzob dang ni don dam par// shes rab gnyis kyis shes par bya// kun rdzob reg byar shes par bya// gang zhig reg bya med par byed// blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do//
205a1(rgyud): rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can// de ni bdag gis mtshan mor bshad// nyin mo thabs su grags pa ste// thabs ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur// b+ha ga'i 'byung ba nyi ma yin/
205a2(rgyud): nyi ma b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur// srid pa'i rnam pa nyi ma yin// zla ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs// srid pa de ni rigs zhes bstan// nyi las 'byung ba zla ba'i rigs// dri ma med phyir nyi ma ste// rtog pa'i
