322b2(rgyud): slob ma blo chen gyis// ras zung gsum ni dbul bar bya// der ni gdan yang bsgrub par bya// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// de ru rnal 'byor ma mchod do// blo gros chen po thugs
322b3(rgyud): dgyes pas// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshim bya// mgu bar sems pa'i yid kyis ni// 'khor lo khyad par che bya ste// phyis ni slob dpon brtse
322b4(rgyud): chen bdag/ phyi rol sa ru byung nas ni// bde ba yi ni gdan bzhugs te// slob mas maN+Dal gsum byas la// bla ma me tog sna tshogs mchod// zhabs la spyi gtugs 'di skad
322b5(rgyud): gsol// ston pa bcom ldan bla ma kye// sems can don la gcig brtson pa// nam mkha' lding bzang sbyor ba dang // sha li ka yi sbyor ba 'tshal// dus su zin pa bzlog pa
322b6(rgyud): yi la sems can don ni bzang po 'tshal// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ston pa chen pos de dag gsungs// bdag gi the tsom bzlog pa dang // sems can don ni mthar
322b7(rgyud): thug bgyi// brtan pa dang ni rgyu ba dang // yan lag skyes dang bcos ma yi// dug rnams dug med par bgyi zhing // sems can thams cad 'tsho bgyi ba// bla ma chen po de dag gsung //
323a1(rgyud): de nas slob dpon brtse ba yis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i thugs kyis ni// khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yi// slob ma la ni so shing sbyin// so shing sngags
323a2(rgyud): ni sbyin par bya// oM hUM he b+ha ga wa tI mu khaM pa ri shud+d+haM ku ru swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la// so drud nas ni kha ba shul te// slob ma lhag par gnas par bya// rang
323a3(rgyud): gi lag pa byug bya zhing // me tog gis kyang dkri bar bya// mgrin pa lag par zla ba bsam// zla ba'i zer gyis phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas spyan drangs gdon mi za// sangs
323a4(rgyud): rgyas tshogs kun zla bar blta// grags chen thams cad rab zhugs shing // zla ba zhu bar gdon mi za// slob dpon sgom pa'i nus pa yis// slob ma'i mgo ru lag bzhag ste/
323a5(rgyud): lhag par gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// oM sarba bud+d+ha a tra a mu ka s+ya kA ya ma d+hiSh+ThA na/ yan+ta ma tsa la ma tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ha ra ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tra pa tra pa/ b+h+yo b+ha
323a6(rgyud): ga b+h+r-i ta sarba bud+d+ha ka pa la badz+ra sa ka taM ma la ya shri g+h+raM ku ru ku ru hUM hUM ha ha/ sngags 'di lan bdun du bzlas pas lhag par gnas par bya'o// sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis
323a7(rgyud): de'i lus la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu rnams skrag cing dug gi bum pa'ang 'dor ro// nor rgyas la sogs pa'i
323b1(rgyud): klu stobs po che rnams dpyod par 'gyur ro// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis ni// 'di lta'i sdug bsngal thob 'gyur na// mkha' lding rtog
323b2(rgyud): pa'i sems can gyis// bdag ni ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur// de ma thag tu slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor nang du me tog ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya// sna tshogs spos
323b3(rgyud): dang lha bshos dbul// dung chos zangs chos snod dag ni// man ji'i steng du gzhag par bya// mchod yon gyi ni don ched du// bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya// khrag 'thung go
323b4(rgyud): 'phang gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskor ba yi// khrag 'thung rnam pa spyan drangs te// dkyil 'khor ji bzhin yang dag ldan// mdog dang mtshan mar ldan pa yi// de
323b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs rnams sa bon gyi// 'od zer gyi ni rnam par bsam// bdag nyid chen po grags chen po// bum pa ru ni zhugs tsam gyis// dam chog dkyil 'khor zhu bar gyur//
323b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems dang ni// slob dpon gyis ni 'di ltar blta// de nas zangs ma'i snod du chu blugs shing dung phor chus bkang ste// man dzi'i steng du gzhag par bya'o//
323b7(rgyud): yang phyir byung nas slob ma'i don du bdag nyid kyis ras kyis mig dgab par bya'o// ras gsum gon par gyur pa'i slob ma phyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la chus gtor te sngags/
324a1(rgyud): bzla'o// a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM sarba yo gi ni ma ku Ta a d+hiSh+Ta yai tu a tsi tu hUM swA hA/ cod pan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de nas slob dpon gyis kye khyod su zhes
324a2(rgyud): smra'o// slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes smra'o// de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog lan gsum du gtor la/ mig ras bsal te dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o//
324a3(rgyud): oM he ru ka badz+ra puSh+pa ye pra tIts+tsha hUM/ dbus su'o// ya~M tsa tra sanA puSh+TA yaM pra tIts+tsha trAM/ shar du'o// oM kA mi nI puSh+pa yaM b+hU tits+tsha b+h+yAM/ lho yi'o// oM pU tA la b+hA si ni puShA ya pra tIts+tsha hUM/
324a4(rgyud): nub tu'o// oM su b+ha dra puSh+pa yaM prA tIts+tsha hUM/ byang du'o// oM sho Di ni puSh+Ta yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ mer ro// oM bud+d+hi ni puSh+pa ya pra tIts+tshi hUM/ bden bral du'o// oM tsa tur b+ha tra puSh+pa yaM pra tiH
324a5(rgyud): hUM rlung ngu'o// oM a kA sha bA si ni puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ dbang ldan du'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku mdog ji lta bu dang mtshan ma la sogs pa de bzhin du slob ma la bstan
324a6(rgyud): par bya'o// yang dung phor blangs te chu btung bar bya'o// de 'thungs pa tsam gyis klu thams cad skrag cing skyo bas dug skyug par 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug gang yin
324a7(rgyud): ba dang / gzhan yang sbyar ba dang nye bar sbyar ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mda' dug dang / byug pa'i dug dang / dgra rnams kyis gang sbyar ba dang / bud med rnams kyis gang sbyar ba'i
324b1(rgyud): dug de rnams nye bar 'pho bar 'gyur ro// gal te klu yis zin pa yang // de ru de ni nges par 'gro// gzhan yang sbrul gyi dug kyang rung // chu ni 'thungs pa tsam gyis kyang // de dag thams cad/
324b2(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi phyir na dung gi chu// 'di ru ba tung bar the tsom med// de nas slob ma dri bar bya// 'dir ni shaM li kar byed cing // mkha' lding shes pa'i slob dpon 'gyur// bsam
324b3(rgyud): pa rnam par dag shes nas// phyis ni bkas gnang sbyin par bya// stong ngam brgya ru gsol ba gdab// de nas sngags kyi man ngag sbyin// ji srid sbrul gyis zin dus dang / ji
324b4(rgyud): srid mkha' lding rigs yod par// de srid de dang de las kyang // ji srid dus su zin med par// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de srid 'bad rtsol bya ba min// dus zin
324b5(rgyud): 'chi ba'ang shes bya ste// nam mkha' lding gi bya ba bya// dus su zin no zhes smra ba// de srid rnal 'byor che 'di zhes// de ru lngas ni brtsam par bya// bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing //
324b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma brgyad yang dag ldan// blo ldan sngon gsungs gsang sngags kyis// phyis ni gtor ma sbyin par bya// de rjes dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang
324b7(rgyud): sngags kyis// gnas dgu ru ni mchod par bya// mkhas pa yis ni mchod byas rjes// mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams brtsam// gang du rdzu 'phrul che klu yod// de ru sems
325a1(rgyud): bzang 'od zer spro// klu rnams kyi ni snying bskams pas// ci zhig bgyi'o zhes ni smra// gsungs pa/ lha mo sna tshogs sde ma yis// sangs rgyas thod par sngon
325a2(rgyud): du gsungs// kye kye grags pa che ba'i klu// song ste 'di dus zin gyur pa'i// dus zin 'dzin dang gzung ba med// dug med sbrul yang med pa'o// gang phyir dogs pas rmongs gyur
325a3(rgyud): pa/ de phyir skye bo rnams 'chir 'gyur// de nas 'od zer srar log ste// sing ka ru dri thim par 'gyur// yang ni sems ni mnyam bzhag pa'i// slob dpon gyis ni ngo mtshar
325a4(rgyud): bstan// de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i lci ba blangs te 'dab chags ri skegs gnyis bya zhing snod dkar po byas te// ro bsregs pa'i srol ba gzhag par bya'o// ro bsregs pa'i
325a5(rgyud): sol ba la snag tsha byas te/ sems can gyi don rig pas dben par sngags bri bar bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrI tad tha ba ya b+ho sha li ka na a na ya na bud+d+ha ka pA la badz+ra s+ya A
325a6(rgyud): ma la~M g+he ya hUM hUM sa re tu sarba dA TI ka pa ti ka tse ta/ maM d+h+ya g+hi ti sarba dza i na su naM ti pa ya ga re re ka ra ko Ta ka pra b+hI ta ya nA ga rA dza na sU taM ti mu rda na re re sa sma a ba sa s+yA ma tsa la haM
325a7(rgyud): ma bu la ha dza oM tsa la sa pra la ha re re b+ha ru kri pra b+hI ta ya rA ga rA dza na u ha praT Ta mu d+hi pra na dza i/ zhes pa ni sha li ka'i snying po'i sngags so// de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/
325b1(rgyud): sems ni shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// yongs rdzogs sha li ka byas la// pho dang mo ru brtag par bya// snag tshwa yis ni bri bar bya// mig gi sngon du mi bzhag cing // sha li ka/
325b2(rgyud): bzang pos phyogs blta// de nas lcug ma sngags kyis sngags// oM haM ha la khyab 'jug gi sa bon no// oM baM tshangs pa'i sa bon no// oM so zhes bya ba ni zhi byed kyi sa bon
325b3(rgyud): no/ oM ha ha ha ha ha ha haM swA hA/ mngag pa'i sngags so// 'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog/ stong gsum na yang rnyed par dka'// lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni// 'gro
325b4(rgyud): bar 'dir ni the tsom med// klu rnams skrag par byed pa yi// mkha' lding nyams dga' song nas ni// klu yi gnas su zhugs de'i tshe// mkha' lding bye ba'i stobs dang ldan//
325b5(rgyud): ring nas kyang ni gshog rlung gis// stobs po che yi klu rnams skrag/ mtho ris mi yul sa 'og dang // gang yang gzhan na gnas pa dang // gzhan yang rung ste de thams cad//
325b6(rgyud): skrag nas ci bgyi zhes ni smra// klu gang gis zin pa de gal te yang shi na/ bdag nyid chen po sha li ka mthong ma thag long bar 'gyur ro// klu dang sbrul de dag gis sha li ka la 'di
325b7(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// kye sha li ka gzhan du gsung bar ma mdzad cig/ de ltar thos nas sha li ka mgu ba'i sems kyis dug gis zin pa'i mdun du sbrul long ba khyer te 'jog go//
326a1(rgyud): de nas slob dpon gyis bltas te/ sa'i gong bu blangs la sha li ka mngag pa'i sngags kyis sbrul long ba la bsnun no// skad cig de nyid la de'i mig dbye bar
326a2(rgyud): 'dir som nyi med do// dug gis zin pa 'gyel te shi ba sbrul gyis mthong nas/ de'i lus la 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pas dus su zin pa dug med par 'gyur zhing // dga' ba'i
326a3(rgyud): sems kyis ldang ngo // zin pa langs pa tsam nyid na sha li ke sa sbrul bzung ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro// skad cig ma de nyid la slob dpon gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom par bya'o//
326a4(rgyud): stong pa dri med kun rang bzhin// chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin kye// gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin// mtha' dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin kye// dngos po ma lus pa mtha' dag/
326a5(rgyud): dang dug kyang stong pa nyid du sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mthar thug par ji srid du lus ma zhig pa de srid du slob dpon gyis yang dag par brtsam
326a6(rgyud): par bya'o// de ltar slob ma la rjes su gnang ba byin nas phyis lung bstan par bya'o// des lan brgya'am stong du gsol ba btab nas/ dug 'joms pa'i sngags bstan par
326a7(rgyud): bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni AHhUM/ dug bza' ba'i sngags so// de nas gzhan yang don du gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams thams cad la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dung phor gyi
326b1(rgyud): chu 'thungs pa des ni dug med par 'gyur te/ sbrul gyis mi 'dzin no// gal te 'dzin na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'dir the tsom med do// de ltar slob ma sha li ka'i sbyor ba la mngon par brtson
326b2(rgyud): pab la bka' gnang ba byin te/ grong gang du gnas pa der dug gis 'dzin pa med do// gal te yod na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar thos nas slob ma rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang
326b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i sems kyis gang ci'ang rung ba'i yon der dbul bar bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi sar byung ste/ gtor ma gtang bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi
326b4(rgyud): sngags kyis gshegs su gsol to// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIHu tiSh+Tha gats+tsha hUM gats+tsha hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas yang dag bshad
326b5(rgyud): par bya// chu yi sbyor ba bla med pa// gang gis byin pa tsam gyis ni// dug gis zin pa 'tsho bar 'gyur// nyi ma bdun du 'chi ba dang // gzhan yang dug gis nyams pa rnams//
326b6(rgyud): chu ni byin pa tsam gyis ni// 'di ru 'tsho bar the tsom med// sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// gnas dgu rnams su mchod par bya// dung por chu yis bkang byas pa//
326b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// de nas brtse ba chen po yis// bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rang gi lag pa g.yon pa la// zla ba yi ni khyad par bsam// bcu drug
327a1(rgyud): cha las yongs rdzogs pa'i// dri med dge ba'i lus can te// de'i dbus sa bon mi shigs dge/ kha dog dkar po'i lus can no// lag des snod kyi kha bcad
327a2(rgyud): del de nas gsang sngags bzla bar bya// oM sarba bi Sha ha ra ha ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bsngags te/ mi shig pa dang lhan cig zla ba zhu bar gyur/
327a3(rgyud): nas chu'i nang du thim ste/ chu dang zla ba gcig tu 'dres pas shin tu dkar por 'gyur ro// gal te dug gis zin pa ma shi na de'i tshe chu blud do// yang na shi la yin na mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug
327a4(rgyud): par lan gsum du chu rgyun mi 'chad par thugs na langs par 'dir the tsom med do// de nas chu brud na rnal mar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i
327a5(rgyud): yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ sha li ka'i sbyor ba dang chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// shin tu rnyed dka'i bcud
327a6(rgyud): len le'u// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med// gzhon nu ma dang sha ri ka/ grub ma byis pa can ma dang // de bzhin thod bzang can ma'o// 'di dag
327a7(rgyud): sman ni chen po sba// sangs rgyas lngas kyang rnyed par dka'// 'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar de 'tsho'o// gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu// de bzhin sha ri ka zla gsum//
327b1(rgyud): grub ma zla ba gcig tu'o// byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis// thod can ma yang zla bar te// tshe 'phel ba yi mchog yin no// bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs// glang po ma ni ngang pa'i
327b2(rgyud): gzugs// drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te// sngo bsangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig/ kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni// mig las byung ba'i rdzas gang yin// sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma/
327b3(rgyud): 'di ru bstan par som nyi med// de yi pad+ma las byung rdzas// rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnas// ge sar sbas pa'i spyod yul te// sman de sha ri ka ru gsungs// me tog ldan pa'i bung
327b4(rgyud): med gang // kha dog nag mos rab mdzes ma// gang du thabs shes gnyis 'dus pa// de yi kha sbyar sbyor las byung // sman de'i ming ni grub mar bshad// sangs rgyas thod pa'i
327b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// bud med rab mdzes ma nyams dang // dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yi// de las dang por byung ba'i rdzas// sman de byis pa can no zhes//
327b6(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po'i lha mos gsungs// lhan cig skyes dga' byung ba'i rdzas// byang chub sems mchog chen mar khu// chags pa'i yi chu dag dang ni// bsre 'gyur 'dir ni
327b7(rgyud): the tsom med// sman de'i ming ni thod can ma'o// zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis// bya bar 'dir ni the tsom med// zla bas zla bar nyi mas nyid// de lus skra dkar gnyer ma zhi// ji srid
328a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar// de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gyur// sman 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni// dag pa'i lus su 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang yang
328a2(rgyud): rung // lcags dang zangs ma'i snod dag la// dngul ni byugs pa tsam gyis ni// dngul dang gser du 'gyur ba yid// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed
328a3(rgyud): dka' ba// rgyud gzhan du ni rab sbas pa// 'bad pas de 'drir rab gsal bya// dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste// dri chen rdo rje bzang po nyid// khrag ni mar me rdo rje yin// khu ba rdo rje'i thab
328a4(rgyud): byung nyid// sha ni chos kyi rdo rje yin// de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog/ gang gis dam tshig rnyed dka' ba'i// thabs 'dir bdag gis bshad par bya// ba grang sha ni 'bar ba ste//
328a5(rgyud): khyi yi sha la spro bar gsungs// rta yi sha la bza' bar bshad// glang po'i sha la zhu bar gsungs// sha chen la ni bzang por bshad// de lnga rnal 'byor mchog tu gsungs// rnal
328a6(rgyud): 'byor rnal 'byor ma ldan par// gal te gcig tu byed nus pa// de tshe rnam rtog de thams cad// 'jig 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste// tshod ma la
328a7(rgyud): ni sdig pa nyid// rol shin tu rnyed dka' gsungs// byis pa la ni 'gal ba nyid// gsung mo la ni bzang mor gsungs// rus pa'i 'phreng la rdzas zhes bya// skyes bu lazhi rdo rjer gsungs//
328b1(rgyud): bud med la ni snod bzang nyid// dbang po gnyis kyis rab sbyor la// gzi brjid 'phreng chen de bshad do// rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid// 'khyud pa la ni chos zhes brjod// 'dri ba la
328b2(rgyud): ni mar me'o// shin tu 'dril me zhes bya// 'gro ba la ni 'phreng can la// 'od la shin tu 'phreng can ma// myur ba la ni byug ces bya// dpa' ba la ni bzang de brjod// pad+ma rtsa 'jo
328b3(rgyud): 'phreng can ma// sngags kyis mtshan la rab nges she'o// bldag la lce 'og ces bya ste// so la bza' ba sna la bde// mig la rol rtsed mu tig rna// gsang ba'i yul la rnyed dka' zhe'o// /
328b4(rgyud): 'di dag bshad do lag chen po// 'jig rten gsum na rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// med par phan tshun smra mi bya// 'on kyang bshad chen de nyid 'di// gcig/
328b5(rgyud): la gcig gis smra bar bya// rgyud rnams thams cad du sbas pa// rlud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas// nye mdun grong mtha' lhan cig ce'o// 'dus pa phyi rol zhes su gsungs// nye ba'i/
328b6(rgyud): 'dus pa nang de bzhin// gnas la 'bras bu zhes su gsungs// nye ba'i gnas la shing nyid do// klong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs// nye ba'i grong mtha' myu gu'o// tshogs pa la
328b7(rgyud): ni sdong bur gsungs// gcig pu la la ni 'dab ma ste// stong pa la ni rtsa bzhi'o// de ltar dgongs pas bshad pa ni// bde gshegs rnams kyis ma mkhyen no// spyan ma la/
329a1(rgyud): sogs rnal 'byor ma// rnams kyi khong du mi chud cing // byang chub sems dpa'i yul min zhing // bla ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// spros pa thams cad spangs/
329a2(rgyud): nas ni// rdzas la chags pa mi bya'o// shin tu stong sgrom rnal 'byor pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang phrag drog med// gti mug dang ni nga rgyal spangs// nyon mongs thams cad rnam par
329a3(rgyud): spangs// za 'thungs de bzhin glu len na// shin tu spros pa spang bar bya// bde bas dga' bo nyid dang ni// shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid gsungs// bla med de nyid zla phyed kyis//
329a4(rgyud): 'grub par the tsom med pa'o// kye lags grogs mo 'gro kun gang // mtha' dag dri ma med pa yi// blta dang bral la skyo bo ltos// gsog gsob rang bzhin brdzun slu ba//
329a5(rgyud): pad rtsi grib ma lta bur ldos// dbang po lnga ni sgyu 'dra zhing // lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi// rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas 'grub// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i
329a6(rgyud): gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ sman bzang po dang dgongs pas bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/
329a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa mchog gsang bar// thabs dang shes rab sgrub pa yin// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba// shes rab pad+ma'i nang dbus su// dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil 'khor la//
329b1(rgyud): gsum brtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus// 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par// mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur// gal te byung
329b2(rgyud): chub bla med 'dod// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba min// lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur// des na rdul tshon tsam gyis ni// de bzhin lha rnams dag mi
329b3(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // de bzhin pa la gri nyid/ byas na slar yang 'jigs byed pa// skyes bu tha shal dmyal bar 'gro// gang gis sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing // gang gis gshegs su
329b4(rgyud): gsol ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams// gang na'ang byon pa ma yin no// dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus// gang gis spyan drangs
329b5(rgyud): gshegs su gsol// de nyid kyis na brtag med par// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag bya// lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo ni// tshul khrims ma nyams tshogs chung ba'i//
329b6(rgyud): thos dang ldan zhing grags chen mo// nad med snying rje dang ldan ma// sems can don la gcig nan tan// rgod cing pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan// zla ba'i cha 'dra gdong mdzes ma//
329b7(rgyud): mu cor mi smra brtan zhing dul// des na slob ma blo chen po// shin tu dad pa'i sems dang ldan// 'dod med dbang po dul ba dang // chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// sama?
330a1(rgyud): can don la shin tu sbyor// gti mug zhe sdang phrag dog spangs// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// de rnams la ni de nyid bshad// gsang ba byi yi lnga
330a2(rgyud): dang ni// bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa dang // gnyis ka gcig tu 'dus pa'o// gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya// slob ma legs dang ldan pa dang // brtse ldan sems
330a3(rgyud): gzhan med pa yis// gser ni 'bum phrag bcu drug dang // sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan pa dang // glang po bud med dam pa dang // ral gri 'khor lo rta dang ni// yongs 'dren skyes bu rin
330a4(rgyud): chen rnams// sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// de ni bla mar dbul bar bya// shin tu dri med sems kyis ni// de nas 'dir ni gsol ba gdab// 'khor ba'i 'dam du byeng ba bdag/
330a5(rgyud): dbun gnyen khyod kyis bsgral du gsol// bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs// kye kye ston pa bla ma che// mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar/
330a6(rgyud): mdzod// de ltar gsol 'debs tshig gsan nas// de ru bla ma mi gsung bzhugs// man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni// glegs bam rnams las spyod yul min// dkyil 'khor gang
330a7(rgyud): la gang gis brgyan// mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kyi// su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kye// 'gro ba brdzun 'dra'i som nyir lhung // mtha' dag stong pa gos med kye// chu
330b1(rgyud): nang zla ba ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus gnas// kye lags rnal 'byor ma tshogs ltos// der ni he ru ka gcig dang // thams cad skyed par byed ma yin// 'gro kun zil ma/
330b2(rgyud): slu bas na// gti mug las ni bskyed pa ltos// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri ba dang
330b3(rgyud): slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// ri dang phug dang tshwang tshong ngam// yang na dur khrod dag dang ni// gdod nas grub pa'i
330b4(rgyud): gnas su 'am// 'on te rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag tu// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bla med bri// rdul tshon sngon po ni ro bsregs pa'i sol ba las bya'o// rdul tshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag
330b5(rgyud): las bya'o// rdul tshon ljang khu ni nim pa'i 'dab ma las bya'o// rdul tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye ma las bya'o// rdul tshon ser po ni yung ba'i phye ma las bya'o// de ltar rdul/
330b6(rgyud): tshon lnga rnams kyis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// pho brang rigs gsum zlum po la// rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor// phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa yi// sgo bzhir rta babs
330b7(rgyud): rnams kyis brgyan// ba dan rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// phyi rol kha khyer dag pa dang // rin chen pha gur yang dag ldan// pad+ma nyi ma'i nyi shu lnga'i// gdan rnams
331a1(rgyud): kyis ni shin tu mdzes// de yi dbus chung sa bon ni// yi ge hUM gi rang bzhin sngo// skad cig tsam gyis he ru ka/ sku mdog sngon po grags chen po// g.yas na cang te'u gri
331a2(rgyud): gug ste// g.yon na kha T+wAM thod pa'o// skyil krung phyed pas 'jigs chen po// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing // sangs rgyas lnga ni cod pan can//
331a3(rgyud): dbu la sna tshogs rdo rje mnan// zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha// sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// dpa' bo phyag bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang // shin tu hUM sgrogs 'jigs byed pa// gar gyi sta ba/
331a4(rgyud): kyis rnam par bzhugs// mgo bo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba can// mdzod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba'o// thod pa gti mug rnam dag pa// 'phreng ba brgyus pas brtan pa'i lha// mgul
331a5(rgyud): dang ni 'khor lo dang // rkang gdub dang ni dpung rgyun dang // gang bu rked pa'i sku dgas dang // dpa' bon ma mchog gis brgyan// 'di 'dra'i gzugs can ni rtsub ni// hrInas zlos par byed pa'o//
331a6(rgyud): desas byung ba'i rdul 'byor pa/ kyi sa pazhi'i bdag nyid rnams// sra ma dag sngon mo grags chen mo// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can pa// zhal gcig phrag gnyis thod pa 'chang /
331a7(rgyud): se mo ri nga bzhin// darnams pa ni rab tu bshad// 'brang bzang sa// 'dod mapa/ 'jigs pa/ zab pa 'a ma/ dge pa'i ga gas sa ma/ gzugs na pa/ rnam rgyalapa/ 'byung banasas/
331b1(rgyud): thod can ma/ mtsho chen ma/ byed ma/ gsod ma/ sgrol ma/ 'jigs ma/ mthong ma/ mi 'jam ma/ dge ma/ mdur byed ma/ dus mtshan ma/ grags chen ma/ mdzes sdug ma/ nor 'dzin ma/ skal bzung ma/ grags
331b2(rgyud): mthong ma'o// 'di lta bu yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan// de yi dbus gnas lha mo ni// he ru ka la bde ster ma// skyil krung byed pa'i gar byed ma// mi yi rus pa'i
331b3(rgyud): 'phreng bas brgyan// lha mo 'od zer dpag dka' zhing // skra ser gyen du 'bar ba ste// d+h+r-i gi bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs// zhal nas khrag ni 'thor byed ma// dkar mo nag mo ljang ku ma/
331b4(rgyud): thams cad khu ba ldan gyur ma// lha yi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid gsungs// bdag nyid he ru ka gzugs la// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lha mos mchod// thod pa bdud rtsi
331b5(rgyud): lngas bkang ba// he ru ka yis btung bar bya// de yis 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni// 'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid che// gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs// rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra/
331b6(rgyud): de ltar he ru ka mgon pos// rnal 'byor ma kun spyad par bya// thams cad spyad pas zhu gyur te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas// de ni zhu bar mthong nas ni// shin tu srid pa
331b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i phyir// sgo yi rnal 'byor ma yis bskul// ci ste 'jig rten snyan mnanan// ci phyir khyod ni mi dgyes gyur// gal te khyod bdag tshig gsan na// mi dgyes gyur pa mtha' dag thong /
332a1(rgyud): srid 'jigs skye bo kun lhung bas// stong pa'i thugs ni ma mdzad par// nyid kyi dgongs pa kun bsgrubs kye// rnal 'byor ma yi grogs po bzhengs// gal te sngon
332a2(rgyud): gtso tshig gsan na// 'bras bu yal bar ma der cig/ khyod mi snang na 'gro ba yi// skye bo mtha' dag gdung bas non// log pa'i nga rgyal ma mdzad par// stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni/
332a3(rgyud): khyod kyis dngos med kun thong la// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs la spyod// rnal 'byor ma ni bzhi po yis// 'di lta bu yi glu yis bskul// sngon bzhin mdog dang mtshan sogs ldan// kun+d+ha
332a4(rgyud): nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor// 'jigs pa 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i// dpa' bo chen po 'di bzhengs so// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i
332a5(rgyud): yang shin tu gsang ba las/ dkyil 'khor dang he ru ka bskyed pa dang bsgom pa'i le'u sde bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor
332a6(rgyud): mchog bzang po// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod de// sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// shing gi sbyir sreg mi bya zhing // 'bras dang 'bru rnams kyis kyang
332a7(rgyud): min// blo ldan gal te zhi 'dod no// me tog gis ni sbyin sreg bya// me tog lnga po mchog chen dang // 'o mar yang dag ldan pas bya// gal te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod// zhi ba'i gzugs
332b1(rgyud): sogs ldan pa yis// zhi ba'i thab khung gru bzhi pa// zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gang ba// kha la rdo rje rtse lnga pa// dkar po rtse mo 'dus pa bri// rdo rje rtse gsum sngon po ni// zhi ba hUM bdag
332b2(rgyud): 'khor bar ni// de yi dbus su 'khor lo la// gru gsum pa yi yi ges brgyan// e wa ma ya mchog chen gyi// lte ba ru ni bskyed par gsungs// rtse gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rjes bskor//
332b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i dbus su nyi ma bas ma// nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hAM/ kha dog dmar po'i 'od chen po// mtshams dang mtshams su rdo rje ni// rtse dgu ser po bri bar bya/
332b4(rgyud): bdag nyid he ru kar blta ste// phyis ni sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam// shes ra ba can gyis me yi lnga// sngags 'dri yis ni spyan drang ngo // oM sarba de bA hI da pra d+he ne/ a bi kalpe su da ha
332b5(rgyud): ne da ha da ha dzA la dz+wa la/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ka ya tri kuM ne a tiSh+Ta ya a tiSh+Tha ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/ ki li ki li/ he he ho haM hraHhri hUM swA hA/ me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so//
332b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// shes rab can sngags lan bdun bzlas// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs shing // mdog dkar du ba dang bral ba'i// me lha rgyal dbang
332b7(rgyud): byon nas kyang // thab khung gi ni dbus su bzhugs// de nas blo ldan sbyin sreg bya// de ru sol ba bzhugs bya ba// a shwa ta dang n+ya gro d+ha// u dum wa ra ra ka ti// pa la sha ste shing lnga las/
333a1(rgyud): sol bA sa du med 'bar ba'i me// blo ldan thab khung dbus su bzhugs// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// padz+ra bar+d+ha ni rtsa brgyad dang // de bzhin ut+pa la nyid dang // ku mu
333a2(rgyud): dmar dri zhim 'dra// ka ra bI ra gzhan nyis 'gyur// byas te bsregs pas zhi bar gsungs// sbyin bdag mdun na 'dug pa la// de la du ba dbab par bya// mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di
333a3(rgyud): bton zhing // pad+ma mAr sngags bsreg par bya// oM pad+ma rA dze ig+ni thi na ya a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mkhas pa yis ni sngags bzlas te// ut+pal 'o mas sbyin sreg bya// oM \u0f7f
333a4(rgyud): g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya te dzo rA dza bi nA ya shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ mkhas pa bde gshegs kun bdag gis// gu ra ku ma ku mu da ba sngags bsregs// oM su puSh+pe su ka ra tsa le dz+wa la nI ye
333a5(rgyud): shAn+tiM ku ru sAhA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// dri zhim tsan dan sbyin sreg bya// oM dA me hA ma rA dza da ha da ha sarba bag+ni shAn+tiM ku ru sAhA/ ka ra b+hi ra dri zhim mar// mkhas pas
333a6(rgyud): sngags rgyal bzlas te sreg/ oM ka li ka ra ka la tri sarba pA pa da ha da ha shAn+tiM ku ru sA hA/ me tog re re re re la/ gsang sngags rgyal po lan re bzla// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tha med pa/
333a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum ni rnyed par dka'// me ni 'o mas zhi bar bya// de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg khyad par bshad par bya// rgyas la thab khung zlum po ste// chu yi dkyil
333b1(rgyud): 'khor ltar snang ba// zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gsum ste// kha dog ser por rnam par bsam// de dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa// sngo bri de steng pad 'dab brgyad// bdag nyid he ru ka rnam
333b2(rgyud): pa/ khro ba'i sems kyis bdag nyid kyis// shing bsregs pa yi sbyin sreg bya// gal te rgyas pa mchog 'dod na// a mra kan thA pa la dang // arga bil ba du du ra// shin tu
333b3(rgyud): rnyed dka'i shing lnga las// sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du// slob dpon gyis ni gzung bar bya// ma gas ma bskams ma bcad cing / khu ga can gyi shing spang ngo // de yi
333b4(rgyud): dbus su sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsam// re re la ni brgya rtsa brgyad// bgrangs te de nas sbyin sreg bya// bdag nyid he ru ka yi tshul// sku
333b5(rgyud): mdog nag po 'od chen pos// mar dang yam shing thams cad ni// sngags bsregs 'dir ni the tsom med// oM ga ga ni ga ga na bi lo ka ne hUM phaT/ te dzo rA dza puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ shing rnams
333b6(rgyud): kun gyis sngags 'di yis// re re bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// phyis ni ser po'i chus zhi bya// 'di lta'i rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'// rgyud gzhan rnams su
333b7(rgyud): sbas pa ni// rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg mchog/ thab khung gru gsum dmar po la// thabs dang rgyar ni sor mo brgyad// de dbus
334a1(rgyud): pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar// zla ba dmar la sogs pas brgyan// gla grwa ru ni rdo rje dmar// bdag nyid he ru kar bsam pa// dbar po ltar snang chags pa'i bdag/ rdo rje dmar/
334a2(rgyud): po thod pa bsnams// yongs su gang ba'i khrag nyid kyis// khams gsum pa la rjes su chags// a sho ka yi yam shing dang // go ro tsa nar ldan pa ni// blo ldan brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs/
334a3(rgyud): tewashin tu mnyam bzhag sngags ni 'dron// oM a sho ka ni su ra ke a nu rA ga ya trai lo kyaM ba sha mA na ya hrIHswA hA/ nyin bdun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// khams gsum dbang du/
334a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// chu ni dmar pos me zhi bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// mngon spyod dang ni gsad pa mchog/ zla ba phyed pa'i cha 'dra'i thab// zabs dang rgyar ni khru
334a5(rgyud): gang tshad// 'jigs chen mdog ni ljang ku'o// grA grwa ru ni rdo rje bri// dbus kyi sa gzhi stong pa ru// blo ldan sha lngas sbyin sreg bya// gsod pa yi ni sbyin sreg mchog/ mngon
334a6(rgyud): spyod gsod pa ru ni gsungs// dgra kun bstun cing zlog par byed// dgra bo thur du kha bltas shing // kha nas khrag ni skyug pa nyid// sha yi dbus su bsam par bya// seng ldeng sol/
334a7(rgyud): bos me bya ste// med na 'ba' 'bo la nyid kyi// 'ba' 'bo tsher mas sha phug ste// brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags kyis sreg/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya kI la ya sarba sha truM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ bdag
334b1(rgyud): nyid he ru kAr gyur cing // sku mdog sngon po thugs 'khrugs pas// dgra rnam lam cad rlag par ni// skad cig de la the tshom med// phred mdzad 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed// ha ha zhes
334b2(rgyud): mdzad 'jigs par mdzad// gdug pa thams cad gsad par ni// sbyin sreg tsam gyis the tsom med// 'di lta'i gsad pa'i sbyin sreg dang // mngon spyod kyang ni rnyed dka' ba// rnal
334b3(rgyud): 'byor lha mos rtogs min na// sngags skyes phal lha smos ci dgos// de phyir sangs rgyas thod pa yi// rnal 'byor nga rgyal dang bral bas// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems// lha rnam/
334b4(rgyud): kyis kyang rnyed par dka'// ljang ku'i chu yis me zhi bya// gang gis bsregs shing grang zhig bsregs// gang gi zhi ba gang zhi ba// gang gis rnam rtog kun bcom pa// de yi sems ni mgu
334b5(rgyud): bar byed// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas
334b6(rgyud): yang dag rab bshad pa// spyod pa'i le'u shin tu rnyed dka' ba// bud med shin tu mchog gyur dang // rnal 'byor gang gis spyod kun byed// dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan// de nas
334b7(rgyud): spyod pa yang dag brtsam// sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod// de de'i dngos grub rtag tu ster// lag pas thod pa bzung byas te// gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yi// brtul zhugs can/
335a1(rgyud): gyi spyod pas 'khyam// gang du gang tshe de tshe der// rtag tu spyod pa thams cad bya// rgyan rnams kun las rnam grol zhing // nam mkha' dang mtshungs gyur pa li// shes/
335a2(rgyud): rab can gyis khyim khyim du// slong mo bya bar the tsom med// yid dang mthun pa kun blangs nas// bsam gtan gnas su the tshom med// dga' ba'i sems kyis bsams nas ni/
335a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yis slong mo bslangs// chos la gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas// thod pa'i steng du bzhag pa yi// rdzas ni de nas bza' bar bya// rdzas ni zos ma thag tu yang // khyim
335a4(rgyud): khyim thal phud shing drung dang // gang du gang tshe drer de'i tshe// gang gis dga' ba'i sems de yis// blo gros chen po gnyid log 'phreng // 'di lta'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis//
335a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po nges par 'thob// de ltar yang ni rgyud las gsungs// gang du ji ltar der de ltar// gang gi de yis sangs rgyas te// rang gi rnam rtog dag gis nyams// mtha' dag
335a6(rgyud): rang bzhin rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
335a7(rgyud): de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// gcig tu sems can don rab nges// gser du nges par byed pa'i le'u// slob dpon la ni rab dang bas// mu tig dang ni nya phyis dang // dngul chu dang ni byA/
335b1(rgyud): ru yis// gang gi sems can nor ldan 'gyur// 'di ni phyi yi sman min te// shun lpags lo ma ma yin zhing // dngul chu bcud len ma yin te// mu zi lgang tsher ma yin zhing // lcags dang zha nye zangs
335b2(rgyud): ma yin// lcags gzhan dag ni ma yin te// grub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no// 'di lta bu yi tshig thos nas// phyag na rdo rje stobs po ches// zhabs kyi rdul gyi chabatud nas// sems dpa'
335b3(rgyud): gcig tu dang brtan pas// lha mo legs so zhes ni smras// sman gyi mchog ni gang yin zhing // dngos grub kyang ni ji lta bu// gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal// lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsung//
335b4(rgyud): grub pa'i sman gyi mchog gang lags// gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur// tshe 'phel ba la brtson pa gang // sngon bsnyen ltos pa med pa yis// sman chen grags pas 'grub pa gang /
335b5(rgyud): gang gis rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur// mo gsham bu dang ldan gyur gang // yang dang yang du mi 'chi zhing // shi nas yang dag 'tshor 'gyur ba// lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs//
335b6(rgyud): bka' stsalnga pa/ khyim 'di nyid du gnas pa yi// sman chen po yis 'grub pa ste// de yang snod bzang mchog la 'grub/ byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so// bdag don gcig
335b7(rgyud): bubral 'bab cing // kye ma gcig tu dka' 'bad pas// ji ltar sems can don 'grub 'gyur// snod bzang la ni gnas pa'i bcud// ze 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te// ro bcud
336a1(rgyud): rtsa yi nang gnas pa'i// sman chen ro bcud ma ru brjod// gang gis lcags ni gser 'gyur bar// gcig gis kyang ni grangs med 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sman
336a2(rgyud): chen mchog/ ro bcud ma ni de bzhin gnas// rab 'byor cho ga sngon 'gro bas// sman gyi mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// der ni yang dag sbyor ba bshad// dad pa brtan pa yis ni nyon// /
336a3(rgyud): me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang // gzhon nu kha dog nag mo ste// rgyud 'di thos pa dang ldan zhing // ngo tsha med cing ltos med ma// 'dod pa chung zhing sems can brtse// de bzhin gshegs pa/
336a4(rgyud): rnams ston cing // rtag tu rab sbas brtsog med ma// 'di lta'i bud med rab blangs te// sman chen mchog ni yang dag brtsam// skyes bu shin tu chags che zhing // myur du byang chub
336a5(rgyud): sems 'bab pa// gang yin de la dngos grub med// 'di lta bu yi sman chen po// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rab rnyed dka'// shin tu brtan pa'i sems kyis ni// blo ldan bud med de rnams/
336a6(rgyud): bsten// de ltar yang gsungs pa/ rab tu brtan pa gtso bo'i gnas// zhes ni sgrub pa po rnams smra// de phyir brtan pa'i sems kyis ni// snod bzang 'bras bu bskul bar bya// der ni ma
336a7(rgyud): tog ldan bud med// gser gyi sbyor ba rnyed dka' brtsam// grub pa'i bcud kyis byugs pa yis// zla ba rang gi snying kar bsam// sngon du ri yi rgyal pos brgyan// der ni yi ge hrI sa bon//
336b1(rgyud): sems can don la gcig tu 'bad// tho ldan dgos pa yang dag brtsam// zangs ma'i dngos po srang gcig bcas// zlum po snod bzang la bcug ste// g.yon pa bskum pa'i g.yas zur
336b2(rgyud): gzhag/ med na lcags kyang bya ba yin// brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni// de nas blo ldan las rnams brtsam// ri rab zla ba sa bon rgyal// zhu 'gyur the tshom med pa yin// snod
336b3(rgyud): bzang der ni ngal bsos pas// 'pho ba'i sbyor bas 'dzag pa nyid// bzang por myur du rab blangs te// mkhas pa yis ni byug par bya// rdog po byugs pa tsam gyis ni// me yi
336b4(rgyud): nang du gzhug bya zhing // de nas shes rab can bltas na// gser du 'gyur ba the tshom med// de ni ma sha gcig gis ni// srang brgya ru ni 'gyur ba yin// de ltar gser gyi sbyor ba
336b5(rgyud): mchog/ 'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'// gal te sman chen tshad min na// de tshe sangs rgyas tshad ma yin// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir// dngos po gang dang gang gsungs
336b6(rgyud): pa la sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di tshad min smra ba'i// blo gros chen po thos ldan pa// ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi
336b7(rgyud): bar// de dag thams cad dmyal bar 'gro// sman 'di tsam gyis ma grub na// chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang // bla med rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// de dag thams cad brdzun par 'gyur//

337a2(rgyud): tu 'bad// sgo ldan 'grub pa lta ci smos// sman mchog gser dang dngul du 'gyur// ji srid sangs rgyas ye shes yod// mi ni bskal pa bye bar 'tsho// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa//

337a4(rgyud): lnga yi rdul tshon nam// yang na rdul tshon dkar po yis// dpag dka' skrag par byed pa yis// dkyil 'khor 'jigs par bri bar bya// de ni bum pa lho che ba// zlum po bzhi ni gzhag

337b1(rgyud): de nas ral gri 'dzin pa yi// skyes pa bzhi po grags chen po// khro bo gzhan gyi sems dang ldan// 'jigs chen skyes bu de rnams kyis// ral gris nam mkhar bsnun cing gsod// sangs/

337b3(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sman chen po khyad par can dang / mo gsham gyi khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//

337b5(rgyud): nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed// mtshan ma phyag sogs sngon gsung bzhin// kha dog dkar po 'ba' zhig nyid// phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma dkar zhing // mtshams kyi dmar po nyid yin
337b6(rgyud): no// sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs// bum pa rnam pa bzhi po la// sngon gsungs phyag mtshan bri bar bya// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
337b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// phyis ni slob ma rjes su gzung // sngon gyi tsho gas gsol btab ste// sbyin dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang // de nas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// slar yang gsang
338a1(rgyud): sngags 'di yis ni// slob ma rjes su gzung bar bya// sa stengs na ni dus zin la// cung zad gasngo bar mi nus te// nam mkha' lding can gyis btang zhing // dus
338a2(rgyud): su zin ces smra ba na// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// blo ldan de nas las brtsam mo// bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing // kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad de// de kun sku ni dkar po
338a3(rgyud): ru mcho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya// 'bras btags rang bzhin blangs nas ni// rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis bya'o// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis// de yi lag par ral gri sbyin//
338a4(rgyud): de yi snying khar sngags bris gzhug/ 'dab ma grang dang gang de la// mar khu che byas snag tsha dang // mkhas pas sngags ni bri bar bya// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hId+ha oM ka pA li ni badz+ri Ni/
338a5(rgyud): a bi dz+nyA sa ya sarba nA ga na u da pa ye d+ya d+ha ra NI/ bi b+ha ya ka la da sha na/ b+ho b+ho b+ha ga wa ti bud+d+ha ka pA li nI sarba na Na k+Sha ye ka ri ha ha ha sAd+d+he/ reg pa 'dzin pa'i sngags so//
338a6(rgyud): de ltar yongs su rdzogs nas ni// 'dab ma snying kar gzhug par bya// gsang sngags 'di dang lcug ma yis// lan bdun bar du spyan drang ngo // oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/
338a7(rgyud): b+ha Da g+ha Da pri tri baHhaHhe hohaM/ lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis/ khar snang du ni lding 'gyur te// gcig ni dum bu dum bu ru// sa la
338b1(rgyud): ltung ba ru ni 'gyur// dus zin 'dir langs the tshom med// gzhan yang sbyor ba rnyed dka' gang // pang bteg la sogs bcwo lnga pa'o// glegs pam la ni thi ma byas// bla ma'i drin
338b2(rgyud): las shes par bya// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba'i man ngag nges pa'i le'u ste bcu
338b3(rgyud): gcig pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// rnal 'byor ma yi gtsor gyur pa/
338b4(rgyud): shes rab chen po lha mo legs// khyod kyis gsungs pa'i sbyor ba gang // 'jig rten na yang rnyed par dka'// bdag gis rgyud kun mthong mod kyi// sbyor ba 'di dag rnyed par dka'//
338b5(rgyud): rgyud 'dir khyod kyis gang gsungs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis ma bshad do// e ma'o sems can don la brtson// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun bskyed ma// e ma'o phyag rgya che la brtson/
338b6(rgyud): sngags rnams kun gyi rab sbyor ba// shin tu rnyed pa gang yin des// rnal 'byor pa gang ngo mtshar ba// sna tshogs byed 'gyur lha mo gsungs// dang po'i le'ur gang gang gsungs// sbyor
338b7(rgyud): de lha mo bdag la shod// 'di lta bu yi tshig gsan nas// rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs ste// bzhad cing shin tu bzhad pa yis// lha rnams thams cad skrag pa dang // bdud sde thams
339a1(rgyud): cad 'bros pa dang // bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// e ma'o bzhad pa'i nges pa yis// rgyal ba'i mchog kun ngo mtshar ro// gsungs pa/ rgyal/
339a2(rgyud): mtshan 'phyang ba gleng byas la// de yi sha yang blang bya zhing // de yi rked cha'i rus pa ni// blangs nas thab khung du ni bya// de yi thod pa'i rjes bzung ste// rgyus pa sdong bur byas
339a3(rgyud): te gzhag/ de yi mar khus dgang bya zhing // thab khrang gru gsum steng du gzhug/ gzhan yang dud pa 'bebs pa dang // ji srid dud pa chags kyi bar// sangs rgyas thod pa'i
339a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// gsang sngags 'di ni bzla bar bya// oM prad+d+ha ku pA li ni b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra d+ha d+ha ra/ d+ha rap+ta ya d+hA ra pA ya/ shau Sha ya sho ShA ya/ ta pa ya tA pa ya/ tAM tAM/ oM
339a5(rgyud): me saM ra d+haM ku ru ku ru b+h+yo b+ha ga wa ti prad+d+ha ka pA la s+ya dz+nyA ma laM g+ha ya shI g+h+raM ka dza la ba taM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ tAM trAM a hU~M stam+b+ha ya/ b+ho b+ha ga wa ti hUM aM phaT/ 'di ltar sngags kyi
339a6(rgyud): rgyal po yis// 'jig rten gsum yang skems par byed// 'byung po ro langs mkha' 'gro ma// srin po sha za la sogs dang // gzhan yang rung ste bgegs de rnams// thos
339a7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur// ji srid dud pa ma babs pa// de srid sngags ni bzla bar bya// dud pa babs ma thag tu ni// lag pa gnyis kas gzung bar bya// de nas blo
339b1(rgyud): chen rnal 'byor pas// rol rtsed 'phreng ba btung bar bya// bu mo lo ni bcu drug ma// lang tsho'i gzugs la brtse ba can// 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis spyad// gcig tu sems
339b2(rgyud): can don 'bad pa// gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yis// mkhas pas he hi'i sngags bton te// rol rtsed 'phreng ma btung bar bya// de yi rjes la rtsed 'jo brtsam// shin tu band
339b3(rgyud): gyur phred mdzad pa'i// brtse ba chen po'i lag g.yon du// dud chen mchog ni gzhag par bya// sbyor ba la ni mkhas pa yis// phyis ni pags kyis bya ba bya// pad+ma las byung rdzas gang
339b4(rgyud): zhig/ de nyid kyis ni dud pa mnye// ming med mthe bos me tog sbyin// ril bu brgyad dang rtsa brgyad bya// ril bu re re re re la// gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla// oM bud+d+ha kA pA/
339b5(rgyud): li ni trAM hrIHhUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' zhing // rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed dka' ba// rnal 'byor mas kyang rnyed dka' ba'i// sngags 'di yis ni dud pa sgrub// srin lag gis
339b6(rgyud): nisor mo yis// mig la dud pa byugs tsam gyis// stong gsum rdul phran lta bu yi// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad cu yi// steng dang
339b7(rgyud): 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur// lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis// skad cig de la rnal mar 'gyur// mdzub mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong 'gyur te// 'byung po
340a1(rgyud): ye dgas sha ba dang // gzhan yang grub pa rnams dang ni// dpag chad bye ba stong phrag gi/ sreng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur// lag pa gson pas mnyes tsam gyis// nal/
340a2(rgyud): mar 'gyur bar the tshom med// gung mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni// shin tu ngo mtshar byed 'gyur te// pheg brdabs bdun gyi sgra tshad du// nag po 'bar byed rtse mo yis// sprin rnams thams cad
340a3(rgyud): 'thor bar 'gyur// 'di lta'i rung pa rnyed par dka'// lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis// skad cig de la mi ru 'gyur// mthe bong gis ni drad pa yi// bdag nyid chen po byugs tsam gyis//
340a4(rgyud): gzugs brnyan mtshan ma ri dang shing // gzhan dag gang yang rung ba rnams// khro ba'i lta bas bltas tsam gyis// dum bu stong du 'gyur ba yin// g.yon pas mnyes pa tsam gyis ni/
340a5(rgyud): rnamasar 'gyur bar the tshom med// mthen rgyang gis ni mig byugs na// gang cis de la mi srang 'azur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// gad cigasam cu gsum su mthos/
340a6(rgyud): mdzod pa bud med rdzas nyid dang // dngos po gang dang gang 'dod pa// dud pa'i bdag nyid chen po yis// skad cig de la 'brog par 'gyur// 'di la bu yi dud mchog gi/ sbyor ba rna
340a7(rgyud): tshogs legs par bshad// de ni mig la byugs tsam gyis// rang gi gzugs ni sgyur bar byed// dud pa 'di ni blugs tsam gyis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// bya rog
340b1(rgyud): 'ug pa bya rgod dang // sbrul dang khyi dang ce spyang dang // stag dang gung dang byi la dang // sbrang bu glang po bong bu ru// de ltar dud pa chen po yis// sna tshogs pa yi las byed pa'o// kun la
340b2(rgyud): las kun yod mod kyi// sbyor ba 'bra' zhig rnyed par dka'// sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad de// sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka'
340b3(rgyud): gasngags dang rus pa'i sbyor ba yis// rtag tu sna tshogs la sa byed do// glang po'i rus pas gsad pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// oM bud+d+ha kA pA li n+na sni d+hu/ ta yi rus pas bskrad pa rnyed par
340b4(rgyud): dka' ba bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI khaM hrIHhUM phaT/ ba glang gi rus pas dgra'i snying kar phur bu gdab par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI traM hrIH/ khyi'i rus pas rengs pa chen po bya bar gsungs
340b5(rgyud): so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI oM AHhUM phaT/ rus pa chen pos ni dgug par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hrIHbo ShaT/ bong bu'i rus pas rmongs par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI bruM hUM/ 'ug pa'i
340b6(rgyud): rus pas dbang du bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI tA hrIHhU~M/ b+hu rgod kyi rus pas dbye bar bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hA phaTaHTu/ bong bu'i rus pas rengs par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badz+ri/
340b7(rgyud): traice spyang gi rus pas g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI b+ha ga wa ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ha he ho ha ha/ ma he'i rus pas dga' zhing rtse bas lo bcu gnyis su nyin dang mtshan du de'i
341a1(rgyud): byang chub sems mi ltung ngo // oM bud+d+ha ka pa li nI ra ma ra ma kri Ta k+tsi Ta haha/ sbrul gyi rus pas shing rtsa nas 'don no// oM prad+d+ha ka pA li nri Shawa ta Ta/ rba ta ya \u0f7f
341a2(rgyud): sa ma ta s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya uta pa Ta ya hUM phaT/ stag gi rus pas ri 'degs par byed do// oM prad+d+ha ka pA li ts+tshi/ g+hA ra g+ha ra/ maT maT/ tra Ta ya tAT ya/ g+ha TA pa la g+hab+hA pa ya/ A Ta pru \u0f7f
341a3(rgyud): mo Ta mo Ta ya saM kra ma ya hrIHd+hu hU~M phaT/ lcags kyus ni nags stug po stongs par byed do// oM br-id+d+ha ka pA li nI badzin sha yA ma ra ye/ b+hu Ta b+hu Ti ni sarba ba na ya tir tre ye ya~M ta TA ya bi rbab pa/
341a4(rgyud): tsa mo tsa ma/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ b+ho b+ha ga la ti e e ta Ta hUM phaT/ sems gcig dri med me long bzhin// gang bsams de yang gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam lta bur shes mod kyi// 'on kyang /
341a5(rgyud): rnam par rtog pas gsungs// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sngags sna tshogs kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste
341a6(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// rnam dag le'u rab rnyed dka'// ne ne mo dang tsha mo dang // ma dang bu mo chung ma nyid// gal te phyag rgya che 'dod na//
341a7(rgyud): shes rab can gyis 'di dag spyad// gsung mo dang ni gar mkhan ma// khrus mkhan ma dang gtum mo yi// bu mo ko ba byed par gsungs// blo dang ldan pas 'di dag spyad// de lnga rnal 'byor/
341b1(rgyud): ma yi mchog/ de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// ma dag pa yi sems sbyang phyir// mig ni sring mor gyur pa ste// rna ba tsha mo nyid yin no// sna ni ma ru 'gyur ba ste// lce ni bu mo nyid yin no//
341b2(rgyud): yid ni chung mar 'gyur ba ste// lnga po de rnams mchog lha mo// phyag rgya chen po rab ster ma'o// gti mug gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur// zhe sdang g.yung mo nyid yin no// 'dod chags khrus
341b3(rgyud): mkhan ma yin te// nga rgyal gtum mo nyid yin no// phrag dog ko ba byed ma'o// lnga po de rnams bud med mchog/ gzugs las gti mug skye ba ste// sgra las zhe sdang skye ba yin// dril
341b4(rgyud): longs spyod pas 'dod chags// ro las nga rgyal nyid yin te// reg bya las ni phrag dog skye// sems kyi dag pa nyid yin no// de phyir rnal 'byor blo chen gyis// shin tu sbyor ba'i sems /
341b5(rgyud): kyis ni// skye 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang // skye gzhan srid par dngos grub 'thob// ji ltar dngos po med par bsgom// ji ltar dngos po bsgom par bya// dngos po bsgom bya ji
341b6(rgyud): ltar 'gyur// sring mo'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin// dkar mo ljang ku'i sngon mo'i mdog/ 'di lta'i gzugs dang ldan par ni// dag pa'i sems kyis blta mi bya// tsha mos ji ltar
341b7(rgyud): sla thos pa'i// spa zags pa ni rnam gsum nyid// 'di lta'i sbyor dang ldan par ni// dag pa'i sems kyis mnyan mi bya// rab sbas skyes ma gang yin des// de ni rnam pa gsum/
342a1(rgyud): bltas pa// lha mir yid dang ldan pa la// ji ltar 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur// lce dang lhan cig longs spyod rdzas// ro drug myangs pa ci 'dra ba// myangs pas
342a2(rgyud): longs spyod ldan pa yi// myangs pa'i gzugs ni jis bu// yid kyis longs spyod dga' de nyid// yid kyis gnyis ka spyad pas bde// der ni rtag pa yod ma yin// dngos po las ni dngos
342a3(rgyud): med yod// dngos med la yang dngos po nyid// dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka stong // 'di dag sems kyi dag pa nyid// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// phyi yi lus ni sbyang phyir ro//
342a4(rgyud): lha dang ldan pa snying rje ste// 'khyud pa byams par 'gyur ba'o// drud pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni// dga' ba yan lag ma yi mchog/ gnyis ka 'dus las gang 'dzag pa// de ni bdag/
342a5(rgyud): gis btang snyoms gsungs// de ltar dngos po'i sbyor ldan pa// ji ltar 'dod chags kyis 'ching 'gyur// mthong ba las ni 'dod chags skye// 'khyud las 'bras bu cung zad tsam//
342a6(rgyud): drud pa las ni dga' ba skyes// kun gyi mtha' mar dga' bral lo// de ltar dga' dang dga' thal 'bras// khams gsum pa las skye bar 'gyur// rab 'ga' sems kyi sbyor ba
342a7(rgyud): yis// dngos po gsum gyis 'ching mi 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba gang ci'ang rung // bde ba 'bab pa'i kha zas rnams// de kun bshang dang gci sogs su// rnal 'byor rig pas/
342b1(rgyud): rtag tu brtag/ gang ci rung ba'i dga' rtsed 'jo// 'khyud pa dang ni 'o byed dang // nyid dang 'chir ba nyid kyis ni// phyag rgya chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur// 'di lha'i sgom dang ldan
342b2(rgyud): pas ni// 'di ru 'grub par the tshom med// rnal 'byor me lngas sangs rgyas kyi// dpal dang phyag rgya che ster byed// rnal 'byor pa yis de mchod na// 'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi
342b3(rgyud): 'gyur// phrag dog la sogs kyis sngags kyang // de la nyes pas gnod pa med// rnal 'byor pa yi mchog de nyid// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// ji srid khams phye
342b4(rgyud): dom gsor// sangs rgyas sku srid sdig dang bral// byang chub sems ni 'dzag med pa// gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i shing // sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i
342b5(rgyud): rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sems rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sna
342b6(rgyud): tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u// de ltar phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams
342b7(rgyud): spyan drangs shing mgu ba'i sems kyis sna tshogs bde ma la btud de bstod pa// kyi ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed ma// dpal dang grags pa
343a1(rgyud): che zhing 'jigs// sems can kun la phan mdzad ma// lha mo snying rje che ldan ma// phyag tu chen po blo chen ma// don chen 'bras bu skyon mdzad ma// sangs rgyas
343a2(rgyud): thod pa yi ni rgyud// rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs shing // byang chub sems dpa'i yul min pa// gsungs gcig gis ni gsal mdzad de/
343a3(rgyud): de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsungs// e ma'o snod chen lha mo khyod// rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs kun yul min pa// rnyed dka' dngos grub gang yin pa/
343a4(rgyud): de ni lha mos gsal bar mdzod// gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad nyon// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // 'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyon// sangs rgyas
343a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyon// klu dang lhar bcas mi rnams nyon// rgyud rgyal 'di ni bklags tsam gyis// bsod nams gang yin de kun gyi// bsod nams rjes rang yongs su bsngo//
343a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i don du ni// sangs rgyas yon tan rnam pa dbul// sngags don zab mo rnams dang ni// sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba// gang zhig gsal byas bdag bzod mdzod//
343a7(rgyud): shin tu sbas pa'i yul de yang // sems can don du gsal byas pas// rgyal po'i mchog rnams bdag bzod mdzod// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sngags kyi bzlas pa/
343b1(rgyud): stobs po che// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sangs rgyas thod sbyor bzang po bzla// oM hrIHbud+d+ha hUM ka pA lI nI AH'jug pa la yo/ 'byung ba la hrIHgnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde
343b2(rgyud): ba la hUM/ nub pa la ka pA li nI/ ldang ba la AH'o// de ltar bzlas par rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor chud bza// de ltar yid kyi bzlas ldan pas// dngos grub
343b3(rgyud): 'thob pa the tsom med// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni AHhrIHhe hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badz+ri Ni ho hUM/ a dur lak+She b+h+rUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so// de nas
343b4(rgyud): yang dag rab bshad pa// dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du// slob ma dang brtan gang zhig gis// shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab// dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis// maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas
343b5(rgyud): te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyan byas pa// lha mo che la gsol ba gdab// zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog btab// rdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang // yid ni tshom zhing thugs dgyes so//
343b6(rgyud): lha mo dgyes par mthong nas ni// tshig 'di dag gis smra bar byed// rnam par rtog pa mang po yis// g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba dag/ mdzes ma
343b7(rgyud): khyod kyis skyob par mdzod// grags chen snying rje ldan pa yi// wa mo de ni zhi bar mdzod// der ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang // sleb srub rgyan rnams dbul bar bya// dad pa brtan pa'i/
344a1(rgyud): sems kyis ni// de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs btung // de yi mdun du dbul bar bya// gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa// sangs/
344a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod// 'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs// gzhan yang dngos grub gtso bo dang // snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig/ mkha' 'gro ma kun 'di la bzhugs//
344a3(rgyud): gang du dbang po 'gags gyur pa// bdag rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste// kye de lhan cig skyes dgar gyur// bla ma'i zhal snga gsal bar zhus// gang zhig 'tshar dus tshen dpa' bo dang /
344a4(rgyud): yul mnyam rub gyur de la phyag 'tshal lo// mkhas pa rnams kyi snying sbas su sad la// phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig/ sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i
344a5(rgyud): rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rgyud thams cad kyi gleng bzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
344a6(rgyud): 'di gsungs nas sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi gnas na 'dug ste/
344a7(rgyud): ci'ang mi gsungs par bzhugs so// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan/
344b1(rgyud): bo shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsAb gyi rdzo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gur skad du/ ma hA mA yAt+tar+tha/
344b2(rgyud): nArnam khod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los sgyur// ye
344b3(rgyud): shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid// 'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing // 'jig rten bya bar rab 'jug pa// de snyed rnam
344b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig gis ni kun khyab pa// rgyu dang
344b5(rgyud): mi rgyu tshangs sgo nga // lha mo thams cad skyed byed cing // tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che// de rnams kyi ni gsang tshon 'di// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang phyug che// sgyu 'phrul chen mo
344b6(rgyud): drag chen mo// 'byung ba yang dag sdud mdzad ma// gang gis 'di kun la khyab pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// des ni de nas 'di bsdus nas// 'jig rten gsum po yang
344b7(rgyud): spro'o// gsang ba pa rnams ma 'di ni// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ces rnam grags// 'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste// 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba// gang zhig rnam par shes tsam/
345a1(rgyud): gyis sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa nyid// lha dang nor bdag dri za dang // gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas// rig pa 'dzin dang gang yang rung // mi 'am ci dang lto
345a2(rgyud): 'phye che// srin po dang ni sha za rnams// sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur// dbang du 'du 'gyur 'byung po rnams// chu las skyes dang thang las skyes// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od/
345a3(rgyud): gsal ba// gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// thabs brjod pa yis de las ni// rang byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba'i ma// khams gsum po ni ma
345a4(rgyud): lus kun// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'o// sangs rgyas kun las phrogs nas su// lha mchog lha skyes bu mo skyod// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed
345a5(rgyud): rig pa// de bzhin du ni mig 'khrul byed// rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang // bskrad dang gsad pa la sogs pa// dbang dang dgug pa la sogs dang // nam mkhar 'gro ba nyid kyang ngo //
345a6(rgyud): gzhan gyi grong sogs bya ba dang // mi snang ba dang gang yang rung // zhe 'gras pa dang rmugs pa dang // de bzhin sa 'og 'gro ba'o// rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur nyid 'gyur// 'chi ba med
345a7(rgyud): cing rgas pa med// rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'di// 'di yis na ba med par 'gyur// sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su// rnal 'byor pas ni rnal rol byed// bklags pa dang ni
345b1(rgyud): bsams pa yis// skom pa dang ni ting 'dzin rnams// bklags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste// rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// brtul zhugs med cing dka' thub med// dka' spyod
345b2(rgyud): bsrung ba sdom med par// rtag tu shes rab thabs sogs kyis// rtag tu dga' dang bde bas 'grub// lte ba'i dbus gnas dpa' bo ste// ge sar gsung ba'i spyod yul la// sem
345b3(rgyud): dang sems med sems kyi gzugs// ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag/ de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// A li kA li mnyam byas te/
345b4(rgyud): ri mo de la sbyar bar bya// ri mo steng du 'bar ba'i mthar// 'og tu 'bab par byed pa'o// khu ba'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ste// bdud rtsi'i thig pa'i gzugs las so// gang gang
345b5(rgyud): dbang po'i lam nas ni// de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'bab// dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub dang /
345b6(rgyud): ril bu chen po'i sgrub pa yang // sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rab sbyor ba'i// sdom pa'i sbyor bar byed par 'gyur// mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas//
345b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i dbang po shes bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o// gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis// lha yi gnas su myur bar 'gyur// de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// lha me
346a1(rgyud): bden par smra ba'o// sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyod la ngas// 'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen mo rnams kyi ni// bzang po'i yi ge'i
346a2(rgyud): 'phreng ba rnams// gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa kun la nyer spyod pa// ji ltar 'dod bzhin bster byas na// rnal 'byor pa
346a3(rgyud): chen rtag rol te// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni// rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dpal//
346a4(rgyud): dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur// bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rtag tu sems can dor byed pa'o// khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni// gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid// /
346a5(rgyud): sha chen po ni bkug nas su// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig spyod// tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po dang // gzi brjid che zhing stobs chen 'gyur// lha yi mig dang rdzu 'phrul ldan//

346a7(rgyud): zag tu ni// rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes shing // bklags pas 'grub pa'i don yod pa// rig ma'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul che// rig pa 'jig rten gsum po na// nga yi rig dang
346b1(rgyud): mnyam pa med// rgyud rnams kun gyi lung 'di ni// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen mo las/ dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u
346b2(rgyud): dang po'o// // de nas de las rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ma'i gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par

346b6(rgyud): shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni// sred pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'ang //

347a1(rgyud): yi ge gnyis pa dang ldan pa// bsam zhing rnam par bsgom bya na// sa gsum po ni ma lus pa// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// tshangs dang khyab 'jug

352b1(rgyud): lngas gang bum pa ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyi// des ni lha rnams dbang bskur bya// lha yi dbang las bde ba nyid// oM sarba ta thA ga ta DA ki n+ya b+hi Shi ka badz+ra swa b+ha la At+ma ko&he/ gru gsum
352b2(rgyud): me yi sa bon gyis// snang byed rnam par bsgom par bya// snying kar hUM las rigs bdag nyid// de nyid kyi ni de ru 'gyur// de nas rdo rje las byung kun// rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid// ri gi a ra li
352b3(rgyud): gnas su// bdag nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya// dmyal ba brgyad ni thod pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'phar ma gsum gnas pa'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// 'khor lo g.yas su bskor ba yin//
352b4(rgyud): zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'i A ra li// sems kyis 'jigs byed mnan nas ni// ri gi shing la mngon zhon pa// zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor bar bya// rnal 'byor ma kun thod par gnas// gar/
352b5(rgyud): gyi rkang pas phyogs su gnas// tsha dang grang ba'i rab dbye bas// mtshams su thod pa brgyad po yin// las thams cad rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
352b6(rgyud): ri gi a ra lis zhus pa// brda yi rnam pa du zhig lags// de la lha mo ri gi ches// brda ni yang dag rab tu phye// brda ni chen po tsAm bcu// bdag nyid sngon du byed pa nyid// gang gis rnam
352b7(rgyud): par shes tsam gyis// sgrub po dngos grub thob 'dod na// gnas ni dpral ba'i rgyab tu 'dod// ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid de// pus mo tshan dor 'gro bar 'gyur// dpral bar nye ba'i tshan do nyid//
353a1(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa 'du ba nyid// g.yon pa nye ba'i 'du ba nyid// rna ba g.yas pa dur khrod gnas// g.yon pa nye ba'i dur khrod do// snying ni zhing du yang dga'agyur// lhag ma
353a2(rgyud): nye ba'i zhing nyid dang // tshong rdal nyams dga' tshong dus dang // ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu blta// brda yi rnam par shes par bya// rang gi mtshan ma rang gis ston// ril bu mig sman la sogs pa// /
353a3(rgyud): mchog ni rab tu smin par 'gyur// A ra li yis lha mo zhus// ye shes dam pa ji ltar lags// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// 'bras byir byang /
353a4(rgyud): chub thob 'gyur ba'i// ting 'dzin lha mo ri gi ste// mchog tu bde ba chen po nyid// srub dang srub byed las byung ba// kun mkhyen ye shes yang dag 'byung // sems pa thams cad yongs su
353a5(rgyud): spangs// dbang po thams cad bzlog par bya// dgon pa dben pa'i gnas su ni// gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par spangs// mig dag steng du bzlog nas ni// smin ma'i dbus su sems
353a6(rgyud): byas nas// mi bzang mun pa'i gzugs su ni// sgrub pos dang po mthong bar 'gyur// phyis ni rna ba g.yon par bcug/ dal gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur// yan lag can gyi bde ba
353a7(rgyud): gang // de bzhin phyag rgya chen po bde// phyi yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jigs// de yis ye shes kyang ni 'jig/ bde ba chen por rtogs pa'i phyir// de yi ye shes phyag rgya ba// 'di nyid ye shes chen po/
353b1(rgyud): nyid la rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin can// gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bur// gzhan du brjod par mi nus so// lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// sems can gsol 'debs sems kyis ni//
353b2(rgyud): sems can kun la snying rje yis// 'di ni rnal 'byor gtso bo nyid// 'di la goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni// snying rje mthu chen rnal 'byor pas/
353b3(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dang por mun pa mthong bar 'gyur// gnyis pa dkar dang ngu ba 'thul// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa lhur// bzhi pa ya ba'i me tog bzhin// lnga pa sprin
353b4(rgyud): med ye shes ni// rang bzhin yang dag rig pa spangs// sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni// de yod thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rtse gcig sems kyis ri
353b5(rgyud): gir 'gyur// ye shes bdud rtsi rtag 'thungs pas// bkres pas zil gyis mi non cing // sgom pa yis kyang zil ma non// rga dang na bas gzer mi 'gyur// 'di yi thabs kyis rnal
353b6(rgyud): 'byor gyis// ri gi thams cad rig par 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po// A ra li ni nyid kyis ni// dam du 'khyud par 'o mdzad pas// ri gi la ni gus par zhus// e waM ma yA ci zhig
353b7(rgyud): bshad// e yi rnam pas sa ru bshad// waM gi rnam pa de bzhin chu// ma ni me zhes bya bar brjod// yA ni rnam pa rlung du gsungs// ri gi sdom pa ci zhig bshad// ri gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
354a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro mar ni gsungs// sdom pa dam par gyur pa 'di// ri gi e waM sdom pa ni// e laM rnam pa rna bar gnas// rig sna yi rtse mor ni// rtag tu ri gi bzhugs pa yi//
354a2(rgyud): ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni// kun mkhyen ye shes de yi bdag/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi gtan la dbab pa dang brda'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor chen po yi//
354a3(rgyud): a rA li ni nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid la zhus// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i// khrag ni ji ltar dgug par bgyi// nus la sogs pas mdun du ni// ya ba'i me tog bzhag/
354a4(rgyud): nas ni// rang gi khrag ni dgug par bya// ri gi nyon cig goms pa yi// nas ni nyi shu kha smad byung // phyi nas khrag ni dgug par byed// lha ri bral ba bshad par bya// spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par
354a5(rgyud): byab 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab nas ni// der ni sngags ni bzlas par bya// oM he ru ka pa taM pheM pa ta ya/ ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas// lha la phyag byas 'gas par 'gyur// a li ka li
354a6(rgyud): yan lag mnyam// 'di dag gnyis dbus rang sa bon// rang gi sa bon nyid kyis ni// rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin te// phyag rgya las ni lha rnams 'byung // oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko&6/
354a7(rgyud): lcags kyu phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis// mthe'u chung phan tshun lcag kyu'i tshul// dbu ma yi ni sor mo gnyis// mthe bong rgan pos gzir bar bya// sdig mdzub gnyis kyi zhags pa nyid/
354b1(rgyud): rdo rje ral gri zhags chen po// chos kyi ye shes gang zhig gzhan// ri gi nyid du rab tu grags// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis ni// si si la sogs rab tu grags// mi 'jigs pa
354b2(rgyud): ni bzhi yin te// mi bzar la sogs rab tu grags// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni// wa la sogs pa rab tu grags// phyag drug 'gro ba drug tu gsungs// spyan gsum srid
354b3(rgyud): pa gsum du brjod// 'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de// zhabs kyi rtsa bar bsgyel ba nyid// dga' ba la sogs sa bcu na// gnas sogs yang dag rab tu grags// pha rol phyin
354b4(rgyud): drug phyag rgya drug/ thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid// e waM ma ya'i dbus gnas pa'o// bdag nyid kyis ni de ltar bsam// 'chol pa kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis// thams cad
354b5(rgyud): rgyud du yang dag gnas// gri gug ma rig gcod pa nyid// thod pa yi ni snying rje che// ri gi A ra li yi sgra// cang te'u hUM de'i sngags bzlas pas// dgra sta chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod//
354b6(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rjer rab tu grags// mgo bo nyon mongs pa yi bdud// thod pa nam mkha' drag pa nyid// lcags kyu ri gi ze 'bru ste// de bzhin zhags pa dag pa nyid// rang gi dag pa bsdus nas ni//
354b7(rgyud): lus ni mchod rten dag pa ste// skyil krung gdan du shes par bya// 'dzam bu'i gling gi snying por gsungs// gnyer ma gsum rtag lte ba nyid// lto ba yang ni gzugs su 'gyur// mgrin pa yang
355a1(rgyud): ni mgrin par brjod// kha khyer mgo bor shes par bya// spyi bo gdugs kyi 'phreng bar brjod// mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid// 'phan ni mgo las skyes pa yin//
355a2(rgyud): rus pa bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung // de phyir rang byin rlob par 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu mchod// rang gi ngo bo sangs
355a3(rgyud): rgyas su bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // rgyal po chen po zas gtsang 'di// A ra lis ni yang dag phye// de la ri gi sgyu mche// 'gro ba thams cad shes
355a4(rgyud): rab dag/ don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste// lha mo sa 'aro phyag rgya'o// sgra gcan bzang po bde ba che// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi spros pa las// sgyu ma chen po sa 'tsho nyid// rdo rje sku
355a5(rgyud): ma'i rnam 'phrul bas// don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// sras ni bcom ldan rdo rje can// yab ni rdo rje 'chang bar grags// yum ni sgyu ma chen mo yin// de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grag/
355a6(rgyud): mthe bong rgan po rdo rje yin// le ba chos kyi 'byung gnas gsungs// sgyu ma chen po'i rnam 'phral bas// don grub nyid ni gzi brjid can// ngo bos 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// lha mo ri gang
355a7(rgyud): tshig nyon// las la spyod pa rab brtags pas// lus can rnams ni tig tu gdungs// dga' ba yang ni shi shir gsungs// mchog tu dga' ba 'dod pa ma// dga' bral dga' ba bdechen/
355b1(rgyud): mkha lhan cig skyes dga' sdom pa na// mi zad ma ni 'o ru gsungs// rnon mo yang ni 'khyud mo nyid// sgyu ma skyed la sgyu ma che// mthe bong mchu ni 'jib pa nyid// dga' ba'i rtsod pa la nyid de// sbrang rtsi
355b2(rgyud): btung bas ma he nyid// rtog pa yis ni rta mgrin te// 'o byed glang po'i rgyal mtshan no// rdo rje ra li 'don chen can// 'dod pa ma ni ri gir brjod// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// 'gro/
355b3(rgyud): ba thams cad rnam par khyab// si si rnam pas dmyal ba bzhi// de bzhin ha yi rnam pa bzhi// 'khor bar ji ltar spyad pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa mi 'gal lo// rdo rje a ra li nyid ni// khu
355b4(rgyud): bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// ri gi bde ba chen por gsungs// ri gi A ra li sbyor bas// rdo rje sgyu ma zhes byar brjod// bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rmongs// /
355b5(rgyud): bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad spel bar byed// snying po'i sngags ni// oM A ra li b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha/ si si si si/ mi gsal bar bzlas so// gnyis kyi nye ba'i snying po ni//

355b7(rgyud): tshig mchod pa nyid// thams cad kyi ni dam tshig la// mi las skyes pa rab tu bsngags// klu bzer gnyis 'thung dam tshig ste// rmi lam rta ni rab tu bsngags// gsad la ma he dam tshig go/ dbang la
356a1(rgyud): khyi ni rab tu bsngags// khrag dgug pa la dam tshig ste// 'jug pa de bzhin rnga mo nyid// rengs pa la ni ne'u'i sha// kha na ma tho med rnyed pa// gal te bsad par byas na ni//

356a3(rgyud): la yang ni sor gnyis yang // sgo khyud kyi ni kha khyer la// sor ni bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs// lha yi snam bu sor gnyis te// rta babs sor ni bcu drug nyid// sgo las sor mo gnyis kyis ni//
356a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'phreng ba de bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor snying po zlum po ste// phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhi dang ldan// kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nyid// srad bu lnga zhes bya bar brjod// gser dang yang na dngul nyid
356a5(rgyud): dang // mu tig dang ni byu ru dang // mu men yang dag bsres nas ni// rin chen lnga ni shin tu gzhug/ lha yi grangs kyi bum pa nyid// rnam rgyal bum pa ches che ba// bum pa dkri ba nyid du

356a7(rgyud): skyong ba dbang po dang // lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bzhengs par bgyi// 'od srungs ma yis bgegs med mdzod// ji ltar bdag nyid nags de bzhin// rtag pa nyid du
356b1(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin// mtshan mo thun gcig gnas pa ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya// gtor ma'i sngags ni// oM shan tI ka swa ni nA kA ro mu khaM sar+b+bad+harmA d+hA yA d+ha nu t+pan+na tAtra/

356b4(rgyud): bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra sA ra li ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/

356b7(rgyud): rig cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mkhyen nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te// phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chu yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni// sman ni/

357a2(rgyud): byung rdo rje nyi ma ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas yang dag khyab// de yi steng du hUM nyid de// bskal pa'i mo ni lta bu nyid// de ni rdo rjer yang bsams nas// rdo rje las byung he ru ka/ bgegs

357a4(rgyud): che gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa ni// rol pa'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing // ri rab ri rgyal lhun po yang // sa yi 'og tu yang dag mnan// phyag tu rdo rje bsnams bsgoms nas// g.yon

357b1(rgyud): chos nyan pa'i sbyor ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje A ra li chen po la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtor ma'i sngags ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/

357b3(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di nyid sngags ni chen po nyid// de bzhin du ni gtor ma'i sngags// las ni thams cad pa yi sngags// yin pa nyid du the tsom med// rdo rje A ra li las gtor ma'i le'u ste/

357b6(rgyud): sdom pa bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// khyod kyis ma byin par yang long // gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis// ma dang sring
357b7(rgyud): mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// de nas dbang bskur bka' stsal pa// phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon
358a1(rgyud): gyis// de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya// dbang bskur de yi phyi nas ni// de nyid 'di ni rab tu dbye// 'di nyid bde ba chen po ste// thams cad lus la rnam par

358b7(rgyud): nyid// nub tu b+h+yo yi rnam pa ste// byang du phaT kyi rnam pa yin// dbus su swA hA rnam par gnas// ngos gsum du ni bsgrub bya'i ming // rdo rje A ra li las le'u bzhi pa'o//
359a1(rgyud): de nas 'khor lo bri ba bka' stsal pa/ che ge mo 'di sod cig/ che ge mo 'di dbang du mdzod cig/ che ge mo rengs par mdzod cig/ che ge mo rmongs par mdzod cig
359a2(rgyud): che ge mo ma lus par gyis shig/ che ge mo lkugs par mdzod cig/ che ge mo khrug cig/ che ge mo skrod cig/ che ge mo la sdang bar mdzod cig/ che ge mo chings shig/ che ge mo ma ning du/
359a3(rgyud): mdzod cig/ che ge mo sgur por mdzod cig/ ces sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnam kyi ngos gnyis su bris te/ gro ga'i 'dab mar gur kum gyis bri bar bya zhing 'di dpung pa'i rtsa bar gdags
359a4(rgyud): par bya'o// dgug pa la ni zla mtshan zags pa'i ras la rgya skegs kyi khu bas bri bar bya'o// gsad pa la sogs pa'i las la dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / tsi tra ka yi khru ba dang / yungs
359a5(rgyud): mar dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ka na ka yi khu ba dang / rus pa'i sbu gus so// dgug pa la ni skyu ru ra'i tsher mas so// rmongs pa la ni d+hu d+hu ra ka'i
359a6(rgyud): shing gis so// rengs pa la ni pa Ta'i smyu gus so// ma lus pa la ni po de tse'i shing gi sbu gus bri bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ bas mtha' dang ni dben pa dang
359a7(rgyud): bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang // lo ni bcu gsum de bzhin du// lo ni bcu drug bu mo dang // nyi shu rtsa lnga ma mchod bya// ba dang de bzhin ma he dang // spre'u mo dang khyi mo dang // bong ma
359b1(rgyud): de bzhin rnga mo dang // sha ba dang ni ra ma nyid// phag dang ba men las byung ba// gzhan yang he ru ka mchod pa// 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med// nya dang zla ba 'pho ba yi// tshes ni mu stegs can gyis
359b2(rgyud): brtag/ dri ma gzhig par bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni myang bar bya// srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya// brdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya// ma byin par ni blang mi bya// pha rol bud med
359b3(rgyud): bsten mi bya// nyin par nyal zhing mtshan mo lang // shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas 'dug/ sha chen dang ni rus pa dang // khrag ni chen po btung ba dang // khu chen yang dag bza' ba dang //
359b4(rgyud): de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid// bram ze ma dang g.yung mo nyid// gar ma de bzhin btso blag ma// zod can ma dang ko lpags mkhan// gdol pa de bzhin phyag bdar ma// rtswa 'tshong ma dang /
359b5(rgyud): shan ma nyid// de bzhin kla klo la sogs dang // smig mkhan dang ni chang 'tshong ma// gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // sring mo las byung bu mo nyid// gzhan
359b6(rgyud): gyi bu mo spang mi bya// rje'u rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste// bzod bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas// bgrod min mkhas pas bsten par bya// rdo rje A ra li las le'u lnga pa'o//
359b7(rgyud): de nas dam tshig gi bag dbab pa bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos skal ba ngan pa la// bag ni dbab par mi bya zhing // de bzhin gcer bu thod dum dang // ral pa can ni thams cad la/
360a1(rgyud): dam tshig bag ni dbab mi bya// snying rje yi ni bdag nyid can// gal te yin na bza' bar bya// grub kyang sa pa dam pa ni// sems can don byed skyes pa nyid// skal ba/
360a2(rgyud): ngan pa zhes byar brjod// bram ze dam tshig rnam par snang // de nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang / bzod ldan dal ba mi sbu ba// bla mar gus shing snying
360a3(rgyud): rje ldan// rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags// de nas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa/ sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas// de nyid bcu ni/
360a4(rgyud): yongs su shes// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas// de nas thun tshod bzhi byin gyis brlab pa bka' bya/ ji ltar bsgom pa'i sbyor ba des// dang po thun tshod byin gyis brlab//
360a5(rgyud): des ni ji srid nyi phyed na// nyi ma phyed na thun gsum pa// dus dang bral nas nam byed na// thun chod byin brlabs rab tu grags// thun tshod byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis// bdag gi rnal/
360a6(rgyud): 'byor ldan pas 'grub// de nas bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dog dang ni ser sna nyid// bcom ldan he ru ka la med// ya
360a7(rgyud): na rnam par dag pa nyid// de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'gegs dang btsugs pa'i shing la'am// ljon shing btags shing 'phyang ba dang // g.yul du mtshon gyis bsnun pa nyid/
