389a5(rgyud): par rtog/ gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i chos// gnyis kyi rtog pa ji ltar spang // a li ka li ji ltar lags// rnal 'byor bstan bcos tshul rnams ni// phyi rol phyag rgya'i sems ni ci//
389a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// lnga yi bdag nyid rab tu 'jug/ reg na dro ba ma yin te// du ba ltar snang rlung
389a7(rgyud): yin no// sra ba'i rang bzhin chu zhes bya// gzugs su snang ba sa yin no// ye shes byin rlabs rdo rje'o// lha lnga ru ni bsgom par bya// ma lus chu yi dbyibs dang ni// zad par bya ba me nyid dang // de bzhin
389b1(rgyud): rtag tu rlung dang ni// ngang pa mtshungs don sa dbang po// ye shes kyi ni yi ge lnga// sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya// de yi dbus su zla ba yi// dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge'o// lnga po lnga ru brjod par bya// dngos dang dngos med
389b2(rgyud): las grol ba'i// rdo rje chu ni sbyangs pa yis// des ni gti mug bsrings pa yin// phyi rol bdud rtsi rdzas bzang po// me yis btsos nas sbyangs pa ltar// lha tshogs me yis btsos nas ni// lhag/
389b3(rgyud): ma bshang dang gci ba yin// me yis btsos nas sbyangs me yi// dbus su sbyin sreg rtag tu dbul// rdo rje chu yi sa bon ni// sa bon babs pas bzlas nas kyang // de yi dbus su nyi ma la//
389b4(rgyud): dur khrod yi ge bsams nas sreg/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bas// de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes shin tu sdug/ dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang
389b5(rgyud): mdzad// myang ba rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rdo rje// lha gsum rnam pa gsum ni shes par bya// ha zhes pa yis kha dog dbrog/ ho zhes pa yis dri zhim ste// go rims de ltar mngon par brjod// bdud
389b6(rgyud): rtsi chu zhes bya ba ste// lha ni rnam pa gsum du grags// dngos dang dngos med las grol bas// de phyir rmongs pa ring du spong // a li bung ba zhes brjod de// bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin// a
389b7(rgyud): li nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin te// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can// lus ni ma lus bskyed pa'o// bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas// dbang po kun gyi bdud
390a1(rgyud): rtsi rnams// de yi dbus nas drangs nas su// a li'i dbus su thim par 'gyur// 'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis te// sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams skye ba yin// rlung dang me yi
390a2(rgyud): bdun don la// rdo rje ma yi sa bon sbyar// sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan// char pa'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod// dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon// de yi dbus su gzung bar bya// dngos
390a3(rgyud): dang dngos med las grol ba// de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// ka li me tog kun tu mnan// rdo rje can gyi lus me tog/ 'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste// sa dang kun gyi ma zhes bya// ye shes
390a4(rgyud): chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir// de bzhin gshegs rab chu srin nya// gnyis med 'dab kyi 'bras bu ni// thabs kyi myu gu de bzhin te// khan du ka ltar khwa phye ba// sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi yi ni gnas// ka li bdud/
390a5(rgyud): rtsi'i de nyid ni// me tog chu yis de bzhin bskor// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang // rtsa bar sgra ni yang dag sbyar// yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni// lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum// zla ba'i dbus
390a6(rgyud): su bsam par bya// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsgoms pa yis// dngos dang dngos med las grol ba// de phyir rmongs pa kun tu spong // a li bung ba zhes byar brjod// ka li de bzhin gshegs ma
390a7(rgyud): yin/ lus gnyis po las skyes pa dag/ bdud rtsi yi ni cho ga mchog/ sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum pa gzung bya ba// dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can// skra bo che yis bkri bar bya//
390b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga yi de nyid kyis// lus can bdag nyid bkru bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // gang gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sgo ni mthong 'gyur zhing // drag pa'i lus ni skyon med
390b2(rgyud): par/ bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba kun shes pas// rang dgar bdud rtsi myang bar bya// bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gi/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjer nyon// gang zhig shes nas zos pa yis// myur du 'gro ba mthong
390b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// blo chen dang ni dag dang ni// rigs la 'gran dang reg 'gro dang // lcags kyu chen po rnal 'byor pas// shel dang 'dra bas longs spyod bya// rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni// de yis
390b4(rgyud): sa bon gzung bar bya// shel gyis sems kyi longs spyod na// rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur// dag pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya// bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te// de yi
390b5(rgyud): yan lag la sbyar ba// hUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis// lcags kyu ru ni sbyar bar bya// gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni// gri zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid// rab tu sbyar nas bsams nas su//
390b6(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa ring du spang // rta yi lcags kyu'i dbus gnas pa// thams cad rig pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor pa yi dz+dza zhes pa// dag pa'i shel ltar bsam par bya// rdo rje lcags kyu byin/
390b7(rgyud): brlabs pas// rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste// srad ces bya ba bkod de bza'// rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byung ngo // bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la// dngos grub 'dod
391a1(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin// sgrub pos rnal 'byor bstan bcos la// rtag tu mdzod pa'i las byas na// spyod dang zol ba gang 'dod dang /
391a2(rgyud): las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro na yang // myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar// mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/
391a3(rgyud): dbul po nor gyis 'phongs pa yang // khyim ni 'byor zhing rgyas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa// bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu po dag ldan pa/
391a4(rgyud): la// yi ge bcu yi sngags dang ni// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te// mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin rlabs la// sgrub pos 'di yi du bas bdug/ 'gro
391a5(rgyud): pa thams cad rmongs par 'gyur// gur ku ma dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcud phan tshun ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya// skyes bu 'gro la skal bzang 'gyur// tsan dan dang ni sbyar
391a6(rgyud): ba yi// rdzas bcud dag ni ldan pa yis// yan lag dag ni byugs nas su// reg ni shi yang mi gtong ngo // dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru// bza' dang btung bar sbyin
391a7(rgyud): byas na// dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas nas kyang // mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas// de dag las su sbyar bar bya// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med//
391b1(rgyud): gnyis med ded dpon gnas su ni// thig le byas na go char 'gyur// de nyid theg pa'i snying po 'dir// 'khor ba las ni rgyal bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzang ma// sems can rnams la
391b2(rgyud): sdug par lta// bde sdug dag ni 'phrog byed me// de bzhin sgeg pa'i nyams kyis mdzes// thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma// mi brtson ma dang brtson sems can// skal bzang lha kun rmongs byed ma//
391b3(rgyud): kun nas 'joms pa nyid dang ni// blo ngan sreg pa'i ngo bo 'joms// lha mo byams ma nyid dang ni// yid 'ong bdud rtsi ldan grag ma// yon tan ldan pa'i lha mo nyid// lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni// spyod
391b4(rgyud): dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol// de ltar yon tan ldan lha mo// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// pho nya'i las kyis bya ba yin// grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs//
391b5(rgyud): ni/ bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal// pho nya'i lus su sbyar ba yis// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// las rnams kun gyi snying po bas// rab tu 'bad de pho nya sgrub// shing gcig gi ni drang /
391b6(rgyud): pa ru mcho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas// khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi// thang ka la ni bre bya ste// mtheb sor bcu gnyis tshad du ni// kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis mgo bor thal
391b7(rgyud): sbyar ba'i// 'od zer me 'bar lha mo bri// sgrub pa'i mdun du bkram nas su// 'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam// dri dang me tog dmar po dang // sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya// sha dang nya sha btsong /
392a1(rgyud): la sogs// nye bar spyad pa'i gtor ma sbyin// rdzas lnga dang ni dngos po lnga// mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste// gnyis pa la ni nya dri ma nam/
392a2(rgyud): gsum par shing ni 'gul 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// de yi sngags ni brjod nas kyang // dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// oM dI pe shwa ri hUM phu// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su//
392a3(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag ste brjod par bya// dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi// dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas badz+ra
392a4(rgyud): nas su// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med par// byin gyis brlabs la bdag sbubs shig/ de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas// bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang // gser la sogs pa
392a5(rgyud): yang rung // bka' bzhin myur du ster bar 'gyur// thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad// 'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la// gal te grub par ma gyur na// de tshe drag mo'i sa bon bzla// sa bon gnyis ni
392a6(rgyud): gzir tsam gyis// 'bar byed ma yi spyi bo 'gems// sems can don 'bad sgrub pa pos// 'bar ba chung mar bsgrub par bya// grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes
392a7(rgyud): nyon/ thang ka khru gnyis dman pa la// mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te// de 'og gzugs ni bri bar bya// dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs//
392b1(rgyud): shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// phyag na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu bsnams// grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// 'od zer me snar 'bar zhing gsal// mig g.yon sa par band pa ze// du khrod/
392b2(rgyud): kyi ni sa phyogs su// sgrub pa po yis bris sku dgram// kun tu khrag gis byugs nas ni// me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod// me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs// bdud/
392b3(rgyud): rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor sbyin cing // rnal 'byor sgom pas bzlas nas ni// 'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su// kha ru bcug ste/
392b4(rgyud): bgad par bya// oM DA kI nI dzu pu phu// sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang po sa ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa mdun du gad rgyangs sgrog/ gsum pa mdun du snang gyur nas// bzhi pa la ni bka
392b5(rgyud): lung nod// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru ni sgrub pa yis// ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya// dgra rnams gsad cing rtsa ba dang // yan lag
392b6(rgyud): gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i// las la sogs pa thams cad ni// g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya// gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga ga
392b7(rgyud): bzhin// mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla// ra dag gi ni pags pa la// 'bad de zang ka brkyang bar bya// 'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// lus la rgyan gyis
393a1(rgyud): brgyan pa dang // mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon pa bri// g.yon pa sdebs mdzub zhags pa dang // g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar// mkhas pa
393a2(rgyud): yis ni bsgrub bya ste// lci ba yis ni byugs byas la// me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// khrag dang nya dang sha dang bskyod//
393a3(rgyud): bza' ba dag dang sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin// 'bad de gnas pas 'bum gcig bzla// oM tsu Shi Ni A kaR+Sha ya phu phaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni// snyim/
393a4(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyed bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas// 'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po khyi ni ngur ba'i sgra// gnyis pa lnga ni gsal
393a5(rgyud): bar dgod// gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed// bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol sla// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par
393a6(rgyud): gyis// dam tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po dag gis khyod bsgrubs so// de nas nyi ma re re zhing // gser spang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur// gal
393a7(rgyud): 'bum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying po gzir te bzla// sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis// 'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so// chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su// kam po ci ni bsgrub/
393b1(rgyud): par bya// ba lang la sogs ko ba ni// brkyang ste 'phrog byed 'dri ru gzhug/ lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste// kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar bgos
393b2(rgyud): shing phyag gnyis mdzes// ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs// ha ha bzhad cing rnam gtsigs pa// khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni// dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/ rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya//
393b3(rgyud): sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing bzlas// 'bum gcig gis ni 'grub
393b4(rgyud): 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bebs// gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig
393b5(rgyud): de nas 'bad de sbyin// oM k+Sha kr-i hUM phu phaT/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// de yi sngags ni brjod par bya// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar bas ni// ci zhig bgyi zhes
393b6(rgyud): brjod par 'gyur// ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni// rtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang // rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzhan yang rung // nga 'dod pa de khrid de shog/ gser dang
393b7(rgyud): dngul dang zangs la sogs// bza' dang btung dang bgo ba ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong // lha ma'i chung ma gang yang rung // ti se gangs kyi rtse mo ru// ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'khrid par
394a1(rgyud): khyed bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// las gzhan gyi ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de yi rkang pa
394a2(rgyud): g.yon pa yis// mnan te lnga brgya bzlas na ni// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma grub na// dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni// dum bu dum bur gtub par bya// kri
394a3(rgyud): zhes bya dang gsod pa mtha'// hUM gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cad du ni bapa' bar bsam// des ni bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang // gal te ma grub
394a4(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing // me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni// khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni// nyi byed na hUM zhes pa ni// brjod cing brgya
394a5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bsregs na// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur ram// cho nges 'debs shing 'ongs nas su// nges par las rnams sgrub par byed// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// khro bo sngon po
394a6(rgyud): mdzes pa ste// khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong // nor bu rin chen ches bcings pa'i// dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste// bdag ni 'khor ba las sgrol phyir// dpa' bos gnang gis btang
394a7(rgyud): dugasol// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su// bzang po sgo 'di bye ma thong // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gsang che// gsang dang gsang bas shes bya ba// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/
394b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de// ser mo khar ni
394b2(rgyud): 'jug byed pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa// g+ho g+ha/ 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma yin// ga g+ha/ mthe bong 'tshor bar byed pa yi// 'jib byed ma yi
394b3(rgyud): mtshan ma'o// mu g+hu/ lag pa rna bar rdeb pa ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lu swa stu/ sna rtser sbyor mo rdeb pa ni// thugs badre mi bde 'dri ba yin// DaSh+Ta/ sha ba'i mgo ltar stong
394b4(rgyud): byed pa// rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// g+han+d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma dbus re pa// nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o// a li ni da ha/ so yis lci ni 'tshor byed pa// lus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o//
394b5(rgyud): b+hak+Sha so// lag pa sgra la 'ju byed pa// khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// dwe ra ti/ lag pa snying kar reg byed na// da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o// ru tsa pa ta pa/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni// med do zhes ni
394b6(rgyud): ston pa'o// shu na ta/ lag pa brkyang ste lhor rdeb na// phun sum ldan par yod ces pa'o// kri ka ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na// kha zas bza' bar 'dod pa'o// tsan+da li ga/ mdzub mo mdun du ston byed/
394b7(rgyud): ciganag gtum la drug pa yin// ni la tan pa ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod pa ni bsar ston// an ma g.yung/ lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag/ da sde 'chi zhes bya ba'o// dra ka ti Tan/
395a1(rgyud): tu lta bar byed pa ni// chos grangs shes par 'dod pa'o// ha ra ga na/ chos gcig nas ni brtsams nas su// mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya// ci tshod yi ge la sogs pa// ra
395a2(rgyud): bstan pa bzhin mdun du reg/ gi ti to// steng du lta bar byed pa ni// nyin phyed dga' bar rol pa'o// sa ma tsha ya/ 'jug dang bcas pas lha byed cing // lag pas lag pa bzung nas su// rgya
395a3(rgyud): mtsho lta bur ston byed pa// nor bzang byin zhes bya ba'o// dzi na pa ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// sap+ta pa ta/ mthe bong gis ni srin lag la// reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// so ma/ mtha
395a4(rgyud): bong khro bo bza' la sogs// sa ru bad/ rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dga' ba la rol pa'i ngag gi phyag rgya dang brda'i mtshan nyid do// gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa
395a5(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu// shes nas ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi// 'khor ba la sgrol
395a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// dang po de nyid rdo rjes ni// dril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o// bgrang ba'i 'phreng bu gsum pa ste// ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o// de nyid bzhi yi rba rlabs
395a7(rgyud): kyis// ji ltar 'dod bzhin pha rol rgol// dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad// thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa// lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung // nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod// byang gi phyogs
395b1(rgyud): su don yod grub// rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so// pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad// ji bzhin sa ru gzhag par bya// phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang // nam mkha' dang ni kun tu bzang // gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan
395b2(rgyud): gyi dpal// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid// shar la sogs par ji bzhir bsam// dbus kyi bcu gsum sgo nga ru// ye shes lnga ni thim par bya// pad+ma brgyad/
395b3(rgyud): pa lha mo brgyad// ji bzhin gnas su sbyang bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du/ zhags pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste// de ltar lha mo bzhi po dag/ de bzhin phyogs bzhir rol pa yin// mtshams kyi/
395b4(rgyud): cha ni rnam pa bzhir// mkhas pa yis ni bsam bya ba// skul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang // rdo rje lcags sgrog ming can de// gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ste// mtshams kyi 'dab ma kun la dgod//
395b5(rgyud): rtse mo lnga ni mkha' 'gro ma// snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// byang du drag mo zhes bya ste// nub tu de bzhin ro langs ma// lho yi phyogs su gtum mo gnas// dbus
395b6(rgyud): su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje de kho na yi lha// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// cha gsum gsal bar bzung ba la// ska rags kyis ni shin tu brgyan// ut+pal ku mu da ltar mdzes// rin
395b7(rgyud): chen pad+ma yang dag gnas// phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni// dbus ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu// rtse mo'i dgu yi lha nyid do// lha dgu yi ni byin gyis brlabs// chu srin las ni byung ba yi//
396a1(rgyud): rtse mo'i 'od zer bzlas par gnas// rtse mo dgu pa zhes bya ba// ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba sgrol// rdo rje'i de nyid gang yin pas// bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam// rdo rje'i snying
396a2(rgyud): po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje yi ni sems su bya// rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas// chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med// thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin// rdo rje'i las kyi snying po yi// rdo rje 'phro ba sbyor
396a3(rgyud): ba'i bdag/ rdo rje 'khor ba sgrol bar byed// rdo rje dgug pa sbyor ba'i bdag/ rdo rje bcing ba'i sbyor bar ldan// bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan// rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni// ye shes
396a4(rgyud): rdo rje bcom nas su// phyogs kun tu ni snang bar byed// rdo rje'i sgrub pa la sogs kun// rdo rje'i bdag nyid blta bar bya// chos kyis 'ching ba rdo rje ste// thar pa mchog 'bad rdo rje'o// rdo rje
396a5(rgyud): pad+ma gzung nas su// de nyid thams cad bsgrub par bya// rdo rje pad+mor zhugs pa ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// shes rab sgra yi/
396a6(rgyud): de nyid ni// thos pas srid pa las sgrol ba'i// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ byang chub snying por rnam par gnas// thams cad rig pas phyogs kun tu// gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams mthar thug
396a7(rgyud): phyogs brgyad ces ni bya ba rnams// lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags// yi ge brgyad kyis bon ni// phyogs btud du ni dgod par ga// shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste// byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo// rab kyi phyogs su/
396b1(rgyud): mA ma kI// lho yi phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan// mdog bzang dbyangs snyan mdzes pa dang // bzhi pa rdo rje 'phreng ba mo// dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin tu mdzes// pad+ma
396b2(rgyud): rgyas la yang dag 'byung // gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni// shes rab bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra// shes rab bdud rtsi gnas dag la// de yi dbus kyi stan dag la// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo//
396b3(rgyud): gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas// steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya// dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste// thams cad spro dang sdud pa po'o// a li ka li'i rab
396b4(rgyud): sbyor gyis// phyogs brgyad du ni bskyod par bya// a li ka li'i rab sbyor bas// 'khor ba thams cad gcod pa ste// rdo rje dril bu'i thabs yin te// thabs kyis rdo rje'i dbus gnas so//
396b5(rgyud): g.yas par nyi ma bsams nas su// g.yon pa ru ni zla ba dgod// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su// pad+ma'i rnam pa lag tu bskor// lus rnams la ni thabs dang sbyar// rang 'dod lha rnams bsam/
396b6(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje gsor bas sgrol ba ste// 'khor ba sgrol ba yang dag byung // hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags bya// rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis// sems can thams cad
396b7(rgyud): mdzes par bya// rnamathar chos su bya ba ste// rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog/ oM badz+ra b+har+NA tse hU~M/ oM badz+ra g+ha N+De ni ta pra ra Ni ta sa rba ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+ha k+Sha tra pra tsa li te/ pra nA par mi tAnA da sa b+hA be badz+ra d+harmA NI/
397a1(rgyud): da ya a ba san+te Shi hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ a a a swA hA/ shes rab thabs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// shes rab thabs kyis dkrol bar bya// shes rab thabs kyi chos kyis ni// 'gro
397a2(rgyud): ba rnams kyis rtogs bya 'am// mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can don phyir dkrol bar bya// rdo rje de kho na yis gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// sems can don byed rnal 'byor pas//
397a3(rgyud): shes rab thabs su blta bar bya// de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// glang chen dril bu sgra dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi// dngos grub ring bar shes par bya// de nas gsang dang phra
397a4(rgyud): ba yi// rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gzung ba ste// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed pa// dbus ma'i tshig ni bskor ba lnga// gsang ba'i rdo rje cha gsum bya// de nyid kyis ni cha gcig
397a5(rgyud): gi/ phra ba'i rdo rje rab tu brtag/ spyi gtsug lag pa la sogs pa// rtag tu dag byed khu tshur bcang // slob dpon rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog/ bgrang 'phreng
397a6(rgyud): la sogs gzung ba ni// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang // gzhan yang nor bu dkar po sogs// zhi so/
397a7(rgyud): las la khyad par gyis// bzang 'phreng gi ni khyad nyid ni// gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // pad+ma'i sa bon khyad par du// rgyas pa yi ni bgrang 'phreng ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya// gur/
397b1(rgyud): kum la sogs dri zhim pa'i// dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las// ril bur byas te dmar por bcos// dbang du sdud par rab tu grags// ru rag sha dang lung tang dang // mi yi rus pa de bzhin te//
397b2(rgyud): drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la// bo de tse ni las kun byed// sngags sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste// dbang la de yi phyed du bya// zhi la
397b3(rgyud): brgya phrag gcig yin te// rgyas pa la ni brgyad lhag pa'o// mngon spyod la ni drug cu'o// las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar// las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du// bgrang 'phreng dag ni brtag par bya/
397b4(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad du ni// dbus ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu// lha dgu yi ni srud pa la// lha dgu byin gyis brlab par bya// gzugs rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang // gtsang zhing
397b5(rgyud): dang ldan snyan par smra// de yis bkal ba'i bgrang 'phreng gis// grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// skud pa thams cad sangs rgyas tshul// ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom yin// 'og ma mchod
397b6(rgyud): rten du ni bstan// steng ma chos kyi dbyings yin no// mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'o// lag par nyi ma bsams nas su// dbyangs kyi dngos po yi ge ni// lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu// dmar po la
397b7(rgyud): ni dmar po bsgom// g.yon pa zla ba'i dbus su ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsam bya ba// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rjer bsam/
398a1(rgyud): g.yon pa pad+ma'i 'dab mar bsgom// rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis// kha sbyor dbus su 'phreng bzhag la// de nyid thams cad bsgom pa yis// bgrang 'phreng byin gyis brlab par
398a2(rgyud): bya sor mo dag gi bye brag gis// de nas sngags pas bzlas par bya// rdo rje ma dngos g.yon pa ste// g.yas pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o// dkar po dud pa dung dang ni// pad+ma g.yas kyi sor mo ste/
398a3(rgyud): gi wang dri gsum 'jig pa dang // sa gdug g.yon par dgod pa dang // ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis// lag la sogs pa'i las can ma// zhi ba la ni khro bos bgrang // rgyas pa la ni gung mo/
398a4(rgyud): ste// srin lag la ni dbang du bstan// mtha' mar mngon par spyod pa ste// mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni// lha nyid dgug pa'i bsam pa yin// mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas bsgom na// 'grub 'gyur
398a5(rgyud): 'di la the tsom med// de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de nyid med pa'i sngags bzlas dang // de nyid med pa'i rdo rje dril// phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba// rnal 'byor ma yis grub pa med// rnal 'byor
398a6(rgyud): de nyid dmigs na ni// de nyid thams cad kun bya'o// yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos// sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzlas na// rnal 'byor ma yi snying po grub//
398a7(rgyud): bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs rigs gcig/ rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba 'grub// oM ba de pa de ma hA pa de dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma hA b+hA be// hUM hUM hUM/ ho ha ho/ a swA hA/ sngags 'di yis ni sbyang byas na// bzang 'phreng
398b1(rgyud): gigis ni lha rnams 'grub// las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur// ye shes de dag bye brag dag/ yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon// ye shes bye brag ring du gnas//
398b2(rgyud): thun mong ye shes brjod pa ste// dman dang rab dman dman pa can// gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po// klu dang byol song gsang ba pa// lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci// mi dang yi dgas mkha' 'gro ma// dmyal/
398b3(rgyud): bar 'tshed pa'i sems can dang // byol song gzugs su brjod pa ste// phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// de bzhin du ni sa yi khams// brtan pa la sogs thams cad
398b4(rgyud): dang / rtswa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang // bong ba rdo dang brag la sogs// thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs// ye shes med na skye mi 'gyur// ye shes thams cad kur rig pa'o// ye shes thar par
398b5(rgyud): gang gis ni// ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa// bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu// lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi gnas// gong nas
398b6(rgyud): gong du nyis 'gyur te/ 'dod pa lnga yi ye shes dag/ gong pa'i shes re shes 'phel// gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste// lha min ye shes khro bo'o// yi dgas ye shes zhan pa ste// dmyal ba'i ye shes
398b7(rgyud): 'jigs shin du// byol song ye shes glen pa ste// bstan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o// mi rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga// bye brag tu ni shes par bya// glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang // bung /
399a1(rgyud): med ye shes spu brid do// byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis sbyangs pa// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// sangs rgyas ye
399a2(rgyud): shes kyis bsgral yin// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas// 'bad de dad pas bskyed par bya// sgra spogs phyi rol bstan bcos ni// gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa ste// blo ldan rnal 'byor/
399a3(rgyud): bstan bcos kyis// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob// snying po snying po bstan bcos te// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o// /
399a4(rgyud): 'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dag/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang // srung dang mngon par spyod pa dang // re mig dgu sogs 'khor lo ni// phyi rol mu
399a5(rgyud): khyubyud bskor bar bya// 'khor lo las kyi kha dog gis// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// oM tA re tut+tA de tu re sAhA/ sa bon de dag thams cad ni// phyogs mtshams tha ma dbus su bya// dbus su ming dang
399a6(rgyud): srung ba yi// tshig kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin chus// bdag gi las ni bkru bar bya// mnyam nyid thams cad rig pas gnas// srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// ye shes
399a7(rgyud): can gyis srung bsgom na// 'jig pa kun las ring bar 'gyur// sems can dngos po med pa ru// sbyor ba'i dngos po'i 'jigs pa la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya//
399b1(rgyud): sgrol ma'i rgyud du bsgom pa yis// bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprul// oM tA re swAng+ga/ mgo la'o// oM dAng+ka re swA hA/ mig la'o// oM tu re swA hA/ sna la'o// oM tu sAhA/ rna ba la'o// oM re swA hA/ lce la'o// a/
399b2(rgyud): tA re ni swAhA/ snying ka'o// yan lag drug tu rtag tu dgod// 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam bya ba// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni klubs// kun tu mi
399b3(rgyud): 'jigs sbyin pa dang // gzhan gyi sna ru ut+pal bsnams// thams cad 'od zer rnams bsgoms nas// khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya// thams cad yon tan can du bsgom// oM tA re
399b4(rgyud): tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ srung ba'i las thams cad kyi sngags so// rgyal po'i brtson ra dgra phyogs dang // nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang // yan lag sna tshogs rims dang ni// chu dang dug gis 'chil
399b5(rgyud): sogs// gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas// de dang der ni bsam par bya// shes rab zhan dang le lo sogs// 'khor lo bris nas bcang bar bya// bsrung ba bzang po 'di yis ni// 'jigs pa
399b6(rgyud): kun las grol bar 'gyur// srung ba 'di dag thams cad ni// de nyid sbyor ba bsgrub par bya// 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa la// phyi rol mu khyud bskor nas su// dbus su thog ma tha ma ste/
399b7(rgyud): bzlas pa thams cad gzhag par bya// mu khyud dbyangs kyis bskor nas su// 'khor lo dkar po bsam par bya// yan lag thams cad phye ba yis// mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// sngon
400a1(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms pa yis// las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur// yo pre pra rnams pa/
400a2(rgyud): swa/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bas// dngos po bsgoms pas bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes rab dag nyid bsgoms nas su// phyag gnyis sems
400a3(rgyud): dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar// shes rab dngos po bsgoms nas su// sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas// shes
400a4(rgyud): rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// glen dang snyoms las blun po yang // sbyor ba 'di yis shes rab 'phel// snying po re mig dgu ru bya// de bzhin par ma bcu gnyis te// phyi rol
400a5(rgyud): ri mig bcu drug go// mthar thug mya khyud de bzhin te// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i// dbus su bdag gi sems bzhag la// sgra dang thig le ldan pa yi// yi ge brgyad pa/
400a6(rgyud): snying por dgod// bcu gnyis pa la dbyangs sa bon// ma ning spangs pa bri bar bya// sde tshan gsum gyi yi ge rnams// yi ge lhag pa gcig dang bcas// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag/
400a7(rgyud): bcu drug gnas su gzhag par bya// gsod pa'i yi ge mu khyud la// thams cad rig pas kun tu bskor// dang po dkar por bsam bya ste// gnyis pa ser por bsgom par bya// gsum
400b1(rgyud): pa dag ni dmar po ste// de bzhin bzhi pa sngon po'o// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// mnyam nyid stong par yang dag gnas// mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed nas su// 'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par/
400b2(rgyud): bya mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgom pa yi// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// kun nas thams cad 'bar ba ste// me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni// bdud rnams thams cad sreg par byed//
400b3(rgyud): ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis// kun nas nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang // sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su// bdag nyid nam mkha' bsgoms
400b4(rgyud): byas la// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su sa bon ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bya ste// sde tshan dang po gang yin pa'i// yi ge dang po bzung/
400b5(rgyud): nas su// lcags kyu yis ni gzir bya ba// rtsa bar re pha sbyar bya ba// bdud rtsi'i thig le stong du dgod// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba ni// shin tu mnya
400b6(rgyud): par bzhag pas bsgom// rgyal po rgyal po'i pho brang dang // yid can gyis ni bsam par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste//
400b7(rgyud): 'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du sdud// bu mo rnams kyis gang bsam pa// ming dang bcas nas bsgrubs nas ni// bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// ngas bstan pa la the tsom med// sngon gyi mtshan
401a1(rgyud): nyid thams cad ni// sngar bzhin du ni bstan pa nyid// thams cad bdag nyid bsams nas su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mo bcas/
401a2(rgyud): 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro// 'od zer ser po shin tu mdzes// gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsams// rin chen la sogs gang 'dod pa// thams cad rang gi dbugs kyis dgug/ sgrub pa po/
401a3(rgyud): yi lus la ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya// kha dog la sogs dmar bsam zhing // gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por
401a4(rgyud): bsgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul gyis
401a5(rgyud): niyid ni 'gug pa bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom pa yis// mdzub mo lcags kyu bskyod par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/
401a6(rgyud): 'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du 'grub// de ltar sgom zhing bzlas nas su// sor mo yang ni bskyod byas nas// bsgrub bya'i yid ni bskyod 'gyur bar// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo 'dab ma
401a7(rgyud): med pa la// mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis// mu khyud mkhas par bskor bar bya// sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa// yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su// i dang re pha sbyar nas su// 'bad pas/
401b1(rgyud): dbus su bzhag nas bya// ye shes can gyi sa bon 'di// sga yig bdud pa dang sbyar la// 'dab ma rnams la'ang de nyid bya// 'dab mar 'di nyid gzhag par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod pas// 'od zer/
401b2(rgyud): sna tshogs rab 'bar bas// gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa ru// sngar bstan shin tu mkhas pas bsgom// de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi// gzugs su bdag nyid bskyod par bya//
401b3(rgyud): gzugs mdzes shin tu yongs su rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin// g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams// dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni//
401b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' sbyar te// de ltar bsgoms shing bzlas pa yis// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur// lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor gyis// rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin// bdag nyid bye brag
401b5(rgyud): gzhan dag tu// rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no// bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// stong pa'i de bzhin bsgoms nas su// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sa yi dkyil 'khor
401b6(rgyud): bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes rnam shes dngos po bsgom// 'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lor ni// dbus su sa bon bsgoms ras ni// phyi rol 'khor lo
401b7(rgyud): mu khyud la// dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya// phyogs kyi 'dab mar bdud rtsi bzhi// gug skyed kun dang sbyar bar bya// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la yang // sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par
402a1(rgyud): brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can// rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste// rang gi lus la bsgob par bya// gang 'dod yid ni rtog bya'i phyir//
402a2(rgyud): de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med pas// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// rmugs dang glen dang snyoms las dang // shes rab zhan cing lta ngan rnams// rnal 'byor pa yis/
402a3(rgyud): skad cig la// snyoms las la sogs ring du spong // mnyam gzhag cung zad bltas nas su// rdul phran dkar po spro bar bya// phyogs bcur song ste khyab nas ni// thams cad rim pas kun snang bya//
402a4(rgyud): ye shes sems la bltas nas ni// rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur// sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su// mnyam bzhag 'khor lor blta bar bya// mnyam nyid ye shes mthong ba yis//
402a5(rgyud): 'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sa bon gyis bsrungs pa// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// phyag
402a6(rgyud): gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas// snying ka'i phyogs su 'tshir bar mdzad// kha dog dkar po mdzes pa yi//
402a7(rgyud): 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro// spro ba sna tshogs mi zad pas// sems can khams ni sgrol bar mdzad// shes rab rdo rjes 'gro sgrol ba// dbyangs yig
402b1(rgyud): dang po mchog sa bon// mtha' ru cho// basbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// sa bon 'di ni bsgoms nas su// mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas nas ni// byang chub rim pa mthong bar//
402b2(rgyud): 'gyur// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// / byin rlabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo dag/ gang gis sems can rnams la bstan// byin rlabs rim
402b3(rgyud): pa ji lta bu// lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal// sems can rmongs pa gso ba'i phyir// byin gyis rlob pa'i chos bstan pa// yang dag 'khor ba sgrol ba yi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon//
402b4(rgyud): snying kar zla ba bsams nas su// hUM gi sa bon dbus su bsam// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// nyi ma'i dbus su gzhag par bya// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// me yi
402b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// gnas rnams thams cad 'bar ba yis// kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid bstan pa yi// dang po stong pa nyid du bya// me yi dkyil//
402b6(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas lnga ni bsam par bya// dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// gya gyu phyag na rdo rje ste// lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no// mgo dang bum pa byams
402b7(rgyud): pa ste// steng du 'bar ba'i ma yig ni// 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba'o// 'jig rten gsum gyis grub 'dod na// sa bon de ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i stan la gnas pa yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
403a1(rgyud): bsgoms nas su// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin du// bdag nyid ye shes kyis srung ba// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// steng gi rdoH/
403a2(rgyud): cod pan la// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbugs kyis g.yo bar bsgom par/
403a3(rgyud): bya/ sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// rdo rje dbyug pa gug skyed bcas// skra bo che la sogs pas dkri// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// 'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su// gnyis med
403a4(rgyud): gtor ba'i las kyis ni// de yi 'og tu las rnams bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// cho gar ldan pas sbyin par bya// de yi mod la 'bab par 'gyur// babs
403a5(rgyud): nas rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya// rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod// gzhan dang drag po sbyor ba yis// thams cad kun nas khyod kyis gsol// skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam
403a6(rgyud): bsgral// glu 'di yis ni gar byed de// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// oM tiSh+Tha yo ga hA kro d+ha hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ 'di ni tshim bya thams cad bya// rnal 'byor ma kun bsten par bya// dmar dang bar dang mchog rnams
403a7(rgyud): lasade yi 'og tu chos bstan bya// oM yo ga A be sha ya// shin tu mnyam bzhag rnal 'byor pas// 'di ni sngon du bsnyen par bya// gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar das/
403b1(rgyud): gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis// sgrub pa po yis 'dis gdab bya// sngar gyi smos pa'i sngags kyis ni// bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// oM man g+ha ru b+ha ru/ d+hi s+thi tsi li tsi li hUM hUM phaT/ rnal
403b2(rgyud): 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na// bltas pas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur// mchod cing gang la bltas pa yi// mthong bar byas te gar byed do// oM mA la ma li hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum
403b3(rgyud): gyis 'grub 'gyur te// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur// oM ma hA tsi li tsi li hUM hUM phruM phaT/ 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa yis// skyes sogs ring po nas kyang 'bebs// oM ba ta li ba
403b4(rgyud): ta li hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du ni// bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// yau dgas 'byung po gsang ba sogs// lha rnams thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur// oM pa ta ni pa tA ni hUM
403b5(rgyud): paT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig/ bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// chu dang bong ba rdo dang ni// shing rnams kun la 'bebs par byed// dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis/
403b6(rgyud): sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni// shin tu dul zhing brtag pa yis// de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam// lnga ni mnyes par ma byas na// bdag nyid la ni co 'dri yin// oM be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM pra phra
403b7(rgyud): phaT/ thal bar lan bdun bdu ni// mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor// nyin zhag bdud du bzhag na yang // ces kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro// oM pu ru pu ru/ mai tre dzaHhUM phu phaT/ skud pi dmar lo brgyad
404a1(rgyud): brgya ru// yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yis// gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na// ce spyang bzhin du 'khyam par 'gyur// srung ba dang ni bral gyur na// bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin du
404a2(rgyud): byed/ byin rlabs rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mnyam par bzhag pas sgom zhing bzlas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i
404a3(rgyud): sku/ 'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas bya// mngon du 'grub pa bya bar bsam// rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni// sa bon stan du bsgom par bya// sgra dang thig
404a4(rgyud): ler ldan pa ni// rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par// rlung gis bskor bar snying kar gzhag/ thams cad kha dog sngon por bsam// rang gi dbugs kyi rtse mo yi// rlung gi brda ru sbyar bar bya// oM yu pra/
404a5(rgyud): ta bA yu a mo ka s+ya yuM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis gsang sngags 'di// brgyad brgyar bzlas nas 'grub par gyur// 'gro ba la sogs bzung nas su// dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya// rnal 'byor mchog ni
404a6(rgyud): bzung nas su// thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yi// skud pa dmar pos dkris nas ni// shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya// rlung gis spur bar sgom pa ste// gang du rlung ni
404a7(rgyud): bzhon 'gyur ba// de yi phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis bskrad pas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar bsams/
404b1(rgyud): bdag gi lus ni bsgoms nas su// blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas na// gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma ni// de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya// oM badz+ra DA ki Ni shaM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya hUM hUM phreM phreM phaT/ maN+Dal/
404b2(rgyud): dmar pos byug nas ni// seng ldeng phur pa brgyad kyis gdab// dbus su ming ni bris nas su// gtor ma yongs su gang bar ldan// skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang // lan bdun bskor bas drang
404b3(rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyus drangs nas su// gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas byas nas// dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas// las 'dis bzlog nas 'gugs par 'gyur// maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu/
404b4(rgyud): las 'dis 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mkha' 'gro drag por bsam bya ba// rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// nyi ma
404b5(rgyud): gcig ni bzung nas su// mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis brlabs// sngags dang bcas pa'i ming bris la// nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni// rkang pas mgo ni rab mnan la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya//
404b6(rgyud): oM bruM phreM a mu ka s+yA mu khaM be d+ha be d+hA/ thi hri hri/ phuM phaT/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur// thams cad tshul bya ba ste// las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya// sngags
404b7(rgyud): 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni// bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya// gang du nya ni gnas pa yi// nya yi kha ru gzhug par bya// mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs te// ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni// lan re bzlas
405a1(rgyud): te zar bcug na// bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag nyid tsaN+Da li yi gzugs// gzugs rnams thams cad yongs
405a2(rgyud): rdzogs shing // me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su// gnyis med gtor mi'i lus rnams ni// de yi dbus su rab tu bya// lci bas pad+ma'i gzugs byas la// ming dang sngags kyi gzhag par bya// oM
405a3(rgyud): stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM/ b+ha ga na mu traM phru phru phaT/ gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas su// lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas nas su// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//
405a4(rgyud): chung ma shin tu g.yon can rnams// las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya// mthar ni chu dang 'o ma yis// bkrus nas bcings pa las grol 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa ra/ ka lha mo rdo rje ma
405a5(rgyud): ru bsgom// kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes// 'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar// yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes par ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// yi dgas kyi ni gdan la bzhug//
405a6(rgyud): ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung // gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma yi// las ni de ru byas nus kyang // 'bras phye la sogs khyad par las// pad+ma'i dbyibs ni byas nas su// khyi yi spu yis dgang
405a7(rgyud): bar bya// ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i rnams pa ni// las der byin gyis brlab par bya// sau kro d+he shwa ri bruM bruM phaT/ brgyad brgya ru di bzlas nas su// rdo rje gsang bar gzhug pa/
405b1(rgyud): las 'di sbyar zhing gzir ba yis// b+hag dag na bzlog par 'gyur// las 'dis shin tu 'grub pa ste// phyung na de las thar par 'gyur// chung ma shin ku gdul dka' la// las ni de ltar sbyar ba dang // /
405b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom// rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya// ban d+hA'i me tog rgyas pa yi// dbus su lcags kyu'i yi ge
405b3(rgyud): ste/ kha dog dmar po shin tu 'bar// gsang zhing gsang bas bsgom par bya// kho bo'i sor mo'i sor mo ru// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni// sor mo 'di yis bskyod par bya// sbyor ba gsum ni bsamra/
405b4(rgyud): pa yis// de yi dbus kyi sa gnas rnams// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya// chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la// 'di yis b+ha gar brtag par bya// 'od zer can dang bla mar bya// skyo byed yan lag lnga dang
405b5(rgyud): bcas// gu gul chen po che dang bsres// mar nag chen pos bskol bar bya// sngags pas bdud rtsi chu dang ni// lce yi dang pos myang bar bya// 'dir ni skyo 'gyur the tsom med// mar zos pas ni grol
405b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// yi dgas gos ni ma lhung bas// mar me yi ni sdong bu bya// klu dbang gi ni gong du gzung // rlung gi mar gyis sbar bar bya// gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags
405b7(rgyud): kyis/ du ba dag ni dbab par bya// dur khrod du ni gtor byin la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung // gang la du ba byug pa des// mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar gyur/
406a1(rgyud): lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis bzung la// drar khrod kyi ni sol ba yis// tsha ba'i rdzas la sgyur nas mi/ khya rog sgo \u0f7fs+yA bri bar bya// oM ki ri ki ri kro d+hi a mu ka rdzu phra pA nra/ snod ni gnyis/
406a2(rgyud): la s+yo s+yo ru// gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bris la// gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni// khro bos bkang ste drud par bya// oM ki li brta li badz+ra li kro d+ha mra khe a mu ka s+yA hi li hi li badz+ra tiSh+Tha mu khaM
406a3(rgyud): phu phreM phreM phaT/ brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni// myur du 'thab rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur// gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yi// dbang bskur ba ni zhi bar 'gyur// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las
406a4(rgyud): rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste// gnyis med ming gis brjod pa yin// sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi ba// rol mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal//
406a5(rgyud): gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ so sor gzung ba'i de kho na// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid dang // chos kyi dril bu lha mo'o// kha sbyor
406a6(rgyud): sbyor ba phyag rgya ste// thabs ni de ni thim pa'o// dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya//
406a7(rgyud): oM sa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+ha rmAs b+hA ba shud+d+ho \u0f7f/ oM badz+ra gud+haHsa r+b+ba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+hoH/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha \u0f7fsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma mo ga shud+d+homache/ gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol bas// sbyin pa'i rabs sbyin par
406b1(rgyud): bya zhal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// thams cad rtswa bzhin blta bar bya// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// 'gro rnams gtso bar mi bya sogs// sems can don ni dgag mi bya//
406b2(rgyud): steng du tshul khrims dra ba'o// gzhan la gnod pa 'go la sogs// bzod pa'i phur bu 'og tu gdag// phur bu ra ba dra ba yis// srung ba'i bdud dang dragra rnams bskrad// bdud ni bdud du 'char mi
406b3(rgyud): 'gyur// rang gi sems kyis bsnams pa'o// rang gi rang sems btul ba na// bdud kyis 'tshe bar ga la 'gyur// mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni// gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya// lus la
406b4(rgyud): lte 'jog tsan dan byug/ sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste// bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor pas// 'bad dang ldan pas dgram par bya// mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis// rang
406b5(rgyud): bzhin dag pas bdug par bya// shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste// khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams// mar me 'di yis bcom nas su// ji ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya// sems kyis mi
406b6(rgyud): 'jigs sbyin pa yis// dbugs ma phyin pa dbug dbyung bya// mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du// gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas
406b7(rgyud): su// bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas ni// shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul// bar du khru gang bzhag nas su// mnyam nyid sa bas bas par bya// snying kar hU~M ni bsgom byas la// thams cad rig/
407a1(rgyud): pas kun stong bya// khams gsum zad par byas nas ni// thams cad nam mkhar yang dag gnas// sngor bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su//
407a2(rgyud): po zang yangs par ci 'drod par// ri rab rtse mor bsam par bya// lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan// rdo rje sngon du bstan pa bzhir// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// hUM gi thig le las byung ba// zla ba'i
407a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mi g.yo rdo rje bsgom nas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du// bdag gi lus ni sprul par bya// yi ge'i dgod pas dgod nas su// mkhas pas go cha byas nas hUM/
407a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste// gangs dang kun de zla ba'i mdog/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag rgya chen po snying por bcas// go
407a5(rgyud): 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba khwa// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro// dngos po sgom pa bsgoms nas su// hUM gi sgra yis dgang bar bya// rang nyid ji ltar
407a6(rgyud): 'dod sems kyis// ye shes sa bon bzlas par bya// btso ma'i gser ltar shin tu 'bar// sems can kun gyi don la chags// de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag
407a7(rgyud): nyid can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// nyi shu rtsa gsum lnga rnams kyis// dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las//
407b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par spro// de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnams ni// shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs//
407b2(rgyud): kha dog cung zad 'dres pa'i sku// sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni// yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya// phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste// go 'phang mchog
407b3(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya// a li ka lI las byung ba'i// de yi sa bon bzlas par bya// 'dod chags sems ni stobs kyi ni// bcom gser gyi 'od dang bcas// sems can bsgral phyir kun tu 'byung/
407b4(rgyud): nu ma 'khyud cing zhal gnyis 'jig/ rdo rje ser mo'i rtse mor ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni// lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni// bstan pa'i rtse mor gzung bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi gnas rnams
407b5(rgyud): ni/ kun nas bdud rtsi gang gnas pa// mdzub mo 'dri yis bskyod pa yis// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par 'gyur// gnyis kyi kun sprod btang nas su// shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyod// rol
407b6(rgyud): ba'i stobs kyis lha mo ni// rdo rje rkang pa'i stobs kyis mnan// nu ma lag pa gnyis kyis gzir// sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin can te// 'og mas gnon po btsir bar bya// dril bu lag gnyis
407b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i sbyor// de bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas// shar phyogs su ni bskyod pa yis// sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// lha mo g.yon pa bskyod nas su// lho ru kha ni blta bar bya// rdo rje yang
408a1(rgyud): ni bskyod nas su// rkang mthil gnyis kyis de bzhin btsor// dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis ni// rked pa bsdams te btsir bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang // de bzhin gsang
408a2(rgyud): bar btso bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni// yang dang yang du sprad par bya// sa bon gnyis ni bzlas pa yis// lho phyogs sems can sgrol bar 'gyur// nub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis//
408a3(rgyud): lha mo nub tu blta bar bya// rdo rje yi ni phyogs gcig gis// g.yas kyi brla ni mnan par bya// mgrin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis 'khyud de// dril bu'i sgo ni bskyod nas su// rdo rje lce la reg par bya// de bzhin
408a4(rgyud): sbyar nas gnyis ka bzlas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bsdams pa'o// dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang // rna ba'i drung bar gzugs par bya// gnyis ka'i mchu ni kun
408a5(rgyud): sbyar nas// de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// sems can thams cad bdi gyur cig/ kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog/ gang gis/
408a6(rgyud): lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig/ skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor dang // skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can// kun nas kun tu skad cig ste// skad cig gis ni gsang
408a7(rgyud): sngags 'don// dril bu lnga ru sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni// gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de// rang nyid lha mor bsam pa dang // slar yang 'di nyid rab tu /
408b1(rgyud): rang gis rjes su rmugs pa'i sems// da nas rdo rje ku tu 'byung// de nas bdag nyid rdo dza ru// dkar na babs pa bsam pa b+ba// dzA yi na rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod//
408b2(rgyud): las byung ba'i me tog ni// gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las// rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste// ban du ka ni rnas pa 'dra// thong ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams// sa dang rlung drag nyid yin no// 'og tu chu yi rang /
408b3(rgyud): bzhin la// mu gu me yi sa bon no// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su// dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can// sa bo che la sogs pas dkri// lha mo'i gzugs su bsams
408b4(rgyud): nas su// sa yi nang du thim par bya// dus ma'i yi dgas mer sbyor cing // yi dgas me dang dus mer sbyor// lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba// mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan nas su// gsum po//
408b5(rgyud): dag ni rtse mor sbyor// phyag rgya gnyis kyis mgor btsug nas// bdud rtsi bza' ba'i bsam pa yis// gnod pos 'og ma btsir bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas// dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul/
408b6(rgyud): bar bya// g.yon gyi tsha ni ban du ka/ chu 'dzag pa yi cha byad can// chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la// der ni phyag rgyas bskul bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni// rang
408b7(rgyud): bzhin mnyam pa'i tshul du bya// mthong ka la sogs gnas kun tu// de nas sor mo gdab par bya// de nas rdo rje rtse mo ni// phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya// gnyis ka kun tu sbyar nas ni// rdo rje padro bskul bar bya//
409a1(rgyud): hUM gi sgra yis bkang nas su// lha mo thams cad tshim par bya// dril bu yi ni dngos po yis// a li sa bon kun tu sbyin// ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtse// bdag nyid lha ni mnyes/
409a2(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje dril bu lus yin te// phyag rgya kha sbyor sbyar bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // de kho na yis so sor gzung // rdo rje de kho na bskyod la// dril bu rang dkar dkrol bar bya// rdo rje/
409a3(rgyud): dril bu rab sbyor te// phyag rgya'i de nyid sbyor ba yin// lus ni gnyis ka mnyes pa yis// sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// gnyis ka yi ni bdag nyid sems// chu de byin gyis brlab par bya//
409a4(rgyud): sgeg cing bskyod par gnas pa ste// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rol pa'i rkang pa ste// dril bu g.yon gyi brla yi sa rol// lag g.yon 'khyud cing nu ma gzung // g.yas kyis
409a5(rgyud): rdo rje gsor bar bya// bzhad cing khro dang sgeg pa yis// yang dang yang du spro bar bya// dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// brla yi stan la 'dug nas su// rkang pa g.yas pas dkris nas ni// dku
409a6(rgyud): yi gnas su gzhag par bya// mgrin pa gcig gis 'khyud nas ni// g.yon pas dril bu gsil bar bya// ngo mtshar bcas bzhad sgeg pa yis// yang dang yang du sprad par bya// de nas rdo rje glu blang
409a7(rgyud): zhing // sna tshogs hUM zhes bya bar 'dod// bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su// slar yang glu ni blang bar bya// 'khor lo stong pa snying po med pa ni// snying po dag ni shin tu bsam pa ste// rnam par
409b1(rgyud): thar bas rab tu bskasgral pa ste// ngos las rnam par grol ba rab tu 'grub// phan tshun kun tu 'khyud pa'i sbyor byas pa// de yis don ni yang dag byed par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i snying po dag ni med pa/
409b2(rgyud): lal rnal 'byor dbus su snying po 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i slar bcas pas// de nas de ltar glu thang bya// mnyam bzhag sgom zhing bzlas pa yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// las ni gang
409b3(rgyud): zhig bsam pa rnams// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sman la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams// bskyed pa'i sbyor bar ldan par bya// gur kum dang ni gi wang dang // kar sbrang rtsi ba la sha/
409b4(rgyud): yung ba ru rta cha mnyam pa// sbyor ba'i gnas su gzung bar bya// rdzas de dag ni bsgom nas su// rtag tu thig le byas gyur na// rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas// thams cad du ni dga' bar 'gyur//
409b5(rgyud): dbang po lag dang ru rtsa dang // rmongs byed ma dang rengs byed ma// bdag gi lnga dang yan lag wa// lnga po thams cad cha ba sams la// bza' dang btung dang so rtsi dang // zhib tu btags te sbyar la sbyin/
409b6(rgyud): thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te// 'chi ba na yang gtor mi 'gyur// khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub// sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis// 'gro ba thams
409b7(rgyud): cad rmongs par 'gyur// bdag gis lus la gshegs gsol pa// bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar bya// sems can don phyir blo ldan pas// thams cad dbang du 'du bar sgrub// brtul zhugs
410a1(rgyud): bram ze'i nye du mos// zhi ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos// rgyas pa'i las ni sbyar bar bya// je rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis// dbang gi las
410a2(rgyud): ni bsgrub par bya// lham mkhan shan pa nya ba mos// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// kla klo gdol pa chos mkhan mas// sbyor ba'i dngos grub bshad pa yin// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rnal
410a3(rgyud): 'byor bstan bcos gzung bar bya// gzhan yang rkang stabs bcing bar bya// sems can bsgral ba'i gnas yin te// gnyis ni kun tu 'dus nas bstod// de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya ba cing /
410a4(rgyud): mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang // dbye ba'i stabs dang // zlum po'i skabs dang // gsum gnon pa'i skabs dang // rus sbal gyi stabs dang // g.yas brkyang dang // g.yon brkyang dang // gnas
410a5(rgyud): gcig pa dang / 'dug pa dang / bung ba'i tshogs dang / rgya mtsho rlab pa dang / ri bo dpung pa dang / sa rkang pa'i 'phen pa dang / mchod sdong gi tshul dang / pus mo btsir ba dang / bsdu ba'i tshul dang /
410a6(rgyud): mnyam du gnas pa dang / dus kyi ma dang / snying po dang / dga' bas gnas pa dang / gcig tu bsdu ba'o// rkang stabs skyod pa bco brgyad ni// mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya// yon tan thams cad
410a7(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas// rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya// snying kar btsir ba dang / rkang pa sbyar ba dang / 'phreng ba'i tshul dang / nu ma'i tshul dang / gnyis ka sbyar te bza' ba dang / phyed kyis 'khyud pa dang /
410b1(rgyud): gsang bar reg pa dang / lus mnye ba dang / kos so sdang ba dang / zhal bzhad cing sgeg pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa yis// de yi las rnams 'grub par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ de la/
410b2(rgyud): na yis so sor gzung // gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na// dril bus ji ltar 'bras bu 'bras// rdo rje'ang dril bu dang bral na// rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring bar 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ dmigs na pha rol
410b3(rgyud): sgrol bar 'gyur// mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang // nyin mo zla bas ci zhig nus// de nas rdo rje dril bu dang // mnyam pa de nyid gsal bar byed// a li kA li mnyam bsgom nas// rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa
410b4(rgyud): pos// a li rdo rje zhes byar brjod// ka li de bzhin gshegs ma yin// a li ka li mnyam sbyor bas// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// sems can don rnams ma lus pa// lha yi gzugs
410b5(rgyud): kyis bri bar bya// phyi rol shes rab thabs rnams kyis// ji ltar 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur// rmongs pa phyi rol sems ldan pas// de yi dam tshig bstan pa yin// gsang ba'i gsang ba gsang ba la// rtag
410b6(rgyud): tu gab cing gsang ba yis// gang zhig lung ni shes gyur pa// de yi rnal 'byor pa ru grags// shel lngar dag pa'i sems la ni// de yi chos ni bstan par bya// gal te sems ni the tsom na// skad cig gis ni
410b7(rgyud): dmyal bar srung // 'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing // longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya// sems can don bya'i phyir du ni// rab tu 'bad pa'i de nyid dmigs// gal te 'dod dga'i rnal 'byor pa// thabs kyi mtshan nyid/
411a1(rgyud): gcig yin te// rang dga' skad cig yang dag 'byung // rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba'o// skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod// gsang ba'i nang gi dbus
411a2(rgyud): gnas par// a li'i sa bon gzung bar bya// bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni// hUM zhes bya ba 'bad de bzla// gang yang cung zad lus dang ngag/ lnga yi sbyor bar thim par bya// thal sbyor phyogs ni thams/
411a3(rgyud): cad du// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang gson// dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yis// 'gro ba thar pa de ring thob// e mchos kyi mchog gi lam// e ma'o 'khor ba gcod pa bo// e ma'o rnal 'byor grol/
411a4(rgyud): ba'i gnas// e ma'o ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam// chos grangs med cing rgyu skar med// bsnyung ba med par bstan pa ste// 'di ni bde ba'i sgrub par brjod// bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed// las kyi
411a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i cho ga rnams// sgrub pa po yi sna tshogs 'dod// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// drag mo'i gzugs su sprul par bya// de yi gzugs su bsams nas ni// sngon bzhin de
411a6(rgyud): nyid bsgom par bya// sngags pas sum 'bum bzlas nas su// phyi nus las ni bsgrub par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang // rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar bzhag pa/
411a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du// bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni// de nyid las rnams 'bad de sgrub// yi dgas gos la sogs bzung la// lha mo ser mo tshon gyis bri// phyag gnyis rol pa'i
411b1(rgyud): rkang skabs can// dkar dang ser la 'bar ba'i lus// hahar bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste// sA ni sdug pas rnam par brgyan// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// skyes bu'i pags pa'i na bza'
411b2(rgyud): mnubs// don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// glang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs can// kha T+wAM mchog gis brgyan pa ste// g.yon pa chang gi thod pa bsdam/
411b3(rgyud): hUM ga sgra ni 'jigs par mdzad// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// lha mo seng ge bsgom par bya// sa yi dbus sogs sbyor byer bya// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// sngon gyi mtshan/
411b4(rgyud): nyid ldan pa yis// gnyis mer gtor mas dgang bar bya// gal te 'byor nA yi dgas mo// tha mal me 'bar dbus su ni// yam shing thang shing las byas pa'am// zho can lnga yi shing las bya//
411b5(rgyud): mchod pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang // sha chen la sogs bsreg par bya// spang ci khrag la grags pa dag/ brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin zag bya// de ltar bsregs pa tsam gyis ni// des ni mtshan ma ston
411b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// oM s+thA phru~M phu phaT/ sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so// thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya// dang po sa ni 'gul 'gyur te// gnyis par ni bris gzugs 'gul// gsum pa la ni dri
411b7(rgyud): chen 'byung / kha na par seng ge sgo spogs te// lnga par sgrub pa'i thogs por ni// seng ge'i tshul du babs nas su// drag po'i gzugs can rnam par gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrog par byed//
412a1(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya sogs byin nas// gtor ba'i mchod pas mnyes par bya// ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas rnams dang // stan ni bdag gi mdzad du gsol// de nas lha mo dngos bstan/
412a2(rgyud): nas/ bdag gis bu yi ci zhig sgrub// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas su// de la phyag rgya bstan par bya// dpa' bos de ltar byin nas su// da lta bdag gi 'dir mdzod cig/ bdag nyid la ni lha mo 'grub// oM
412a3(rgyud): tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hUM hUM hUM dza dza dza swA hA/ spyi bor lag pa bzhag nas ni// gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya// sha dang khrag dang sran chan bcas// gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyin// yi dgas bgrod par
412a4(rgyud): gnas nas su// rtag pa'i dus su byin gyis brlab// lha min klu mo gnod sbyin mo// dri za mi 'am ci dang ri// yi dgas mi mo gang 'dod pa// bka' bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na// phran tshogs
412a5(rgyud): mimo mo gros ci dgos// bka' ni bsgo ba tsam gyis su// snga min klu yi gnas dag kyang // gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams// myur du khrid nas 'ong bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra rnams gsad pa dang /
412a6(rgyud): bka' bzhin du ni spyod par 'gyur// las rnams kun byed lha mi ste// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// stag mo ce spyang 'ug pa mo// las de nyid kyis bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub de ltar shes byas
412a7(rgyud): la mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin nyid kyis so sor gzung // rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing // dril bu chos kyi lha mo yi// phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin// kun
412b1(rgyud): rig pas ni thams cad sdug/ sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so// rnal 'byor phrag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i// slob dpon dag ni gzung b+ha ga/ sngags dang byug/
412b2(rgyud): rgyasbyor sogs ldan// 'khor ba las sgrol mnyam nyid kyi// ji bzhin lam gyi 'khor ba las// sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje nyon// slob dpon yon tan ci 'dra zhing // tho ma zhes bgyi ji ltar
412b3(rgyud): lags// slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi// bcom ldan ji ltar blta bar bgyi// thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi// de nyid phyug na rdo rjes nyon// byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang //
412b4(rgyud): lus ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// cha shas byang chub yan lag rnams// dbu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de// ba spu rnams ni dgra bcom mo// 'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan// 'od zer gnod
412b5(rgyud): sbyin gsang la sogs// de ltar yon tan ldan pa'i skur// rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu blta// ye shes can ni shes bya ba// mtshan nyid gang yin bstan par bya// shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs/
412b6(rgyud): sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas// rnal 'byor bzo dang bstan bcos rig/ thams cad du ni snyan par smra// sems can kun la bu bzhin lha// sbyin pa/
412b7(rgyud): la sogs rtag tu dga'// rnal 'byor bsam gtan mngon par brtson// snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// bden par smra zhing 'tsho mi byed// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pas na// sems can rnams
413a1(rgyud): kyi mgon skyob yin// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa// 'di ni slob dpon ces byar brjod// gzhan yang slob mas spyod pa yi// de nyid mtshan nyid mnyam par gyis// rnal 'byor ma yi/
413a2(rgyud): sbyor ba lta// dam tshig spyod pa dang lha nyid// gtor ma gsang ba la sogs ldan// slob dpon gsang ba slad mi b+ha// smyung na myur du mnar med 'gro// kun tu dam tshig med pa dang // stan dang mal dang /
413a3(rgyud): ldem sogs dang // gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod rnams// grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya// bzlog dang gzir ba'i tshig brjid min// 'das na de ni dus kun tu// gnod kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /
413a4(rgyud): nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur// bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed// de yi grib ma 'goms gyur na// mchod rten bshig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod// slob dpon smod par gang byed
413a5(rgyud): pa'armi lam na yang dngos grub med// slob dpon yon tan gzung bya yin// skyon rnams nam yang gzung bya min// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs// de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro// bslab pa
413a6(rgyud): sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas// de nas maN+Dal la sogs bya// sngar bstan yi ge gcig pa yis// sangs rgyas lnga ru bstan par bya// de yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// las rnams 'dod bzhin 'grub
413a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// sngags kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis// yi ge brgyad po bsgom par bya// gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang bskur ba'i// de yi chos ni shes par bya// sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan
413b1(rgyud): pa la// ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya// slob dpon dbang ni bsgyur nas su// thams cad gsang ba la sogs bstan// dang por slob mas bya ba ni// bla gos phrag par gzar nas su/
413b2(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i ljang dag/ sa la legs par btsugs na sa na// thal mo snying kar sbyar bar bya// bla ma stan la 'dug nas ni// rang gis lha ru rab bsgoms la// lag pa sa lag pa
413b3(rgyud): bzung nas ni// mkhas pas bslab pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// theg pa gsum po thams cad dang // rnal 'byor gsang sogs
413b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod
413b5(rgyud): pa rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang // don yod grub pa la sogs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes
413b6(rgyud): bgyi ba ni// dus tshod 'di las bzung nas su// byang chub snying por mchis bar du// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bgyi zhing // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i
413b7(rgyud): phyir bdag gis chos khrims 'di bgyi'o// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du// mnyam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan brjod// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha sar+b+ba
414a1(rgyud): d+harma badz+ra shud+d+ho&haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA lo ga shud+d+ho&haM/ lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// lus
414a2(rgyud): bsdam pas ni dam tshig spang // sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su// ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya// de nas ras kyis mig bkab nas// gtor ma'i gnas su gzhug par bya// lag
414a3(rgyud): pas lag pa bzung nas su// slar yang bslab pa bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo yi// sbyor ba'i gdan
414a4(rgyud): la bdag phyag 'tshal// don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnam shes nas// rnal 'byor ldan pas sgribs g.yogs rnams su bral ba'i phyir// srid pa'i nyes dmigs bskyod pa'i
414a5(rgyud): nyon mongs bcom nas su// rnal 'byor don dam grub byed de nyid rgyal por 'gyur// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// hUM ni nyon mongs sreg pa ste// thugs kyi rdo
414a6(rgyud): rjer byin gyis brlab// oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste// sku yi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// de nas mig phye mthong ma thag/ kun la yan lag lnga btud nas// bdag gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid// sbyor
414a7(rgyud): pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// de nas mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar// lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// mkhas pa yis ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar bstan bzhin mtshon byas la// de nas bslab sogs yang bya
414b1(rgyud): b+he ji ltar bstan pa'i yid kyis brtags// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin// ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog/ he yis dri ni 'joms par byed// ji yis nus pa gzhom
414b2(rgyud): bya ste/ lA lar sngags ni bzlas par bya// bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni// mgo bos btud de dpral bar bya// oM pany+dza DA ki nI pu dza u pas+tha na ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ oM A ya ts+tsha bu dze paswa nA ya
414b3(rgyud): At+ma na nir+yA ta ya mi// oM sarba satwA la pa ri tA Na Ar+tha ya At+ma ni ner+yA ta ya mi/ nga rgyal dang ni khro ba dang // brlang dang tshig rtsub la 'bar bya// sdig pa'i grogs po spang bya ste// srog gcod rku ba de bzhin/
414b4(rgyud): no// longs spyod kun la mi chags shing // bdag nyid nges par chog shes bya// gar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra ba'i// phyi rol bstan bcos shes mi bya// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho/ a A ai aHdzaH
414b5(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis// yan lag drug gi sa bon gzung // gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad kyis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// de nas slob ma 'byor ldan pas// rtag tu bla ma/
414b6(rgyud): yon dbul bya// rang gi bu dang chung ma dang // gnyen 'dun bran khol bcas pa dang // glang chen rta dang ba glang khyu// rin chen khyim dang zhing yul bcas// gser dang dngul dang zangs dang ni// gos dang
414b7(rgyud): 'bru la sogs pa'i nor// stan dang mal cha lham la sogs// gdugs sogs nye ba'i longs spyod dbul// mthar ni rang gi lus nyid kyang // bla ma'i yon du phul nas su// chos rnams rang bzhin
415a1(rgyud): dag pa nyid// dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa ru// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// sngon du bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can rnams la gzir mi bya// gzhan la tshig rtsub
415a2(rgyud): sgra mi bya// thams cad mi dgar bya ba min// tshul khrims sdom pa srung ba dang // skye bo rnams la gnod mi bya// srog chags gsad par mi bya ste// de bas shi bar gyur kyang bla// rab tu 'bar me mtshung
415a3(rgyud): pas na// gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya// dngos la sred pa'i blun po rnams// bdag nyid srin po mi bzad ltung // rags dang phra mo tsam la yang // rnal 'byor pa yis brdzud bsrung ngo // rnal 'byor
415a4(rgyud): spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// de la brdzun smra yod pa min// spyod la lags par bsdams pa dang // bza' bca' sogs la'ang legs par bsdam// dga' dang rtsi la'ang legs par bsdam// /
415a5(rgyud): gtor ma'i dus su'ang legs bsdam bya// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams// sems can dga' bas grub par 'gyur// gang zhig kun shes slob ma la// sems can spro ba bstan
415a6(rgyud): par bya// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas ni// thams cad mnyam pAr blta bar bya// rtag tu mnyam par spyod par bya// rnal 'byor bsam gtan 'bad par bya// sems can smin la sred pa
415a7(rgyud): gzhis// tshong byed myur gu 'phel 'gyur te// de yi myu gu ljon shing gis// 'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gogs par byed// mtho ris longs spyod 'dod pa yis// lus can rnams ni byams pas na//
415b1(rgyud): dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis// bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur// mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing // glegs bam bklag par mi bya'o// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing zhing // sngags kyi ye
415b2(rgyud): shes bzla mi bya// bsnun bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste// de yi sbyor ba rnyed pa dka'// slob dpon dag gis lam gyis ni// mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya// bdag gis lnga dang gzhan las
415b3(rgyud): ni khadag gi lha ni lnga yi mchog/ bdag gi gzugs su mi nus pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs bri bar bya// gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu phye ba las rim par phye ba dang po'o//
415b4(rgyud): der ni sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba// nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po gtso// de nyid med pa'i sngags pa rnams// srid pa 'phel byed 'og tu ltung // lus po ngo mtshar skyes gyur pa sa//
415b5(rgyud): de nyid chos ni bstan du gsol// rnal 'byor gyi ni tshad ma ci// sngags dang phyag rgya ji lta bu// chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi// lus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags// rnal 'byor pa yi gtor/
415b6(rgyud): ma'i las// rab tu sbyar ba'i tshad ma grang // gang gis 'gro ba sgrub pa yin// mtshan nyid tshad mas ji ltar lags// mtshon bya'i lus dang sems kyi tshad// ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon// bdag
415b7(rgyud): gi khams ni bstan pas na// gtor ma'i las dang bzlas pa dang // dkyil 'khor me dang chu yi las// phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa yi// 'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang // srid
416a1(rgyud): pa'i rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa// srid pa so sor 'byung ba rnams// gang gis de yi tshad ma ste// sems ni ji ltar blta bar gyis//
416a2(rgyud): yid ni the tsom skyes par 'gyur// 'khor ba khyod kyis dris pa nyon// sems ni yid kyi bkrus nas su// rang dga' ye shes dngos med pa// mkha' 'gro rlung gi bcing ba yis// sems
416a3(rgyud): ni gzugs dang gzugs med par// bsam gtan dmigs pa'i 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod lha la sogs 'dod can rnams// rtag tu 'dod yon smod pa ste// de ltar 'khor ba'i mi rnams
416a4(rgyud): nirang 'dod sa la sogs pa 'grub// de las sgrol ba'i dngos po rnams// rdo rje 'dzin gyis ma dor bsdus nyon// rnal 'byor can gyis rnam shes dang // lhan cig 'gro bas 'gro bar
416a5(rgyud): 'gyur// rnam shes rnam par shes pa yis// phyogs kun gyis ni gsal bar 'grub// sems kyi ngo bo the tsom pas// bcom ldan de yang bshad du gsol// shes rab rnam shes
416a6(rgyud): dngos rang bzhin// mi shes ye shes ji ltar lags// rnam shes ye shes mtshan nyid kyis// the tsom gyur pa nyan par 'tshal// shel dang mtshungs pa dag pa'i sems// sems la
416a7(rgyud): skyon dang yon tan med// yul rnams dang ni spad pa yis// srid pa'i skyon gyis gos pa yin// gang gis 'di yi srid pa'i dngos// yul gnas pa yis ni gyur nas// ji ltar gnas
416b1(rgyud): bzhin rab sbyor ba// bu ga'i sgo ru gzir bar bya// de yi dbus su shes bya ba/ rtag tu rnam shes nam mkha' 'dra// kha dog med cing thams cad 'tshod// mi ldan lus can ldan pa ste/
416b2(rgyud): gzugs med pa ni kun gyi gzugs// de bzhin thung ngu ring po min// sems kyi de kho na nyid kyi// dngos med rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan/
416b3(rgyud): nyid thams cad ster ba'o// dngos po med par sgom pa yis// sgom pa dag ni mtshon par bya// gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni// sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste// thams cad
416b4(rgyud): kun nas dmigs pa yis// rnal 'byor lus ni skyon med pa'o// gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po// rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag/ bstan bcos klog la sogs sbas shing //
416b5(rgyud): yul gyi mtshan nyid las kyang ring // mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni// bla ma'i lam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// sems dang lus su bcas mnyam zhing // sems kyang gdung bar mi bya'o// /
416b6(rgyud): lus ni gdung bar mi bya'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// lag gnyis
416b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag/ mig ni snga rtser bltas nas su// dbugs ni lte bo'i rtsa bar gzung // zong ka kun tu spangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor lta bur sbyar bar bya// 'bad de mnyam
417a1(rgyud): nyid sems kyis ni// de nyid rang bzhin dag byas la// yid kyi dri yis byug pa dang // yid kyis me tog mchod par bya// rang bzhin dri yis byugs nas su// shes rab
417a2(rgyud): skyon mas snang bar bya// bdud rtsi'i gtor mas tshim pa'i lus// kun nas drangs te bza' bar bya// kha dog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od// ka sha gnyis 'gyur yi ge ste// drag mor ldan pa'i sa
417a3(rgyud): bon nyid// tshangs pa'i sgo ru shin tu srung // thams cad gzugs kyi 'jigs byed pa// dril bu chu yi yi ge ste// stong par ldan pa'i sa bon ni// sna dang rna ba dag la dgod// bdud rtsi'i chu yi
417a4(rgyud): sa bon ni// lce dbang rtse mor gzung bar bya// seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis// rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya// stag mo'i sa bon brtsegs pa'i yis// thong kA kun tu gzung bar bya/
417a5(rgyud): ce spyang sa bon brtsegs pa ni// snying ka'i gnas su gzhag par bya// lte ba'i tshig ni gdan gyi sgor// phyugs kyi sa bon gyis srung ngo // lha mo brgyad du sbyar nas ni// sa bon brgyad po
417a6(rgyud): gzung bar bya// de yi mdog ni dkar mo ste// lus kun tu ni shin tu 'bar// steng gi mche ba gnyis las ni// dngul chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dbab// 'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba yin// 'jug pas
417a7(rgyud): rlabs pa'i mdog lta bu// steng gi mche ba gnyis kyis ni// lce yis bstan pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu// lce chung gsang ba'i nang du dbab// dpral ba'i sde dang sna dang ni// rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab
