438a3(rgyud): tshig gsum tshig tu brjod pa yi// bdag 'dod pa bzhin dbang du byed// 'tsham gyi tA ni la sogs pa// smyo byed chu ni lnga pa dang // bdag nyid bcing bar sngon ldan pas// mchog tu bsgom
438a4(rgyud): na bdug par bya// bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas na// sgrub pos sna la mnams tsam gyis// de yi rang 'dod su la ni// dbang du gyur par yongs su grugs 'tsham gyi swa sa ra la sogs blang /
438a5(rgyud): phye ma zhib mor byas nas ni// bdag nyid dri ma lnga dang ni// kun nas cha ni mnyam byas la// phye ma zhib mo yang dag ldan// 'di yi sman dang ldan pa yis// bsgrub bya'i lus la reg byas
438a6(rgyud): na// nges par dbang du byed pa'o// cha dang cha yi bye brag ni// mkhas shing bzo bar sbyar bar bya// khyad par sman gyi las nyid ni// cho ga bzhin du rnam par blta// rdo rje sems
438a7(rgyud): dpar sbyor ba ni// pad+ma'i gdan gyi gdan la bzhugs// kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa yin// bcom gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// snying kha'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// a ni thig
438b1(rgyud): yang dag ldan// 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba yis// bslab bya'i sems ni 'gugs par byed// mi 'gyur yi ge'i thig le dang / gam par sgra yis rab tu sbyar// mthar ni bdud rtsi'i li/
438b2(rgyud): ge'i ming // 'bum phrag gcig gis rab tu sgrub// slad gyi ster bar ldan pa yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kun nas bya// gtor ba de nyid byin brlabs nas// 'bum dang 'bub du
438b3(rgyud): bsnyen pa bya// sngon du dan ti'i yan lag dang // thig le brgya par kun nas ldan// bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas na// mi yi skad cig rnam par spang // dan da la sogs srin bu
438b4(rgyud): dang khar yi 'o mar bsres byas nas// gang gis zos pa tsam gyis ni// zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi// ku gsum srin bu bdun dang ni// smyo byed nu ni rnam pa lnga// bza' bar
438b5(rgyud): zos pa tsam gyis ni// smyo zhing smyo bar 'gyur ba'o// ram gyis lam sogs sde tshan dang // dkar po srin bu sbyar nas ni// bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas nas// thams cad kun
438b6(rgyud): nas 'thab par 'gyur// ka mi srin bu'i sde tshan dang // mi yi mar khu dang sbyar nas// phye mas yan lag la reg na// skal ngan mi byams pa dag ni// rtsi te sde tshan bdun pa ni// nor
438b7(rgyud): bur sgo nga ldan bzas nas// thig le tsam zhig zos pa yis// mod la tshor ba mi bzang 'byung // sa la la sogs sde tshan dang // nyi shu re yi chu yis spangs// cung zhig tsam zhig zos
439a1(rgyud): pa yis// nyi ma nyi shu na de 'chi// dan ti mtsham gyis srin bu dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar nas ni// bza' btung ba yis zos nas ni// mdzend kyi ni yan lag gzir/
439a2(rgyud): mtshams sogs thang chu'i srin bu ni// bza' dang btung bar byin na ni// rnam par rmongs shing dran pa nyams// de nyid med cing mnyam gzhag med// rab sbyor snying po bsdus pa nyid// gsang zhing
439a3(rgyud): gsang bar byas pa yi// rmongs shing blun pa'i sems can sogs// sbyor ba 'di yis longs spyod ldan// dkon mchog gsum la brnyas pa dang // slob dpon dang ni gsang sprod dang // sdig
439a4(rgyud): gis gos par mi 'gyur ba// rnal 'byor mA ni kun gyis gsung // nyon mongs rmongs sogs bag chags dang // shes ra ba zhan zhing yid mi gzhung // sngags kyi snod min snying rje med// sman
439a5(rgyud): gyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa'o// de yi sbyor ba mthong nas ni// brda yi skad kyis bsdus pa'o// le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba rdzogs
439a6(rgyud): so// de yi rtsa ba'i snying po'i don// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yi// de nyid bsdus pa'i 'grub pa'o// de nyid sman pas lus nyon mongs// shes rab thabs ni rgyur
439a7(rgyud): gyur pas// rang 'dod las ni bsgrub par bya// shes rab ye shes snang ba'o// thabs ni rig pa'i tshul nyid do// rnal 'byor shes rab rtsa ba 'di// thabs ni de yi grogs nyid do// gang zhig thabs
439b1(rgyud): dang shes rab ldan// nyon mongs lus las rnam par rgyal// srid pa'i nyes skyon du ma yang // srid pa dang ni rmongs pa bzhi// dngos po'i gnas ni mi rtag pas// de phyir shes rab yongs su spangs//
439b2(rgyud): dngos med dngos po yang ma yin// skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med// dngos po yongs su gnas pa med// 'jig pa yi ni rnam pa med// dngos dang dngos med la sogs mtha'// ngag dang ma dag
439b3(rgyud): dbus su ni// de yi mtshan nyid sngon shes nas// mnyam pa'i lta ba ldan par gzung // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol ba'i// dngos po'i 'du shes rnam par spangs// sangs rgyas kyis rtogs
439b4(rgyud): bstan bcos las// yongs su brtags nas snying po blang // dngos med dngos por gzung bar bya// dngos por rang bzhin rnam par spangs// dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas pas//
439b5(rgyud): ma bsrubs pa las ni mar// mchog gi snying po yang dag blang // mnyam pa lta ba 'ba' zhig go// bstan bcos bstan zhig yong shes na// de yi mtshan nyid dngos po med// yang dag lam la/
439b6(rgyud): dmigs pa yis// dngos po mchog dang mchog tu 'grub// ji bzhin gnas kyis rim pa sten// ye shes mchog tu gong nas gong // gzhan gyis gnas las 'phangs pa yi// mda' yi mda'
439b7(rgyud): ni bsnun pa bya// gong nas gong la sogs pa bas// rang 'dod dngos por yang dag thang // bdun pa'i sgra las rnam par rgyal// 'khor ba'i dgra yi g.yul nyid ni// gang zhig thabs dang shes rab
440a1(rgyud): ldan// dgra ni dngos po gang du gnas// le lo gnyid dang 'dod pa dang // khro dang rmongs pa sred pa dang // khro ba yis ni yan lag gzir// thabs kyis bdud ni rnam par
440a2(rgyud): spangs// le lo nyes skyon kun gyi gnas// gnyid kyis dge ba rnam par 'joms// khro ba yis ni srid pa 'dren// 'dod pas dran pa rnam par nyams// rmongs pa yis ni gnyid kyis
440a3(rgyud): non pa sred pa yis ni 'khor bar 'jug/ bkres pas dman zhing sdang ba yi// bdud bdun po ni yongs su spangs// kun nas bdud kyis 'big pa yis// lus ni nyon mongs sdug bsngal
440a4(rgyud): gnas// rang 'dod pa yis sems kyis ni// dul bar bsrub cing mnan par bya// gang dang gang gi lam du ni// rang 'dod sems kyis 'bad pa yin// thams cad snying por bsdus nas
440a5(rgyud): ni// rnal 'byor mchog ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// smon lam bla med d+hu lI ni// oM sa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA sa b+hA ba shud+d+hodz+dza/ yo ga shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shu
440a6(rgyud): badz+ra shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+ho&6/ smon lam kun mchog don du ni// lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis// rnam shes rang 'dod par byas pas// sred dang rmongs pa rnam par spangs//
440a7(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas// bdag nyid lus ni rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// dung dang kun da mnyam pa'i 'od// bdag nyid sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
440b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang // sru la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// rdo rje me 'od rab 'phro ba// 'jigs pa med cing 'tsho med par// dngos po dngos por bsgom par bya// a li ka li rab stong/
440b2(rgyud): bsal sa bon sa bon byung ba yi// phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar bzhag pa// rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis bzla// rim bzhin 'gags pa'i phyi nas ni// bdag med shin tu mnyam par gzhag/
440b3(rgyud): gzugs kun rnam par dbus nas ni// khams gsum du ni mi rtog go/ zla ba la sogs bdag nyid med// kun nas thams cad stong par rig/ stong nyid stong pa stong chen dang // dngos
440b4(rgyud): med dngos por bsgoms pa yis// bsgoms nas lhag ma'i mtha' ru ni// rnam shes sngon me lta bur 'bar// de yi 'od zer snang ba yis// khams gsum mun pa bsal nas ni//
440b5(rgyud): 'bar zhing rab tu phra ba'o// rnam shes ye shes snang ba nyid// dngos dang dngos po med pa'i dbus// gzugs dang gzugs med dbus nyid dang // 'du shes 'du shes med par ldan//
440b6(rgyud): yud tsam lta bar reg pa'o// gzugs dang stong pa la sogs dbus// 'di yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid// 'gog pa'i sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// /
440b7(rgyud): yan lag gzir ba med pa dang // sems kyis skyo ba med pa yis// rim dang rim pa brtsam byas nas// 'khor ba gcod cing gcod pa'o// rtag tu nyid kyis sems kyis ni// yang dag
441a1(rgyud): byang chub rim pa bstan// shin tu bcad cing bltas nas ni// rnal 'byor 'di ni blang bar bya// oM ba tA li ba ta li b+he ta mu khi d+hu parba swAr+tha/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal
441a2(rgyud): 'byor gyis// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// gzugs kun rdzogs shing mdzes pa yi// btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas ni// rdo rje 'od zer
441a3(rgyud): kun nas 'phro// ye shes sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni// sngags pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na// 'dod dang grol ba rgya chen po'i// phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya// dur khrod
441a4(rgyud): thal ba sogs blangs la// snod la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi sol ba'i phye ma yis// gang du dkyil 'khor sprul pa yis// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis
441a5(rgyud): ni rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su pad+ma bri// thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// dri dang bdug pa mar me dang // gtor ma'i de nyid de nyid dang // kun nas nya phyis dngos po yi//
441a6(rgyud): sna tshogs mchod pa rgya chen po// ye shes mkha' 'gro dgug pa ni// po nya bzhi dang kun tu ldan// seng ge stag mo ce spang dang // thug pa mo ni phyogs bzhir ro// thams cad kun nas
441a7(rgyud): kun tu ni// mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis mchod// de yi shar gyi gnas su ni// me yi las ni rab tu byas// dur khrod shing gi lhag ma dang // de yi shing gi sa ba dan gsum//
441b1(rgyud): 'am 'on te rdol ba'i mes// 'bad pas me ni rab tu sbyar// rdo rje lcags kyu rgya chen po// mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres byas pas// mchog gi sngags ni bzla bya zhing // bsreg pas lha mo
441b2(rgyud): tshim par 'gyur// thams cad gnas dang phyogs nas ni// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'jigs pa dang // mi bzad ku co rab sgrog na// 'jigs par mi bya 'joms par 'gyur// dpung
441b3(rgyud): gi tshogs ni yan lag bzhi// rgyal po myur du 'ong 'gyur ba// de la tshang ngam sbyin par bya// ri rab ri la sogs pa dang // sa gzhi 'ur 'ur 'gul ba dang // sna tshogs me bzad dri dang ni//
441b4(rgyud): 'dren pa'i sems ni 'jigs mi bya// sems can chen po'i rnal 'byor pas// khri phrag gcig tu bsreg byas na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdun nyid ni// 'grub pa 'di la the tsom med// sngags
441b5(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'i bya ba dang // gtor ma'i las dang las nyid dang // lus la ltos pa med pa yis// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// phyi nas ye shes lha mo ni// me yi dbus su
441b6(rgyud): ston par byed// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// gtor ma dang ni arga dbul// zab cing rgya cher sgrog pa yi// de la lha mo tshig tu brjod// sems can chen po ci zhig 'jug/
441b7(rgyud): gang 'dod dngos grub rab tu zlos// de la sgrub pos sbas pa ni// dngos grub chen po grub sman pa'o// gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod// grub pa brgyad ni gsol ba gdag//
442a1(rgyud): bdud dang nyon mongs gza' sogs kyis// gal te yid gnyis skyes na ni// til mAr chen po dang ldan pa'i// sngags kyu chen po sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje sems dpas/
442a2(rgyud): gsung ba bzhin// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i// mchog gis lha mo sgrub pa ni// lus dang srog la mi ltos par// mkhas pa yis ni
442a3(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// de nas ye shes de nyid mchog/ shin tu phra la rab zhi ba// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// 'byung ba kun la 'dis khyab pa// 'od kyi bdag nyid gnas pa'i
442a4(rgyud): mi kha ma rig nyon mongs gcod byed pa// srid pa la sogs nyon mongs rnams// gang du gnas kyi rnam pa 'byung // lus la sems shing sems dpa' dang // bcu gnyis dus kyi
442a5(rgyud): gnas su yang // gzugs med sems kyi longs spyod pa'o// rmongs pa'i gnas dang gnas su ni// srid pa'i ngo bo nyid du mchod// rmongs pa gcod sogs rnal 'byor pa/
442a6(rgyud): srid pa 'dam sogs rgal dka' ba// dag pa'i chos kyi sgrol ma yis// sgrib pa'i mtshan ma 'joms pa yi// chos dag pa yi thabs kyis ni// dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa'o//
442a7(rgyud): dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis// legs byas nyes byas 'du shes can// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dag/ rgya mtsho lta bur gting dpag dka'// bcu gnyis lus
442b1(rgyud): kyi bdag nyid can// rmongs pa ye shes rnam par gnas// dag pa'i chos kyi chu yis ni// lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma 'khru// rang bzhin pad+ma'i dbye ba yis// nyon mongs la sogs
442b2(rgyud): gdung ba gcod// rnam rtog 'jigs pa chen po ni// srid pa'i rgyu ste mi bzhin no// de phyir rnam rtog ring du spang // rnal 'byor pa yi 'gro ba rtogs// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed byas
442b3(rgyud): nas// kun nas thams cad mnyam par lta// rab tu mi gnas ming can la// las dang las kyi mtshan nyid med// bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin yang // bdud rtsi lus ni tshim par bya// rtag/
442b4(rgyud): tu bdud rtsis mchod pa'o// dngos su med na rnam par brtag/ lcags kyu rnam pa lnga drangs nas// thams cad kun nas rim pas mchod// sbyor bas mkha' 'gro la sogs ni// bdag
442b5(rgyud): nyid dbang du myur du 'gyur// rtag tu de nyid kyi bza' zhing // med na gzhan las rnam par brtag/ gsher ba'i bdud rtsi kun nas bsam// bza' ba yang na sha nyid du// rtag tu dga'
442b6(rgyud): ba'i ngo bo yis// rtag dang rnam rtog rnam par spang // rang bzhin dag pa'i dpa' bo ni// dag pa'i lus su gdon mi za// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa spangs pa// bgrod dang bgrod min rnam par
442b7(rgyud): spangs// lo ma'i dang ni 'dab ma'i rgyu// snod la thams cad myu gu'o// de yi pad+ma rgyas byed pa// dag pa'i mtshan ma dang po'o// kha dog ngan zhing dri mi zhim// btung ba dro ba rnam par spangs// dag
443a1(rgyud): pa'i ngo bo gcod byed pa// gnyis pa'i mtshan mar bstan pa'o// kun la dga' zhing byams pa dang // gnod pa nam yang mi byed cing // sems can kun la snying brtse ba
443a2(rgyud): gsum pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan// rtag tu stong pa'i blo ldan pas// bab cing rgya che'i sems kyis ni// thams cad rtsa bzhin du ni stong // bzhi pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan// dag cing bstan
443a3(rgyud): ba'i ngo bo nyid// lus gcig la ni rab ltos pa// rtag tu gsang sogs za ba ni// lnga pa'i mtshan ma ru ni gsungs// brtson 'grus kun nas ldan pa dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang /
443a4(rgyud): bsam gtan mchog tu brtan byed pa// drug pa'i mtshan ma ru ni brtag/ bzo dang sgyu rtsal nyan pa dang // rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems dang ni// rtag tu sems can don la brtson// bdun pa yi ni
443a5(rgyud): mtshan mar bstan// mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun gyis blo rtog byed// sred pa yang dag byang chub lam// mtshan ma brgyad pa ru ni bstan// 'ga' yang nam du mi smod cing // rdzas
443a6(rgyud): dang rdzas min rnam rtog bcas// gdug pa'i bdud dang bgegs sogs dang // rnam par rtog pas srid par ltung // dka' thub sdug bsngal mi zad pas// bsnyen pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te// /
443a7(rgyud): lus ni dka' bar spyod pa yis// 'khor zhing srid pa'i mtha' ru'o// rnam rtog med pas mnyam par byas// dngos po mtshan ma'i sems dang bcas// sbyor ba grub pa'i don du ni// rnam par mi
443b1(rgyud): rdog sems kyis bza'// bsrubs pa rang 'dod snying po ni// g.yo dang mi g.yo dngos grub tu// chos kyi snying po snying po nyid// sems ni ye shes rang bzhin ldan// sbyor ba'i bstan bcos
443b2(rgyud): cha nyid ni// de nyid de nyid khyad par ro// sbyar dang bsam gtan byas pa yis// rtag tu sems ni sbyang bar bya// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor las 'das gnas chen po// las
443b3(rgyud): bzhi dang ni rab ldan pa'i// ye shes kyis ni 'khor ba sgrol// dang por bskyed rim spyod pa dang // dbugs kyi sbyor ba rim sogs dang // las la sems shing sems pa dang // dang po'i sbyor ba'i/
443b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid do// me bzhin du ni za ba dang // mnyam pa'i nyi ma bzhin du blta// rna dbang rlung gi rang bzhin du// rna ba sgra yi mchod par ldan// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// gzugs brnyan la
443b5(rgyud): sogs mchod pa'o// gtor mas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// gnyis pa shin tu sbyor ba'o// dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas nas// sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag sbyar// phyag rgya chen po yi/
443b6(rgyud): ni thabs// sbyor ba las 'das 'di yod do// rang bzhin gyis ni legs spyad na// thams cad bdag med pa las byung // lus sogs stong par rtogs pa ni// bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o//
443b7(rgyud): 'di rnams mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// chen po'i sems kyi sdom pa'o// rtag tu bya ba der 'jug pas// 'byung zhing 'khor bar sgrol ba'o// spyan ni pad+ma ltar yangs shing // bzhin ni me tog rgyas pa
444a1(rgyud): 'dra// 'dod pa lnga po nye bar bsten// bde bar spyod cing bde bar reg/ 'dod pa kun dang nyer ldan pa// bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// rnam par rtog pa'i rnal
444a2(rgyud): 'byor pas// srid par 'khor zhing 'jug pa'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// rang bzhin ldan pa'i las kyis ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya//
444a3(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar nas// sor mo 'brel bar byas nas ni// dri med gsum dang dud pas spel// sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags// tsham rngam phur bu ra ba dang // dra ba thams cad las nyid do//
444a4(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od// 'di yi phyag rgyar bstan par bya// kha ga'i phyogs gzhan nyid dang ni// rtsa bar rlung dbang gnon pa dang // spyi bor 'bar ba'i re pha dang // mtshan ma'i mnga' bdag
444a5(rgyud): gis brgyan cing // rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi nas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od// 'di ltar sa bon mdor byas pa// thams cad las ni sgrub pa'o// lus la dgra yis kun tu dgang // gzugs/
444a6(rgyud): la sogs pa zad par byed// sa bon lus kyi bdag nyid ni// sa bon lhag par bsam par bya// go cha'i srung ba dang bral zhing // thams cad yan lag drug gi las// stong pa'i de nyid snying po ni//
444a7(rgyud): sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// smad pa dang ni bstod pa'ang med// ci 'byor dag pa'i bza' ba dang // dbang po yul dang longs spyod ni// mnyam pa nyid du sems kyis bya// sngon du rig pas smon lam rnam/
444b1(rgyud): bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i 'bras bu rtogs// gang zhig yid la 'dod spyod pa// de yi thabs ni rdo rje'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rked pa'i phyogs su bzung nas ni// hU~M gi dbyangs kyis kun bkang zhing //
444b2(rgyud): grub pa'i glu yis mnyam par bya// dza dza dza dza/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bzhugs pa'i bdag po khyod// ha ha ha ha/ druM yig dgon po dam tshig bdag po bdag phyag 'tshal// ba ba ba ba/
444b3(rgyud): sgrog gi gsang ba las byung sku 'dzin pa// a a a a/ a ho mgu ba'i rdo rje a li gcig tu thim par hUM/ 'di ltar gsang ba'i glu chen po// rnal 'byor ma kun tshom byed pa// rtse gcig rnal
444b4(rgyud): 'byor sems bcas pas// khu byug skad ltar snyan pa'i sgras// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// khams gsum snying po'i dbus su ni// rlung gi nam mkha' ltar dag pas// sam/
444b5(rgyud): nyid rlung bzhin nam mkhar brjod// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i// a li sa bon 'od dang bcas// las
444b6(rgyud): kyi sa bon mdog tu ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// 'byin dang sdud cing gcod mdzad ma// a li'i sa bon rab tu grags// ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi// yi ge gsum pa
444b7(rgyud): bzung byas te// glo ru dbyug pa rdo rje dang // 'og pag gis ni dkri bar bya// 'di ltar rnal 'byor mchog sgom pa// 'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed// phyi nas bdag nyid lus po ni// sems dpa'
445a1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje 'dzin// kun nas chu yis gang bar ni// phyogs brgyad du ni mnyam par ro// de 'i dbus su rab mdzes pa// pad+ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i// rlung gi dkyil 'khor/
445a2(rgyud): dbus gnas par// 'o ma zla ba'i sa bon 'dzin// gdugs dkar po yis mngon par bkab// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po// de yi sa bon las skyes pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni// kun
445a3(rgyud): da dkar dang zla ba'i mdog/ phyag gnyis pa la mdzes pa'i brang // dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje snying khar mtha' 'dzin cing // g.yon pa
445a4(rgyud): dril bu dku ru brten// skrag cing spro ba'i rang bzhin dang // rgyan rnams kun ni rnam par brgyan// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po// dngos po'i tshon gyis btso bar bya// sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab rgyas pa'i/
445a5(rgyud): rdo rje rnon po'i 'od 'phro ba// 'jigs pa med cing gnod med par// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// bzlas 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas// spro ba'i sems kyis mnyam par bsgom// dbus/
445a6(rgyud): su mchog gi sa bon dang // phyag 'tshal a li mthar bzhag pa// yi ge drug pa'i sngags chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o// zlos dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// rang 'dod
445a7(rgyud): las ni mngon par 'grub// 'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen pa yis// de nas de yi mngon du 'grub// de nas kun gyi snying po ni// skye dang 'jig dang rnam bral ba// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas//
445b1(rgyud): 'dod bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed pa'o// rdo rje dril bu de nyid dang // ye shes glu ni gnyis kyi gzugs// rdo rje g.yas brkyang gnas nas ni// dril bu mnan pa'i rkang pas mnan// pad+ma rdo rje/
445b2(rgyud): sbyar byas nas// phyag rgya 'ching ba'i mchog tu brtson// dril bu lag gnyis kyis mgrin par// rdo rje gcig gis nu mar reg/ g.yon pas gzhung tshogs mtha' ru'o// tshems kyis ma mchu
445b3(rgyud): btsir mdzad cing // gnyis kyi sems kyis mchog brtson par// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnyis dang // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/
445b4(rgyud): thams cad stong pa'i de nyid ni// sems kyis rab tu spyad par bya// mthar ni sgrol ma'i rnam pa'o// dbus su a li swa bon ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phro// khams gsum kun gyi cha dang
445b5(rgyud): bcas// phyis ni gzugs nyid yongs rdzogs pa// gnyis ka yid 'ong gzugs mdzes pa'o// dbyig pa rdo rje 'jam pa'i mgon// 'od dpag shes rab kyi ni gzhi// rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor bas/
445b6(rgyud): mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya// rdo rje gsang ba mtshan nas ni// gnyis ka 'khyud nas bzlas par bya// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag nas// dbus su a li'i sa bon ni// rtag pa mchog
445b7(rgyud): tu phra ba nyid// bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// yid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga yis// kun nas yid kyis bsgrub par bya// shes rab rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba'i le'u rdzogs so//
446a1(rgyud): de nas thams cad snying po ni// mchog gi gtso bo bsdus pa'o// sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// gus pa yis ni gzung bar bya// shel gyi rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/
446a2(rgyud): dag pa'i dngos por bza' bar bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// dag pa'i ngo bor sgom pa nyid// de nas rtog pa mi rtog pa// bza' dang bza' min mnyam pa nyid// btung dang mi btung rang 'dod du'o//
446a3(rgyud): 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pas// sngon du dbang bskur dpa' bo rnams// 'bad pas brtul zhugs gzung bar bya// rim pa bzhin du zla ba dang // nyi ma 'am ni lo dus su// brtul zhugs mtshan
446a4(rgyud): nyid bzhi pa'o// yon tan de yi yongs su bza'// bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang // khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o// brtul zhugs rim pa 'di nyid ni// nan tan gyis ni gtor ma sbyin// de yi las
446a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad ni// ye shes de nyid 'bras bu sogs// de lta bden pa'i sngags kun gyis// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// bza' sogs ston mo'i rnal 'byor pas// zla ba tha ma'i nyid ma gzung //
446a6(rgyud): rang 'dod chos ni rab brtags na// thams cad sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// brtul zhugs ldan pa nyin re 'am// gal te ma 'byor pa na yang // dbyar zla 'bring po'i tha ma ni// lo yi nyi ma gzung
446a7(rgyud): bar bya// mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// skyon med sngags kyis sbyin byas nas// de yis dus rnams thams cad du// dpal dang phun tshogs mdun na gnas// rnal 'byor chos sogs la dga'
446b1(rgyud): bas gnyis med grogs mchog rab ldan pas// de yis chos la brten nas ni// mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya// stong nyid kyis ni gzugs 'jig cing // blangs pa'i chos rnams zad par byed//
446b2(rgyud): thams cad sdom pa nam mkha' ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam// thams cad nam mkha'i gnas su ni// 'o ma zla ba'i sa bon bsam// 'od zer 'bar ba mang po ni// dkar dang kun du
446b3(rgyud): zla ba'i mdog/ a li'i sa bon mchog gtso bo// dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya// skad cig rnam par sbyor ba yis// ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid ni// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid//
446b4(rgyud): kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// steng du rdo rje cod pan dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyad// rgod dang khro dang sgeg
446b5(rgyud): pa dang // spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// smad g.yogs glang chen lpags pa dang // mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol// mi yi yan lag lnga rus pas// rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan// skra yi rtse mo
446b6(rgyud): rab 'jam zhing // me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od// dang po'i phyag na kha T+wAM ga/ gnyis pa na ni dgra sta bsnams// gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // gnyis pa thod pa khrag
446b7(rgyud): gis bkang // ral gri phyag ni steng du'o// rdo rje 'od zer dri ma med// sangs rgyas sprin ltar rab 'phro ba// sa yis dbus su rnam rol bar// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// 'ug pa ce spyang seng ge dang /
447a1(rgyud): @#/ stag mo phyogs su rnam par bsgom// bya rog ce spyang bya rgod dang // tsi li ka ni mtshams su dgod// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog mche ba gtsigs// ha hUM rnam par 'jigs par byed/
447a2(rgyud): 'di ltar mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang ma// bdag nyid sems kyis bsgom par bya// rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni// gzugs brnyan la sogs dgod par bya// rnal 'byor pa yis bris sku sog/
447a3(rgyud): de yi gnas su kun tu bsam// 'dod dang grol ba'i go 'phang gnas// gnyis med gtor ma'i lha nyid yin// sbyor ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa pos// 'di mi mchod pa'i cho ga bshad// bza' dang ston mo
447a4(rgyud): de nyid dang // gsang ba'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyis hUM gi sa bon las// de yi gzugs la sogs bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i
447a5(rgyud): bdag nyid dgod// bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid// dag pa'i dngos por bsgoms nas ni// sgrub pa shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// yud tsam gyis ni sbyor ba yis// oM ha ho hrIHswA hA/ oM gyis
447a6(rgyud): 'bar bas bsam pa dang // ha yi rnam pas so sor rtog/ sa bon ho yis snang bar byas// hI yi rnam pas dri ma sbyong // lus kyi lha nyid tshim pa'i phyir// a yi rnam pas rtog par bya// sa bon lnga
447a7(rgyud): yis lha nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga nyid mngon par thim// oM dza~M g+hA traM hUM a swA hA/ bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid// sngags 'di yis ni gzung bar bya// oM gyi rnam pas lus dang ni// dzaM gyis
447b1(rgyud): rnam par bzung ba dang // b+h+rU~M gyis rnam par lto ba dang // traM gis rnam par dri med lus// hUM gis rnam pas spyad par bya// sems kyis snying khar yi ge a// de nyid rtag tu mchod byas nas/
447b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis sdig sbyang bya// dri dang mar me me tog dang // lha bshos dang ni gtor ma yis// glu yi dus su dbyangs snyan dang // pi wang gling bu la sogs sbyar// rtag tu de dag gis mchod cing /
447b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid brjod// 'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang // 'chag dang thams cad dus nyid du// rtag tu sems shing sems pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya//
447b4(rgyud): oM a mu hUM swA hA/ ye shes gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis// sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas// sdig pa thams cad thag bsrings shing // rang 'dod las ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung ba lnga las
447b5(rgyud): gyur pa'i sdig/ gang gi gsang ba dbye byas pa'ang // rtag tu bsgoms shing bzlas byas na// sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// oM ka ra ka ra pradz+nyA ma hA tik+Sh+Na pany+tsa oM bud+d+he ha/ oM kro d+ha hUM/
447b6(rgyud): hUM a A a mu mu mu swA hA/ sngags chen po yi sa bon 'di// sangs rgyas sems ni mdor bsdus pa'o// skyon med sbyor ba'i sgrub pa pos// thams cad de ldan pa'i sa bon ni// mtshan mo yin
447b7(rgyud): mtha' nyid dang // dang po ra ro hi ta dus la// 1phyis snod du chu dang ni// ma ga d+ha ni srang gnyis nyid// kun nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// bdud rtsi'i dbus su yang dag ldan// bdud rtsi
448a1(rgyud): bsam pa'i thabs kyis ni// shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas// yan bdun mngon par bsngags byas pa'i// de yi chu ni btung byas na// sdig pa thams cad 'jig/
448a2(rgyud): pa dang // ye shes bdud rtsi ye shes sku// yid gzhung shes rab rno ba dang // rlung dang gzi brjid dpal 'phel zhing // kun nas skul ldan dag dang ni// thos dang shes rab nor dang ni// rlung mkhris
448a3(rgyud): dug dang bad kan dang // 'dus dang glo sogs kyis gzer dang // mig dang yan lag gzer ba ni// chu 'di yis ni nad kun 'phrog/ oM ra ta a brta ni// sarba pA paM ha ran+tu me hUM/ bi kr-i ta kro d+ha hUM
448a4(rgyud): paT swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngag sa chen po// srung ba kun gyi bla na med// sngon gyi dus su bzhag byas nas// rnal 'byor lus ni srung ba'o// lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la// gnas lnga ru
448a5(rgyud): ni lan gsum mo// sangs rgyas lnga ni mngon bsams nas// spyi bo'i steng du bskur byas nas// rgyal po seng ge dgra sogs dang // rkun mo dang ni me dang chu// rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs dang //
448a6(rgyud): 'jigs byed 'jigs pa 'joms par byed// oM bi mo ha ne/ saM mo ha ni/ sar+b+ba pra ye ti hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen pos// 'gro kun rmongs par byed par gsungs// mi
448a7(rgyud): byams byams pa skyed byed cing // kun nas mdza' bar gyur pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa yini chu// sde dro'i dus su kha bkrus nas// rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pa// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par/
448b1(rgyud): gyur/ de nas sbyor ba mchog tu bshad// snying po las ni snying po mchog/ rdo rje la sogs bsgom par bya// gnyis su med par mnyam par 'dres// yan lag 'di yis tha dad bsgom// drug
448b2(rgyud): med pa yang dug gis bsnun// shin tu mi bzad rmongs pa yis// rmongs pa rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jig/ 'bad pas chos kyi thabs kyis ni// dag pa'i lus ni rnam dag byed// dag pa'i sgron ma bltas
448b3(rgyud): pa yis// nyon mongs la sogs mun 'joms pa// nam mkha' rdo rje rdo rje la// sems dang sems ni rnam par thim// gcig sogs dngos po sgom pa ni// 'di yi rnal 'byor mtshan nyid ni// me yi lhag ma sogs
448b4(rgyud): lhag pa// dbus dang dbus su rnam par 'tsher// de yi 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas blta// sa bon 'di yi myu gu las// a li ka li rnam par 'byung // sa bon sa bon
448b5(rgyud): rab 'phro ba// nam mkha'i khams su yang dag gnas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// ro langs ma yi dbus su bsam// pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par bzhugs// gdugs dkar po yis mngon par
448b6(rgyud): g.yogs// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa// lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang // spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis blta ba dang /
448b7(rgyud): na bza' dmar po mngon par g.yogs// mchog gi sems dang sems pa la// bdud rtsi'i yi ge rnam par bsam// lcags kyu'i rtse mor yi ge k+ShaM// bzlas shing 'di yis drang bar bya//
449a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan gyis ni yid bskyod cing // rang gis dbugs kyis dgang bar bya// oM rA ga ta b+ha tI hUM k+She swA hA/ lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor/
449a2(rgyud): pa yis 'drod bzhin drang // rmongs chen shin tu rmongs pa ni// mnyam par bzhag nas rab tu sgrub// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi gsum pa las// grub pa'i snying po
449a3(rgyud): bsdus pa ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa'o// de nas ye shes lus la ni// shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas// bza' dang bza' ba'i bsam pa yis// sbyangs dang rtog pa spyad par bya// /
449a4(rgyud): dngos po smad pa ma yin zhing // gang yang brtag par mi bya'o// mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs la sogs// mnyam nyid lha ni lnga pa'o// gang zhig skye ba po sogs pa// sems kyis gnod pa
449a5(rgyud): mi bya'o// gal te gnod pa byed soms na// rnal 'byor sdom pa ring bar 'gyur// gang zhig che dang phra ba yi// gzhan rdzas rang gir byed pa yi// rku ba'i sems ni mi bya'o// rnal 'byor sdom pa
449a6(rgyud): ring ba nyid// rdzun dang tshig rtsub phra ma dang // 'khyal pa'i ngag ni ring du spang // gzhan gyis sems la gnod byas pas// rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid// don dang ling ga rab sbyor bas//
449a7(rgyud): sbyor ba'i chos kyi sa snying po nyid// rlong pas log dkris ngag sogs kyis// de yi rab sbyor smod pa nyid// legs par byas pa'i las kyis ni// bde ba bskyed pa'i lus kyis ni// sems can
449b1(rgyud): bde ba lhur len pas// theg pa che la legs par bslabs// gal te sems can gnod sogs pa'i// mi dga' ba yi tshig mi smra// sdig pa'i las ni mi bya zhing // rnal 'byor gtsug lag mi smad do//
449b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor 'dod dga' ma yin zhing // rmongs pas rgyags par mi bya'o// phyag rgya 'ching bar rab sbyor bas// rang 'dod kyis ni bstan par bya// bsten cing bsten pa'i rab sbyor bas// lha nyid tshim
449b3(rgyud): zhing bsgrub par bya// sems can don gyi ngo bo yis// sems can bde bas phan 'dogs byed// theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu che// 'di yi lam gyis bsten par bya// gang dang gang du rab sbyor bas// de
449b4(rgyud): dang der ni phan pas bde// sems can sdom pa la sogs pas// de yi sems ni gdon mi za// 'khor bar skyes pa'i dus na ni// thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan// dngos po dngos po med byed dang //
449b5(rgyud): sems can don na a lir bsgyur// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgya// gsang ba'i gsang ba bcing ba yis// de yi dbus su bdud rtsi ni// skye zhing myu gu 'byung ba'o// 'dab ma gsum dang kun ldan
449b6(rgyud): pa'i a li mchog ni mtha' med do// gzhan yang bdud rtsi mchog nyid ni// phyi rol kun gyi snying po nyid// bdud rtsi yid 'ong skal bzang zhing // sems can la ni snyan par ston// sangs
449b7(rgyud): rgyas lnga yi kun gyi lus// bcom gser ltar 'bar ba'o// cod pan bcings shing 'phyar ba dang // phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras// rgod dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ni// rgyan kun
450a1(rgyud): #gyis ni rnam par brgyan// steng du rdo rje lcags kyu dang // gnyis pa rdo rje zhags pa'o// g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang // gsum pa lcags sgrog 'ching ba yi// phyag bzhi po/
450a2(rgyud): yi phyag rgya ni// gsang ba gsang sogs 'ching ba dang // lus dang kha dog 'bar ba ru// snang ba mtha' yas mnyam par gzhag/ ha yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni// yi ge mchog gi dga' bar byed//
450a3(rgyud): ho yi rnam pas lus dang lus// rnam snang mnga' bdag lha nyid do// sems dang sems pa bsgom pas ni// lha nyid du ni yongs su grags// thams cad lus dang lus can gyi// srog dang sems ni
450a4(rgyud): 'phrog pa'o// hI yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// oM gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'phro// kun nas sems ni rtogs mdzad pa'o// a yi rnam pa des tshim byed// blo dang ldan pas
450a5(rgyud): yongs su bsten// bdud rtsi chu yi lha mo ni// de yi shes bya rtogs pa'o// bdud rtsi gang gis myang ba yis// bdud rtsi yi ni 'bras bu thob// de bzhin gshegs dges lha mo ni// gzugs mdzes mchog
450a6(rgyud): tu yid 'ong ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam pa yis// phyag rgya bzhi pa bcing bar bya// rnal 'byor pa ni sgrub 'dod na// gnyis ni gnyis su med par bsgom// gnyis ni dngos po dngos med pas// ye shes ldan
450a7(rgyud): pas yongs su gsal// nga rgyal chen pos bcing ba ni// spro ba'i sems dang ldan pas bcings// sgeg dang khro dang tshul gyis ni// lha mo'i snying po nyid du thim// nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni// zla ba'i lag pas reg
450b1(rgyud): byas la// de yis 'khyud cing 'khyud nas ni// lha mo'i ye shes nyid du thim// lte ba'i ye shes me yi lha// me yi gnas su tshim par bya// shes rab thabs la thim pa yis// gnyis med sbyor bas tshim par bya//
450b2(rgyud): oM ha ho hrIHa/ sa bon chen po'i sa bon no// 'di yis bon bsam par bya// rim pa 'di yis mchod pa ni// sman gyi rgyur ni ma yin no// lha mo bkres dang sdug bsngal 'phrog/ sgeg cing snyan par smra ba
450b3(rgyud): dang khang rgyal med pa'i nga rgyal byed// brtson med pa yi brtson 'grus bcas// kun nas skal ldan lha mo ni// rmongs byed 'jig dang 'gugs par byed// yid mi gzhung dang ngo tsha 'jig/ lha mo snyan mas 'jo
450b4(rgyud): par byed// de ltar yon tan lha mo ldan// yid 'ong bdud rtsi snyan pa mo// 'dod dam thar pa'i go 'phang gnas// gang zhig lha mo 'di yi lam// chu sbyar ne tse gtam dang ni// sgeg dang gar ni lnga ldan pa'o//
450b5(rgyud): lha man brtson 'grus bdun pa ste// dran pa nyams byed brgyad pa'o// lha mo pho nya brgyad kyi las// myur du sems ni 'phrog pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yi bdag nyid sems// 'dod pa'i sems kyis rnam par byed//
450b6(rgyud): ji ltar gsum pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// 'bad pas thang kha sna tshogs 'gram// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par// kun nas pho nya brgyad pa ni// bud med gzugs su de
450b7(rgyud): yi tshul// phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu'o// gzugs mdzes yon tan ldan pa yi// dung chen la sogs lag pa na// gnas dang gnas la bdud rtsi'i chu// sha lnga yi ni snod la sogs// bza' dang ston
451a1(rgyud): mos nye bar mdzes// de yi gzugs brnyan mdun du ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// me tog spos dang dril stsogs// gnyis med gtor ma yang dag ldan/
451a2(rgyud): dang po re zhig dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya la sogs bcing bar bya// zla ba'i lag pa rab brkyang nas// rnam shes byed par kun tu ldan// oM hi lI hi li hUM phaT/ dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya
451a3(rgyud): yis mchod pa'i las la rab tu sbyar// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da ha ho hrIHa swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma'i leg pa'i gdan la ni// zla ba'i lag pa kun sbyar la// snying po'i
451a4(rgyud): snying dang phyag rgya yis// rang 'dod las ni rab tu byed// 'bum phrag gcig zlos rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// phyis ni me la sogs pa'i las// gnyis med gtor ma'i
451a5(rgyud): las kyis so// me thab kha ran gsum par ni// snang byed shing ni rab sbar la// lha mo'i me tog rgyas pa ni// sbrang rtsis bsku zhing sbyar byas la// bdud rtsi'i rgyu dang kun nas bsre// gang gi ming nus
451a6(rgyud): yang dag bzung // brgyad brgya ru ni bsregs byas nas// nges par dbang du 'gyur ba'o// me yI lha sogs thal ba dang // bdag nyid khu bo lan lnga ru// bdud rtsi dbus su sbyin byas na// bdag nyid
451a7(rgyud): 'dod bzhin dbang du byed// skyo byed sbrul ni lnga pa dang // su dza'i shing ni cha mnyam pa// bdud rtsir ldan par byin byas na// myur du skyo bar 'gyur ba'o// nim pa la sogs rtse mo la// mkhas pa yis
451b1(rgyud): ni bsgrub par bya// me tog bdug pa dri sogs dang // gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni// an dkar po rtsa ba las// 'dab pas me ni rab tu sbar// pad+mo zhib mo phye ma ni// 'o ma dang ni bdud rtsis sku//
451b2(rgyud): brgyad brgya ru bsreg byas pa yi// lhag ma'i thal ba bgos pa'o// tsi tra ka yi rtsa ba'i chus// lan bdun bgros la grib mar bskam// mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas// de yi thal ba
451b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi chus// myur ba nyid du bgos pa ni// kha ba kun da 'o ma ru// lus ni mongs pa'i gzugs dang ni// shin tu rmongs shing rmo ba'i dri// pho nya brgyad kyi lha mo ni// stobs dang gzi brjid don
451b4(rgyud): me'o// rnam rtog rmongs pa'i sems can la// 'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar// rmongs pa spang ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba myur du rtog par 'gyur// 'di yis phye ma blang byas la// dza ti mar khu lan
451b5(rgyud): gsum srang // bdud rtsi mchod pa'i dus su ni// thal ba lan cig bsres byas nas// thig le lce yi myang ba yis// pho nya brgyad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// pho nya'i mtshan ma yongs rdzogs pa// skyo zhing rgyag
451b6(rgyud): pa'o// smyo byed shing ni yang dag blang // 'bad pas me ni rab sbar la// me tog sbrang rtsi bdud rtsir ldan// brgyad brgya ru ni bsreg par bya// de yi thal ba blangs byas nas// rab tu sbyor ba la sogs bya//
451b7(rgyud): bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i gnas su ni// thal ba de yis byug byas nas// chu yi mdog ni gzhan du dang // de yi ro ni gzhan du 'gyur// sbrang rtsi 'o ma ldan pa yis// de gzugs snga ma bzhin du 'gyur// de ma
452a1(rgyud): / thal ba blangs byas la// ku sum pa yi cha dang bsres// bdud rtsi yi ni na bdun dang // ma ru rtse yi cha brgyad ni// mchod pa'i dus su chang la ni// de yi thal ba blugs byas na/
452a2(rgyud): gang la byin pa tsam gyis ni// bdud rtsi kun nas rang 'dod rig/ gang dang gang gi lam gyis na// de dang de'i ni rmongs pa rnams// sems can don du rmongs bsal phyir// rtag tu lam ni bstan par bya// gzhan//
452a3(rgyud): gyi don la brtson par bya// rang gi 'dod 'dri bsdus pa'o// sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang // shes rab dman la sogs pas dman// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni// gsum pa gtor ma'i las kyis
452a4(rgyud): ni dngos grub snying po bsdus pa ni// de yi dngos po bsdus pa'o// sngags sgrub pa yi don du ni// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyar bar bya// mchog gi gzugs brnyan rab sbyar bas// byin gyi rlabs kyis
452a5(rgyud): rin pas sgrub// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba ni// gzugs brnyan gyis ni thams cad 'grub// gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan par bya// sngon du ras kyi mtshan nyid dang //
452a6(rgyud): gnyis pa ta la'i mtshan nyid dang // gsum pa kha dog rim pa dang // bzhi pa gtor ma sbyin sreg nyid// gleng gzhi rang 'dod bskyed nas ni// ma nyams kha tshar yang dag ldan// steng 'og la sogs rab rgyas pa//
452a7(rgyud): ras la zhi ba'i ri mo bri// ma lhung ba yi yi dgas gos// ma nyams kha tshar bgo bar bya// mtshon gyis ma phog cha la ni// rgyas pa yi ni mtshan nyid do// yi dgas mo yi dmar po'i ras// ma lhung bar ni rab
452b1(rgyud): tu spyad// mtshon gyis ma phog rab sbyar ba// dbang nyid du ni yongs su grags// ra nag po yi pags pa dang // ba lang rta sogs gzhan dag la// gnag cing drag sogs pa yi las// mngon spyod las kyi mtshan/
452b2(rgyud): nyid do// de yi mnan pa'i gnas su ni// thig gi mtshan nyid gdab par bya// cha gsum du ni rab tu bgo// gcig ni 'og tu dor bar bya// cha gnyis lnga pa'i steng du'o// gsum pa gsungs pa'i zag nyid ni//
452b3(rgyud): tshangs pa'i ri mo dbyug pa ni// cha lnga la ni bdun du'o// lus ni cha gsum nyid du 'dod// zhe dang yan lag mnyam pa'o// zhal ni bcu gnyis cha nyid do// mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o// mgo dang sgra la'ang de nyid do//
452b4(rgyud): rna ba nyid kyang de yi tshad// zhal gyi cha ni gsum pa nyid// dpral ba lkog ma sna nyid do// smin ma'i mtha' ni rna ba'i lhag/ mig ni sor gnyis pa yi tshad// bug pa sor mo bzhi pa'o// doni mig gi mtshan
452b5(rgyud): nyid do// mgrin pa'i mtha' yi dbus su ni// brang gi cha ni gnyis kyis mnan// snying kha'i gnas dang lte bar ni// mnan cing kun tu mnan pa'o// nu ma'i mthar ni mnan bcas pa// brang du nu ma gnyis mnan la/
452b6(rgyud): lag pa gnyis kas mnan pa ni// lag gnyis kun tu gnon pa'o// sor bzhi pa dang ldan pa ni// brla dang rje ngar kun tu ldan// pus mo gnyis la sor bzhi'o// rkang pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin no// bcu gnyis
452b7(rgyud): tala'i tshad kyis ni// lha yi gzugs ni ri mor bris// lhag pa'i sor mo bzhi po ni// lha brgyad kyi ni gdan du'o// dgu pa yi ni gdan nyid ni// sor mo gnyis su bshad pa'o// dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil
453a1(rgyud): 'khor ni// kun nas na bza'i 'od zer sogs// rab zab rdo rje'i lha nyid ni// ta la bcu gnyis kyi ni tshad// 'og ma'i cha dang cha sogs dang // nye bar mdzes sogs ri mo bri// steng /
453a2(rgyud): gi lhag pa'i cha la ni// rigs ni lnga pa bstan pa'o// las kyi mdo sogs mdog tu ni// 'dod bzhin lha nyid bsgrub par bya// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba ni// bcu gnyis ta la'i rnam pa'o// de
453a3(rgyud): yi ta la'i tshad la ni// phyag gnyis kun nas bkug pa ni// sor mo gnyis ni rab dor la// gzhi pa'i lha yi rnam pa'o// de yi ta las zhal bzhi ni// gsus khyim che zheng che ba nyid// kun+da nas tshogs
453a4(rgyud): dang tshigs nyid ni// sor mo gnyis ni don par bya// khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma// bran pho bran mo mngag gzhug ni// drag po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs// ta la bcur ni bri ba'o// dkyil 'khor/
453a5(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod pa yis// mchod pa'i lha mo mngon par ldan// ras kyi brgyad kyi cha nyid ni// ta la'i steng du dor bar bya// dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rim pa ni// rim dang rim bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus
453a6(rgyud): su mnga' bdag rdo rje'i lha// gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bri// mgrin pa ko sko zhabs nyid ni// de gsum ring na nyes skyon no// sngags pa nges par bdag nyid ni// skrod dang gnas ni rlag pa'o//
453a7(rgyud): shangs dang snyan dang sor ma ni// de gsum zung ba'i nyes pa ni// nges par dngos grub drag pa dang // de yi dpal yang ring ba nyid// rje nga bzhag dang mkhur chos ni// de gsum sdom pa nyes pa che// nges par sgrub
453b1(rgyud): po'i bdag nyid ni// bdud dang bgegs dang dpal ring ngo // 'gram pa zang dang rtsibs logs ni// de gsum dma' na skyon che'o// yun mi ring ba myur du ni// nor ni rlag par 'gyur ba'o// ru ma/
453b2(rgyud): rna ba dpral ba ni// de gsum yon skyon che'o// 'thab mo yi ni dgra 'tshe bar// myur du sgrub pa po 'gyur ba'o// brang dang lus dang brla gnyis ni// de gsum dma' na skyon che'o// dgras ni 'jig par 'gyur
453b3(rgyud): ba dang // 'chi bar yang ni the tsom med// sna zhom mig ni yo ba dang // rna ba mchu dang dpral ba ni// bgegs dang bdud dang sems 'jigs shing // dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba nyid// gyen du lta ba'i dbugs dang ni//
453b4(rgyud): gdan ni yo zhing tha dad pa// brang dang mgrin pa yan lag ni// nyes skyon grangs ni med par grags// 'od zer yo zhing tha dad dang // phyag rgya phyag mtshan nor bas ni// mya ngan gdung bas sdug bsngal bar// sgrub po'i
453b5(rgyud): gzugs brnyan nyes skyon no// rgyab yol gdugs dang gdan rnams ni// rnam gsum dog pa'i nyes pa ni// 'chi zhing dpal nyams rlag pa dang // mi mdza' mdza' ba 'joms pa'o// de ltar nyes skyon skyon chen/
453b6(rgyud): pos 'dul zhing dul la bzod pa dang // sems ni shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// rnam par brtag cing rab tu dpyod// mtshan nyid thams cad longs rdzogs shing // mdzes pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bstan//
453b7(rgyud): sngags grub tu yi don dang ni// dbang dang dgug pa yi ni lha// zhi ba la ni zhi ba'i tshul// ngag la drag cing 'jigs su rung // dpa' zhing dpa' ba'i nga rgyal gyis// rgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang // khro bo'i gzugs kyi
454a1(rgyud): tshul dang ni// bran dang bran mo'i rnam par sprul// las kyi gnas dang gnas nyid du// bdag nyid kyis ni kha dog bsgyur// de ltar mtshan nyid mtshon pa yi// dngos grub myur du
454a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang // rnal 'byor pa yi 'dod pa las// sngags pas thang kha'i ri mo bri// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ saM bo d+ha ni/ bi shud+d+ha/ na maHsarba b+hi ga ha ra na nu hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags pa yis ni
454a3(rgyud): sngags 'di yis// ras dang skud pa bkru ba'o// thams cad las kyi sngags kyis ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs// gzugs brnyan so sor rab sbyor bas// sgrub pos thang khu ba sgrub par
454a4(rgyud): bya gzugs brnyan 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni// sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bya'o// yi dgas kyi ni gos blangs la// gtor ma la sogs ldan pa yi// nan tan gyis na thang kha brgyad// thig skud kyis ni ri mo bya//
454a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag gnyis pa la thang kha mdzes// rdo rje cod pan mthon ka'i rtse// sangs rgyas
454a6(rgyud): lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sgra// dar gyis dkri zhing rnam par 'phyang // rdo rje phyag gis gsor mdzad cing // snying khar gnon pa mchog tu brtson// g.yon pa'i dril bu mngon ldan
454a7(rgyud): bas brked pa'i mtshams su rnam par gnon// btsem gser gyi kha dog dang // sgeg cing shin tu bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje dkyil 'khor la brten par// khro bo'i 'od zer rnam par spro// dkar dang zla ba kun da'i
454b1(rgyud): mdog/ lha mo gsang ba'i snod mdzad cing // rkang pas 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar// phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud// tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// myos pas khro bo mchog gis te//
454b2(rgyud): rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku// chags pa'i gos dkar bsnams pa nyid// ba spu nas ni rdo rje 'phro// gdugs dkar po yis mngon g.yogs pa'i// 'di ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgya la/
454b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i lus can rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje shar gyi cha ru ni// mo gzugs ri mor bris pa ni// gzugs kun la sogs rab rgyas pa'o// gnod sbyin mo ni rgyal dbang 'di// rin chen gdan la
454b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa ni// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// phrag ni gtor ma'i snod legs pa// phyogs kyi mdog tu btso bar bya// dngos grub cani ster lha mo ni// lus ngan gyi ni sring mo'o// thug
454b5(rgyud): 'tshal tshul gyis 'dud pa ni// lha mo sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje byang gi cha la ni// lha mo snyan par smra ba ni// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgya la// pad+ma'i lus can ye shes 'dzin/
454b6(rgyud): pa'i gser btso ma yi mdog/ bzang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// gnyis kyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i snod// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis lta ba ru// mkhas pa
454b7(rgyud): yis ni bri bar bya// ye shes nub kyi cha la ni// lha mo snyan pa'i dbang phyug ma// bcom gser gyi mdog dang ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// thams cad mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa'i// lha mo
455a1(rgyud): gzhon nu grub pa ni// lcags kyu lnga sogs snod kyis ni// gnyis pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan// rdo rje lho yi cha ru ni// 'byung mo'i ming ni ska rags can// sku mdog sngon mo gzugs
455a2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// bdud rtsi bum pa phyag gnyis na// gzhan gyi sgeg pa'i yan lag dang // gshin rje yi ni sring mo nyid// dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni// thams cad
455a3(rgyud): kun la gzugs mdzes par// rnam par brtags te ri mor bri// rdo rje dril sogs rim par yang // dbang ldan la sogs rim par sbyar// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // phyag
455a4(rgyud): ni phyag rgya mtshan ma sogs// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgya la// rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam par bya// lha rnams dmigs pa dang bcas pa// sngags dang phyag rgya gtor mas mchod// oM sarba sid+d+hi
455a5(rgyud): ku ru hUM/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ nyi ma'i lag pa rab brkyang nas// ye shes kyis ni pad+ma mnan// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// yan lag
455a6(rgyud): drug tu bsrung bar bya// ye shes khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// dkar po dang ni sa gdugs bsgreng // 'khyil bar sa gdugs 'khyud byas la// dkar po'i lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // oM badz+ra
455a7(rgyud): aM ku sha dza/ phyag rgya de nyid brtan bcing la// dkar po dang ni gi'u wang sbrel// zhags pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis// kun nas lha mo bzhugs par ldan// oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas//
455b1(rgyud): rgya ba dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// gsang zhing gsang ba'i lcags sgrog gis// lha rnams kun nas mnyes par bya// khu tshur de nyid dam bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu yang dag ldan// sa gdugs badz+ra/
455b2(rgyud): spel byas la// kun nas lha nyid tshim byed pa'o// spos kyi phyag gnyis rab ldan pas// sor mo gnyis ka bslang byas la// zla ba nyi mar bzhugs byas la// snying rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// oM su
455b3(rgyud): ra ta badz+ra hUM dza/ khu tshur gnyis ni bcings byas la// nyi ma'i stong du kha sbyar la// shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM shri ye ba ti hUM phu swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings
455b4(rgyud): te/ ye shes dang ni rnam shes bsgreng // oM su tri le hUM phu swA hA/ byang gi phyogs kyi lha mo ni// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi'u wang bsgreng // oM su ru su
455b5(rgyud): ru ma du re hUM phu swA hA/ nub kyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas// sa gdugs pad+ma'i kha sbyin bya// oM pri ya me kha lA hUM phu swA hA/ lho phyogs lha mo
455b6(rgyud): rgyal dbang gi/ snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gnyis med cho ga'i sngags kyis ni// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// bdug pa me tog sogs glu dang // mkhas pas mchod pa nyi shu mchod// 'dod
455b7(rgyud): dang thar pa dge ba'i gnas// las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// rdo rje chos kyi bde spro ba// rnal 'byor sngags kyis sgrub par byed// de nas kun gyi snying po ni// khro bo gnod byed khro mo ni// dbye ba
456a1(rgyud): nam gsum su rang bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag pazhi// khros pa'i khro bo'i mchog tu spro// 'jig pa theg pa rnam pa gsum// lha mo'i lta bas 'jigs par/
456a2(rgyud): byedapa bdud dang 'byung po gcod byed cing // bdud dang gdug pa skems pa dang // gnon cing yul nas skrod pa dang // 'dod dang thar pa'i gro 'phang sgrub// tshangs pa mnan cing nyed pa dang /
456a3(rgyud): mur+t+ti drag pos 'gugs// 'jigs byed kun nas sgrub pa yang // mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// re zhig dang po bri ba'i sku// mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// bye ba bcu bzhi'i tshogs
456a4(rgyud): dang ni// sna tshogs gzugs can bzhin ngan pa// lha mo dka' bzlog gdan du ni// rgyab tu kun nas rnam par mnan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sprul// zhal
456a5(rgyud): gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid// 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i zhal// rol pas 'phen pa'i gdan la ni// tshangs pa'i mgo ni zhabs kyis mnan// spyan gsum khro la nga rgyal can// dmar zhing dmar ba'i/
456a6(rgyud): spyan dang ldan// 'khyil zhing rnam par dgyes pa yi// dbu skra dmar pos rnam par brgyad// rus pa'i thod pa'i 'phreng ba yis// sangs rgyas mi bzad cod pan no// bgegs kyi mgo bo bsam pa yi//
456a7(rgyud): klu gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan// shin tu rgod cing mche ba gtsigs// zhal gsum kha dog gsum pa'o// glang chen lpags pa bsnams pa'o// mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol// rgyan brgyad kyi ni gnas
456b1(rgyud): nyid du// dkar zhing rab 'bar rus pa'o// sangs rgyas mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dang // mche ba rno zhing sor mo 'bar// steng gi phyogs su mda' dang ni// gnyis pa la ni kha T+wAM ga/ gsum pas rdo rje gsor ba/
456b2(rgyud): 'o// g.yas pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // gnyis pa la ni thod pa'o// gsum pa gzhu dang kun nas ldan// rgan byad drag mo 'jigs su rung // zhags pas bcings shing rnam par brgyan/
456b3(rgyud): drag mo mnan cing mche ba gtsigs// khrag 'dzag pa dang brgyal ba ni// so sor dbus su brgyan pa yi// so so'i pho nya rab tu sgrub// tshen bdun gyis ni gos pa yi// rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu spro//
456b4(rgyud): khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'i lus// 'bar ba'i 'od zer rdo rje can// mi yi keng rus keng rus dang // gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs// ye shes khro bo dbang phyug bdag/ phrag cing shin tu drag
456b5(rgyud): pa 'dul// bdud rnams thams cad gnon mdzad pa// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams// zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// khro bo'i gzugs la sogs pa
456b6(rgyud): bstan// khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // ce spyang srin po khyi la sogs// 'jigs pa'i ku co rab sgrog dang // mi yi keng rus kyis bkang ba'i// de ltar gzugs brnyan rab sbyor bas// 'dod dang thar pa'i don
456b7(rgyud): gnyer dang // thams cad khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa'i// sngags pas gzugs brnyan bsgrub par bya// oM ta hUM ma tha ma tha duSh+Tan g+ha ta ya hUM phaT swA hA/ ba dan gsum sogs phyag rgya yis// las rnams kun
457a1(rgyud): nas rab tu byed// spos dang bdug pa la sogs dri// rgyas pa'i mchod pa kun ldan pas// dpa' bo mchod srog yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis// cho ga
457a2(rgyud): yan lag sbyin sreg las// gtor ma'i las ni khyad par nyid// ma brtags pa yi sha dang ni// khrag gis kyang ni de nyid las// gang gang dngos grub 'dod pa yi// de yi rnam pas tshim par bya// oM
457a3(rgyud): bi dzit+ti ni ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ zla ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// dkar po gi'u wang sbrel byas nas// sa yi gdug dang pad+ma sbrel// de nyid snying po phyag rgya dang // sngags de nyid ni
457a4(rgyud): rnam par sbyang // phur bu ra ba tsham rnga ma dang // dra ba go cha mtshon cha rnams// las kyi gnas su dgod pa ni// phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu drag/ phyag rgya 'di nyid snying khar bcing // ye shes dang ni rnam shes sbyar//
457a5(rgyud): oM kro d+ha ni hUM a/ snying po mchog gi sa bon dang // phyag rgya de nyid rnam par bya// lus dang srog la ltos med par// chen po'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// drag cing rno ba'i lha mo ni// rno ba'i sama?
457a6(rgyud): kyis grub par bya// cung zad zhi ba'i lha mo ni// thabs gcig gi ni mtshan nyid do// chu yi 'gram gyi sa phyogs su// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// 'bum phrag lnga ni bzlas pa dang /
457a7(rgyud): phyis ni 'bum phrag gcig gis so// zhi ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni// mi yi las la sogs pa byas// nag po ra yi sha dang ni// khrag dang rnam par bsres nas ni// bris sku la
457b1(rgyud): sogs gzugs brnyan mdun// rdzogs pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya// gtor ma sbyin sreg gis tshim bya// thams cad las ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag
457b2(rgyud): dang la mngon par spyod pa la sogs 'grub// dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yis// bum pa rgya cher mchod pa yis// nad kyis yan lag gzir ba la// sngon du dbang bskur byin byas
457b3(rgyud): nas/ nad kun dang ni bral ba dang // de bzhin gza' yis gnod pa nyid// skal ba dman dang mi byams pas// thams cad zhi ba thob par 'gyur// ser po'i tshon dang spra tshal
457b4(rgyud): las// log 'dren lha yi gzugs brnyan nyid// mnyam pa'i don la thal mo sbyar// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras// mche ba gtsigs pas yan lag rgyas// pad+ma'i snod la/
457b5(rgyud): gnas pa ni// rtse gsum dang ni bza' ba'i snod// dgra sta la phug phyag na'o// sor mo bzhi yi tshad du ni// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// bris sku'i gzugs brnyan mdun ni// 'khrul
457b6(rgyud): 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya// gro ga 'am ni shing shun la// gi'u wang dang ni gur kum gyis// sgrub pa po yi gzugs brnyan bri// gzugs dang rnam pa kun ldan pa// snying khar ming ni bre bar bya//
457b7(rgyud): g.yo dang lhung dang srog 'dren pa// lcags kyu kun nas ldan pa dang // dpral bar drangs nas gzhag par bya// bgegs kyi dbang po yi ni gdan// snying khar mnan nas gzhag par bya/
458a1(rgyud): me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod// nan tan gyis ni gtor ma'i las// don 'dod 'bras bu don gnyer ba'i// rnal 'byor pas ni sngags yig bzlas// oM \u0f7f/
458a2(rgyud): tha tha tha hUM dza sAhA/ me tog dkar po la bzlas shing // re re zhing ni brdeg par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs rdzogs na// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// sngags 'di yi ni sbyor ba yis//
458a3(rgyud): sgrub pa po yi yid g.yo zhing // myur du 'gugs shing lon pa'o// rgyal po'i dbang po dbang phyug sogs// rgyal po dang ni rgyal tsha ba dang // phyug po'i byis pa la sogs dang /
458a4(rgyud): shin tu mdzes pa'i bdag nyid lus// sha rtsi dang ni brgya byin sogs// gal te kun nas 'dod tsam gyis// sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur// ji srid lus ni 'tsho ba'i bar// dus
458a5(rgyud): rtag tu ni rnam par 'dud// nga rgyal yan lag gtso bo bas// nga rgyal gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo'i lus ni bsten pa yis// las dang las ni myur du 'grub// khro bo'i lus rnam par
458a6(rgyud): bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // spyod pa'i chos can kun bsdus pa// brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// ye shes longs spyod 'bras 'dod pas// spyod pa'i
458a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid shes par bya// mi bzang 'khor ba 'jigs pa ni// chags pas srid par ltung ba'o// chags pa spang ba'i lus kyis ni// rgyun du brtul zhugs yang gzung ngo //
458b1(rgyud): dben par shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa'o// chags pas srid par ltung ba dang // zhen pas 'khor bar 'jug par byed// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ring
458b2(rgyud): du spangs// sems can don du chos bstan phyir// sems can don byed gyur pas kyang // brtul zhugs dka' thub mi zad pas// dben par sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// chags pa'i nyes brtsa
458b3(rgyud): mtsher 'khor// bdag nyid nyon mongs las rgyal phyir// sems can don blo 'ba' zhig go// sems can don 'gyur dus su ni// spyod dang sdom pa'i sngon bzhin no// 'dra 'dzi dang bral dben pa ni/
458b4(rgyud): dag pa ru ni lus srung ngo // dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas// bstan bac+doMs tshig rnams blangs byas nas// sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan// rab tu rno bas chos spyod do// gnas dang gnas la'ang
458b5(rgyud): mi gnas pa'i// nam du yang ni mi gzung ngo // bza' dang bza' min par rtog pa'i// dman sogs nges par mi bya'o// 'bad pas rtag tu dga' ba yis// lham mkhan nya ba shan pa dang // /
458b6(rgyud): bram ze dmangs rigs rgyal rigs rnams// mnyam pa'i sems kyis lam gyis ni// rtag tu slong mo bslang bar bya// gal te gong du spyod pa'i tshe// gang zhig bza' ston zos pa dang // mal cha
458b7(rgyud): ras dang mchil lham yang // longs spyod longs spyod yid 'ong ba'i// brtul zhugs la gnas tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid// spyod pa spyod dgur rnal 'byor pas// bsod nams lag tu blang/
459a1(rgyud): bar bya// thams cad spangs kyang nyes med de// dngos po yang ni mi gzung ngo // sems ni rnam par dag pa yi// thams cad bza' zhing bza' ba nyid// dag cing gus bcas/
459a2(rgyud): nga rgyal gyis// de yis gnas ni yongs su spang // dad pas dkyil 'khor 'bri ba dang // yang na gtor ma'i las la ni// bsam pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po ni// de yi gnas su dbul bar bya// chos
459a3(rgyud): gos gsum gyi lhag ma ni// slar yang gus pa yis ni gzung // spyi bor ngur smrig mtshan ma dang // sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang // rin po'i tshem ber chos gos gsum// stong du rdo rje dbyug pa
459a4(rgyud): dang // lhung bzed mtshan khung chu tshags bcas// de ltar 'dzin pa'i lus la ni// glegs bam la sogs gzhan yang med// grog mo la sogs bsal ba'i phyir// rnga ma'i chun po bsngags pa yin//
459a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang // chos don rtsa ba snying rje nyid// de nas bskyab par bya ba ni/ a mra'i tshig gi sdom pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes rdzu 'phrul che/ mchog la skyabs dang skyabs snyam che//
459a6(rgyud): rdorje dbang phyug mchog gi lus// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo shes rab sbyor rang bzhin// mkha' 'gro lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mu ka sa ma yo ha sa ma ya/ a mu ka sa ma yo/ oM a mu
459a7(rgyud): ka sa ma yo haM sa ma ya/ oM badz+ra badz+ra ma hA badz+ra badz+ra/ kA ya su pa ra/ hi hi hi/ ho ho ho/ hUM na ni pa ta daM/ 'di yis slob ma rab tu gzung // brtul zhugs rdo rje rdo rje can// gnyis pa'i las kyis bsgrub par bya//
459b1(rgyud): sbyor dang gsang ba'i sngags rig pas// thams cad dus dang dus nyid du// tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod par bya// gang zhig pa dang gang zhig ma// gang zhig mdza' ba'ang mi rtag pa'o// sangs rgyas lus ni sgra/
459b2(rgyud): ma nyid// rtag tu chos kyis yongs su skyob// kye ma stong pa nyid kyi mthus// dngos kun rnam par mnan pa'o// sangs rgyas 'bras bu rab ster ba'i// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// rmongs pa
459b3(rgyud): gcad pa'i don du ni// dus gsum du ni tshig bcad brjod// 'chag dang nyal dang 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang 'gro ba thams cad du// sngags kyi sbyor ba brtan byas nas// sems dang sems kyis nyal
459b4(rgyud): bar bya// bskyed dang skye bar brgyud pa yi// 'byung ba lnga yi lus kyi sdig/ nyin mtshan gnyis kyi spyod pa yis// lus kyi dri ma dag pa nyid// zla ba drug tu spyad byas pas// rang 'dod lha ni 'grub
459b5(rgyud): pa'o// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mi shes pas kyang ye shes 'thob// de ltar yon tan rang bzhin zhing // brtul zhugs spyod pa yi ni rgyu// brtul zhugs sbyor ba sbyor ba yis// thams cad rmong
459b6(rgyud): pa rnam par spang // thabs kyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis// mnyam nyid lta ba rdzogs byas nas// rnam drag lta ba 'ba' zhig go/ kun nas stong pa mnyam pa'i ros// dngos po kun gyi mtshan nyid med// kun
459b7(rgyud): nas stong pa nyid kyi mthar// rnam par rtog pa ji lta bur// rmongs pas brtags shing rnam brtag pa'i// dag pa'i sems dang sems dpar bcas// rmongs pa nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i lus// 'dod pa khro bo'i
460a1(rgyud): bzhi de ni// rno ba'i sems kyis rmongs pa ni// ye shes ldan pa'i lus kyis dbye// sdum pa'i bza' dang 'jam pa'i gos// sna tshogs dbang pos reg pa yis// gti mug chag
460a2(rgyud): pas go bzlog pas// srid par ltung ba'i las su 'gyur// las ni bya ba'i dbang por 'gyur// rmongs pa ye shes mi rtag pa'o// 'dod dang khro dang nga rgyal 'joms// srid par 'ching ba'i
460a3(rgyud): bza' ba'o// 'byung po 'byung la rtse ba dang // kun nas sdig pa mi brtag go// mgon med sdug bsngal 'phongs pa la// nor bas mdar med gyur pa bzhin// 'jig rten 'dir ni rma 'bebs
460a4(rgyud): dang pa mtshang 'dru ba ni mchog tu gtso// theg pa che la legs bslabs pas// ngan 'gro'i dngos por yang ma yin// kun nas bza' dang legs bza' bas// yang dag dga' bas lus srung
460a5(rgyud): ngo kha rnying pa'i bza' ston dran pa yis// nges par bdag nyid dga' bar bya// sngon gyi brlab sogs bslab pa dang // sngon du thams cad bsdam pa nyid// brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam
460a6(rgyud): bzhag pas// mnar med dmigs pa med pa'o// sngon gyi mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis// sngon du bslab sogs bslab par bya// brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam bzhag pas// bslab pa gus
460a7(rgyud): pas bslab par bya// bud med 'jigs gzugs drag ma nyid// sra ni 'dzings shing 'khyil ba dang // ngur smrig dmar po 'jam pa nyid// phra mo'i rdul gyis 'jam pa bgo/ mi yi rus pas
460b1(rgyud): byas pa yang // bdud med rgyun du rnam par brgyan// brnyings pa'i tshem ber dmar po ni// mi yi pags pas g.yog par bya// snod chen po ni gnyis pa ru// gzung la dbang po lnga ni gzung /
460b2(rgyud): steng du rdo rje'i dbyug pa ni// mi yi yan lag rus pas brgyan// ba dan dril bu 'phreng ba ni// dbyug pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung // de ltar bsdu ba'i lus kyis ni// 'bad pas brtul zhugs
460b3(rgyud): spyad par bya// 'di ltar rdzas sogs dngos po ni// me bzhin 'bar bas reg mi bya// bza' dang btung ba la sogs gzhan// dang po bsdu bar yang mi bya// snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// /
460b4(rgyud): kun nas dga' zhing bza' bar bya// thams cad gnod med pas// dngos po kun nas yongs su spang // lus ni srung ba tsam gyis ni// slong mo'i bza' ba bslang bar bya// stong pa'i khyim dang dur khrod/
460b5(rgyud): dang khas mtha' dang ni dgon par gnas// mtshan mo kun nas bgrod par bya// bzlas dang bsam gtan mchog tu brtson// 'chag dang nyal dang 'dug pa 'am// shel gyi rnam pa'i sems dang ni// rang
460b6(rgyud): bzhin yongs su dag pa nyid// bzlas dang bsam gtan 'ba' zhig go// de yis thams cad 'grub 'gyur bar// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa nyid// sdig spangs rnam par spyod pa yis// 'khor ba
460b7(rgyud): ru ni mi gnas pa'o// thams cad dngos po dngos med par// rtag tu sems kyis lta ba nyid// bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru ni// de nas tshig bcad gnyis ni brjod// sbyin pa chos kyi srung bar ni// tshig
461a1(rgyud): bcad gcig ni gnang bar bya// e ma'o rmongs pa yi ni mthus// lus can kun nas dbang du byas// 'dod tshogs chos sogs mi bzad pas// mkhas pa yis ni yongs su spangs//
461a2(rgyud): dngos med dngos po yang ma yin// gzung dang 'dzin pa mi rtog pas// srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal zhing // dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba 'thob// gzhan gyis brtag pa'i longs spyod sogs// nyal dang 'chag
461a3(rgyud): par dus gsum du// rnal 'byor tshig bcad gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod byed pa'o// sems chen po yi sems kyis ni// brnyings pa'i rwas ni bsags pa yis// de yi
461a4(rgyud): gos su rab tu bgos// keng rus kyis ni yan lag kun// shin tu mdzes pa'i dbyig pa gzung // ba Ta ha yi chos kyi brdung // rdo rje'i glu ni blang ba nyid// sems can sgrol ba'i rgyu
461a5(rgyud): dang ni// grong nas grong du kun tu rgyu// dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam par gzhag/ dag pa'i sems ni mi dmigs pas// dga' ba yis ni bsrub
461a6(rgyud): bar bya// spyod pa yis ni rgyur gyur pas// rnal 'byor spyod pa don gyi rgyu// sdig pa thams cad rnam bsal zhing // nyes pa kun nas rnam spangs la// brtul zhugs zla drug spyad pa yis//
461a7(rgyud): rang 'dod ye shes 'grub par 'gyur// brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa rnam par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// de nas thams cad snying po no// mi nyid kun gyi don/
461b1(rgyud): bsdus pa// 'khor bar brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// kun gyi snying por rab sbyor ba'o// dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni//
461b2(rgyud): sngon du bsred pa la sogs bya// rdo rje'am shes rab rnal 'byor gyis// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas nas// phyis ni rang 'dod pa yi las// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// spra tshil la
461b3(rgyud): ni gzugs brnyan bya// tsha ba'i mar khrus byugs byas la// snying khar ming ni gzhag pa dang // tshigs dang tshigs su tsher mas dgang // skyur po tshwa dang ma ru tser// gzugs brnyan dang ni
461b4(rgyud): yang dag ldan// snod du bsres la yang dag gzhag/ ye shes lus la lus kyis ni// rkang pa g.yas pas mnan par bya// rno ba'i sems kyis bzlas byas pas// mtshan mo gcig gi mtha'
461b5(rgyud): ru ni// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// smin pa'i me la bzhag byas na// rgyal po myur du gdung bar 'gyur// dkon mchog grasum la gnod pa la// las 'di yis ni sbyar bar bya// hrIHa mo g+ha si si/
461b6(rgyud): da had ha pra d+ha gr-i hA hU~M hU~M phaT/ snga dro nyi ma shar dus la// me tog dkar po'i maN+Dal dang // spos dang mar me'i cho ga yis// zhi ba'i las ni rnam par bya// chu dang 'o ma bams pa'i snod// de ni gtor
461b7(rgyud): mang sbyar nas ni// sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// rgyal po nad dang bral bar 'gyur// oM a mr-i ta ba ra de hUM hUM hUM a a a/ thams cad las ni bsdus byas la// chu bo chen po'i rgyun la bskur//
462a1(rgyud): rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / de nas rab sbyor snying po 'di// sngags pas rab tu rnam par spyad// yungs kar/
462a2(rgyud): las ni gzugs brnyan bya// snying khar ming ni rnam par sbyar// rdo dang tsher ma lte bar ro// rkang pas mnan cing bzlas par bya// su trik+Sh+Na shU la hUM dza phaT sI me la bsro zhing gdung ba dang // lhag par bzlas
462a3(rgyud): shing gzhag par bya// 'di ltar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// mod la gzer bas yang 'dzin to// zhi ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga las// 'o ma dang ni sbrang rtsis bkru// chu bo'i rgyun la bskur byas na// gzer
462a4(rgyud): zhing gzer ba'i nad dang bral// oM sarba ka ri hUM dza swA hA/ gzer ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// de nas thams cad snying po yis// gzhan gyi las kyi mtshan nyid// sngon du bsnyen sogs
462a5(rgyud): bsten byas pas// las kun 'grub par 'gyur ba'o// nag po'i mtha' dang tha ma la// ba skam gyi ni lci ba las// bsgrub bya yi ni ming dang gzugs// dmar po'i tsan dan gyis ni bsku// bsgrub
462a6(rgyud): bya'i ming ni kun nas gzhag/ seng ldeng phur pas mig 'bras la// g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas shing // me la bdug cing bdugs pa yis// mig ni gzer
462a7(rgyud): bas 'dzin par 'gyur// oM tsak+Shu ma li ni hUM phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// zhi pa'i mchod pas mchod byas nas// oM badz+ra tikA ya hUM swAhA/ lan
462b1(rgyud): bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas// de'i 'o rgyun la bkrus na// bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel// mig 'bras rno zhing gsal bar 'gyur// mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
462b2(rgyud): cho ga'o// ljang tshor las ni bsgrub par bya// mkhas pas khrag gis bri ba'o// dug dang dur khrod sol ba yis// mig gi 'bras bu byugs byas la// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/
462b3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o// oM kriSh+Na bi ga li hUM khe phaT/ 'di yis sngags dang sngags kyis ni// bdag nyid lci bas bran par bya// de ltar mtshan nyid kun ldan pas// bsgrub bya
462b4(rgyud): myur du long bar 'gyur// sbrang rtsi mar gyis bsku byas nas// bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel// brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas// oM a mr-i ta lo tsa ne a s+yAhA/ long ba rab tu zhi
462b5(rgyud): bar byed pa'i sngags so// gzhan yang bsgrub bya sgrub pa pos// las ni shin tu rnam par spyod// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa// sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// bag zan
462b6(rgyud): las ni pad+ma'i dbyibs// bsgrub bya'i ming ni dbus nyid du'o// khyi yi sku yis bug pa dgang // tsha ba'i mar khus bskus byas la// g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni// brgya rtsa
462b7(rgyud): brgyad du bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra ba ke hUM phu phaT/ me la bsro zhing bsres pa yis// b+ha ga myur du bzlog par bya// shin tu gdug pa'i chung ma ni// 'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar// lan/
463a1(rgyud): bdun du ni mngon bsngags nas// sbrang rtsi 'o ma'i rgyan gyis bkru// oM su ko b+ha bi hUM he swA hA/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// 'ji ba'i snod ni thang byas la// pad+ma'i/
463a2(rgyud): dbyibs kyi rnam par bya// rno ba'i til mar yungs kur gyis// brag pa dragang zhing sbyor bar bya// rkang pa g.yon pas munan ni// seng ldeng phur pas brdung bya zhing // sngags ni brgyad brgyar rab
463a3(rgyud): bzlas na// b+ha ga gzir zhing gzi bar 'gyur// hri pi la ta hUM phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// b+ha ga gzir ba'i las nyid do// chu dang 'o mar bkru bya zhing // sngags dang mngon du
463a4(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// oM sarba sho d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// b+ha ga gzir sogs las grol lo// gzhan yang las kyi mtshan nyid ni// shin tu rnal 'byor pas spyad do// rgyal po lam gyi
463a5(rgyud): sa rdul brang // yang na bzhi mdo'i sa rdul las// pad+ma'i mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ni// b+ha ga'i snying po khrag dang ni// yi dgas phyag rgya phyag rgya yis// brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas// thi pri phaT/ 'di
463a6(rgyud): yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// pad+ma sdom pa'i las su 'gyur// oM a mr-i ta wa ti swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang // bla ma dang ni slob dpon spod// dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba ni// sdig
463a7(rgyud): gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// gal te rmongs shing khro ba ni// las kyis rtag tu byas nas ni// 'dis ni nges par ltung ba ru// sangs rgyas kyis gsung the tsom med// lus kyi rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u
463b1(rgyud): rdzogs so// / gsang zhing gsang ba'i de nyid don// snying po'i mchog ni mdor bsdus pa// rol mo bstan bcos sogs glu yi// de nyid thar pa go 'phang gnas// gnyis med dngos/
463b2(rgyud): po'i ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ji ltar 'gyur// gnyis kyi dngos po bdag min pas// gnyis dngos dngos po med pa yi// dngos po dngos min dngos med la// mnyam nyid lta ba'i sems kyis su// rnam
463b3(rgyud): par den dang brten bya med// rtog cing rnam rtog 'khrul pa dang // gzugs dang gzugs can zad par byed// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// sems kyi brtan pa'i gnas su ni// bsam gtan bsam prA/
463b4(rgyud): bsam par bya// dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// thams cad dbyibs su 'jig par byed// stong nyid stong la sogs stong pa'i// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' can nyid// dag cing phra la phra ba'i
463b5(rgyud): don// sems dang sems pa dang bcas pas// kun tu dngos po dngos med pas// thams cad nam mkha' bsdam pa'o// rtag cing rtag la rtag pa'i don// nam mkha'i khams ltar bstan sems pas//
463b6(rgyud): me stag rdul phran yan lag 'phro// chu skyar bzhin du brtag pa yi// rnam shes ye shes lhag ma ni// nam mkhar 'phro zhing snang ba'o// nyon mongs de bzhin mun pa ni// ye shes rdo rjes bcom
463b7(rgyud): nas su// rnam par shes pa lhan cig 'bar// ye shes snang ba sogs thob 'gyur// sems dang sems byung sems pa yis// rnam par lta zhing rab tu spyad// 'jigs pa med cing 'tsho
464a1(rgyud): med par// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// thams cad kun tu snang byed cing // thams cad 'od zer kun bsdus pa// snying po'i sa bon sa bon ni// dkar dang kun
464a2(rgyud): dazla ba'i mdog/ a li ka li rab sbyor bas// byung ba yi ni sa bon mchog/ sbyor ba 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni// mnyam nyid rnal 'byor pa yis sgom// sa bon nam mkha'i spros pa las/
464a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byas// ma lus sprin ltar spro ba nyid// skad cig gis ni spro zhing bsdu// phyis ni rang 'dod dmigs med cing // yi ge med pas yang bsam mo//
464a4(rgyud): gzugs ni stong par brtag pa yi// mnyam nyid sems dang sems kyis ni// ma lus rnam par bltas pa yis// khams gsum snang bar byed pa'o// de ltar sems kyis
464a5(rgyud): bsams pa yis// byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur// skad cig gzugs dang gzung nyid dang // skad cig phung po'i rnam pa dang // skad cig thams cad dbyibs rnams ni//
464a6(rgyud): de phyir mi rtag pa yi gnas// legs byas nyes byas ming can ni// nyes pas smad par mi bya'o// gzugs dang stong pa la sogs dbus// sems dang sems byung rnam par mtshon//
464a7(rgyud): dngos po'i lhag ma dngos med pas// de yi lhag ma gzugs med pa'o// ye shes ri mo 'bar ba yis// 'od zer mnyam par gnas pa nyid// de yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid// rnal 'byor pa
464b1(rgyud): yis rab tu spyad// rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi las// yang dag byang chub brtag pa'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni// sngon du bsnyen pa rab brtsams
464b2(rgyud): nas pa las dang don kun rab grub pa'o// ri rab rtse mor kun bsams pa// rang 'dod rgyal chen gzhal yas khang // sna tshogs rin chen rang bzhin mchog/ dril bu dra bas
464b3(rgyud): mngon par brgyan// gdugs dkar po dang ba dan dang // sna tshogs mchod pas mngon par brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni// dkar dang kun da zla ba'i 'od// de ni rgyan kun gyis
464b4(rgyud): brgyan cing // sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par chas// rab tu mdzes pa'i gos bsnams shing // phyag gnyis na ni rdo rje dril// 'od zer 'phro ba rnam mang po// kun nas rdo rje'i 'od zer 'phro// khams gsum
464b5(rgyud): pa yi rnam pa ni// sems dang sems kyis sgom pa'o// snying khar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dmar po'i hUM ni rab 'bar ba// spyi bor thig le me ri'o// ba spu'i bu ga
464b6(rgyud): nas 'phro ba'o// shar du rdo rje gzhag pa dang // lho ru mda' ni rnam par dgod// nub tu ral gri mtshon pa dang // byang du gzhu ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs bzhi/
464b7(rgyud): mtshams dang mtshams su gzhag par bya// 'di ltar mtshan nyid sngon ldan pas// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// a la'i sa bon gtso mo ni// de nyid ldan pas yang sngags bzlas/
465a1(rgyud): / phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar bzhag pa// 'bum phrag gsum du rab bsnyen pas// rdo rje'i lus dang lus nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur// sbas
465a2(rgyud): pa'i snying po snying po dang // rdo rje chos dang chos mchog go// rdo rje sems ni rjes mchod pa'i// hUM gi glu yi rnam pas bya// bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis// mnyam par bzhag pas byung bar bya/
465a3(rgyud): tri b+hu ba na dz+wa li ta mU rti a nu rA ya na wa ti/ rasmi se ha sra trik+Sh+Na d+ha sa su pa ra su pa ra sra wa ti/ ba hU bI da ru pa paM sha a nu ra yan ta ta ta wa ti/ na ta i badz+ra sa pa be sa ra li la
465a4(rgyud): ti swA hA/ gdan bzhi rgyud ni rgya chen las// stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa// de yi dngos po mdor bsdus las// snying po mdor ni bsdus pa'o//
465a5(rgyud): sde bas sbyor sgra dang rtog sogs med// don dang don ni yang dag bsdus// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i don ni sbas pa nyid// brda yi skad kyis
465a6(rgyud): bshad pa'o// gdan bzhi pa las yang dag par rabatus pa sngags kyi cha'i rgyud bshad pa sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs so// /
465a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
